tika-s0102t:5_1: padeso “karerimaṇḍapo”ti adhippeto. Dvāreti dvārasamīpe. Dvāre ṭhitarukkhavasena
tika-s0102t:5_2: aññatthāpi samaññā atthīti dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ pana bhagavā mahāgandhakuṭiyaṃ
tika-s0102t:5_3: avasitvā tadā karerikuṭikāyaṃ vihāsīti? Sāpi buddhassa bhagavato vasanagandhakuṭi
tika-s0102t:5_5: Pakatibhattassa pacchatoti bhikkhūnaṃ pākatikabhattakālato pacchā, ṭhitamajjhanhikato
tika-s0102t:5_6: uparīti attho. Piṇḍapātato paṭikkantānanti piṇḍapātabhojanato apetānaṃ. Tenāha “bhattakicca”ntiādi.
tika-s0102t:6_0: Maṇḍalasaṇṭhānā māḷasaṅkhepena katā nisīdanasālā “maṇḍalamāḷa”nti adhippetāti āha
tika-s0102t:6_2: kammasādhano, khandhavinimutto ca nivasitadhammo natthi, khandhā ca santānavaseneva
tika-s0102t:6_4: visayabhāvena yojetvā. Pavattitāti kathitā. Dhammūpasaṃhitattā dhammato anapetāti
tika-s0102t:7_0: Udapādīti paduddhāro, tassa uppannā jātāti iminā sambandho. Taṃ panassā uppannākāraṃ
tika-s0102t:7_1: pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhepatova dassitaṃ, vitthārato dassetuṃ “aho acchariya”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:7_2: Tattha ke anussaranti, ke nānussarantīti padadvaye paṭhamaṃyeva sappapañcanaṃ, na
tika-s0102t:7_3: itaranti tadeva puggalabhedato, kālavibhāgato, anussaraṇākārato, opammato niddisantena
tika-s0102t:7_5: “atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko”ti evaṃ kammassakatāñāṇe ṭhitā tāpasaparibbājakā.
tika-s0102t:7_6: Cattālīsaṃyeva kappe anussarantīti brahmajālādīsu bhagavatā tathā paricchijja vuttattā.
tika-s0102t:7_7: Tato paraṃ na anussarantīti tathāvacanañca diṭṭhigatopaṭṭhakassa tesaṃ ñāṇassa paridubbalabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:8_0: Sāvakāti mahāsāvakā tesañhi kappasatasahassaṃ pubbābhinīhāro. Pakatisāvakā pana tato
tika-s0102t:8_1: ūnakameva anussaranti. Yasmā “kappānaṃ lakkhādhikaṃ ekaṃ, dve ca asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti
tika-s0102t:8_2: kālavasena evaṃ parimāṇo yathākkamaṃ aggasāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ puññañāṇābhinīhāro,
tika-s0102t:8_4: Yadi bodhisambhārasambharaṇakālaparicchinno tesaṃ tesaṃ ariyānaṃ abhiññāñāṇavibhavo,
tika-s0102t:8_5: evaṃ sante buddhānampissa saparicchedatā āpannāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “buddhānaṃ pana
tika-s0102t:8_6: ettakanti paricchedo natthi, yāvatakaṃ ākaṅkhanti, tāvatakaṃ anussarantī”ti “yāvatakaṃ
tika-s0102t:8_7: neyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇa”nti vacanato. Sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya hi buddhānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānampi
tika-s0102t:8_8: savisaye paricchedo nāma natthi, tasmā yaṃ yaṃ ñātuṃ icchanti, te taṃ taṃ jānanti
tika-s0102t:8_9: eva. Atha vā satipi kālaparicchede karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahādinā sātisayattā mahābodhisambhārānaṃ
tika-s0102t:8_10: paññāpāramitāya pavattiānubhāvassa paricchedo nāma natthi, kuto tannimittakānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānanti
tika-s0102t:9_0: Khandhapaṭipāṭiyāti yathāpaccayaṃ anupubbapavattamānānaṃ khandhānaṃ anupubbiyā. Khandhappavattinti
tika-s0102t:9_1: vedanādikkhandhappavattiṃ. Tesañhi anubhavanādiākāraggahaṇamassa sātisayaṃ, taṃ saññābhave
tika-s0102t:9_2: tattha tattha anussaraṇavasena gahetvā gacchantā ekavokārabhave alabhantā “na passantī”ti
tika-s0102t:9_3: vuttā, jāle patitā viya sakuṇā, macchā viya cāti adhippāyo. Kuṇṭhā viyāti dandhā
tika-s0102t:9_4: viya. Paṅguḷā viyāti pīṭhasappino viya. Diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhantīti adhiccasamuppannikadiṭṭhiṃ
tika-s0102t:9_5: gaṇhanti. Yaṭṭhikoṭihetukaṃ gamanaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭigamanaṃ khandhapaṭipāṭiyā amuñcanato.
tika-s0102t:10_0: Evaṃ santepīti kāmaṃ buddhasāvakāpi asaññabhave khandhappavattiṃ na passanti, evaṃ
tika-s0102t:10_1: santepi te buddhasāvakā asaññabhavaṃ laṅghitvā parato anussaranti. “Vaṭṭe”tiādi tathā
tika-s0102t:10_2: tesaṃ anussaraṇākāradassanaṃ. Buddhehi dinnanaye ṭhatvāti “yattha pañcakappasatāni
tika-s0102t:10_3: rūpappavattiyeva, na arūpappavatti, so asaññabhavo”ti evaṃ sammāsambuddhehi desitāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:10_4: dhammanettiyaṃ ṭhatvā. Evañhi antarā cutipaṭisandhiyo apassantā parato anussaranti
tika-s0102t:10_5: seyyathāpi āyasmā sobhitoti. So kira pubbenivāse ciṇṇavasī hutvā anupaṭipāṭiyā attano
tika-s0102t:10_6: nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ anussaranto yāva asaññabhave attano acittakapaṭisandhi tāva addasa,
tika-s0102t:10_7: tato paraṃ pañcakappasataparimāṇe kāle cutipaṭisandhiyo adisvā avasāne cutiṃ disvā
tika-s0102t:10_8: “kiṃ nāmeta”nti āvajjayamāno nayavasena “asaññabhavo bhavissatī”ti niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi.
tika-s0102t:10_9: Atha naṃ bhagavā taṃ kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
tika-s0102t:10_10: ṭhapesi. “Cutipaṭisandhiṃ oloketvā”ti idaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena tesaṃ ñāṇassa saṅkamanadassanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:10_11: tena sabbaso bhave anāmasitvā gantuṃ na sakkontīti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:11_0: Taṃ tadeva passantīti yathā nāma saradasamaye ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāya caturatanike
tika-s0102t:11_1: gehe cakkhumato purisassa rūpagataṃ supākaṭameva hotīti lokasiddhametaṃ, siyā pana
tika-s0102t:11_2: tassa sukhumataratirohitādibhedassa rūpagatassa agocaratā. Na tveva buddhānaṃ ñātuṃ
tika-s0102t:11_3: icchitassa ñeyyassa agocaratā, atha kho taṃ ñāṇālokena obhāsitaṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ
tika-s0102t:11_4: viya supākaṭaṃ suvibhūtameva hoti tathā ñeyyāvaraṇassa suppahīnattā. Tenāha “buddhā
tika-s0102t:11_5: pana attanā vā parehi vā diṭṭhakatasutaṃ, sūriyamaṇḍalobhāsasadisa”nti ca ādi.
tika-s0102t:12_0: Tathā sāvakā ca paccekabuddhā cāti. Ettha tathā-saddena “attanā diṭṭhakatasutameva
tika-s0102t:12_1: anussarantī”ti idaṃ upasaṃharati, tena sappadesameva nesaṃ anussaraṇaṃ, na nippadesanti nidasseti.
tika-s0102t:13_0: Khajjopanakaobhāsasadisaṃ ñāṇassa ativiya appānubhāvatāya. Sāvakānanti ettha pakatisāvakānaṃ
tika-s0102t:13_2: “ukkāpabhāsadisa”nti. Osadhitārakobhāsasadisanti ussannā pabhā etāya dhīyati, osadhīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:13_3: vā anubalappadāyakattā “osadhī”ti evaṃ laddhanāmāya tārakāya pabhāsadisaṃ. Saradasūriyamaṇḍalobhāsasadisaṃ
tika-s0102t:13_4: sabbaso andhakāravidhamanato. Apaṭubhāvahetuko visayaggahaṇe cañcalabhāvo khalitaṃ,
tika-s0102t:13_5: kuṇṭhibhāvahetuko visayassa anabhisamayo paṭighāto. Āvajjanapaṭibaddhamevāti āvajjanamattādhīnaṃ,
tika-s0102t:13_6: āvajjitamatte eva yathicchitassa paṭivijjhanakanti attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:14_0: Asaṅgaappaṭihataṃ pavattamānaṃ bhagavato ñāṇaṃ lahutarepi visaye, garutare ca ekasadisamevāti
tika-s0102t:14_1: dassetuṃ “dubbalapattapuṭe”tiādinā upamādvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Dhammakāyattā bhagavato guṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:14_2: ārabbha pavattā “bhagavantaṃyeva ārabbha uppannā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbampīti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:14_3: sabbampi pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ. Titthiyānaṃ, sāvakānañca pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:14_5: bhagavato mahantabhāvo visesato pakāsito hotīti. Saṅkhepatoti samāsato. Yattakopi
tika-s0102t:14_6: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa pavattibhedo attano ñāṇassa visayabhūto, taṃ sabbaṃ tadā
tika-s0102t:14_7: yathākathitaṃ te bhikkhū saṅkhipitvā “itipī”ti āhaṃsu. Tassa ca anekākāratāya āmeḍitavacanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:14_8: pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, “iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo”tiādīsu viya ākārattho
tika-s0102t:15_0: 2-3. Vuttamevāti ettha ca idha pāṭhe yaṃ vattabbaṃ tena pāṭhena sādhāraṇaṃ, taṃ vuttamevāti
tika-s0102t:15_1: adhippetaṃ, na asādhāraṇaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanāya adhikatattāti taṃ dassento “ayameva
tika-s0102t:15_2: hi viseso”tiādimāha. “Assosī”ti idaṃ savanakiccanipphattiyā vuttaṃ saddaggahaṇamukhena
tika-s0102t:15_3: tadatthāvabodhassa siddhattā. Tattha pana pāḷiyaṃ “imaṃ saṃkhiyadhammaṃ viditvā”
tika-s0102t:15_4: icceva vuttaṃ. Ime bhikkhū mama guṇe thomenti, kathaṃ? Mama pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ ārabbhāti
tika-s0102t:15_5: yojanā. Nipphattinti kiccanipphattiṃ, tena kātabbakiccasiddhanti attho. Noti pucchāvācī
tika-s0102t:15_6: nu-iti iminā samānattho nipātoti vuttaṃ “iccheyyātha nū”ti. Nanti bhagavantaṃ. “Yaṃ
tika-s0102t:15_7: bhagavā”ti ettha yaṃ-saddena kiriyāparāmasanabhūtena “dhammiṃ kathaṃ katheyyā”ti
tika-s0102t:15_8: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Dhammikathākaraṇaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ “etassā”ti padassa atthoti āha “etassa
tika-s0102t:15_9: dhammikathākaraṇassā”ti, ādaravasena pana taṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:16_0: 4. Suṇāthāti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā, etena “manasi karothā”ti padaṃ
tika-s0102t:16_1: saṅgaṇhāti. Sotāvadhānaṃ sotassa odahanaṃ, sussūsāti attho. Chinnaṃ upacchinnaṃ vaṭumaṃ
tika-s0102t:16_2: saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ etesanti chinnavaṭumakā, sammāsambuddhā, aññe ca khīṇāsavā, idha pana
tika-s0102t:16_3: sammāsambuddhā adhippetā. Tesañhi sabbaso anussaraṇaṃ itaresaṃ avisayo. Tenāha “aññesaṃ
tika-s0102t:16_4: asādhāraṇa”nti. Paccattavacane dissati yaṃ-saddo kammatthadīpanato. Upayogavacane
tika-s0102t:16_5: dissati yaṃ-saddo pucchanakiriyāya kammatthadīpanato. Tanti ca upayogavacanameva
tika-s0102t:16_6: pucchati-saddassa dvikammakabhāvato. Yanti yena kāraṇenāti ayamettha atthoti āha
tika-s0102t:16_7: “karaṇavacane dissatī”ti. Bhummeti daṭṭhabboti yathā yaṃ-saddo na kevalaṃ paccattaupayogesu
tika-s0102t:16_8: eva, atha kho karaṇepi dissati, evaṃ idha bhummeti daṭṭhabbo. Dasasahassilokadhātunti
tika-s0102t:16_9: jātikkhettabhūtaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷaṃ. Unnādento uppajji anekacchariyapātubhāvapaṭimaṇḍitattā buddhuppādassa.
tika-s0102t:17_0: Kālassa bhaddatā nāma tattha sattānaṃ guṇavibhūtiyā, buddhuppādaparamā ca guṇavibhūtīti
tika-s0102t:17_1: tabbahulatā yassa kappassa bhaddatāti āha “pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā sundarakappe”ti,
tika-s0102t:17_2: tathā sārabhūtaguṇavasena “sārakappe”ti. “Imaṃ kappaṃ thomento evamāhā”ti vatvā imassa
tika-s0102t:17_3: kappassa tathā thometabbatā anaññasādhāraṇāti dassetuṃ “yato paṭṭhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:17_4: Tattha yato paṭṭhāyāti yato pabhuti abhinīhāro katoti manussattādiaṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato
tika-s0102t:17_5: abhinīhāro pavattito. Saṃsārassa anādibhāvato imassa bhagavato abhinīhārato puretaraṃ
tika-s0102t:17_6: uppannā sammāsambuddhā anantā aparimeyyāti tehi uppannakappe nivattento “etasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:17_7: antare”ti āha. Kāmaṃ dīpaṅkarabuddhuppāde ayaṃ bhagavā abhinīhāramakāsi, tassa pana
tika-s0102t:17_8: bhagavato nibbatti imassa abhinīhārato purimatarāti vuttaṃ “amhākaṃ…pe… nibbattiṃsū”ti.
tika-s0102t:18_0: Asaṅkhyeyyakappapariyosāneti mahākappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyapariyosāne. Esa nayo ito paresupi.
tika-s0102t:18_1: “Ito tiṃsakappasahassānaṃ uparī”ti etena padumuttarassa bhagavato, sumedhassa ca
tika-s0102t:18_2: bhagavato antare ekūnasattatikappasahassāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti. “Ito
tika-s0102t:18_3: aṭṭhārasannaṃ kappasahassānaṃ uparī”ti iminā sujātassa bhagavato, atthadassissa ca
tika-s0102t:18_4: bhagavato antare ekenūnāni dvādasakappasahassāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:18_5: “Ito catunavute kappe”ti iminā dhammadassissa bhagavato, siddhatthassa ca bhagavato
tika-s0102t:18_6: antare chādhikanavasatuttarāni sattarasakappasahassāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:18_7: “Ekatiṃse kappe”ti iminā vipassissa bhagavato, sikhissa ca bhagavato antare saṭṭhi
tika-s0102t:18_8: kappāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti. Te sabbepi padumuttarassa bhagavato oraṃ
tika-s0102t:18_9: sumedhādīhi uppannakappehi saddhiṃ samodhāniyamānā satasahassā kappā honti, yattha
tika-s0102t:18_10: mahāsāvakādayo vivaṭṭū panissayāni kusalāni sambhariṃsu. Buddhasuññepi loke paccekabuddhā
tika-s0102t:18_11: uppajjitvā tesaṃ purisavisesānaṃ puññābhisandābhibuddhiyā paccayā honti. “Evamaya”ntiādi
tika-s0102t:19_0: “Kiṃ paneta”ntiādi pubbanimittavibhāvanatthāya āraddhaṃ. Tattha etanti buddhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:19_2: saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyiṃ sandhāyāha. Ekaṅgaṇaṃ hutvā ṭhiteti pabbatarukkhagacchādīnaṃ, meghādīnañca
tika-s0102t:19_3: abhāvena vivaṭaṃaṅgaṇaṃ hutvā ṭhite. Lokasannivāseti bhājanalokena sannivisitabbaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0102t:19_4: Vīsati yaṭṭhiyo usabhaṃ. “Usabhamattā, dve usabhamattā”tiādinā paccekaṃ mattā-saddo
tika-s0102t:19_5: yojetabbo. Yojanasahassamattā hutvāti patamānāva udakadhārā yojanasahassamattaṃ ākāsaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:19_6: pharitvā pavattiyā yojanasahassamattā hutvā. Yāva avinaṭṭhabrahmalokāti yāva ābhassarabrahmalokā,
tika-s0102t:20_1: vasena. Mahābodhipallaṅkoti mahābodhipallaṅkappadesamāha. Tassa pacchā vināso, paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0102t:20_2: saṇṭhahanañca dhammatāvasena veditabbaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ padese. Pubbanimittaṃ hutvāti
tika-s0102t:20_3: buddhappādassa pubbanimittaṃ hutvā. Pubbanimittasannissayo hi gaccho nissitavohārena
tika-s0102t:20_4: tathā vutto. Tenāha “tassā”tiādi. Kaṇṇikābaddhāni hutvāti ābaddhakaṇṇikā viya hutvā.
tika-s0102t:20_5: Suddhāvāsabrahmāno attamanā…pe… gacchantīti yojanā. Vehapphalepi subhakiṇhe saṅgahetvā
tika-s0102t:20_6: “nava brahmalokā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi te catutthiṃyeva viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ bhajanti. Nikkhamantesūti
tika-s0102t:20_7: mahābhinikkhamanaṃ abhinikkhamantesu. Abhijāti panettha jātibhāvasāmaññena gabbhokkantiyāva
tika-s0102t:20_8: saṅgahitā. Nimīyati anumīyati phalaṃ etenāti nimittaṃ, kāraṇaṃ. Ñāpakampi hi kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:20_9: disvā tassa abyabhicārībhāvena phalaṃ siddhameva katvā gaṇhi, yathā taṃ asito isi
tika-s0102t:20_10: abhijātiyaṃ mahāpurisassa lakkhaṇāni disvā tesaṃ abyabhicārībhāvena buddhaguṇe siddhe
tika-s0102t:20_11: eva katvā gaṇhi, evaṃ pana gayhamānaṃ tannimittakaṃ phalaṃ tadānubhāvena siddhaṃ
tika-s0102t:20_12: viya voharīyati tabbhāve bhāvato. Tenāha “tesaṃ nimittānaṃ ānubhāvenā”tiādi. Tathā
tika-s0102t:20_13: cāha bhagavā “so tena lakkhaṇena samannāgato…pe… rājā samāno kiṃ labhati, buddho
tika-s0102t:20_14: samāno kiṃ labhatī”ti ca evamādi. Imamatthanti pañca buddhā imasmiṃ kappe uppajjissantīti
tika-s0102t:22_0: 5-7. Kappaparicchedavasenāti “ito so ekanavute kappe”tiādinā yattha yattha kappe
tika-s0102t:22_1: te te buddhā uppannā, tassa tassa kappassa paricchindanavasena parijānanavasena.
tika-s0102t:22_2: “Idaṃ ta”nti hi niyametvā paricchijja jānanaṃ paricchindanaṃ paricchedo. Parittanti
tika-s0102t:22_3: ittaraṃ. Lahukanti sallahukaṃ, āyuno adhippetattā rassanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “ubhayametaṃ
tika-s0102t:23_0: “Appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti avisesajotanaṃ “vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ vā”tiādinā aniyamitavaseneva
tika-s0102t:23_1: yathālābhato vavatthapetvā ayañca nayo apacuroti dassento “evaṃ dīghāyuko pana atidullabho”ti
tika-s0102t:23_2: āha. Idaṃ taṃ visesavavatthāpanaṃ puggalesu pakkhipitvā dassento “tattha visākhā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:24_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā amhākaṃ bhagavā tattakampi kālaṃ na jīvi, nanu mahābodhisattā carimabhave
tika-s0102t:24_1: ativiyauḷāratamena puññābhisaṅkhārena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti? Saccametanti. Tattha
tika-s0102t:24_2: kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “vipassīādayo panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha abhijātiyā mettāṭhānatāya
tika-s0102t:24_3: abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa mettāpubbabhāgatā. Tadanuguṇañhi tesaṃ visesato paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:24_5: ñāṇasampayuttatā, asaṅkhārikatā ca veditabbā, asaṅkhyeyyaṃ āyu ādhāravisesato, nissayavisesato,
tika-s0102t:24_6: paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato, pavattiākāravisesato ca aparimeyyānubhāvatāya kāraṇassa. Tattha
tika-s0102t:24_7: cirataraṃ kālaṃ santānassa pāramitāparibhāvitatā ādhāravisesatā. Alobhajjhāsayādiāsayasampadā
tika-s0102t:25_0: Ayañca nayo sabbesaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhavābhinibbattakakammāyūhane sādhāraṇoti
tika-s0102t:25_1: tassa phalenāpi ekasadiseneva bhavitabbanti āha “iti sabbe buddhā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā”ti,
tika-s0102t:25_3: kammaṃ hoti, buddhā pana tadā manussānaṃ paramāyuppamāṇānurūpameva kālaṃ ṭhatvā parinibbāyanti
tika-s0102t:25_4: tato paraṃ ṭhatvā sādhetabbapayojanābhāvato, dhammatāvesāti vā veditabbā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:25_5: pana tato paraṃ pana aṭṭhānassa “utubhojanavipattiyā”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, “taṃ lokasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:25_6: loke jātasaṃvuddhānaṃ tathāgatānaṃ na hotī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ. Tathā hi nesaṃ rogakilamathādayo
tika-s0102t:25_7: hontiyeva. Utubhojanavasenāti asampannassa, sampannassa ca utuno, bhojanassa ca vasena
tika-s0102t:25_8: yathākkamaṃ āyu hāyatipi vaḍḍhatipi. Āyūti ca paramāyu adhippetaṃ. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:26_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ samudāgamato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “tattha yadā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dhamme
tika-s0102t:26_1: niyuttā dhammikā, na dhammikā adhammikā, hiṃsādiadhammapasutā. Adhammikameva hoti
tika-s0102t:26_2: issarajanānaṃ anuvattanena, paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanena ca. Uṇhavalāhakā devatāti
tika-s0102t:26_3: uṇhautuno paccayabhūtameghamālāsamuṭṭhāpakā devaputtā. Tesaṃ kira tathā cittuppādasamakālameva
tika-s0102t:26_4: yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ uṇhaṃ pharamānā valāhakamālā nātibahalā ito cito nabhaṃ chādentī
tika-s0102t:26_5: vitanoti. Esa nayo sītavalāhakavassavalāhakāsu. Abbhavalāhakā pana devatā sītuṇhavassehi
tika-s0102t:26_6: vinā kevalaṃ abbhapaṭalasseva samuṭṭhāpakā veditabbā. Tāsanti ettha “mittā”ti padaṃ
tika-s0102t:26_7: ānetvā yojanā. Kāmaṃ heṭṭhā vuttā sattavidhāpi devatā cātumahārājikāva tā pana tena
tika-s0102t:26_8: tena visesena vatvā idāni tadaññe paṭhamabhūmike kāmāvacaradeve sāmaññato gaṇhanto
tika-s0102t:26_9: “cātumahārājikā”ti āha. Tāsaṃ adhammikatāyāti rājūnaṃ adhammikabhāvamūlakena uparājādiadhammikabhāvaparamparābhatena
tika-s0102t:26_10: tāsaṃ devatānaṃ adhammikabhāvena. Visamaṃ candimasūriyā pariharantīti bahvābādhatādi
tika-s0102t:26_12: balena visamaṃ vāyantena vāyunā pīḷiyamānā candimasūriyā sineruṃ parikkhipantā visamaṃ
tika-s0102t:26_13: parivattanti yathāmaggena nappavattantīti. Assidaṃ yathā candimasūriyānaṃ visamaparivattanaṃ
tika-s0102t:26_15: na vāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Devatānanti sītavalāhakadevatādidevatānaṃ. Tenāha “sītuṇhabhedo
tika-s0102t:26_16: utū”tiādi. Tasmiṃ asampajjanteti tasmiṃ yathāvutte vassabījabhūte utumhi yathākālaṃ
tika-s0102t:27_0: “Na sammā devo vassatī”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “kadācī”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0102t:27_1: kadāci vassatīti kadāci avassanakāle vassati. Kadāci na vassatīti kadāci vassitabbakāle
tika-s0102t:27_2: na vassati. Katthaci vassati, katthaci na vassatīti padesamāha. “Vassantopī”tiādi
tika-s0102t:27_3: “kadāci vassati, kadāci na vassatī”ti padadvayasseva atthavivaraṇaṃ. Vigatagandhavaṇṇarasādīti
tika-s0102t:27_4: ādi-saddena nirojataṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Ekasmiṃ padeseti bhattapacanabhājanassa ekapasse.
tika-s0102t:27_5: Uttaṇḍulanti pākato ukkantataṇḍulaṃ. Tīhākārehīti sabbaso apariṇataṃ, ekadesena pariṇataṃ,
tika-s0102t:27_6: dupariṇatañcāti evaṃ tīhākārehi. Paccati pakkāsayaṃ upagacchati. Appāyukāti ettha
tika-s0102t:27_7: “dubbaṇṇā cā”tipi vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ utubhojanavasena āyu hāyati hetumhi aparikkhīṇepi
tika-s0102t:29_0: Vaḍḍhitvā vaḍḍhitvā parihīnanti veditabbaṃ. Kasmā? Na hi ekasmiṃ antarakappe aneke
tika-s0102t:29_1: buddhā uppajjanti, eko eva pana uppajjatīti. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ
tika-s0102t:29_2: “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Cattāri ṭhatvāti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Yaṃyaṃāyuparimāṇesūti
tika-s0102t:29_3: yattakayattakaparamāyuppamāṇesu. Tesampīti buddhānaṃ. Taṃ tadeva āyuparimāṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:32_0: 8. Mūleti mūlāvayavassa samīpe. Taṃ pana tassā heṭṭhāpadeso hotīti āha “pāṭalirukkhassa
tika-s0102t:32_1: heṭṭhā”ti. Taṃdivasanti attanā jātadivase, taṃdivasanti vā taṃ bhagavato abhisambodhidivase.
tika-s0102t:32_2: So kira bodhirukkho sālakalyāṇī viya pathaviyā abbhantare eva puretaraṃ vaḍḍhento
tika-s0102t:32_3: abhisambodhidivase pathaviṃ ubbhijjitvā uṭṭhito ratanasataṃ ucco, tāvadeva ca vitthato
tika-s0102t:32_4: hutvā nabhaṃ pūrento aṭṭhāsi. Ayampi kiretassa rukkhabhāvena viya aññehi vemattatā.
tika-s0102t:32_5: Ghanasaṃhatanāḷavaṇṭatāya kaṇṇikabaddhehi viya pupphehi. Ekasañchannāti pupphānaṃ
tika-s0102t:32_6: nirantaratāya ekajjhaṃ sañchannā, tattha tattha nibaddha…pe… samujjalanti tahaṃ tahaṃ
tika-s0102t:32_7: olambitakusumadāmehi ceva tahaṃ tahaṃ khittamālāpiṇḍīhi ca ito cito vippakiṇṇavividhavaṇṭamuttapupphehi
tika-s0102t:32_8: ca sammadeva ujjalaṃ. Aññamaññaṃ sirīsampattānīti aññamaññassa siriyā sobhāya sampannāni.
tika-s0102t:33: Setambarukkhoti setavaṇṇaphalo ambarukkho. Tadevāti pāṭaliyā vuttappamāṇameva. Ekatoti ekapasse. Surasānīti sumadhurarasāni.
tika-s0102t:34: Ekova pallaṅkoti ekova pallaṅkappadeso. So so rukkho “bodhī”ti vuccati bujjhanti etthāti katvā.
tika-s0102t:36_1: ekattavasena vuttanti āha “khaṇḍo ca tisso cā”ti, buddhānaṃ sahodaro, vemātikopi
tika-s0102t:36_2: vā jeṭṭhabhātā na hotīti “ekapitiko kaniṭṭhabhātā”ti vuttaṃ. Avasesehi puttehi. “Paññāpāramiyā
tika-s0102t:36_3: matthakaṃ patto”ti vatvā tassa matthakappattaṃ guṇavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “sikhinā bhagavatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:37: Uttaroti uttamo. Puna uttaroti theraṃ nāmena vadati. Pāranti parakoṭimatthakaṃ. Paññāvisayeti paññādhikāre. Pavattiṭṭhānavasena hi pavattiṃ vadati.
tika-s0102t:39_0: 10. Uposathanti āṇāpātimokkhaṃ. Dutiyatatiyesūti dutiye, tatiye ca sāvakasannipāte.
tika-s0102t:39_1: Eseva nayoti caturaṅgikataṃ atidisati. Abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya vatthuṃ kathetvā pabbajjā
tika-s0102t:39_2: dīpetabbā, sā pana yasmā manorathapūraṇiyaṃ aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthārato āgatā,
tika-s0102t:41_0: 11. Nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvanti ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva parinibbānā niyataupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0102t:41_1: Aniyatuupaṭṭhākā pana bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyaṃ bahū ahesuṃ. Tenāha “bhagavato hī”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:41_2: Idāni ānandatthero yena kāraṇena satthu nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ upagato, yathā ca
tika-s0102t:41_3: upagato, taṃ dassetuṃ “tattha ekadā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī”ti
tika-s0102t:41_4: āha anayabyasanāpādakena kammunā codiyamāno. Atha naṃ bhagavā tamatthaṃ anārocetvāva
tika-s0102t:41_5: khemaṃ maggaṃ sandhāya “ehi bhikkhu iminā gacchāmā”ti āha. Kasmā panassa bhagavā
tika-s0102t:41_6: tamatthaṃ nārocesīti? Ārocitepi asaddahanto nādiyissati. Tañhi tassa hoti dīgharattaṃ
tika-s0102t:41_7: ahitāya dukkhāyātiti. Teti te gamanaṃ, “ta”nti vā pāṭho.
tika-s0102t:42_0: Anvāsattoti anubaddho, upadduto vā. Dhammagāravanissito saṃvego dhammasaṃvego “amhesu
tika-s0102t:42_1: nāma tiṭṭhantesu bhagavatopi īdisaṃ jāta”nti. “Ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vadanto dhammasenāpati
tika-s0102t:42_2: atthato evaṃ vadanto nāma hotīti “ahaṃ bhante tumhe”tiādi vuttaṃ. Asuññāyeva me sā
tika-s0102t:42_3: disāti asuññāyeva mama sā disā. Tattha kāraṇamāha “tava ovādo buddhānaṃ ovādasadiso”ti.
tika-s0102t:43_0: Vasituṃ na dassatīti ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāsaṃ na labhissatīti adhippāyo. Parammukhā
tika-s0102t:43_1: desitassāpi dhammassāti suttantadesanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Abhidhammadesanā panassa
tika-s0102t:43_2: parammukhāva pavattā pageva yācanāya. Tassā vācanāmaggopi sāriputtattherappabhavo.
tika-s0102t:43_3: Kasmā? So niddesapaṭisambhidā viya therassa bhikkhuto gahitadhammakkhandhapakkhiyo.
tika-s0102t:43_4: Apare pana “dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko paṭipāṭiyā tikadukesu devasikaṃ katokāso bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0102t:43_5: pañhaṃ pucchi, bhagavāpissa pucchitapucchitaṃ nayadānavasena vissajjesi. Evaṃ abhidhammopi
tika-s0102t:43_6: satthārā parammukhā desitopi therena sammukhā paṭiggahitova ahosī”ti vadanti. Sabbaṃ
tika-s0102t:44_0: Aggupaṭṭhākoti upaṭṭhāne sakkaccakāritāya aggabhūto upaṭṭhāko. Thero hi upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:44_1: laddhakālato paṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ duvidhena udakena, tividhena dantakaṭṭhena, pādaparikammena,
tika-s0102t:44_2: gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanenāti evamādīhi kiccehi upaṭṭhahanto “imāya nāma velāya
tika-s0102t:44_3: satthu idaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā taṃ taṃ nipphādento
tika-s0102t:44_4: mahatiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā ekarattiṃ gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ nava vāre anupariyāyati.
tika-s0102t:44_5: Evaṃ hissa ahosi “sace me thinamiddhaṃ okkameyya, bhagavati pakkosante paṭivacanaṃ
tika-s0102t:44_6: dātuṃ nāhaṃ sakkuṇeyya”nti, tasmā sabbarattiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ hatthena na muñcati. Tena
tika-s0102t:46_0: Vihāraṃ pāvisīti gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi. Ettakaṃ kathetvāti kappaparicchedādinavavārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
tika-s0102t:46_1: vipassīādīnaṃ sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ ettāvatā desanaṃ desetvā.
tika-s0102t:46_2: Kasmā panettha bhagavā vipassīādīnaṃ sattannaṃyeva buddhānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ kathesi,
tika-s0102t:46_3: na buddhavaṃsadesanāyaṃ viya pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ, tato vā pana bhiyyoti? Anadhikārato,
tika-s0102t:48: Kamhi kāle tayā vīra, patthitā bodhimuttamā”ti. ādinā –
tika-s0102t:49_0: Pavattaṃ taṃ pucchaṃ adhikāraṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā yassa sammāsambuddhassa pādamūle
tika-s0102t:49_1: attanā mahābhinīhāro kato, taṃ dīpaṅkaraṃ bhagavantaṃ ādiṃ katvā yesaṃ catuvīsatiyā
tika-s0102t:49_2: buddhānaṃ santikā bodhiyā laddhabyākaraṇo hutvā tattha tattha pāramiyo pūresi, tesaṃ
tika-s0102t:49_3: paṭipattisaṅkhāto pubbenivāso, attano ca paṭipatti kathitā, idha pana tādiso adhikāro
tika-s0102t:49_4: natthi, yena dīpaṅkarato paṭṭhāya, tato vā pana purato buddhe ārabbha pubbenivāsaṃ
tika-s0102t:49_5: katheyya. Tasmā na ettha buddhavaṃsadesanāyaṃ viya pubbenivāso vitthārito. Yasmā
tika-s0102t:49_6: ca buddhānaṃ desanā nāma desanāya bhājanabhūtānaṃ puggalānaṃ ñāṇabalānurūpā, na attano
tika-s0102t:49_7: ñāṇabalānurūpā, tasmā tattha aggasāvakānaṃ, mahāsāvakānaṃ, tādisānañca devabrahmānaṃ
tika-s0102t:49_8: vasena desanā vitthāritā. Idha pana pakatisāvakānaṃ, tādisānañca devatānaṃ vasena
tika-s0102t:49_9: pubbenivāsaṃ kathento sattannameva buddhānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ kathesi. Tathā hi ne bhagavā
tika-s0102t:49_10: palobhanavasena samuttejetuṃ sappapañcatāya kathāya desanaṃ matthakaṃ apāpetvāva
tika-s0102t:49_11: gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi. Tathā ca imissā eva desanāya anusārato āṭānāṭiyaparitta- desanādayo pavattā.
tika-s0102t:50_0: Apicettha bhagavā attano suddhāvāsacārikāvibhāviniyā uparidesanāya saṅgahatthaṃ vipassīādīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:50_1: eva sattannaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ kathesi. Tesaṃyeva hi sāvakā tadā ceva
tika-s0102t:50_2: etarahi ca suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā, na aññesaṃ parinibbutattā. “Siddhatthatissaphussānaṃ
tika-s0102t:50_3: kira buddhānaṃ sāvakā suddhāvāsesu upapannā upapattisamanantarameva imasmiṃ sāsane
tika-s0102t:50_4: upakādayo viya arahattaṃ adhigantvā nacirasseva parinibbāyiṃsu, na tattha tattha
tika-s0102t:50_5: yāvatāyukaṃ aṭṭhaṃsū”ti vadanti. Tathā yesaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ paṭivedhasāsanaṃ ekaṃsato
tika-s0102t:50_6: nicchaye na ajjāpi dharati, na antarahitaṃ, te eva kittento vipassīādīnaṃyeva bhagavantānaṃ
tika-s0102t:50_7: pubbenivāsaṃ imasmiṃ sutte kathesi veneyyajjhāsayavasena. Apubbācarimaniyamo pana
tika-s0102t:50_8: aparāparaṃ saṃsaraṇakasattavāsavasena ekissā lokadhātuyā icchitoti na tenetaṃ virujjhatīti
tika-s0102t:50_9: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nirantaraṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvāti abhijātito paṭṭhāya yāva pātimokkhuddeso
tika-s0102t:50_10: yāva tā buddhakiccasiddhi, tāva matthakaṃ sikhaṃ pāpetvā. Na tāva kathitoti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:51: Tantinti dhammatantiṃ, pariyattinti attho. Puttaputtamātuyānavihāradhanavihāradāyakādīnaṃ sambahulānaṃ atthānaṃ vibhāvanavasena pavattavāro sambahulavāro.
tika-s0102t:53_0: Kāmañcāyaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anāgato, aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattā pana ānetvā dīpetabboti taṃ dīpento
tika-s0102t:53_3: tena tesaṃ jātanagarādi paññāyamānaṃ ekaṃsato manussabhāvasañjānanatthaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:53_4: aññathā yathādhippetabuddhakiccasiddhi eva na siyāti dasseti, yato mahāsattānaṃ carimabhave
tika-s0102t:55_0: Candādīnaṃ sobhāvisesaṃ raheti cajāpetīti rāhu, rāhuggaho, idha pana rāhu viyāti
tika-s0102t:55_1: rāhu. Bandhananti ca anatthuppattiṭṭhānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tathā mahāsattena vuttavacanameva
tika-s0102t:55_2: gahetvā kumārassa “rāhulo”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Athāti nipātamattaṃ. Rocinīti rocanasīlā,
tika-s0102t:55_3: ujjalarūpāti attho. Rucaggatīti rucaṃ pabhātaṃ āgatibhūtā, ga-kārāgamaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:55_4: Itthiratanabhāvato manussaloke sabbāsaṃ itthīnaṃ bimbapaṭicchannabhūtāti bimbā.
tika-s0102t:57_1: ṭhapanavasena sabbaṃ vihāraṭṭhānaṃ chādetvā. Suvaṇṇayaṭṭhiphālehīti phālappamāṇāhi
tika-s0102t:57_3: Vuttanayenevāti cūḷaṃseneva. Suvaṇṇakaṭṭīhīti suvaṇṇakhaṇḍehi. Salakkhaṇānanti lakkhaṇasampannānaṃ sahassārānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:58_0: Bodhipallaṅkoti abhisambujjhanakāle nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ. Avijahitoti buddhānaṃ tathānisajjāya
tika-s0102t:58_1: anaññatthabhāvībhāvato apariccatto. Tenāha “ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne hotī”ti. Paṭhamapadagaṇṭhikāti
tika-s0102t:58_2: pacchime sopānaphalake ṭhatvā ṭhapiyamānassa dakkhiṇapādassa patiṭṭhahanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:58_3: Taṃ pana yasmā daḷhaṃ thiraṃ kenaci abhejjaṃ hoti, tasmā “padagaṇṭhī”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:58_4: bhūmibhāge idāni jetavanamahāvihāro, tattha yasmiṃ ṭhāne purimānaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:58_5: mañcā paññattā, tasmiṃyeva padese amhākampi bhagavato mañco paññattoti katvā “cattāri
tika-s0102t:58_6: mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva hontī”ti vuttaṃ. Mañcānaṃ pana mahantakhuddakabhāvena
tika-s0102t:58_7: mañcapaññāpanapadesassa mahantāmahantatā appamāṇaṃ, buddhānubhāvena pana so padeso
tika-s0102t:58_8: sabbadā ekappamāṇoyeva hotīti “cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva hontī”ti vuttanti
tika-s0102t:58_9: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vihāropi na vijahito yevāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Purimaṃ vihāraṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:59: Visiṭṭhā mattā vimattā, vimattāva vemattaṃ, visadisatāti attho. Pamāṇaṃ āroho. Padhānaṃ dukkarakiriyā. Rasmīti sarīrappabhā.
tika-s0102t:60_0: “Sattānaṃ pākatikahatthena chahattho majjhimapuriso, tato tiguṇaṃ bhagavato sarīrappamāṇanti
tika-s0102t:60_1: bhagavā aṭṭhārasahattho”ti vadanti. Apare pana bhaṇanti “manussānaṃ pākatikahatthena
tika-s0102t:60_2: catuhattho majjhimapuriso, tato tiguṇaṃ bhagavato sarīrappamāṇanti bhagavā dvādasahattho
tika-s0102t:60_3: upādinnakarūpadhammavasena, samantato pana byāmamattaṃ byāmappabhā pharatīti upari
tika-s0102t:60_4: chahatthaṃ abbhuggato, bahalatarappabhā rūpena saddhiṃ aṭṭhārasahattho hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:62_1: vipulaṃ, vipulatarañca hotīti attho. Svāyamattho cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-s0102t:62_2: veditabbo. Ettha ca yasmā sarīrappamāṇaṃ, padhānaṃ, sarīrappabhā ca buddhānaṃ visadisāti
tika-s0102t:62_3: idha pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā, tasmā tehi saddhiṃ vemattatāsāmaññena āyukulānipi idha āharitvā
tika-s0102t:62_4: dīpitāni. Paṭividdhaguṇesūti adhigatasabbaññuguṇesu. Nanu ca bodhisambhāresu, veneyyapuggalaparimāṇe
tika-s0102t:62_5: ca vemattaṃ natthīti? Saccaṃ natthi, tadubhayaṃ pana buddhaguṇaggahaṇena gahitameva
tika-s0102t:62_6: hotīti na uddhaṭaṃ. Yadaggena hi sabbabuddhānaṃ buddhaguṇesu vemattaṃ natthi, tadaggena
tika-s0102t:62_7: nesaṃ sambodhisambhāresupi vemattaṃ natthīti. Kasmā? Hetuanurūpatāya phalassa, ekanteneva
tika-s0102t:63: Nidhikumbhoti cattāro mahānidhayo sandhāya vadati. Jāto cāti. Ca-saddena katamahābhinīhāro cāti ayampi attho saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ buddhavaṃse –
tika-s0102t:66: “Eteneva ca sabbabuddhānaṃ visākhānakkhatteneva mahābhinīhāro hotī”ti ca vadanti.
tika-s0102t:67_0: 13. Ayaṃ gatīti ayaṃ pavatti pavattanākāro, aññe pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantā iminā ākārena
tika-s0102t:67_1: anussarantīti attho, yasmā cutito paṭṭhāya yāva paṭisandhi, tāva anussaraṇaṃ ārohanaṃ
tika-s0102t:67_3: katvā. Tasmā paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva cuti, tāva anussaraṇaṃ orohanaṃ pubbenivāse
tika-s0102t:67_4: paṭimukhabhāvena ñāṇassa pavattīti āha “pacchāmukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā”ti. Cutigantabbanti
tika-s0102t:67_5: yaṃ panidaṃ cutiyā ñāṇagatiyā gantabbaṃ, taṃ gamanaṃ bujjhananti attho. Garukanti
tika-s0102t:67_6: bhāriyaṃ dukkaraṃ. Tenāha “ākāse padaṃ dassento viyā”ti. Aparampi kāraṇanti chinnavaṭumānussaraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:67_7: pacchāmukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesanato aparaṃ acchariyabbhutakāraṇaṃ. Yatrāti paccattatthe,
tika-s0102t:67_8: nāmāti acchariyatthe nipāto, hi-saddo anatthako. Tenāha “yo nāma tathāgato”ti. Evañca
tika-s0102t:67_9: katvā “yatrā”ti nipātavasena visuṃ yatra-saddaggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Papañcenti
tika-s0102t:67_10: sattasantānaṃ saṃsāre vitthārentīti papañcaṃ. Kammavaṭṭaṃ vuccatīti kilesavaṭṭassa
tika-s0102t:67_11: papañcaggahaṇena, vipākavaṭṭassa dukkhaggahaṇena gahitattā. Pariyādinnavaṭṭeti sabbaso
tika-s0102t:67_12: khepitavaṭṭe. “Maggasīlena phalasīlenā”ti vatvā tayidaṃ maggaphalasīlaṃ lokiyasīlapubbakaṃ,
tika-s0102t:67_13: buddhānañca lokiyasīlampi lokuttarasīlaṃ viya anaññasādhāraṇaṃ evāti dassetuṃ “lokiyalokuttarasīlenā”ti
tika-s0102t:67_14: vuttaṃ. Samādhipaññāsupi eseva nayo. Samādhipakkhāti samādhi ca samādhipakkhā ca
tika-s0102t:67_16: gahito vā”ti ca. Samādhipakkhā nāma vīriyasatiādayo.
tika-s0102t:68_0: Sayanti attanā. Nīvaraṇādīhīti nīvaraṇehi ceva tadekaṭṭhehi ca pāpadhammehi, vitakkavicārādīhi
tika-s0102t:68_1: ca. “Vimuttattā vimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchantī”ti iminā vimutti-saddassa kammasādhanataṃ
tika-s0102t:68_2: āha aṭṭhasamāpattiādivisayattā tassa. Vimuttattāti ca “vikkhambhanavasena vimuttattā”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:68_3: yojetabbaṃ. Tassa tassāti aniccānupassanādikassa. Paccanīkaṅgavasenāti pahātabbapaṭipakkhaaṅgavasena.
tika-s0102t:68_4: Paṭippassaddhante uppannattāti kilesānaṃ paṭippassambhanaṃ paṭippassaddhaṃ, so eva
tika-s0102t:68_5: anto pariyosānabhāvato, tasmiṃ sādhetabbe nibbattattā, taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesānaṃ
tika-s0102t:68_6: paṭippassambhanavasena pavattattāti attho. Kilesehi nissaṭatā, apagamo ca nibbānassa
tika-s0102t:69_0: 16. Dhammadhātūti dhammānaṃ sabhāvo, atthato cattāri ariyasaccāni. Suppaṭividdhāti
tika-s0102t:69_1: suṭṭhu paṭividdhā savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ pajahanato. Evañhi sabbaññutā, dasabalañāṇādayo
tika-s0102t:69_2: cāti sabbe buddhaguṇā bhagavatā adhigatā ahesuṃ. Arahattaṃ dhammadhātūti keci. Sabbaññutañāṇanti
tika-s0102t:69_3: apare. Dvīhi padehīti dvīhi vākyehi. Ābaddhanti paṭibaddhaṃ taṃmūlakattā uparidesanāya.
tika-s0102t:69_4: Devacārikakolāhalanti attano devaloke cārikāyaṃ suddhāvāsadevānaṃ kutūhalappavattiṃ
tika-s0102t:69_5: dassento suttantapariyosāne vicāressati, atthato vibhāvessatīti yojanā. Ayaṃ desanāti
tika-s0102t:69_6: “ito so bhikkhave”tiādinā vitthārato pavattitadesanamāha. Nidānakaṇḍetiādito desitaṃ
tika-s0102t:69_7: uddesadesanamāha. Sā hi imissā desanāya nidānaṭṭhāniyattā tathā vuttā.
tika-s0102t:71_0: 17. “Vipassīti tassa nāma”nti vatvā tassa anvatthataṃ dassetuṃ “tañca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:71_1: Vividhe attheti tirohitavidūradesagatādike nīlādivasena nānāvidhe, tadaññe ca indriyagocarabhūte
tika-s0102t:71_2: te ca yathūpagate, vohāravinicchaye cāti nānāvidhe atthe. Passanakusalatāyāti dassane
tika-s0102t:71_3: nipuṇabhāvena. Yāthāvato ñeyyaṃ bujjhatīti bodhi, so eva sattayogato bodhisattoti
tika-s0102t:71_4: āha “paṇḍitasatto bujjhanakasatto”ti. Sucintitacintitādinā pana paṇḍitabhāve vattabbameva
tika-s0102t:71_5: natthi. Yadā ca panānena mahābhinīhāro kato, tato paṭṭhāya mahābodhiyaṃ ekantaninnattā
tika-s0102t:71_6: bodhimhi satto bodhisattoti āha “bodhisaṅkhātesū”tiādi. Maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi sabbaññutañāṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:71_8: catutthāya gabbhāvakkantiyā okkamīti dasseti. Catasso hi gabbhāvakkantiyo idhekacco
tika-s0102t:71_9: gabbho mātukucchiyaṃ okkamane, ṭhāne, nikkhamaneti tīsu ṭhānesu asampajāno hoti,
tika-s0102t:71_10: ekacco paṭhame ṭhāne sampajāno, na itaresu, ekacco paṭhame, dutiye ca ṭhāne sampajāno,
tika-s0102t:71_11: na tatiye, ekacco tīsupi ṭhānesu sampajāno hoti. Tattha paṭhamā gabbhāvakkanti lokiyamahājanassa
tika-s0102t:71_12: vasena vuttā, dutiyā asītimahāsāvakānaṃ vasena, tatiyā dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ, paccekabuddhānañca
tika-s0102t:71_13: vasena. Te kira kammajavātehi uddhaṃpādā adhosirā anekasataporise papāte viya yonimukhe
tika-s0102t:71_14: khittā tāḷacchiggaḷena hatthī viya sambādhena yonimukhena nikkhamantā mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ
tika-s0102t:71_15: pāpuṇanti, tena nesaṃ “mayaṃ nikkhamāmā”ti sampajaññaṃ na hoti. Catutthā sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ
tika-s0102t:71_16: vasena. Te hi mātukucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantāpi pajānanti, tattha vasantāpi pajānanti,
tika-s0102t:71_17: nikkhamanakālepi pajānanti. Na hi te kammajavātā uddhaṃpāde adhosire katvā khipituṃ
tika-s0102t:71_18: sakkonti, dve hatthe pasāritvā akkhīni ummīletvā ṭhitakāva nikkhamantīti. Ñāṇena
tika-s0102t:71_19: paricchinditvāti pubbabhāge pañcamahāvilokanañāṇehi ceva “idāni cavāmī”ti cutiparicchindanañāṇena
tika-s0102t:71_20: ca aparabhāge “idha mayā paṭisandhi gahitā”ti paṭisandhiparicchindanañāṇena ca paricchijja jānitvā.
tika-s0102t:72_0: Pañcannaṃ mahāpariccāgānaṃ, ñātatthacariyādīnañca satipi pāramiyā pariyāpannabhāve
tika-s0102t:72_1: sambhāravisesabhāvadassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tattha aṅgapariccāgo, nayanapariccāgo,
tika-s0102t:72_2: attapariccāgo, rajjapariccāgo, puttadārapariccāgoti ime pañca mahāpariccāgā. Tatthāpi
tika-s0102t:72_4: sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca mahāpariccāgānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tato eva ca aṅgapariccāgatopi
tika-s0102t:72_6: kataṃ. Ñātīnaṃ atthacariyā ñātatthacariyā, sā ca kho karuṇāyanavasena. Tathā sattalokassa
tika-s0102t:72_9: ca attano, paresañca tattha satipaṭṭhānena ñāṇacāro buddhacariyā, sā panatthato paññāpāramīyeva,
tika-s0102t:72_10: ñāṇasambhāravisesatādassanatthaṃ pana visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Buddhacariyānanti bahuvacananiddesena
tika-s0102t:72_13: sātisayapaṭipatti pubbacariyā. “Yāva cariyāpiṭake saṅgahitā abhinīhāro pubbayogo,
tika-s0102t:72_14: kāyādivivekavasena ekacariyā pubbacariyā”ti keci. Dānādīnañceva appicchatādīnañca
tika-s0102t:72_15: saṃsāranibbānesu ādīnavānisaṃsānañca vibhāvanavasena, sattānaṃ bodhittaye patiṭṭhāpanaparipācanavasena
tika-s0102t:72_16: ca pavattakathā dhammakkhānaṃ. Koṭiṃ patvāti paraṃ pariyantaṃ paramukkaṃsaṃ pāpuṇitvā.
tika-s0102t:72_18: uppādetvā dinnadānaṃ, maṅgalahatthidānaṃ, gamanakāle dinnaṃ sattasattakamahādānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:72_19: maggaṃ gacchantena dinnaṃ assadānaṃ, rathadānaṃ, puttadānaṃ, bhariyādānanti imāni
tika-s0102t:73_0: “Idāneva me maraṇaṃ hotū”ti adhimuccitvā kālakaraṇaṃ adhimuttikālakiriyā, taṃ bodhisattānaṃyeva,
tika-s0102t:73_1: na aññesaṃ. Bodhisattā kira dīghāyukadevaloke ṭhitā “idha ṭhitassa me bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:73_2: na sambhavatī”ti katvā tattha vāsato nibbindamānasā honti, tadā vimānaṃ pavisitvā
tika-s0102t:73_3: akkhīni nimīletvā “ito uddhaṃ me jīvitaṃ nappavattatū”ti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisīdanti,
tika-s0102t:73_4: cittādhiṭṭhānasamanantarameva maraṇaṃ hoti. Pāramīdhammānañhi ukkaṃsappavattiyā tasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:73_5: tasmiṃ attabhāve abhiññāsamāpattīhi santānassa visesitattā attasinehassa tanubhāvena,
tika-s0102t:73_6: sattesu ca mahākaruṇāya uḷārabhāvena adhiṭṭhānassa tikkhavisadabhāvāpattiyā bodhisattānaṃ
tika-s0102t:73_7: adhippāyā samijjhanti. Citte, viya kammesu ca nesaṃ vasībhāvo, tasmā yattha upapannānaṃ
tika-s0102t:73_8: pāramiyo sammadeva paribrūhanti. Vuttanayena kālaṃ katvā tattha upapajjanti. Tathā
tika-s0102t:73_9: hi amhākaṃ mahāsatto imasmiṃyeva kappe nānājātīsu aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke
tika-s0102t:73_10: nibbatto, appakameva kālaṃ tattha ṭhatvā tato cavitvā manussaloke nibbatto, pāramīsambharaṇapasuto
tika-s0102t:73_11: ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ “bodhisattānaṃyeva, na aññesa”nti. “Ekenaattabhāvena antarena
tika-s0102t:73_12: pāramīnaṃ sabbaso pūritattā”ti iminā payojanābhāvato tattha ṭhatvā adhimuttikālakiriyā
tika-s0102t:73_13: nāma nāhosīti dasseti. Api ca tattha yāvatāyukaṭṭhānaṃ carimabhave anekamahānidhisamuṭṭhānapubbikāya
tika-s0102t:73_14: dibbasampattisadisāya mahāsampattiyā nibbatti viya, buddhabhūtassa asadisadānādivasena
tika-s0102t:73_15: anaññasādhāraṇalābhuppatti viya ca “ito paraṃ mahāpurisassa dibbasampattianubhavanaṃ
tika-s0102t:73_16: nāma natthī”ti ussāhajātassa puññasambhārassa vasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayañhettha dhammatā.
tika-s0102t:74_0: Manussagaṇanāvasena, na devagaṇanāvasena. Pubbanimittānīti cutiyā pubbanimittāni.
tika-s0102t:74_1: Amilāyitvāti ettha amilātaggahaṇeneva tāsaṃ mālānaṃ vaṇṇasampadāyapi gandhasampadāyapi
tika-s0102t:74_2: sobhāsampadāyapi avināso dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bāhirabbhantarānaṃ rajojallānaṃ lepassapi
tika-s0102t:74_3: abhāvato devānaṃ sarīragatāni vatthāni sabbakālaṃ parisuddhappabhassarāneva hutvā
tika-s0102t:74_4: tiṭṭhantīti āha “vatthesupi eseva nayo”ti. Neva sītaṃ na uṇhanti yassa sītassa paṭikāravasena
tika-s0102t:74_5: adhikaṃ seviyamānaṃ uṇhaṃ, sayameva vā kharataraṃ hutvā abhibhavantaṃ sarīre sedaṃ
tika-s0102t:74_6: uppādeyya, tādisaṃ neva sītaṃ, na uṇhaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ kāleti yathāvuttamaraṇāsannakāle.
tika-s0102t:74_7: Bindubinduvasenāti chinnasuttāya āmuttamuttāvaliyā nipatantā muttaguḷikā viya bindu
tika-s0102t:74_8: bindu hutvā. Sedāti sedadhārā muccanti. Dantānaṃ khaṇḍitabhāvo khaṇḍiccaṃ. Kesānaṃ
tika-s0102t:74_9: palitabhāvo pāliccaṃ. Ādi-saddena valittacataṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Kilantarūpo attabhāvo
tika-s0102t:74_10: hoti, na pana khaṇḍiccapāliccādīti adhippāyo. Ukkaṇṭhitāti anabhirati. Sā natthi
tika-s0102t:74_11: uparūpari uḷārauḷārānameva bhogānaṃ visesato duvijānanānaṃ upatiṭṭhahanato. Nissasantīti
tika-s0102t:74_12: uṇhaṃ nissasanti. Vijambhantīti anabhirativasena vijambhanaṃ karonti.
tika-s0102t:75_0: Paṇḍitā evāti buddhisampannā eva devatā. Yathā devatā sampatijātā “kīdisena puññakammena
tika-s0102t:75_1: idha nibbattā”ti cintetvā “iminā nāma puññakammena idha nibbattā”ti jānanti, evaṃ
tika-s0102t:75_2: atītabhave attanā kataṃ, aññadāpi vā ekaccaṃ puññakammaṃ jānantiyeva mahāpuññāti
tika-s0102t:76_0: Na paññāyanti ciratarakālattā paramāyuno. Aniyyānikanti na niyyānāvahaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-s0102t:76_1: abhājanabhāvato. Sattā na paramāyuno honti nāma pāpussannatāyāti āha “tadā hi sattā
tika-s0102t:76_2: ussannakilesā hontī”ti. Etthāha – kasmā sammāsambuddhā manussaloke eva uppajjanti,
tika-s0102t:76_3: na devabrahmalokesūti? Devaloke tāva nuppajjanti brahmacariyavāsassa anokāsabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:76_4: tathā anacchariyabhāvato. Acchariyadhammā hi buddhā bhagavanto, tesaṃ sā acchariyadhammatā
tika-s0102t:76_5: devattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ na pākaṭā hoti yathā manussabhūtānaṃ, devabhūte hi sammāsambuddhe
tika-s0102t:76_6: dissamānaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ devānubhāvato loko dahati, na buddhānubhāvato, tathā sati
tika-s0102t:76_7: “sammāsambuddho”ti nādhimuccati na sampasīdati, issaraguttaggāhaṃ na vissajjeti,
tika-s0102t:76_8: devattabhāvassa ca cirakālādhiṭṭhānato ekaccasassatavādato na parimuccati. Brahmaloke
tika-s0102t:76_9: nuppajjantīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sattānaṃ tādisaggāhavinimocanatthañhi buddhā bhagavanto
tika-s0102t:76_10: manussasugatiyaṃyeva uppajjanti, na devasugatiyaṃ. Manussasugatiyaṃ uppajjantāpi
tika-s0102t:76_11: opapātikā na honti, sati ca opapātikūpapattiyaṃ vuttadosānativattanato, dhammaveneyyānaṃ
tika-s0102t:76_12: dhammatantiyā ṭhapanassa viya dhātuveneyyānaṃ dhātūnaṃ ṭhapanassa icchitabbattā ca.
tika-s0102t:76_13: Na hi opapātikānaṃ parinibbānato uddhaṃ sarīradhātuyo tiṭṭhanti. Manussaloke uppajjantāpi
tika-s0102t:76_14: mahābodhisattā carimabhave manussabhāvassa pākaṭabhāvakaraṇāya pana dārapariggahampi
tika-s0102t:76_16: na abhinikkhamantīti. Kiṃ vā etāya kāraṇacintāya “sabbabuddhehi āciṇṇasamāciṇṇā,
tika-s0102t:76_17: yadidaṃ manussabhūtānaṃyeva abhisambujjhanā, na devabhūtāna”nti. Ayamettha dhammatā.
tika-s0102t:76_18: Tathā hi tadattho mahābhinīhāropi manussabhūtānaṃyeva ijjhati, na devabhūtānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:77_0: Kasmā pana sammāsambuddhā jambudīpe eva uppajjanti, na sesadīpesu? Keci tāva āhu
tika-s0102t:77_2: jambudīpe eva, tasmā jambudīpe eva uppajjantī”ti, tathā “itaresampi avijahitaṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-s0102t:77_3: tattheva labbhanato”ti. Ayaṃ panettha amhākaṃ khanti – yasmā purimabuddhānaṃ, mahābodhisattānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:77_4: paccekabuddhānañca nibbattiyā sāvakabodhisattānaṃ sāvakabodhiyā abhinīhāro, sāvakapāramiyā
tika-s0102t:77_5: sambharaṇaṃ, paripācanañca buddhakhettabhūte imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe jambudīpe eva ijjhati,
tika-s0102t:77_6: na aññattha. Veneyyānaṃ vinayanattho ca buddhuppādoti aggasāvakamahāsāvakādi veneyyavisesāpekkhāya
tika-s0102t:77_7: etasmiṃ jambudīpe eva buddhā nibbattanti, na sesadīpesu. Ayañca nayo sabbabuddhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:77_8: āciṇṇasamāciṇṇoti. Tesaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ tattheva uppatti sampatticakkānaṃ viya aññamaññūpanissayato
tika-s0102t:77_9: aparāparaṃ vattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, eteneva imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ majjhe katvā iminā saddhiṃ
tika-s0102t:77_10: cakkavāḷānaṃ dasasahassasseva khettabhāvo dīpito ito aññassa buddhānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānassa
tika-s0102t:77_11: tepiṭake buddhavacane anupalabbhanato. Tenāha “tīsu dīpesu buddhā na nibbattanti,
tika-s0102t:77_12: jambudīpeyeva nibbattantīti dīpaṃ passī”ti. Iminā nayena desaniyāmepi kāraṇaṃ nīharitvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:78: Idāni ca khattiyakulaṃ lokasammataṃ brāhmaṇānampi pūjanīyabhāvato. “Rājā pitā bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ passi pituvasena kulassa niddisitabbato.
tika-s0102t:79: “Dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari satta divasānī”ti passi, tena attano antarāyābhāvaṃ aññāsi, tassā ca tusitabhave dibbasampattipaccanubhavanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:80_0: Tā devatāti dasasahassicakkavāḷadevatā. Kathaṃ pana tā devatā tadā bodhisattassa
tika-s0102t:80_1: pūritapāramibhāvaṃ, kathaṃ cassa buddhabhāvaṃ jānantīti? Mahesakkhānaṃ devatānaṃ
tika-s0102t:80_2: vasena, yebhuyyena ca tā devatā abhisamayabhāgino. Tathā hi bhagavato dhammadānasaṃvibhāge
tika-s0102t:81_0: “Cavāmī”ti jānāti cutiāsannajavanehi ñāṇasahitehi cutiyā upaṭṭhitabhāvassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
tika-s0102t:81_1: Cuticittaṃ na jānāti cuticittakkhaṇassa ittarabhāvato. Tathā hi taṃ cutūpapātañāṇassapi
tika-s0102t:81_2: avisayova. Paṭisandhicittepi eseva nayo. Āvajjanapariyāyoti āvajjanakkamo. Yasmā
tika-s0102t:81_3: ekavāraṃ āvajjitamattena ārammaṇaṃ nicchinituṃ na sakkā, tasmā taṃ evārammaṇaṃ dutiyaṃ,
tika-s0102t:81_4: tatiyañca āvajjitvā nicchayati. Āvajjanasīsena cettha javanavāro gahito. Tenāha “dutiyatatiyacittavāre
tika-s0102t:81_5: eva jānissatī”ti. Cutiyā puretaraṃ katipayacittavārato paṭṭhāya “maraṇaṃ me āsanna”nti
tika-s0102t:81_6: jānanato “cutikkhaṇepi cavāmīti jānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭisandhiyā pana apubbabhāvato
tika-s0102t:81_7: paṭisandhicittaṃ na jānāti. Nikantiyā uppattito parato “asukasmiṃ me ṭhāne paṭisandhi
tika-s0102t:81_8: gahitā”ti jānāti. Tasmiṃ kāleti paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle. Dasasahassilokadhātu kampatīti
tika-s0102t:81_9: ettha kampanakāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva. Atthato panettha yaṃ
tika-s0102t:81_10: vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato mahāparinibbānavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgamissati. Mahākāruṇikā buddhā bhagavanto
tika-s0102t:81_11: sattānaṃ hitasukhavidhānatapparatāya bahulaṃ somanassikāva hontīti tesaṃ paṭhamamahāvipākacittena
tika-s0102t:81_12: paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahāsivattheropana yadipi mahākāruṇikā buddhā
tika-s0102t:81_13: bhagavanto sattānaṃ hitasukhavidhānatapparāva, vivekajjhāsayā pana visaṅkhāraninnā
tika-s0102t:82_0: Pure puṇṇamāya sattamadivasato paṭṭhāyāti puṇṇamāya pure sattamadivasato paṭṭhāya,
tika-s0102t:82_1: sukkapakkhe navamito paṭṭhāyāti attho. Sattame divaseti navamito sattame divase āsaḷhipuṇṇamāyaṃ.
tika-s0102t:82_2: Idaṃ supinanti idāni vuccamānākāraṃ. Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “anotattadahaṃ netvā
tika-s0102t:82_3: ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha nesaṃ deviyo āgantvā manussamalaharaṇatthaṃ nhāpetvā”ti
tika-s0102t:82_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha nesaṃ deviyoti mahārājūnaṃ deviyo. Caritvāti gocaraṃ caritvā.
tika-s0102t:83_0: Haritūpalittāyāti haritena gomayena kataparibhaṇḍāya. “So ca kho purisagabbho, na
tika-s0102t:83_1: itthigabbho, putto te bhavissatī”ti ettakameva te brāhmaṇā attano supinasatthanayena
tika-s0102t:83_2: kathesuṃ. “Sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasissatī”tiādi pana devatāviggahena tamatthaṃ yāthāvato pavedesuṃ.
tika-s0102t:84_0: Dhammatāti ettha dhamma-saddo “jātidhammānaṃ bhikkhave sattāna”ntiādīsu viya pakatipariyāyo,
tika-s0102t:84_1: dhammo eva dhammatā yathā devo eva devatāti āha “ayaṃ sabhāvo”ti, ayaṃ pakatīti attho.
tika-s0102t:84_2: Svāyaṃ sabhāvo atthato tathā niyatabhāvoti āha “ayaṃ niyāmoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Niyāmo
tika-s0102t:84_3: pana bahuvidhoti te sabbe atthuddhāranayena uddharitvā idhādhippetaniyāmameva dassetuṃ
tika-s0102t:84_4: “niyāmo ca nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kammānaṃ niyāmo kammaniyāmo. Esa nayo utuniyāmādīsu
tika-s0102t:84_5: tīsu. Itaro pana dhammo eva niyāmo dhammaniyāmo, dhammatā.
tika-s0102t:86_1: pupphaphalādiggahaṇaṃ “tesu tesu janapadesū”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāleti
tika-s0102t:88_0: 18. Vattamānasamīpe vattamāne viya voharitabbanti “okkamatī”ti vuttanti āha “okkanto
tika-s0102t:88_1: hotīti ayamevattho”ti. Evaṃ hotīti evaṃ vuttappakārenassa sampajānanā hoti. Na okkamamāne
tika-s0102t:88_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇassa duviññeyyatāya. Yathā ca vuttaṃ “paṭisandhicittaṃ na jānātī”ti.
tika-s0102t:88_3: Dasasahassacakkavāḷapattharaṇena vā appamāṇo. Ativiya samujjalanabhāvena uḷāro. Devānubhāvanti
tika-s0102t:88_4: devānaṃ pabhānubhāvaṃ. Devānañhi pabhaṃ so obhāso abhibhavati, na tesaṃ ādhipaccaṃ.
tika-s0102t:89_0: Lokānaṃ lokadhātūnaṃ antaro vivaro lokantaro, so eva itthiliṅgavasena “lokantarikā”ti
tika-s0102t:89_1: vutto. Rukkhagacchādinā kenaci na haññantīti aghā, asambādhā. Tenāha “niccavivaṭā”ti.
tika-s0102t:89_2: Asaṃvutāti heṭṭhā, upari ca kenaci na pihitā. Tena vuttaṃ “heṭṭhāpi appatiṭṭhā”ti.
tika-s0102t:89_3: Tattha pi-saddena yathā heṭṭhā udakassa pidhāyikā pathavī natthīti asaṃvutā lokantarikā,
tika-s0102t:89_4: evaṃ uparipi cakkavāḷesu viya devavimānānaṃ abhāvato asaṃvutā appatiṭṭhāti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:89_5: Andhakāro ettha atthīti andhakārā. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na jāyati ālokassa abhāvato, na
tika-s0102t:89_6: cakkhuno. Tathā hi “tena obhāsena aññamaññaṃ sañjānantī”ti vuttaṃ. Jambudīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:89_7: pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati, aparagoyānavāsīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:89_8: uggamanavasena, evaṃ sesadīpesu pīti āha “ekappahāreneva tīsu dīpesu paññāyantī”ti.
tika-s0102t:89_9: Ito aññathā pana dvīsu eva dīpesu ekappahārena paññāyantīti. Ekekāya disāya nava
tika-s0102t:89_10: nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāravidhamanampi imināva nayena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pabhāya
tika-s0102t:89_11: nappahontīti attano pabhāya obhāsituṃ anabhisambhunanti. Yugandharapabbatappamāṇe
tika-s0102t:90_0: Vāvaṭāti khādanatthaṃ gaṇhituṃ upakkamantā. Viparivattitvāti vivattitvā. Chijjitvāti
tika-s0102t:90_1: mucchāpattiyā ṭhitaṭṭhānato muccitvā, aṅgapaccaṅgachedanena vā chijjitvā. Accantakhāreti
tika-s0102t:90_2: ātapasantāpābhāvena atisītabhāvameva sandhāya accantakhāratā vuttā siyā. Na hi taṃ
tika-s0102t:90_4: udakaṃ viya khāraṃ bhavituṃ arahati. Tathā hi sati pathavīpi vilīyeyya, tesaṃ vā
tika-s0102t:90_5: pāpakammabalena petānaṃ udakassa pubbakheḷabhāvāpatti viya tassa udakassa tadā khārabhāvāpatti
tika-s0102t:91: Ekayāgupānamattampīti pattādibhājanagataṃ yāguṃ gaḷociādiuddharaṇiyā gahetvā pivanamattampi kālaṃ. Samantatoti sabbabhāgato chappakārampi.
tika-s0102t:94_0: 20. Pakatiyāti attano pakatiyā eva. Tenāha “sabhāvenevā”ti. Parassa santike gahaṇena
tika-s0102t:94_1: vinā attano sabhāveneva sayameva adhiṭṭhahitvā sīlasampannā. Bodhisattamātāpīti amhākaṃ
tika-s0102t:94_2: bodhisattamātāpi. Kāladevilassāti yathā kāladevilassa santike aññadā gaṇhāti, bodhisatte
tika-s0102t:94_3: pana…pe… sayameva sīlaṃ aggahesi, tathā vipassībodhisattamātāpīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:95_1: purisādhippāyacittaṃ uppajjeyyā”ti. Bodhisattassa mātuyā pana devesupi tādisaṃ cittaṃ
tika-s0102t:95_2: nuppajjateva. Yathā bodhisattassa ānubhāvena bodhisattamātu purisādhippāyacittaṃ
tika-s0102t:95_3: nuppajjati, evaṃ tassa ānubhāveneva sā kenaci purisena anabhibhavanīyāti āha “pādā
tika-s0102t:96_0: 22. Pubbe “kāmaguṇūpasaṃhitaṃ cittaṃ nuppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ, puna “pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
tika-s0102t:96_1: samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricāretī”ti ca vuttaṃ. Kathamidaṃ aññamaññaṃ na virujjhatīti
tika-s0102t:97_0: 23. Kilamathoti khedo, kāyassa garubhāvakathinabhāvādayopi tassā tadā na honti eva.
tika-s0102t:97_1: “Tirokucchigataṃ passatī”ti vuttaṃ. Kadā paṭṭhāya passatīti āha “kalalādikālaṃ atikkamitvā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:97_2: Dassane payojanaṃ sayameva vadati. Tassa abhāvato kalalādikāle na passati. Puttena
tika-s0102t:97_3: daharena mandena uttānaseyyakena saddhiṃ. “Yaṃ taṃ mātū”tiādi pakaticārittavasena
tika-s0102t:97_4: vuttaṃ. Cakkavattigabbhatopi hi savisesaṃ bodhisattagabbho parihāraṃ labhati puññasambhārassa
tika-s0102t:97_5: sātisayattā, tasmā bodhisattamātā ativiya sappāyāhārācārā ca hutvā sakkaccaṃ pariharati.
tika-s0102t:97_6: Sukhavāsatthanti bodhisattassa sukhavāsatthaṃ. Puratthābhimukhoti mātu purimabhāgābhimukho.
tika-s0102t:97_7: Idāni tirokucchigatassa dissamānatāya abbhantaraṃ, bāhirañca kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “pubbe
tika-s0102t:97_8: katakamma”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Assāti deviyā. Vatthunti kucchiṃ. Phalikaabbhapaṭalādino
tika-s0102t:97_9: viya bodhisattamātukucchitacassa patanubhāvena ālokassa vibandhābhāvato yathā bodhisattamātā
tika-s0102t:97_10: kucchigataṃ bodhisattaṃ passati, kiṃ evaṃ bodhisattopi mātaraṃ, aññañca purato ṭhitaṃ
tika-s0102t:97_11: rūpagataṃ passati, noti āha “bodhisatto panā”tiādi. Kasmā pana sati cakkhumhi, āloke
tika-s0102t:97_12: ca na passatīti āha “na hi antokucchiyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjatī”ti. Assāsapassāsā
tika-s0102t:97_13: viya hi tattha cakkhuviññāṇampi na uppajjati tajjassa samannāhārassa abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:98_0: 24. Yathā aññā itthiyo vijātappaccayā tādisena rogena abhibhūtāpi hutvā maranti,
tika-s0102t:98_1: bodhisattamātu pana bodhisatte kucchigate tassa vijāyananimittaṃ, na koci rogo uppajjati,
tika-s0102t:98_2: kevalaṃ āyuparikkhayeneva kālaṃ karoti, svāyamattho heṭṭhā vutto eva. “Bodhisattena
tika-s0102t:98_3: vasitaṭṭhānañhī”tiādi tassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Aññesaṃ aparibhoganti aññehi na paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:98_4: na paribhogayogyanti attho. Tathā sati bodhisattapitu aññāya aggamahesiyā bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:98_5: tathāpi bodhisattamātari dharantiyā ayujjamānakanti āha “na ca sakkā”tiādi. Apanetvāti
tika-s0102t:98_6: aggamahesiṭhānato nīharitvā. Attani chandarāgavaseneva bahiddhā ārammaṇapariyesanāti
tika-s0102t:98_7: visayinisārāgo sattānaṃ visayesu sārāgassa balavakāraṇanti dassento āha “sattānaṃ
tika-s0102t:98_8: attabhāve chandarāgo balavā hotī”ti. Anurakkhituṃ na sakkotīti sammā gabbhaparihāraṃ
tika-s0102t:98_9: nānuyuñjati. Tena gabbho bahvābādho hoti. Vatthu visadaṃ hotīti gabbhāsayo visuddho
tika-s0102t:98_10: hoti. Mātu majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse bodhisattagabbhokkamanampi tassā āyuparimāṇavilokaneneva
tika-s0102t:98_11: saṅgahitaṃ vayovasena uppajjanakavikārassa parivajjanato. Itthisabhāvena uppajjanakavikāro
tika-s0102t:99_0: 25. Sattamāsajātoti paṭisandhiggahaṇato sattame māse jāto. So sītuṇhakkhamo na hoti
tika-s0102t:99_1: ativiya sukhumālatāya. Aṭṭhamāsajāto kāmaṃ sattamāsajātato buddhivayavā, ekacce pana
tika-s0102t:99_2: cammapadesā vuddhiṃ pāpuṇantā ghaṭṭanaṃ na sahanti, tena so na jīvati. “Sattamāsajātassa
tika-s0102t:99_3: pana na tāva te jātā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0102t:100_0: 27. Devā paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantīti “lokanāthaṃ mahāpurisaṃ sayameva paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti
tika-s0102t:100_1: sañjātagāravabahumānā attano pītiṃ pavedentā khīṇāsavā suddhāvāsabrahmāno ādito paṭiggaṇhanti.
tika-s0102t:100_2: Sūtivesanti sūtijagganadhātivesaṃ. Eketi abhayagirivāsino. Macchakkhisadisaṃ chavivasena.
tika-s0102t:100_3: Aṭṭhāsi na nisīdi, na nipajji vā. Tena vuttaṃ “ṭhitāva bodhisattaṃ bodhisattamātā
tika-s0102t:100_4: vijāyatī”ti. Niddukkhatāya ṭhitā eva hutvā vijāyati. Dukkhassa hi balavabhāvato taṃ
tika-s0102t:100_5: dukkhaṃ asahamānā aññā itthiyo nisinnā vā nipannā vā vijāyanti.
tika-s0102t:101: 28. Ajinappaveṇiyāti ajinacammehi sibbitvā katapaveṇiyā. Mahātejoti mahānubhāvo. Mahāyasoti mahāparivāro, vipulakittighoso ca.
tika-s0102t:102_0: 29. Bhaggavibhaggāti sambādhaṭṭhānato nikkhamanena vibhāvitattā bhaggā, vibhaggā
tika-s0102t:102_1: viya ca hutvā, tena nesaṃ avisadabhāvameva dasseti. Alaggo hutvāti gabbhāsaye, yonipadese
tika-s0102t:102_2: ca katthaci alaggo asatto hutvā, yato “dhamakaraṇato udakanikkhamanasadisa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:102_3: Udakenāti gabbhāsayagatena udakena. Amakkhitova nikkhamati sammakkhitassa tādisassa
tika-s0102t:102_4: udakasemhādikasseva tattha abhāvato. Bodhisattassa hi puññānubhāvato paṭisandhiggahaṇato
tika-s0102t:102_5: paṭṭhāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ pubbepi visuddhaṃ visesato paramasugandhagandhakuṭi viya candanagandhaṃ vāyantaṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0102t:104_0: 31. Muhuttajātoti muhuttena jāto hutvā muhuttamattova. Anudhāriyamāneti anukūlavasena
tika-s0102t:104_1: nīyamāne. Āgatānevāti taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatāni eva. Anekasākhanti ratanamayānekasatapatiṭṭhānahīrakaṃ.
tika-s0102t:104_2: Sahassamaṇḍalanti tesaṃ upariṭṭhitaṃ anekasahassamaṇḍalahīrakaṃ. Marūti devā. Na
tika-s0102t:104_3: kho pana evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ padavītihārato pageva disāvilokanassa katattā. Tenāha “mahāsatto
tika-s0102t:104_4: hī”tiādi. Ekaṅgaṇānīti vivaṭabhāvena vihāraṅgaṇapariveṇaṅgaṇāni viya ekaṅgaṇasadisāni
tika-s0102t:104_5: ahesuṃ. Sadisopi natthīti tumhākaṃ idaṃ vilokanaṃ visiṭṭhe passituṃ “idha tumhehi
tika-s0102t:104_6: sadisopi natthi, kuto uttaritaro”ti āhaṃsu. Aggoti padhāno, kena panassa padhānatāti
tika-s0102t:104_7: āha “guṇehī”ti. Paṭhama-saddo cettha padhānapariyāyo. Bodhisattassa pana padhānatā
tika-s0102t:104_8: anaññasādhāraṇāti āha “sabbapaṭhamo”ti, sabbapadhānoti attho. Etassevāti aggasaddasseva.
tika-s0102t:104_9: Ettha ca mahesakkhā tāva devā tathā ca vadanti, itare pana kathanti? Mahāsattassa
tika-s0102t:104_10: ānubhāvadassanādinā. Mahesakkhānañhi devānaṃ mahāsattassa ānubhāvo viya tena sadisānampi
tika-s0102t:104_11: ānubhāvo paccakkho ahosīti, itare pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā saddahantā anuminantā
tika-s0102t:104_12: tathā āhaṃsu. Paripākagatapubbahetusaṃsiddhāya dhammatāya codiyamāno imasmiṃ…pe… byākāsi.
tika-s0102t:105_0: Jātamattasseva bodhisattassa ṭhānādīni yesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhūtānīti
tika-s0102t:105_1: te niddhāretvā dassento “ettha cā”tiādimāha. Tattha patiṭṭhānaṃ caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa
tika-s0102t:105_3: lokassa uttaraṇavasena gamanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Tena hi bhagavā sadevakassa lokassa
tika-s0102t:105_4: abhibhūto, kenaci anabhibhūto ahosi. Tenāha “mahājanaṃ ajjhottharitvā abhibhavitvā
tika-s0102t:105_9: “Ayamantimā jātī”ti āyatiṃ jātiyā abhāvakittanā anupādi…pe… pubbanimittanti veditabbaṃ
tika-s0102t:105_10: tassa tassa anāgate laddhabbavisesassa taṃ taṃ nimittaṃ abyabhicārīti katvā. Na āgatoti
tika-s0102t:105_11: imasmiṃ sutte, aññattha ca vakkhamānāya anupubbiyā na āgato. Āharitvāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:105_12: sutte, aṭṭhakathāsu ca āgatanayena āharitvā dīpetabbo.
tika-s0102t:106_0: “Dasasahassilokadhātu kampī”ti idaṃ satipi idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatatte vakkhamānānaṃ acchariyānaṃ
tika-s0102t:106_1: mūlabhūtaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ aññampi evarūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tantibaddhā vīṇā cammabaddhā
tika-s0102t:106_2: bheriyoti pañcaṅgikatūriyassa nidassanamattaṃ, ca-saddena vā itaresampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:106_3: “Andubandhanādīni taṅkhaṇe eva chajjitvā puna pākatikāneva honti, tathā jaccandhādīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:106_4: cakkhusotādīni tathārūpakammapaccayā tasmiṃyeva khaṇe uppajjitvā tāvadeva vigacchantī”ti
tika-s0102t:106_5: vadanti. Chijjiṃsūti ca pādesu bandhaṭṭhānesu chijjiṃsu. Vigacchiṃsūti vūpasamiṃsu.
tika-s0102t:106_7: samujjalāya attano pabhāya obhāsitāni ahesuṃ. Nappavattīti na sannipāto. Na vāyīti
tika-s0102t:106_8: kharo vāto na vāyi. Mudusukho pana sattānaṃ sukhāvaho vāyi. Pathavigatā ahesuṃ uccaṭṭhāne
tika-s0102t:106_9: ṭhātuṃ avisahantā. Utusampannoti anuṇhāsītatāsaṅkhātena utunā sampanno. Apphoṭanaṃ
tika-s0102t:106_10: vuccati bhujahatthasaṅghaṭṭanasaddo, atthato pana vāmahatthaṃ ure ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇena
tika-s0102t:106_11: puthupāṇinā hatthatāḷanena saddakaraṇaṃ. Mukhena usseḷanaṃ saddassa muñcanaṃ seḷanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:106_12: Ekaddhajamālā ahosi nirantaraṃ dhajamālāsamodhānagatāya. Na kevalañca etāni eva,
tika-s0102t:106_13: atha kho aññānipi “vicittapupphasugandhapupphavassadevopavassi sūriye dissamāne eva
tika-s0102t:106_14: tārakā obhāsiṃsu, acchaṃ vippasannaṃ udakaṃ pathavito ubbhijji, bilāsayā ca tiracchānā
tika-s0102t:106_15: āsayato nikkhamiṃsu, rāgadosamohāpi tanu bhaviṃsu, pathaviyaṃ rajo vūpasami, aniṭṭhagandho
tika-s0102t:106_16: vigacchi, dibbagandho vāyi, rūpino devā sarūpeneva manussānaṃ āpāthaṃ agamaṃsu, sattānaṃ
tika-s0102t:106_17: cutūpapātā nāhesu”nti evamādīni yāni mahābhinīhārasamaye uppannāni dvattiṃsapubbanimittāni,
tika-s0102t:107_0: Tatrāpīti tesupi pathavikampādīsu evaṃ pubbanimittabhāvo veditabbo. Na kevalaṃ sampatijātassa
tika-s0102t:107_1: ṭhānādīsu evāti adhippāyo. Sabbaññutaññāṇapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ sabbassa ñeyyassa,
tika-s0102t:107_2: titthakaramatassa ca cālanato. Kenaci anussāhitānaṃyeva imasmiṃyeva ekacakkavāḷe
tika-s0102t:107_3: sannipāto kenaci anussāhitānaṃyeva ekappahāreneva sannipatitvā dhammapaṭiggaṇhanassa
tika-s0102t:107_4: pubbanimittaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ devatānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ dibbavihārapaṭilābhassa, pacchā manussānaṃ
tika-s0102t:107_5: paṭiggahaṇaṃ tattheva ṭhānassa niccalasabhāvato āneñjavihārapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:107_6: Vīṇānaṃ sayaṃ vajjanaṃ parūpadesena vinā sayameva anupubbavihārapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:107_7: Bherīnaṃ vajjanaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantāya parisāya pavedanasamatthassa dhammabheriyā
tika-s0102t:107_8: anusāvanassa amatadundubhighosanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Andubandhanādīnaṃ chedo mānavinibandhabhedanassa
tika-s0102t:107_11: mahājanassa dibbasotadhātupaṭilābhassā”tiādinā tattha tattha ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:107_14: pubbanimittaṃ. Atthādianurūpaṃ atthādīsu sampaṭipattibhāvato. Ratanānaṃ sakatejobhāsitattaṃ
tika-s0102t:107_15: yaṃ lokassa dhammobhāsaṃ dassessati, tena tassa sakatejobhāsitattassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:108_0: Catubrahmavihārapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ tassa sabbaso veravūpasamanato. Ekādasaagginibbāpanassa
tika-s0102t:108_3: sāsanassa sabbattha ekarasabhāvassa, tañca kho amadhurassa lokassa sabbaso madhurabhāvāpādanena.
tika-s0102t:108_5: Ākāsādiappatiṭṭhavisamacañcalaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya sakuṇānaṃ pathavigamanaṃ tādisaṃ micchāgāhaṃ
tika-s0102t:108_6: pahāya sattānaṃ pāṇehi ratanattayasaraṇagamanassa pubbanittaṃ. Bahujanakantatāyāti
tika-s0102t:108_7: candassa viya bahujanassa kantatāya. Sūriyassa uṇhasītavivajjitautusukhatā pariḷāhavivajjitakāyikacetasikasukhappattiyā
tika-s0102t:108_8: pubbanimittaṃ. Devatānaṃ apphoṭanādīhi kīḷanaṃ pamoduppatti bhavantagamanena, dhammasabhāvabodhanena
tika-s0102t:108_9: ca udānavasena pamodavibhāvanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Dhammavegavassanassāti desanāñāṇavegena
tika-s0102t:108_10: dhammāmatassa vassanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Kāyagatāsativasena laddhaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ
tika-s0102t:108_11: katvā uppāditamaggaphalasukhānubhavo kāyagatāsatiamatapaṭilābho, tassa pana kāyassāpi
tika-s0102t:108_13: khudaṃ, pipāsañca bhinditvā vuttaṃ. Tattha pubbanimittānaṃ bhedo visesasāmaññavibhāgena,
tika-s0102t:108_16: kāsāyaddhajamālāvantatāyā”ti keci, sadevakassa lokassa pana ariyamaggabojjhaṅgaddhajamālāhi
tika-s0102t:108_17: mālibhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ. Yaṃ panettha anuddhaṭaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0102t:109_0: Etthāti “sampatijāto”tiādinā āgate imasmiṃ vāre. Vissajjitova, tasmā amhehi idha
tika-s0102t:109_1: apubbaṃ vattabbaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Tadā pathaviyaṃ gacchantopi mahāsatto ākāsena
tika-s0102t:109_2: gacchanto viya mahājanassa tathā upaṭṭhāsīti ayamettha niyati dhammaniyāmo bodhisattānaṃ
tika-s0102t:109_3: dhammatā ti idaṃ niyativādavasena kathanaṃ. Pubbe purimajātīsu tādisassa puññasambhārakammassa
tika-s0102t:109_4: katattā upacitattā mahājanassa tathā upaṭṭhāsīti idaṃ pubbekatakammavādavasena kathanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:109_5: Imesaṃ sattānaṃ upari īsanasīlatāya yathāsakaṃ kammameva issaro nāma, tassa nimmānaṃ
tika-s0102t:109_6: attano phalassa nibbattanaṃ mahāpurisopi sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavituṃ samatthena
tika-s0102t:109_7: uḷārena puññakammena nibbattito, tena issarena nimmito nāma, tassa cāyaṃ nimmānaviseso,
tika-s0102t:109_8: yadidaṃ mahānubhāvatā, yāya mahājanassa tathā upaṭṭhāsīti idaṃ issaranimmānavasena
tika-s0102t:109_9: kathanaṃ. Evaṃ taṃ taṃ bahulaṃ vatvā kiṃ imāya pariyāyakathāyāti avasāne ujukameva
tika-s0102t:109_10: byākari. Sampatijāto pathaviyaṃ kathaṃ padasā gacchati, evaṃ mahānubhāvo ākāsena
tika-s0102t:109_11: maññe gacchatīti parikappanavasena ākāsena gacchanto viya ahosi. Sīghataraṃ pana
tika-s0102t:109_12: sattapadavītihārena gatattā dissamānarūpopi mahājanassa adissamāno viya ahosi. Acelakabhāvo,
tika-s0102t:109_13: khuddakasarīratā ca tādisassa iriyāpathassa na anucchavikāti kammānubhāvasañjanitapāṭihāriyavasena
tika-s0102t:109_14: alaṅkatapaṭiyatto viya, soḷasavassuddesiko viya ca mahājanassa upaṭṭhāsīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:109_15: Mahāsattassa puññānubhāvena tadā tathā upaṭṭhānamattamevetanti. Pacchā bāladārakova
tika-s0102t:109_16: ahosi, na tādisoti. Buddhabhāvānucchavikassa bodhisattānubhāvassa yāthāvato paveditattā
tika-s0102t:109_17: parisā cassa byākaraṇena buddhena viya…pe… attamanā ahosi.
tika-s0102t:110: Sabbadhammatāti sabbā soḷasavidhāpi yathāvuttā dhammatā sabbabodhisattānaṃ hontīti veditabbā puññañāṇasambhāradassanena nesaṃ ekasadisattā.
tika-s0102t:112_1: “Khattiyo brāhmaṇo”ti evamādi jāti. “Koṇḍañño gotamo”ti evamādi gottaṃ. “Poṇikā cikkhallikā
tika-s0102t:112_2: sākiyā koḷiyā”ti evamādi kulapadeso. Ādi-saddena rūpissariyaparivārādisabbasampattiyo
tika-s0102t:112_3: saṅgaṇhāti. Mahantassāti vipulassa, uḷārassāti attho. Nipphattiyoti siddhiyo. Gantabbagatiyāti
tika-s0102t:112_4: gati-saddassa kammasādhanatamāha. Upapajjanavasena hi sucaritaduccaritehi gantabbāti
tika-s0102t:112_5: gatiyo, upapattibhavaviseso. Gacchati yathāruci pavattatīti gati, ajjhāsayo. Paṭisaraṇeti
tika-s0102t:112_6: parāyaṇe avassaye. Sabbasaṅkhatavisaṃyuttassa hi arahato nibbānameva taṃpaṭisaraṇaṃ. Tyāhanti te ahaṃ.
tika-s0102t:113_0: Dasavidhe kusaladhamme, agarahite ca rājadhamme niyuttoti dhammiko. Tena ca dhammena
tika-s0102t:113_1: sakalaṃ lokaṃ rañjetīti dhammarājā. Yasmā cakkavattī dhammena ñāyena rajjaṃ adhigacchati,
tika-s0102t:113_2: na adhammena, tasmā vuttaṃ “dhammena laddharajjattā dhammarājā”ti. Catūsu disāsu
tika-s0102t:113_3: samuddapariyosānatāya caturantā nāma tattha tattha dīpe mahāpathavīti āha “puratthima…pe…
tika-s0102t:113_4: issaro”ti. Vijitāvīti vijetabbassa vijitavā, kāmakodhādikassa abbhantarassa, paṭirājabhūtassa
tika-s0102t:113_5: bāhirassa ca arigaṇassa vijayi, vijetvā ṭhitoti attho. Kāmaṃ cakkavattino kenaci
tika-s0102t:113_6: yuddhaṃ nāma natthi, yuddhena pana sādhetabbassa vijayassa siddhiyā “vijitasaṅgāmo”ti
tika-s0102t:113_7: vuttaṃ. Janapadova catubbidhaacchariyadhammādisamannāgate asmiṃ rājini thāvariyaṃ
tika-s0102t:113_8: kenaci asaṃhāriyaṃ daḷhaṃ bhattabhāvaṃ patto, janapade vā attano dhammikāya paṭipattiyā
tika-s0102t:113_9: thāvariyaṃ thirabhāvaṃ pattoti janapadatthāvariyappatto. Manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-s0102t:114_0: Ratijananaṭṭhenāti atappakapītisomanassuppādanena. Saddatthato pana rametīti ratanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:114_1: “Aho manohara”nti citte kattabbatāya cittīkataṃ. “Svāyaṃ cittīkāro tassa pūjanīyatāyā”ti
tika-s0102t:114_2: cittīkatanti pūjanīyanti atthaṃ vadanti. Mahantaṃ vipulaṃ aparimitaṃ mūlaṃ agghatīti
tika-s0102t:114_3: mahagghaṃ. Natthi etassa tulā upamāti atulaṃ, asadisaṃ. Kadāci eva uppajjanato dukkhena
tika-s0102t:114_4: laddhabbattā dullabhadassanaṃ. Anomehi uḷāraguṇeheva sattehi paribhuñjitabbato anomasattaparibhogaṃ.
tika-s0102t:114_5: Idāni nesaṃ cittīkatādiatthānaṃ savisesaṃ cakkaratane labbhamānataṃ dassetvā itaresupi
tika-s0102t:114_6: te atidisituṃ “cakkaratanassa cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti rañño
tika-s0102t:114_9: ca. Yadaggena mahagghaṃ, tadaggena atulaṃ. Sattānaṃ pāpajigucchanena vigatakāḷako
tika-s0102t:114_10: puññapasutatāya maṇḍabhūto yādiso kālo buddhuppādāraho, tādise eva cakkavattīnampi
tika-s0102t:114_11: sambhavoti āha “yasmā ca panā”tiādi. Upamāvasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ, upamopameyyānañca
tika-s0102t:114_12: na accantameva sadisatā. Tasmā yathā buddhā kadāci karahaci uppajjanti, na tathā
tika-s0102t:114_13: cakkavattino, evaṃ santepi cakkavattivattaparipūraṇassāpi dukkarabhāvatopi dullabhuppādāyevāti,
tika-s0102t:114_14: iminā dullabhuppādatāsāmaññena tesaṃ dullabhadassanatā vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Kāmaṃ
tika-s0102t:114_16: eva naṃ sāmibhāvena visavitāya paribhuñjatī”ti vattabbataṃ arahati tadatthaṃ uppajjanatoti
tika-s0102t:114_17: dassento “tadeta”ntiādimāha. Yathāvuttānaṃ pañcannaṃ, channampi vā atthānaṃ itararatanesupi
tika-s0102t:114_19: cakkaratanena ca parivārabhāvena, sesehi paribhogūpakaraṇabhāvena samannāgato. Hatthiassamaṇiitthiratanehi
tika-s0102t:115_0: Catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ sirivibhavanti tattha laddhaṃ sirisampattiñceva bhogasampattiñca.
tika-s0102t:116_0: Sūrāti sattivanto, nibbhayāti atthoti āha “abhīrukā”ti. Aṅganti kāraṇaṃ. Yena kāraṇena
tika-s0102t:116_1: “vīrā”ti vucceyyuṃ, taṃ vīraṅgaṃ. Tenāha “vīriyassetaṃ nāma”nti. Yāva cakkavāḷapabbatā
tika-s0102t:116_2: cakkassa vattanato “cakkavāḷapabbataṃ sīmaṃ katvā ṭhitasamuddapariyanta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:116_3: “Adaṇḍenā”ti imināva dhanadaṇḍassa, sarīradaṇḍassa ca akaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. “Asatthenā”ti
tika-s0102t:116_4: iminā pana senāya yujjhanassāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “ye katāparādhe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:117_0: “Rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo, taṇhāyanaṭṭhena taṇhā”ti pavattiākārabhedena lobho eva dvidhā
tika-s0102t:117_1: vutto. Tathā hissa dvidhāpi chadanaṭṭho ekantiko. Yathāha “andhatamaṃ tadā hoti,
tika-s0102t:117_2: yaṃ rāgo sahate nara”nti, “taṇhāchadanachāditā”ti ca. Iminā nayena dosādīnampi chadanaṭṭho
tika-s0102t:117_3: vattabbo. Kilesaggahaṇena vicikicchādayo sesakilesā vuttā. Yasmā te sabbe pāpadhammā
tika-s0102t:117_4: uppajjamānā sattasantānaṃ chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhanti kusalappavattiṃ nivārenti,
tika-s0102t:117_5: tasmā te “chadanā, chadā”ti ca vuttā. Vivaṭṭacchadāti ca o-kārassa ā-kāraṃ katvā niddeso.
tika-s0102t:118_0: 35. Tāsanti dvinnampi nipphattīnaṃ. Nimittabhūtānīti ñāpakakāraṇabhūtāni. Tathā hi
tika-s0102t:118_1: lakkhīyati mahāpurisabhāvo etehīti lakkhaṇāni. Ṭhānagamanādīsu bhūmiyaṃ suṭṭhu samaṃ
tika-s0102t:118_2: patiṭṭhitā pādā etassāti suppatiṭṭhitapādo. Taṃ panassa suppatiṭṭhitapādataṃ byatirekamukhena
tika-s0102t:118_3: vibhāvetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha aggatalanti aggapādatalaṃ. Paṇhīti paṇhitalaṃ.
tika-s0102t:118_4: Passanti pādatalassa dvīsu passesu ekekaṃ, ubhayameva vā pariyantaṃ passaṃ. “Assa
tika-s0102t:118_5: panā”tiādi anvayato atthavibhāvanaṃ. Suvaṇṇapādukatalamiva ujukaṃ nikkhipiyamānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:118_6: Ekappahārenevāti ekakkhaṇeyeva. Sakalaṃ pādatalaṃ bhūmiṃ phusati nikkhipane. Ekappahāreneva
tika-s0102t:118_7: sakalaṃ pādatalaṃ bhūmito uṭṭhahatīti yojanā. Tasmā ayaṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādoti nigamanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:118_8: Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ anupubbaninnādiacchariyabbhutaṃ nissandaphalaṃ, taṃ parato
tika-s0102t:119_0: Nābhi dissatīti lakkhaṇacakkassa nābhi parimaṇḍalasaṇṭhānā suparibyattā hutvā dissati,
tika-s0102t:119_1: labbhatīti adhippāyo. Nābhiparicchinnāti tassaṃ nābhiyaṃ paricchinnā paricchedavasena
tika-s0102t:119_3: ṭhapetabbaṃ parikkhepapaṭṭo, tappaṭicchanno idha adhippeto. Nemimaṇikāti nemiyaṃ
tika-s0102t:119_5: āvudhasatti. Sirivacchoti siriaṅgā. Nandīti dakkhiṇāvattaṃ. Sovattikoti sovattiaṅgo.
tika-s0102t:119_6: Vaṭaṃsakoti āveḷaṃ. Vaḍḍhamānakanti purimahādīsu dīpaṅkaṃ. Morahatthakoti morapiñchakalāpo,
tika-s0102t:119_7: morapiñchapaṭisibbito vā bījanīviseso. Vāḷabījanīti cāmarivālaṃ. Siddhatthādi puṇṇaghaṭapuṇṇapātiyo.
tika-s0102t:119_8: “Cakkavāḷo”ti vatvā tassa padhānāvayave dassetuṃ “himavā sineru…pe… sahassānī”ti
tika-s0102t:119_9: vuttaṃ. “Cakkavattirañño parisaṃ upādāyā”ti idaṃ hatthiratanādīnampi tattha labbhamānabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:119_10: Sabbotisattiādiko yathāvutto aṅgaviseso cakkalakkhaṇasseva parivāroti veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:120_0: “Āyatapaṇhī”ti idaṃ aññesaṃ paṇhito dīghataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana atidīghatanti
tika-s0102t:120_1: āha “paripuṇṇapaṇhī”ti. Yathā pana paṇhilakkhaṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ nāma hoti, taṃ byatirekamukhena
tika-s0102t:120_2: dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āraggenāti maṇḍalāya sikhāya. Vaṭṭetvāti yathā suvaṭṭaṃ
tika-s0102t:121_0: “Makkaṭassevā”ti dīghabhāvaṃ, samatañca sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Niyyāsatelenāti chattiritaniyyāsādiniyyāsasammissena
tika-s0102t:122: Yathā satakkhattuṃ vihataṃ kappāsapaṭalaṃ sappimaṇḍe osāritaṃ ativiya mudu hoti, evaṃ mahāpurisassa hatthapādāti dassento “sappimaṇḍe”tiādimāha. Talunāti sukhumālā.
tika-s0102t:123_1: na hoti. Ekappamāṇāti dīghato samānappamāṇā. Yavalakkhaṇanti abbhantarato aṅgulipabbe
tika-s0102t:123_2: ṭhitaṃ yavalakkhaṇaṃ. Paṭivijjhitvāti taṃtaṃpabbānaṃ samānadesatāya aṅgulīnaṃ pasāritakālepi
tika-s0102t:124_0: Saṅkhā vuccanti gopphakā, uddhaṃ saṅkhā etesanti ussaṅkhā, pādā. Piṭṭhipādeti piṭṭhipādasamīpe.
tika-s0102t:124_1: Tenāti piṭṭhipāde ṭhitagopphakabhāvena baddhā hontīti yojanā. Tayidaṃ “tenā”ti padaṃ
tika-s0102t:124_2: uparipadadvayepi yojetabbaṃ “tena baddhabhāvena na yathāsukhaṃ parivaṭṭanti, tena
tika-s0102t:124_3: yathāsukhaṃ naparivaṭṭanena gacchantānaṃ pādatalānipi na dissantī”ti. Uparīti piṭṭhipādato
tika-s0102t:124_4: dvitiaṅgulimattaṃ uddhaṃ, “caturaṅgulamatta”nti ca vadanti. Nigūḷhāni ca honti, na
tika-s0102t:124_5: aññesaṃ viya paññāyamānāni. Tenāti gopphakānaṃ upari patiṭṭhitabhāvena. Assāti mahāpurisassa.
tika-s0102t:124_6: Satipi desantarappavattiyaṃ niccaloti dassanatthaṃ nābhiggahaṇaṃ. “Adhokāyova iñjatī”ti
tika-s0102t:124_7: idaṃ purimapadassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā adhokāyova iñjati, tasmā nābhito…pe… niccalo
tika-s0102t:124_8: hoti. “Sukhena pādā parivaṭṭantī”ti idaṃ pana purimassa, pacchimassa ca kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:124_9: Yasmā sukhena pādā parivaṭṭanti, tasmā adhokāyova iñjati, yasmā sukhena pādā parivaṭṭanti,
tika-s0102t:125_0: Yasmā eṇimigassa samantato ekasadisamaṃsā anukkamena uddhaṃ thūlā jaṅghā honti, tathā
tika-s0102t:126_1: iminā lakkhaṇena rahitajanā. Khujjā vā honti heṭṭhimakāyato uparimakāyassa rassatāya,
tika-s0102t:126_2: vāmanā vā uparimakāyato heṭṭhimakāyassa rassatāya, etena ṭhapetvā sammāsambuddhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:126_3: cakkavattinañca itare sattā khujjapakkhikā, vāmanapakkhikā cāti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:127_0: Kāmaṃ sabbāpi padumakaṇṇikā suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva, kañcanapadumakaṇṇikā pana pabhassarabhāvena
tika-s0102t:127_1: tato sātisayāti āha “suvaṇṇapadumakaṇṇikasadisehī”ti. Ohitanti samohitaṃ antogadhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:127_2: Tathābhūtaṃ pana taṃ tena channaṃ hotīti āha “paṭicchanna”nti.
tika-s0102t:128_1: svāyamattho āvuttiñāyena ca veditabbo. Sarīrapariyāyo idha vaṇṇa-saddoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:128_2: Paṭhamavikappaṃ vatvā tathārūpāya pana ruḷhiyā abhāvaṃ manasi katvā vaṇṇadhātupariyāyameva
tika-s0102t:128_3: vaṇṇa-saddaṃ gahetvā dutiyavikappo vutto. Tasmā padadvayenāpi suniddhantasuvaṇṇasadisachavivaṇṇoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:129: Rajoti sukhumarajo. Jallanti malīnabhāvāvaho reṇusañcayo. Tenāha “malaṃ vā”ti. Yadi vivattati, kathaṃ nhānādīnīti āha “hatthadhovanādīnī”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:131_0: Brahmuno sarīraṃ purato vā pacchato vā anonamitvā ujukameva uggatanti āha “brahmā
tika-s0102t:131_1: viya ujugatto”ti. Sā panāyaṃ ujugattatā avayavesu buddhippattesu daṭṭhabbā, na daharakāleti
tika-s0102t:131_3: ṭhānesu namantā purato namantīti ānetvā sambandho. Passavaṅkāti dakkhiṇapassena vā
tika-s0102t:131_4: vāmapassena vā vaṅkā. Sūlasadisāti potthakarūpakaraṇe ṭhapitasūlapādasadisā.
tika-s0102t:132_0: Hatthapiṭṭhiādivasena satta sarīrāvayavā ussadā upacitamaṃsā etassāti sattussado.
tika-s0102t:132_1: Aṭṭhikoṭiyo paññāyantīti yojanā. Nigūḷhasirājālehīti lakkhaṇavacanametanti tena nigūḷhaaṭṭhikoṭīhītipi
tika-s0102t:132_2: vuttameva hotīti. Hatthapiṭṭhādīhīti ettha ādi-saddena aṃsakūṭakhandhakūṭānaṃ saṅgahe
tika-s0102t:132_3: siddhe taṃ ekadesena dassento “vaṭṭetvā…pe… khandhenā”ti āha. “Silārūpakaṃ viyā”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:133_0: Sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ sīhapubbaddhaṃ, paripuṇṇāvayavatāya sīhapubbaddhaṃ viya sakalo
tika-s0102t:133_1: kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo. Tenāha “sīhassa pubbaddhakāyo viya sabbo kāyo paripuṇṇo”ti.
tika-s0102t:133_2: Sīhassevāti sīhassa viya. Dussaṇṭhitavisaṇṭhito na hotīti duṭṭhu saṇṭhito, virūpasaṇṭhito
tika-s0102t:133_3: ca na hoti, tesaṃ tesaṃ avayavānaṃ ayuttabhāvena, virūpabhāvena ca saṇṭhiti upagato
tika-s0102t:133_4: na hotīti attho. Saṇṭhantīti saṇṭhahanti. Dīghehīti aṅgulināsādīhi. Rassehīti gīvādīhi.
tika-s0102t:133_5: Thūlehīti ūrubāhuādīhi. Kisehīti kesalomamajjhādīhi. Puthulehīti akkhihatthatalādīhi.
tika-s0102t:134_0: Satapuññalakkhaṇatāya nānācittena puññacittena cittito sañjātacittabhāvo “īdiso eva
tika-s0102t:134_1: buddhānaṃ dhammakāyassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhavituṃ yutto”ti dasapāramīhi sajjito abhisaṅkhato,
tika-s0102t:134_2: “dānacittena puññacittenā”ti vā pāṭho, dānavasena, sīlādivasena ca pavattapuññacittenāti attho.
tika-s0102t:135_0: Dvinnaṃ koṭṭānaṃ antaranti dvinnaṃ piṭṭhibāhānaṃ vemajjhaṃ piṭṭhimajjhassa uparibhāgo.
tika-s0102t:135_1: Citaṃ paripuṇṇanti aninnabhāvena citaṃ, dvīhi koṭṭehi samatalatāya paripuṇṇaṃ. Uggammāti
tika-s0102t:135_2: uggantvā, aninnaṃ samatalaṃ hutvāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “suvaṇṇaphalakaṃ viyā”ti.
tika-s0102t:136_0: Nigrodho viya parimaṇḍaloti parimaṇḍalanigrodho viya parimaṇḍalo, “nigrodhaparimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalo”ti
tika-s0102t:136_1: vattabbe ekassa parimaṇḍala-saddassa lopaṃ katvā “nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo”ti vutto. Tenāha
tika-s0102t:136_2: “samakkhandhasākho nigrodho”tiādi. Na hi sabbo nigrodho parimaṇḍaloti, parimaṇḍalasaddasannidhānena
tika-s0102t:136_3: vā parimaṇḍalova nigrodho gayhatīti ekassa parimaṇḍalasaddassa lopena vināpi ayamattho
tika-s0102t:136_4: labbhatīti āha “nigrodho viya parimaṇḍalo”ti. Yāvatako assāti yāvatakvassa o-kārassa va-kārādesaṃ katvā.
tika-s0102t:137: Samavaṭṭitakkhandhoti samaṃ suvaṭṭitakkhandho. Koñcā viya dīghagalā, bakā viya vaṅkagalā, varāhā viya puthulagalāti yojanā. Suvaṇṇāḷiṅgasadisoti suvaṇṇamayakhuddakamudiṅgasadiso.
tika-s0102t:138_0: Rasaggasaggīti madhurādibhedaṃ rasaṃ gasanti anto pavesantīti rasaggasā rasaggasānaṃ
tika-s0102t:138_1: aggā rasaggasaggā, tā etassa santīti rasaggasaggī. Tenāti ojāya apharaṇena hīnadhātukattā
tika-s0102t:139_0: Hanūti sannissayadantādhārassa samaññā, taṃ bhagavato sīhassa hanu viya, tasmā bhagavā
tika-s0102t:139_1: sīhahanu. Tattha yasmā buddhānaṃ rūpakāyassa, dhammakāyassa ca upamā nāma hīnūpamāva,
tika-s0102t:139_2: natthi samānūpamā, kuto adhikūpamā, tasmā ayampi hīnūpamāti dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi
tika-s0102t:139_3: vuttaṃ. Yasmā mahāpurisassa heṭṭhimānurūpavaseneva uparimampi saṇṭhitaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:139_4: “dvepi paripuṇṇānī”ti, tañca kho na sabbaso parimaṇḍalatāya, atha kho tibhāgāvasesamaṇḍalatāyāti
tika-s0102t:139_5: āha “dvādasiyā pakkhassa candasadisānī”ti. Sallakkhetvāti attano lakkhaṇasatthānusārena
tika-s0102t:139_6: upadhāretvā. Dantānaṃ uccanīcatā abbhantarabāhirapassavasenapi veditabbā, na aggavaseneva.
tika-s0102t:139_7: Tenāha “ayapaṭṭakena chinnasaṅkhapaṭalaṃ viyā”ti. Ayapaṭṭakanti kakacaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0102t:139_8: Samā bhavissanti, na visamā, samasaṇṭhānāti attho.
tika-s0102t:140: Sātisayaṃ mududīghaputhulatādippakāraguṇā hutvā bhūtā jātāti pabhūtā, bha-kārassa ha-kāraṃ katvā pahūtā jivhā etassāti pahūtajivho.
tika-s0102t:141_0: Vicchinditvā vicchinditvā pavattasaratāya chinnassarāpi. Anekākāratāya bhinnassarāpi.
tika-s0102t:141_1: Kākassa viya amanuññasaratāya kākassarāpi. Apalibuddhattāti anupaddutavatthukattā,
tika-s0102t:141_2: vatthūti ca akkharuppattiṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatoti ettha aṅgāni parato
tika-s0102t:142_0: Abhinīlanettoti adhikanīlanetto, adhikatā ca sātisayaṃ nīlabhāvena veditabbā, na
tika-s0102t:143_1: saddhiṃ akkhibimbanti veditabbaṃ. Evañhi viniggatagambhīrajotanāpi yuttā hoti. “Adhippeta”nti
tika-s0102t:143_2: iminā ayamettha adhippāyo ekadesena samudāyupalakkhaṇañāyenāti dasseti. Yasmā pakhuma-saddo
tika-s0102t:144_0: Kiñcāpi uṇṇā-saddo loke avisesato lomapariyāyo, idha pana lomavisesavācakoti āha
tika-s0102t:144_1: “uṇṇā loma”nti. Nalāṭavemajjhe jātāti nalāṭamajjhagatā jātā. Odātatāya upamā, na
tika-s0102t:144_2: mudutāya. Uṇṇā hi tatopi sātisayaṃ mudutarā. Tenāha“sappi maṇḍe”tiādi. Rajatapubbuḷakanti
tika-s0102t:145_0: Dve atthavase paṭicca vuttanti yasmā buddhā, cakkavattino ca paripuṇṇanalāṭatāya,
tika-s0102t:145_1: paripuṇṇasīsabimbatāya ca “uṇhīsasīsā”ti vuccanti, tasmā te dve atthavase paṭicca
tika-s0102t:145_2: “uṇhīsasīso”ti idaṃ vuttaṃ. Idāni taṃ atthadvayaṃ mahāpurise suppatiṭṭhitanti “mahāpurisassa
tika-s0102t:145_3: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Saṇhatamatāya, suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya, pabhassaratāya, paripuṇṇatāya ca
tika-s0102t:145_4: rañño bandhauṇhīsapaṭṭo viya virocati. Kapisīsāti dvidhābhūtasīsā. Phalasīsāti phalitasīsā.
tika-s0102t:145_5: Aṭṭhisīsāti maṃsassa abhāvato ativiya aṭṭhitāya, patanubhāvato vā taconaddhaaṭṭhimattasīsā.
tika-s0102t:145_6: Tumbasīsāti lābusadisasīsā. Pabbhārasīsāti piṭṭhibhāgena olambamānasīsā. Purimanayenāti
tika-s0102t:145_8: viya. Uṇhīsaṃ viyāti chekena sippinā viracitauṇhīsamaṇḍalaṃ viya.
tika-s0102t:147_0: 37. Tassa vitthāroti tassa lakkhaṇapariggaṇhane nemittakānaṃ santappanassa vitthāro
tika-s0102t:147_2: Niddosenāti khārikaloṇikādidosarahitena. Dhātiyoti thaññapāyikā dhātiyo. Tā hi dhāpenti
tika-s0102t:147_3: thaññaṃ pāyentīti dhātiyo. “Tathā”ti iminā “saṭṭhi”nti padaṃ upasaṃharati, sesāpīti
tika-s0102t:147_4: nhāpikā, dhārikā, parihārikāti imā tividhā. Tāpi dahanti vidahanti nhānaṃ dahanti
tika-s0102t:147_5: dhārentīti “dhātiyo” tveva vuccanti. Tattha dhāraṇaṃ urasā, ūrunā, hatthehi vā suciraṃ
tika-s0102t:147_6: velaṃ sandhāraṇaṃ. Pariharaṇaṃ aññassa aṅkato attano aṅkaṃ, aññassa bāhuto attano
tika-s0102t:148_0: 38. Mañjussaroti saṇhassaro. Yo hi saṇho, so kharo na hotīti āha “akharassaro”ti.
tika-s0102t:148_1: Vaggussaroti manorammassaro, manorammatā cassa cāturiyane puññayogatoti āha “chekanipuṇassaro”ti.
