tika-s0102t:148_2: Madhurassaroti sotasukhassaro, sotasukhatā cassa ativiya iṭṭhabhāvenāti āha “sātassaro”ti.
tika-s0102t:148_3: Pemanīyassaroti piyāyitabbassaro, piyāyitabbatā cassa suṇantānaṃ attani bhattisamuppādanenāti
tika-s0102t:148_4: āha “pemajanakassaro”ti. Karavīkassaroti. Karavīkasaddo yesaṃ sattānaṃ sotapathaṃ
tika-s0102t:148_5: upagacchati, te attano sarasampattiyā pakatiṃ jahāpetvā avase karonto attano vase
tika-s0102t:148_7: tassa sabhāvakathanaṃ. Laḷitanti pītivegasamuṭṭhitaṃ līḷaṃ. Chaḍḍetvāti “saṅkharaṇampi
tika-s0102t:148_8: madhurasaddasavanantarāyakara”nti tiṇāni apanetvā. Anikkhipitvāti bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvā
tika-s0102t:148_9: ākāsagatameva katvā. Anubaddhamigā vāḷamigehi. Tato maraṇabhayaṃ hitvā. Pakkhe pasāretvāti
tika-s0102t:149_0: Suvaṇṇapañjaraṃ vissajjesi yojanappamāṇe ākāse attano āṇāya pavattanato. Tenāha “so
tika-s0102t:149_1: rājāṇāyā”tiādi. Laḷiṃsūti laḷitaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu. Taṃ pītinti taṃ buddhaguṇārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:149_2: pītiṃ teneva nīhārena punappunaṃ pavattaṃ pītiṃ avijahitvā vikkhambhitakilesā therānaṃ
tika-s0102t:149_4: patiṭṭhāsi. Sattasatamattena orodhajanena saddhiṃ padasāva therānaṃ santikaṃ upagatattā
tika-s0102t:149_5: “sattahi jaṅghasatehi saddhi”nti vuttaṃ. Tatoti karavīkasaddato. Satabhāgena…pe…
tika-s0102t:150_1: dūrepi ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ kammavipākena sahajātaṃ, kammassa vā vipākabhāvena
tika-s0102t:150_2: jātaṃ pasādacakkhu. Duvidhañhi dibbacakkhuṃ kammamayaṃ, bhāvanāmayanti. Tatridaṃ
tika-s0102t:150_3: kammamayanti āha “na bhāvanāmaya”nti. Bhāvanāmayaṃ pana bodhimūle uppajjissati. Ayaṃ
tika-s0102t:150_4: “so”ti sallakkhaṇaṃ kāmaṃ manoviññāṇena hoti, cakkhuviññāṇena pana tassa tathā vibhāvitattā
tika-s0102t:150_5: manoviññāṇassa tattha tathāpavattīti āha “yena nimittaṃ…pe… sakkotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:151_0: 40. Vacanatthoti saddattho. Nimīlananti nimīlanadassanaṃ navisuddhaṃ, tathā ca akkhīni
tika-s0102t:151_1: avivaṭāni nimīladassanassa na visuddhibhāvato. Tabbipariyāyato pana dassanaṃ visuddhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:152_0: 41. Nī-iti – jānanatthaṃ dhātuṃ gahetvā āha “panayati jānātī”ti. Yato vuttaṃ “animittā
tika-s0102t:152_1: na nāyare”ti, “vidūbhi neyyaṃ naravarassā”ti ca. Nī-iti pana pavattanatthaṃ dhātuṃ
tika-s0102t:152_2: gahetvā “nayati pavattetī”ti. Appamatto ahosi tesu tesu kiccakaraṇīyesu.
tika-s0102t:153_0: 42. Vassāvāso vassaṃ uttarapadalopena, tasmā vassaṃ, vasse vā, sannivāsaphāsutāya
tika-s0102t:153_1: arahatīti vassiko, pāsādo. Māsā pana vasse utumhi bhavāti vassikā. Itaresūti hemantikaṃ
tika-s0102t:153_2: gimhikanti imesu. Eseva nayoti uttarapadalopena niddesaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0102t:154_0: Nātiucco hoti nātinīcoti gimhiko viya ucco, hemantiko viya nīco na hoti, atha kho
tika-s0102t:154_1: tadubhayavemajjhalakkhaṇatāya nātiucco hoti, nātinīco. Assāti pāsādassa. Nātibahūnīti
tika-s0102t:154_2: gimhikassa viya na atibahūni. Nātitanūnīti hemantikassa viya na khuddakāni, tanutarajālāni
tika-s0102t:154_3: ca. Missakānevāti hemantike viya na uṇhaniyāneva, gimhike viya ca na sītaniyāneva,
tika-s0102t:154_4: atha kho ubhayamissakāneva. Tanukānīti na puthulāni. Uṇhappavesanatthāyāti sūriyasantāpānuppavesāya.
tika-s0102t:154_5: Bhittiniyūhānīti dakkhiṇapasse bhittīsu niyūhāni. Siniddhanti sinehavantaṃ, siniddhaggahaṇeneva
tika-s0102t:154_6: cassa garukatāpi vuttā eva. Kaṭukasannissitanti tikaṭukādikaṭukadrabbūpasañhitaṃ.
tika-s0102t:154_7: Udakayantānīti udakadhārāvissandayantāni. Yathā jalayantāni, evaṃ himayantānipi tattha
tika-s0102t:154_8: karonti eva. Tasmā hemante viya himāni patantāniyeva hontīti ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:155: Sabbaṭṭhānānipīti sabbāni paṭikiriyānhānabhojanakīḷāsañcaraṇādiṭṭhānānipi, na nivāsaṭṭhānāniyeva. Tenāha “dovārikāpī”tiādi. Tattha kāraṇamāha “rājā kirā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:158_0: 44. Gopānasivaṅkanti vaṅkagopānasī viya. Vaṅkānañhi vaṅkabhāvassa nidassanatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:158_1: avaṅkagopānasīpi gayhati. Ābhoggavaṅkanti ādito paṭṭhāya abbhuggatāya kuṭilasarīratāya
tika-s0102t:158_2: vaṅkaṃ. Tenāha “khandhe”tiādi. Daṇḍaparaṃ daṇḍaggahaṇaparaṃ ayanaṃ gamanaṃ etassāti
tika-s0102t:158_3: daṇḍaparāyanaṃ, daṇḍo vā paraṃ āyanaṃ gamanakāraṇaṃ etassāti daṇḍaparāyanaṃ. Ṭhānādīsu
tika-s0102t:158_4: daṇḍo gati avassayo etassa tena vinā appavattanatoti daṇḍagatikaṃ, gacchati etenāti
tika-s0102t:158_5: vā gati, daṇḍo gati gamanakāraṇaṃ etassāti daṇḍagatikaṃ. Daṇḍapaṭisaraṇanti etthāpi
tika-s0102t:158_6: eseva nayo. Jarāturanti jarāya kilantaṃ assavasaṃ. Yadā ratho purato hotīti dvedhāpathe
tika-s0102t:158_7: sampatte purato gacchante balakāye tattha ekaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ āruḷho majjhe gacchanto
tika-s0102t:158_8: bodhisattena āruḷho ratho itaraṃ saṇṭhānaṃ gacchanto yadā purato hoti. Pacchā balakāyoti
tika-s0102t:158_9: tadā pacchā hoti sabbo balakāyo. Tādise okāseti tādise vuttappakāre maggappadese.
tika-s0102t:158_10: Taṃ purisanti taṃ jiṇṇapurisaṃ. Suddhāvāsāti siddhatthādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:158_11: sāsane brahmacariyaṃ caritvā suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ nibbattabrahmāno. Te hi tadā tattha
tika-s0102t:158_12: tiṭṭhanti. “Kiṃ paneso jiṇṇo nāmā”ti eso tayā vuccamāno kiṃ atthato, taṃ me niddhāretvā
tika-s0102t:158_13: kathehīti dasseti. Aniddhāritasarūpattā hi tassa attano bodhisatto liṅgasabbanāmena
tika-s0102t:158_14: taṃ vadanto “ki”nti āha. “Yathā kiṃ te jāta”nti dvayameva hi loke yebhuyyato jāyati
tika-s0102t:158_15: itthī vā puriso vā, tathāpi taṃ liṅgasabbanāmena vuccati, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:159_0: “Tena hī”tiādi “ayañca jiṇṇabhāvo sabbasādhāraṇattā mayhampi upari āpattito evā”ti
tika-s0102t:159_1: mahāsattassa saṃvijjanākāravibhāvanaṃ. Rathaṃ sāretīti sārathi. Kīḷāvihāratthaṃ uyyuttā
tika-s0102t:159_2: yanti upagacchanti etanti uyyānaṃ. Alanti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. Nāmāti garahaṇe nipāto
tika-s0102t:159_3: “kathañhināmā”tiādīsu viya. Jātiyā ādīnavadassanatthaṃ taṃmūlassa ummūlanaṃ viya
tika-s0102t:159_4: hotīti, tassa ca avassitabhāvato “jātiyā mūlaṃ khaṇanto nisīdī”ti āha. Siddhe hi
tika-s0102t:159_5: kāraṇe phalaṃ siddhameva hotīti. Pīḷaṃ janetvā antotudanavasena sabbapaṭhamaṃ hadayaṃ
tika-s0102t:159_6: anupavissa ṭhitattā paṭhamena sallena hadaye viddho viya nisīdīti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:161: 47. Pubbe vuttanayenevāti “suddhāvāsā kirā”tiādinā pubbe vutteneva nayena. Ābādhikanti ābādhavantaṃ. Dukkhitanti sañjātadukkhaṃ. Ajātanti ajātabhāvo, nibbānaṃ vā.
tika-s0102t:163_0: 50. Bhantanettakuppalādi vividhaṃ katvā lātabbato vilāto, vayhaṃ, sivikā cāti āha
tika-s0102t:163_2: āha. Ito paṭigatanti ito bhavato apagataṃ. Katakālanti pariyosāpitajīvanakālaṃ. Tenāha “yattaka”ntiādi.
tika-s0102t:165_0: 53. Dhammaṃ caratīti dhammacaraṇo, tassa bhāvo dhammacaraṇabhāvoti dhammacariyameva
tika-s0102t:165_1: vadati. Evaṃ ekekassa padassāti yathā “sādhudhammacariyāti pabbajito”ti yojanā, evaṃ
tika-s0102t:165_2: “sādhusamacariyāti pabbajito”tiādinā ekekassa padassa yojanā veditabbā. Sabbānīti
tika-s0102t:167_0: 54. Pabbajitassa dhammiṃ kathaṃ sutvāti sambandho. Aññañca saṅgītianāruḷhaṃ tena
tika-s0102t:167_1: tadā vuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathanti yojanā. “Vaṃsovā”ti padattayena dhammatā esāti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:167_2: Cirassaṃ cirassaṃ passanti dīghāyukabhāvato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “bahūnaṃ vassānaṃ…pe…
tika-s0102t:167_3: accayenā”ti. Tenevāti na cirassaṃ diṭṭhabhāveneva. Acirakālantarikameva pubbakālakiriyaṃ
tika-s0102t:167_4: dassento “jiṇṇañca disvā…pe… pabbajitañca disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rājā”ti
tika-s0102t:167_5: āha yathā “nhatvā vatthaṃ paridahitvā gandhaṃ vilimpitvā mālaṃ piḷandhitvā bhutto”ti.
tika-s0102t:169_0: 55. “Kasmā panetthā”tiādinā tesaṃ caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ mahāsatte saṃbhattataṃ,
tika-s0102t:169_1: saṃvegabahulatañca dasseti, yato sutaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhatvā ñātimittādīsu kiñci anāmantetvā
tika-s0102t:169_2: mattavaravāraṇo viya ayomayabandhanaṃ ghanabandhanaṃ chinditvā pabbajjaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
tika-s0102t:170: Cattāro māse cārikaṃ cari na tāva ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā.
tika-s0102t:171_0: Yadā pana ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gataṃ, taṃ dassento “ayaṃ panā”tiādimāha. Sabbeva ime pabbajitā
tika-s0102t:171_1: mama gamanaṃ jānissanti, jānantā ca maṃ anubandhissantīti adhippāyo. Sannisīvesūti
tika-s0102t:171_2: sannisinnesu. Saṇatevāti saṇati viya saddaṃ karoti viya.
tika-s0102t:172_0: Avivekārāmānanti anabhirativivekānaṃ. Ayaṃ kāloti ayaṃ tesaṃ pabbajitānaṃ mama gamanassa
tika-s0102t:172_1: ajānanakālo. Nikkhamitvāti paṇṇasālāya niggantvā, mahābhinikkhamanaṃ pana pageva
tika-s0102t:172_2: nikkhanto. Pāramitānubhāvena uṭṭhitaṃ upari devatāhi dibbapaccattharaṇehi supaññattampi
tika-s0102t:172_3: mahāsattassa puññānubhāvena siddhattā tena paññattaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “pallaṅkaṃ
tika-s0102t:172_4: paññapetvā”ti. “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatū”tiādi nayappavattaṃ caturaṅgavīriyaṃ
tika-s0102t:173_0: Aññenevāti yattha mahāpuriso tadā viharati, tato aññeneva disābhāgena. Kāmaṃ bodhimaṇḍo
tika-s0102t:173_1: jambudīpassa majjhe nābhiṭṭhāniyo, tadā pana brahāraññe vivitte yogīnaṃ paṭisallānasāruppo
tika-s0102t:173_2: hutvā tiṭṭhati, tadañño pana jambudīpappadeso yebhuyyena bahujano ākiṇṇamanusso iddho
tika-s0102t:173_3: phīto ahosi. Tena te taṃ taṃ janapadadesaṃ uddissa gatā “anto jambudīpābhimukhā cārikaṃ
tika-s0102t:173_4: pakkantā”ti vuttā anto jambudīpābhimukhā, na himavantādipabbatābhimukhāti attho.
tika-s0102t:175_0: 57. Kāmaṃ bhagavā buddho hutvā sattasattāhāni tattheva vasi, sabbapaṭhamaṃ pana visākhapuṇṇamaṃ
tika-s0102t:175_1: sandhāya “ekarattivāsaṃ upagatassā”ti vuttaṃ. Rahogatassāti raho janavivittaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:175_2: upagatassa, tena gaṇasaṅgaṇikābhāvena mahāsattassa kāyavivekamāha. Paṭisallīnassāti
tika-s0102t:175_3: nānārammaṇacārato cittassa nivattiyā pati sammadeva nilīnassa tattha avisaṭacittassa,
tika-s0102t:175_4: tena cittasaṅgaṇikābhāvenassa pubbabhāgiyaṃ cittavivekamāha. Dukkhanti jātiādimūlakaṃ
tika-s0102t:175_5: dukkhaṃ. Kāmaṃ cutūpapātāpi jātimaraṇāni eva, maraṇajātiyova “jāyati mīyatī”ti pana
tika-s0102t:175_6: vatvā “cavati upapajjatī”ti vacanaṃ na ekabhavapariyāpannānaṃ nesaṃ gahaṇaṃ, atha
tika-s0102t:175_7: kho nānābhavapariyāpannānaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇanti dassento āha “idaṃ dvayaṃ…pe… vutta”nti.
tika-s0102t:175_8: Kasmā pana lokassa kicchāpattiparivitakkane “jarāmaraṇassā”ti jarāmaraṇavasena niyamanaṃ
tika-s0102t:175_9: katanti āha “yasmā”tiādi. Jarāmaraṇameva upaṭṭhāti āditoti adhippāyo. Abhiniviṭṭhassāti
tika-s0102t:175_10: āraddhassa. Paṭiccasamuppādamukhena vipassanārambhe tassa jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya abhiniveso
tika-s0102t:175_11: aggato yāva mūlaṃ otaraṇaṃ viyāti āha “bhavaggato otarantassa viyā”ti.
tika-s0102t:176_0: Upāyamanasikārāti upāyena manasikaraṇato manasikārassa pavattanato. Idāni taṃ upāyamanasikārapariyāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:176_1: yonisomanasikāraṃ sarūpato, pavattiākārato ca dassetuṃ “aniccādīni hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:176_2: Yonisomanasikāro nāma hotīti yāthāvato manasikārabhāvato. Aniccādīnīti ādi-saddena
tika-s0102t:176_3: dukkhānattaasubhādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Ayanti “etadahosī”ti evaṃ vutto “kimhi nu kho satī”tiādinayappavatto
tika-s0102t:176_4: manasikāro. Tesaṃ aññataroti tesu aniccādimanasikāresu aññataro eko. Ko pana soti?
tika-s0102t:176_6: uppajjati ceva cavati ca, taṃ aniccaṃ udayavayaparicchinnattā addhuvanti katvā. Tassa
tika-s0102t:176_7: pana tabbhāvadassanaṃ yāthāvamanasikāratāya yonisomanasikāro. Ito yonisomanasikārāti
tika-s0102t:176_8: hetumhi nissakkavacananti tassa iminā “upāyamanasikārenā”ti hetumhi karaṇavacanena
tika-s0102t:176_9: atthamāha. Samāgamo ahosīti yāthāvato paṭivijjhanavasena saṅgamo ahosi. Kiṃ pana
tika-s0102t:176_10: tanti kiṃ pana taṃ jarāmaraṇakāraṇanti āha “jātī”ti. “Jātiyā kho”tiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho
tika-s0102t:176_11: – kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti jarāmaraṇakāraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:176_12: pariggaṇhantassa bodhisattassa “yasmiṃ sati yaṃ hoti, asati ca na hoti, taṃ tassa
tika-s0102t:176_13: kāraṇa”nti evaṃ abyabhicārikāraṇapariggaṇhane “jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:176_14: jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti yā jarāmaraṇassa kāraṇapariggāhikā paññā uppajjati, tāya
tika-s0102t:176_15: uppajjantiyā samāgamo ahosīti. Sabbapadānīti “kimhi nu kho sati jāti hotī”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:177_0: Dvādasapadike paṭiccasamuppāde idha yāni dve padāni aggahitāni, tesaṃ aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:177_1: pucchitvā vissajjetukāmo tesaṃ gahetabbākāraṃ tāva dassento “ettha panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:177_2: Paccakkhabhūtaṃ paccuppannabhavaṃ paṭhamaṃ gahetvā tadanantaraṃ anāgataṃ “dutiya”nti
tika-s0102t:177_3: gahaṇe atīto tatiyo hotīti āha “avijjā saṅkhārā hi atīto bhavo”ti. Nanu cettha anāgatassāpi
tika-s0102t:177_4: bhavassa gahaṇaṃ na sambhavati paccuppannavasena abhinivesassa jotitattāti? Saccametaṃ,
tika-s0102t:177_5: kāraṇe pana gahite phalaṃ gahitameva hotīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Api cettha
tika-s0102t:177_6: anāgatopi addhā atthato saṅgahito eva, yato parato “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”ntiādinā
tika-s0102t:177_7: anāgataddhasaṅgahikā desanā pavattā. Tehīti avijjāsaṅkhārehi ārammaṇabhūtehi. Na
tika-s0102t:177_8: ghaṭiyati na sambajjhati. Mahāpuriso hi paccuppannavasena abhiniviṭṭhoti aghaṭane
tika-s0102t:177_9: kāraṇamāha. Adiṭṭhehīti anavabuddhehi, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Sati
tika-s0102t:177_10: anubodhe paṭivedhena bhavitabbanti āha “na sakkā buddhena bhavitu”nti. Imināti mahāsattena.
tika-s0102t:177_12: Diṭṭhā taṃsabhāvataṃsahagatehi tehi samānayogakkhamattā. Visuddhimagge kathitāva,
tika-s0102t:178_0: 58. Paccayatoti hetuto, saṅkhāratoti attho. “Kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:178_1: hi hetuparamparāvasena phalaparamparāya vuccamānāya “kimhi nu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotī”ti
tika-s0102t:178_2: vicāraṇāya “saṅkhāre kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotī”ti viññāṇassa visesakāraṇabhūte saṅkhāre
tika-s0102t:178_3: aggahite tato viññāṇaṃ paṭinivattati nāma, na sabbapaccayato. Tenevāha “nāmarūpe
tika-s0102t:178_4: kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotī”ti, nāmampi cettha sahajātādivaseneva paccayabhūtaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0102t:178_5: na kammūpanissayavasena paccuppannavasena abhinivisassa jotitattā. Ārammaṇatoti avijjāsaṅkhārasaṅkhātaārammaṇato,
tika-s0102t:178_6: atītabhavasaṅkhātaārammaṇato vā. Atītaddhapariyāpannā hi avijjāsaṅkhārā. Yato paṭinivattamānaṃ
tika-s0102t:178_7: viññāṇaṃ atītabhavatopi paṭinivattati nāma. Ubhayampīti paṭisandhiviññāṇampi vipassanāviññāṇampi.
tika-s0102t:178_8: Nāmarūpaṃ nātikkamatīti paccayabhūtaṃ, ārammaṇabhūtañca nāmarūpaṃ nātikkamati tena
tika-s0102t:178_9: vinā avattanato. Tenāha “nāmarūpato paraṃ na gacchatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:179_0: Viññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honteti viññāṇe nāmassa, rūpassa, nāmarūpassa ca paccaye
tika-s0102t:179_1: honte. Nāmarūpe ca viññāṇassa paccaye honteti tathā nāme, rūpe, nāmarūpe ca viññāṇassa
tika-s0102t:179_2: paccaye honteti catuvokāraekavokārapañcavokārabhavavasena yathārahaṃ yojanā veditabbā,
tika-s0102t:179_3: dvīsupi aññamaññapaccayesu hontesūti pana pañcavokārabhavavaseneva. Ettakenāti evaṃ
tika-s0102t:179_4: viññāṇa nāmarūpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ upatthambhanavasena pavattiyā. Jāyetha vā…pe… upapajjetha
tika-s0102t:179_5: vāti “satto jāyati…pe… upapajjati vā”ti samaññā hoti viññāṇanāmarūpavinimuttassa
tika-s0102t:179_6: sattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtassa dhammassa abhāvato. Tenāha “ito hī”tiādi. Etadevāti
tika-s0102t:180_0: Pañca padānīti “jāyetha vā”tiādīni pañca padāni. Nanu tattha paṭhamatatiyehi catutthapañcamāni
tika-s0102t:180_1: atthato abhinnānīti āha “saddhiṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhīhī”ti. Puna taṃ ettāvatāti
tika-s0102t:180_2: vuttamatthanti yo “ettāvatā”ti padena pubbe vutto, tameva yathāvuttamatthaṃ “yadida”ntiādinā
tika-s0102t:180_3: niyyātento nidassento puna vatvā. Anulomapaccayākāravasenāti paccayadhammadassanapubbakaṃ
tika-s0102t:180_5: idappaccayatā paccayākāro, so ca “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā vutto. Saṃsārappavattiyā
tika-s0102t:180_6: anulomanato anulomapaccayākāro. Jātiādikaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ cittena samihitena
tika-s0102t:180_7: kataṃ samūhavasena gahetvā pāḷiyaṃ “dukkhakkhandhassā”ti vuttanti āha “jāti…pe… dukkharāsissā”ti.
tika-s0102t:181_1: samudayo”ti āmeḍitavacanaṃ avoca. Atha vā “evaṃ samudayo hotī”ti idaṃ na kevalaṃ
tika-s0102t:181_2: nibbattinidassanapadaṃ, atha kho paṭiccasamuppāda-saddo viya samuppādamukhena idha
tika-s0102t:181_3: samudaya-saddo nibbattimukhena paccayattaṃ vadati. Viññāṇādayo bhavantā idha paccayadhammā
tika-s0102t:181_4: niddiṭṭhā, te sāmaññarūpena byāpanicchāvasena gaṇhanto “samudayo samudayo”ti āha,
tika-s0102t:181_5: evañca katvā yaṃ vakkhati “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti paccayasañjānanamattaṃ kathita”nti,
tika-s0102t:181_6: taṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Yadi evaṃ “udayadassanapaññā vesā”ti idaṃ kathanti? Nāyaṃ doso
tika-s0102t:181_8: cakkhūti samudayassa paccakkhato dassanabhāvena cakkhu viyāti cakkhu. Ñātakaraṇaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0102t:181_9: yathā samudayo sammadeva ñāto hoti avabuddho, evaṃ karaṇaṭṭhena. Pajānanaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0102t:181_11: jānanaṭṭhena. Nibbijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā uppannaṭṭhenāti anibbijjhitvā pubbe udayadassanapaññāya
tika-s0102t:181_12: paṭipakkhadhamme nibbijjhitvā “ayaṃ samudayo”ti paccayato, khaṇato ca, sarūpato paṭivijjhitvā
tika-s0102t:181_13: uppannabhāvena, nibbijjhanaṭṭhena paṭivijjhanaṭṭhena vijjāti vuttaṃ hoti. Obhāsaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0102t:181_14: samudayasabhāvapaṭicchādanakassa mohandhakārassa ca kilesandhakārassa ca vidhamanavasena avabhāsakabhāvena.
tika-s0102t:182_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ paṭipāṭiyā vibhāvetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha cakkhuṃ
tika-s0102t:182_1: udapādīti pāḷiyaṃ paduddhāro. Kathaṃ udapādīti ceti āha “dassanaṭṭhenā”ti. “Samudayassa
tika-s0102t:182_2: paccakkhato dassanabhāvenāti vutto vāyamattho. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:182_3: Cakkhudhammoti cakkhūti pāḷidhammo. Dassanaṭṭho atthoti dassanasabhāvo tena pakāsetabbo
tika-s0102t:182_4: attho. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ettakehi padehīti imehi pañcahi padehi. “Kiṃ kathita”nti
tika-s0102t:182_5: piṇḍatthaṃ pucchati. Paccayasañjānanamattanti viññāṇādīnaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ nāmarūpādipaccayuppannassa
tika-s0102t:182_7: Saṅkhārānaṃ sammadeva udayadassanassa jotitattā “vīthipaṭipannā taruṇavipassanā kathitā”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:183_0: 61. Attanā adhigatattā āsannapaccakkhatāya “aya”nti vuttaṃ, ariyamaggādīnaṃ magganaṭṭhena
tika-s0102t:183_1: maggoti. Pubbabhāgavipassanā hesā. Tenāha “bodhāyā”ti. Bodhapadassa bhāvasādhanataṃ
tika-s0102t:183_4: “Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”nti hi vuttaṃ. Bujjhatīti cattāri ariyasaccāni ekapaṭivedhena
tika-s0102t:183_5: paṭivijjhati, tena bodha-saddassa kattusādhanattamāha. Paccattapadehīti paṭhamāvibhattidīpakehi
tika-s0102t:183_6: padehi. Nibbānameva kathitaṃ viññāṇādi nirujjhati etthāti katvā. Anibbattinirodhanti
tika-s0102t:184_0: 62. Sabbeheva etehi padehīti “cakkhū”tiādīhi pañcahi padehi. Nirodhasañjānanamattamevāti
tika-s0102t:184_1: “nirodho nirodhoti kho”tiādinā nirodhassa sañjānanamattameva kathitaṃ pubbārambhabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:184_2: na tassa paṭivijjhanavasena paccakkhato dassanaṃ ariyamaggassa anadhigatattā. Saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0102t:184_3: sammadeva nirodhadassanaṃ nāma sikhāppattāya vipassanāya vasena icchitabbanti “vuṭṭhānagāminī
tika-s0102t:185_0: 63. Viditvāti pubbabhāgiyena ñāṇena jānitvā. Tato aparabhāgeti vuttanayena paccayanirodhajānanato
tika-s0102t:185_1: pacchābhāge. Upādānassa paccayabhūtesūti catubbidhassapi upādānassa ārammaṇapaccayādinā
tika-s0102t:185_2: paccayabhūtesu, upādāniyesūti attho. Vahantoti pavattento. Idanti “aparena samayenā”tiādi
tika-s0102t:185_3: vacanaṃ. Kasmā vuttanti “yāya paṭipattiyā sabbepi mahābodhisattā carimabhave bodhāya
tika-s0102t:185_4: paṭipajjanti, vipassanāya mahābodhisattena tatheva paṭipanna”nti kathetukamyatāvasena
tika-s0102t:185_5: pucchāvacanaṃ. Tenāha “sabbeyeva hī”tiādi. Tattha puttassa jātadivase mahābhinikkhamanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:185_6: padhānānuyogo ca dhammatāvasena veditabbo, itaraṃ itikattabbatāvasena. Tatthāpi cirakālaparibhāvanāya
tika-s0102t:185_7: laddhāsevanāya mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānasattā “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:185_8: saṃsāradukkhato mocetuṃ icchitassa sattalokassa kicchāpattidassanamukhena jarāmaraṇato
tika-s0102t:185_9: paṭṭhāya paccayākārasammasanampi dhammatāva. Tathā attādhīnatāya, kenaci anupakhatattā,
tika-s0102t:185_11: khandhesu abhinivisitvāti viññāṇanāmarūpādipariyāyena gahitesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu
tika-s0102t:185_12: vipassanābhinivesavasena abhinivisitvā paṭipattiṃ ārabhitvā. Anukkamanti anu anu
tika-s0102t:185_13: gāmitabbato paṭipajjitabbato “anukkama”nti laddhanāmaṃ anupubbapaṭipattiṃ. Katvāti paṭipajjitvā.
tika-s0102t:186_0: Iti rūpanti ettha dutiyo iti-saddo nidassanattho, tena paṭhamo iti-saddo sarūpassa,
tika-s0102t:186_1: parimāṇassa ca bodhako anekatthattā nipātānaṃ,āvuttiādivasena vāyamattho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:186_2: Antogadhāvadhāraṇañca vākyaṃ dassento “idaṃ rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, ito uddhaṃ rūpaṃ
tika-s0102t:186_3: natthī”tiādimāha. Tattha “ruppanasabhāva”nti iminā sāmaññato rūpassa sabhāvo dassito,
tika-s0102t:186_4: “bhūtupādāyabheda”ntiādinā visesato, tadubhayenapi “idaṃ rūpa”nti padassa attho niddiṭṭho.
tika-s0102t:186_5: Tattha lakkhaṇaṃ nāma tassa tassa rūpavisesassa anaññasādhāraṇo sabhāvo. Raso tasseva
tika-s0102t:186_6: attano phalaṃ pati paccayabhāvo. Paccupaṭṭhānaṃ tassa paramatthato vijjamānattā yāthāvato
tika-s0102t:186_7: ñāṇassa gocarabhāvo. Padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ, tenassa paccayāyattavuttitā dassitā.
tika-s0102t:186_8: “Anavasesarūpapariggaho”ti iminā pana “ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, ito uddhaṃ” rūpaṃ natthīti
tika-s0102t:186_9: padadvayassāpi attho niddiṭṭho rūpassa sabbaso pariyādānavasena niyāmanato. “Iti
tika-s0102t:186_10: rūpassa samudayo”ti ettha pana iti-saddo “iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo”tiādīsu
tika-s0102t:187_0: Avijjāsamudayāti avijjāya uppādā, atthibhāvāti attho. Nirodhanirodhī hi uppādo atthibhāvavācakopi
tika-s0102t:187_1: hoti, tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpasamudayo, rūpassa
tika-s0102t:187_2: uppādo hotīti attho. “Taṇhāsamudayā”tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Āhārasamudayāti ettha pana
tika-s0102t:187_3: pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāhārassa balavatāya so eva gahito. Tasmiṃ pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena
tika-s0102t:187_4: utucittāni gahitāneva hontīti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa paccayato udayadassanaṃ vibhāvitamevāti
tika-s0102t:187_6: rūpassa uppādasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ. Passantopīti na kevalaṃ paccayasamudayameva,
tika-s0102t:187_7: atha kho khaṇato udayaṃ passantopi. Addhāvasena hi paṭhamaṃ udayaṃ passitvā ṭhito
tika-s0102t:187_8: puna santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati. Avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhoti
tika-s0102t:187_9: aggamaggena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa rūpassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve
tika-s0102t:187_10: abhāvato. Taṇhānirodhā kammanirodhoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Āhāranirodhāti pavattipaccayassa
tika-s0102t:187_11: kabaḷīkārāhārassa abhāvena. Rūpanirodhoti taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa abhāvo hoti. Sesaṃ
tika-s0102t:187_13: taṃ addhāvasena paṭhamaṃ passitvā puna santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena
tika-s0102t:187_14: passati. Ayañca nayo pākatikavipassakavasena vutto, bodhisattānaṃ panetaṃ natthi.
tika-s0102t:188_0: “Iti vedanā”tiādīsupi heṭṭhā rūpe vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Tenāha “ayaṃ
tika-s0102t:188_1: vedanā, ettakā vedanā”tiādi. Tattha vedayita…pe… sabhāvanti ettha “vedayitasabhāvaṃ…pe…
tika-s0102t:188_2: vijānanasabhāva”nti paccekaṃ sabhāva- saddo yojetabbo. Vedayitasabhāvanti anubhavanasabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0102t:188_4: āyūhanasabhāvaṃ. Vijānanasabhāvanti ārammaṇassa upaladdhisabhāvaṃ. Sukhādīti ādi-saddena
tika-s0102t:188_6: phassādīti ādi-saddena cetanā vitakkādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnanti ādi-saddena sabbesaṃ
tika-s0102t:188_7: lokiyaviññāṇānaṃ saṅgaho. Yathā ca viññāṇe, esa nayo vedanādīsupi. Tesanti “samudayo”ti
tika-s0102t:188_9: phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetī”ti vacanato “phassasamudayā”ti vattabbaṃ. “Nāmarūpapaccayāpi
tika-s0102t:188_10: viññāṇa”nti vacanato viññāṇakkhandhe “nāmarūpasamudayā”ti vattabbaṃ. Tesaṃ yevāti
tika-s0102t:188_11: tīsu khandhesu “phassassa viññāṇakkhandhe nāmarūpassā”ti phassanāmarūpānaṃyeva vasena
tika-s0102t:188_12: atthaṅgamapadampi yojetabbaṃ, avijjādayo pana rūpe vuttasadisā evāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:189_0: Samapaññāsalakkhaṇavasenāti paccayato vīsati khaṇato pañcāti pañcavīsatiyā udayalakkhaṇānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:189_1: paccayato vīsati khaṇato pañcāti pañcavīsatiyā eva vayalakkhaṇānaṃ cāti samapaññāsāya
tika-s0102t:189_2: udayavayalakkhaṇānaṃ vasena. Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayo lakkhīyati etehīti
tika-s0102t:189_3: lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti avijjādisamudayoti, tathā tesaṃ anuppādanirodho lakkhīyati
tika-s0102t:189_4: etehīti lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti avijjādīnaṃ accantanirodho. Nibbattivipariṇāmalakkhaṇāni
tika-s0102t:189_5: pana saṅkhatalakkhaṇamevāti. Evaṃ etāni samapaññāsalakkhaṇāni sarūpato veditabbāni.
tika-s0102t:189_6: Yathānukkamena vaḍḍhiteti yathāvuttaudayabbayañāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne hutvā vahante
tika-s0102t:189_7: tato paraṃ vattabbānaṃ bhaṅgañāṇādīnaṃ uppattipaṭipāṭiyā buddhippatte paramukkaṃsagate
tika-s0102t:189_8: vipassanāñāṇe. Pageva hi chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena pavattena sabbaññutaññāṇānucchavikena
tika-s0102t:189_9: mahāvajirañāṇasaṅkhātena sammasanañāṇena sambhatānubhāvaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ
tika-s0102t:189_10: gacchantaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhiñāṇaṃ aparimitakāle sambhatāya paññāpāramiyā ānubhāvena
tika-s0102t:189_11: ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ anukkamena vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvaṃ upagantvā yadā ariyamaggena
tika-s0102t:189_12: ghaṭeti, tadā ariyamaggacittaṃ sabbakilesehi maggapaṭipāṭiyā vimuccati, vimuccantañca
tika-s0102t:189_13: tathā vimuccati, yathā sabbañeyyāvaraṇappahānaṃ hoti. Yaṃ kilesānaṃ “savāsanappahāna”nti
tika-s0102t:189_14: vuccati, tayidaṃ pahānaṃ atthato anuppattinirodhoti āha “anuppādanirodhenā”ti. Āsavasaṅkhātehi
tika-s0102t:189_15: kilesehīti bhavato ābhavaggaṃ, dhammato āgotrabhuṃ savanato pavattanato āsavasaññitehi
tika-s0102t:189_16: rāgo, diṭṭhi, mohoti imehi kilesehi. Lakkhaṇavacanañcetaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ yadidaṃ “āsavehī”ti,
tika-s0102t:189_17: tadekaṭṭhatāya pana sabbehipi kilesehi sabbehipi pāpadhammehi cittaṃ vimuccati. Aggahetvāti
tika-s0102t:190_0: Maggakkhaṇe vimuccati nāma taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesehi phalakkhaṇe vimuttaṃ nāma. Maggakkhaṇe
tika-s0102t:190_1: vā vimuttañceva vimuccati cāti uparimaggakkhaṇe heṭṭhimamaggavajjhehi vimuttañceva
tika-s0102t:190_2: yathāsakaṃ pahātabbehi vimuccati ca. Phalakkhaṇe vimuttamevāti sabbasmimpi phalakkhaṇe
tika-s0102t:191_1: visesato pakārehi mutto. Suvikasitacittasantānoti sātisayaṃ ñāṇarasmisamphassena
tika-s0102t:191_2: suṭṭhu sammadeva samphullacittasantāno. “Cattāri maggañāṇānī”tiādi yehi ñāṇehi suvikasitacittasantāno,
tika-s0102t:191_3: tesaṃ ekadesena dassanaṃ. Nippadesato dassanaṃ pana parato āgamissati, tasmā tattheva
tika-s0102t:191_4: tāni vibhajissāma. Sakale ca buddhaguṇeti atītaṃse appaṭihatañāṇādike sabbepi buddhaguṇe.
tika-s0102t:191_5: Yadā hi lokanātho aggamaggaṃ adhigacchati, tadā sabbe guṇe hatthagate karoti nāma.
tika-s0102t:192_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha ādito dvinnaṃ gāthānamattho heṭṭhā brahmajālanidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto
tika-s0102t:192_2: eva. Parato pana ayoghanahatassāti ayo haññati etenāti ayoghanaṃ, kammārānaṃ ayokūṭaṃ,
tika-s0102t:192_3: ayomuṭṭhi ca, tena ayoghanena hatassa pahatassa. Eva-saddo cettha nipātamattaṃ. Jalato
tika-s0102t:192_4: jātavedasoti jalayamānassa aggissa, anādare vā etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Anupubbūpasantassāti
tika-s0102t:192_5: anukkamena upasantassa vikkhambhantassa niruddhassa. Yathā na ñāyate gatīti yathā
tika-s0102t:192_6: tassa gati na ñāyati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ayomuṭṭhikūṭādinā pahatattā ayoghanena hatassa
tika-s0102t:192_7: pahatassa ayogatassa, kaṃsabhājanādigatassa vā jalamānassa aggissa anukkamena upasantassa
tika-s0102t:192_8: dasasu disāsu na katthaci gati paññāyati paccayanirodhena appaṭisandhikaniruddhattāti.
tika-s0102t:192_9: Evaṃ sammāvimuttānanti sammā hetunā ñāyena tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttipubbaṅgamāya
tika-s0102t:192_10: samucchedavimuttiyā ariyamaggena catūhipi upādānehi, āsavehi ca muttattā sammā vimuttānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:192_11: tato eva kāmabandhanasaṅkhātaṃ kāmoghabhavoghādibhedaṃ avasiṭṭhaoghañca taritvā ṭhitattā
tika-s0102t:192_13: akampanīyatāya acalaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhaṃ pattānaṃ adhigatānaṃ
tika-s0102t:192_14: khīṇāsavānaṃ gati devamanussādibhedāsu gatīsu “ayaṃ nāmā”ti paññāpetabbatāya abhāvato
tika-s0102t:192_15: paññāpetuṃ natthi na upalabbhati, yathāvuttajātavedo viya apaññattikabhāvameva te
tika-s0102t:192_16: gacchantīti attho. Evaṃ manasi karontoti “evaṃ anekajātisaṃsāra”ntiādinā attano katakiccattaṃ
tika-s0102t:192_17: manasi karonto bodhipallaṅke nisinnova virocitthāti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:195_0: 64. Yannūnāti parivitakkanatthe nipāto, ahanti bhagavā attānaṃ niddisatīti āha “yadi
tika-s0102t:195_1: panāha”nti. “Aṭṭhame sattāhe”tiādi yathā amhākaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho hutvā vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedanādivasena
tika-s0102t:195_2: sattasu sattāhesu paṭipajji, tato parañca dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇādivasena,
tika-s0102t:195_3: evameva sabbepi sammāsambuddhā abhisambuddhakāle paṭipajjiṃsu, te ca sattāhādayo
tika-s0102t:195_4: tatheva vavatthapīyantīti ayaṃ sabbesampi buddhānaṃ dhammatā. Tasmā vipassī bhagavā
tika-s0102t:195_5: abhisambuddhakāle tathā paṭipajjīti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Tattha “aṭṭhame sattāhe”ti
tika-s0102t:195_6: idaṃ sattamasattāhato paraṃ, sattāhato orime ca pavattāya paṭipattiyā vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:195_7: na pallaṅkasattāhassa viya aṭṭhamassa nāma sattāhassa vavatthitassa labbhamānattā.
tika-s0102t:196_0: Paṭividdhoti sayambhuñāṇena “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā paṭimukhaṃ paṭivijjhanavasena pavatto,
tika-s0102t:196_1: yathābhūtaṃ avabuddhoti attho. Dhammoti catusaccadhammo tabbinimuttassa paṭivijjhitabbadhammassa
tika-s0102t:196_2: abhāvato. Gambhīroti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā aññatra samupacitaparipakkañāṇasambhārehi
tika-s0102t:196_4: Alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭho ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya sarūpato visesato ca passituṃ na sakkāti
tika-s0102t:196_5: āha “gambhīrattāva duddaso”ti. Dukkhena daṭṭhabboti kicchena kenaci kadācideva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:196_6: Yaṃ pana daṭṭhumeva na sakkā, tassa ogāhetvā anu anu bujjhane kathā eva natthīti
tika-s0102t:196_7: āha “duddasattāva duranubodho”ti. Dukkhena avabujjhitabbo avabodhassa dukkarabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:196_8: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā”ti
tika-s0102t:196_9: suttapadaṃ vattabbaṃ. Santārammaṇatāya vā santo. Nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya nibbuto.
tika-s0102t:196_10: Padhānabhāvaṃ nītoti vā paṇīto. Atittikaraṭṭhena atappako sādurasabhojanaṃ viya.
tika-s0102t:196_11: Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti santārammaṇaṃ, maggasaccaṃ santaṃ, santārammaṇañcāti
tika-s0102t:196_12: santārammaṇaṃ anupasantasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ, saṅkhārānañca abhāvato santo nibbutasabbapariḷāhattā
tika-s0102t:196_13: nibbuto, santapaṇītabhāveneva tadatthāya asecanakatāya atappakatā daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha
tika-s0102t:196_14: “idaṃ dvayaṃ lokuttarameva sandhāya vutta”nti. Uttamañāṇassa visayattā na takkena
tika-s0102t:196_15: avacaritabbo, tato eva nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya, saṇhasukhumasabhāvattā ca nipuṇo. Bālānaṃ
tika-s0102t:196_16: avisayattā paṇḍitehi eva veditabboti paṇḍitavedanīyo. Ālīyanti abhiramitabbaṭṭhena
tika-s0102t:196_17: sevīyantīti ālayā, pañca kāmaguṇā. Ālayanti abhiramaṇavasena sevantīti ālayā, taṇhāvicaritāni.
tika-s0102t:196_18: Ālayaratāti ālayaniratā. Suṭṭhu muditā ativiya muditā anukkaṇṭhanato. Ramatīti ratiṃ
tika-s0102t:196_19: vindati kīḷati laḷati. Ime sattā yathā kāmaguṇe, evaṃ rāgampi assādenti abhinandanti
tika-s0102t:197_0: Ṭhānaṃ sandhāyāti ṭhāna-saddaṃ sandhāya. Atthato pana “ṭhāna”nti ca paṭiccasamuppādo
tika-s0102t:197_1: eva adhippeto. Tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayabhūtā
tika-s0102t:197_2: avijjādayo. Imesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayāti idappaccayā, avijjādayova. Idappaccayā
tika-s0102t:197_3: eva idappaccayatā yathā devo eva devatā, idappaccayānaṃ vā avijjādīnaṃ attano phalaṃ
tika-s0102t:197_4: paṭicca paccayabhāvo uppādanasamatthatā idappaccayatā, tena paramatthapaccayalakkhaṇo
tika-s0102t:197_5: paṭiccasamuppādo dassito hoti. Paṭicca samuppajjati phalaṃ etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādo.
tika-s0102t:197_6: Padadvayenāpi dhammānaṃ paccayaṭṭho eva vibhāvito. Tenāha “saṅkhārādipaccayānaṃ avijjādīnametaṃ
tika-s0102t:197_7: adhivacana”nti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:198_1: nibbānameva. Idāni tassa nibbānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tanti nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:198_2: Āgammāti paṭicca ariyamaggassa ārammaṇapaccayahetu. Sammantīti appaṭisandhikūpasamavasena
tika-s0102t:198_3: sammanti. Tathā santā ca savisesaṃ upasantā nāma hontīti āha “vūpasammantī”ti, etena
tika-s0102t:198_4: sabbe saṅkhārā sammanti etthāti sabbasaṅkhārasamatho, nibbānanti dasseti. Sabbasaṅkhāravisaṃyutte
tika-s0102t:198_5: hi nibbāne sabbasaṅkhāravūpasamapariyāyo ñāyāgato yevāti. Sesepadesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:198_6: Upadhīyati ettha dukkhanti upadhi, khandhādayo. Paṭinissaṭṭhāti samucchedavasena
tika-s0102t:198_7: pariccattā honti. Sabbā taṇhāti aṭṭhasatappabhedā sabbāpi taṇhā. Sabbe kilesarāgāti
tika-s0102t:198_8: kāmarāgarūparāgādibhedā sabbepi kilesabhūtā rāgā, sabbepi vā kilesā idha kilesarāgāti
tika-s0102t:198_9: veditabbā, na lobhavisesā eva cittassa viparītabhāvāpādanato. Yathāha “rattampi cittaṃ
tika-s0102t:198_10: vipariṇataṃ, duṭṭhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, mūḷhampi cittaṃ vipariṇata”nti virajjantīti
tika-s0102t:198_11: attano sabhāvaṃ vijahanti. Sabbaṃ dukkhanti jarāmaraṇādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:198_12: Bhavena bhavanti tena tena bhavena bhavantaraṃ. Bhavanikantibhāvena saṃsibbati, phalena
tika-s0102t:198_13: vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ sataṇhasseva āyatiṃ punabbhavabhāvato. Tato vānato nikkhantaṃ tattha
tika-s0102t:198_15: kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca veditabbā. Sā ca kho desanāya atthaṃ ajānantānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:198_16: appaṭipajjantānañca vasena, jānantānaṃ, pana paṭipajjantānañca desanāya kāyaparissamopi
tika-s0102t:198_17: satthu aparissamova. Tenāha bhagavā “na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesesī”ti. Tathā
tika-s0102t:198_18: hi vuttaṃ “yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma, so mama kilamatho assā”ti. Ubhayanti cittakilamatho,
tika-s0102t:198_19: cittavihesā cāti ubhayaṃ petaṃ buddhānaṃ natthi, bodhimūleyeva samucchinnattā.
tika-s0102t:199_0: 65. Anubrūhanaṃ sampiṇḍanaṃ. Soti “apissū”ti nipāto. Vipassinti paṭi-saddayogena
tika-s0102t:199_1: sāmiatthe upayogavacananti āha “vipassissā”ti. Vuddhippattā acchariyā vā anacchariyā.
tika-s0102t:199_2: Vuddhiatthopi hi akāro hoti yathā“asekkhā dhammā”ti. Kappānaṃ cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
tika-s0102t:199_3: satasahassañca sadevakassa lokassa dhammasaṃvibhāgakaraṇatthameva pāramiyo pūretvā
tika-s0102t:199_4: idāni samadhigatadhammarājassa tattha appossukkatāpattidīpanatā, gāthātthassa acchariyatā,
tika-s0102t:199_5: tassa vuddhippatti cāti veditabbā. Atthadvārena hi gāthānaṃ anacchariyatā. Gocarā
tika-s0102t:199_6: ahesunti upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Upaṭṭhānañca vitakketabbatāvāti āha “parivitakkayitabbataṃ pāpuṇiṃsū”ti.
tika-s0102t:200_0: Yadi sukhāpaṭipadāva kathaṃ kicchatāti āha “pāramīpūraṇakāle”tiādi. Evamādīni duppariccajāni
tika-s0102t:200_1: dentassa. Ha-iti vā byattanti etasmiṃ atthe nipāto, “ekaṃsatthe”ti keci. Ha byattaṃ,
tika-s0102t:200_2: ekaṃsena vā alaṃ nippayojanaṃ evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa dhammassa desetunti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:200_3: Halanti “ala”nti iminā samānatthaṃ padaṃ “halanti vadāmī”tiādīsu viya. Rāgadosaphuṭṭhehīti
tika-s0102t:200_4: phuṭṭhavisena viya sappena rāgena, dosena ca samphuṭṭhehi abhibhūtehi. Rāgadosānugatehīti
tika-s0102t:201_0: Niccādīnanti niccaggāhādīnaṃ. Evaṃ gatanti evaṃ pavattaṃ aniccādiākārena pavattaṃ.
tika-s0102t:201_1: “Catusaccadhamma”nti idaṃ aniccādīsu, saccesu ca yathālābhavasena gahetabbaṃ. Evaṃ
tika-s0102t:201_2: gatanti vā evaṃ “anicca”ntiādinā abhinivisitvā mayā, aññehi ca sammāsambuddhehi gataṃ,
tika-s0102t:201_3: ñātaṃ paṭividdhanti attho. Kāmarāgena, bhavarāgena ca rattā nīvaraṇehi nivutacittatāya,
tika-s0102t:201_4: diṭṭhirāgena rattā viparītābhinivesena na dakkhanti yāthāvato imaṃ dhammaṃ nappaṭivijjhissanti.
tika-s0102t:201_5: Evaṃ gāhāpetunti “anicca”ntiādinā sabhāvena yāthāvato dhamme jānāpetuṃ. Rāgadosaparetatāpi
tika-s0102t:202_0: Dhammadesanāya appossukkatāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kasmā panā”tiādinā sayameva
tika-s0102t:202_1: codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tattha yathāyaṃ idāni dhammadesanāya appossukkatāpatti sabbabuddhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:202_3: mahābhinīhāre attano cittassa samussāhanaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇadhammatā vāti āha “kiṃ
tika-s0102t:202_4: me”tiādi. Tattha aññātavesenāti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ unnādento buddho ahutvā kevalaṃ buddhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:202_5: sāvakabhāvūpagamanavasena aññātarūpena. Tividhaṃ kāraṇaṃ appossukkatāpattiyā paṭipakkhassa
tika-s0102t:202_6: balavabhāvo, dhammassa paramagambhīratā, tattha ca bhagavato sātisayaṃ gāravanti
tika-s0102t:202_7: taṃ dassetuṃ “tassa hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha paṭipakkhā nāma rāgādayo kilesā sammāpaṭipattiyā
tika-s0102t:202_8: antarāyakarattā. Tesaṃ balavabhāvato ciraparibhāvanāya sattasantānato dubbisodhiyatāya
tika-s0102t:202_9: te satte mattahatthino viya dubbalaṃ purisaṃ ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādentā
tika-s0102t:202_11: Dūrappabheda ducchejjatāhi dubbisodhiyataṃ pana dassetuṃ “athassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0102t:202_12: ca anto āmaṭṭhatāya kañjikapuṇṇalābu ciraparivāsikatāya takkabharitacāṭi snehatintadubbalabhāvena
tika-s0102t:202_14: Hīnūpamā cetā rūpappabandhabhāvato, acirakālikattā ca malīnatāya, kilesasaṃkileso
tika-s0102t:202_15: eva pana dubbisodhanīyataro anādikālikattā, anusayitattā ca. Tenāha “atisaṃkiliṭṭhā”ti.
tika-s0102t:202_16: Yathā ca dubbisodhanīyatāya evaṃ gambhīraduddasaduranubodhānampi vuttaupamā hīnūpamāva.
tika-s0102t:203_0: Gambhīropi dhammo paṭipakkhavidhamanena supākaṭo bhaveyya, paṭipakkhavidhamanaṃ pana
tika-s0102t:203_1: sammāpaṭipattipaṭibaddhaṃ, sā saddhammasavanādhīnā, taṃ satthari, dhamme ca pasādāyattaṃ.
tika-s0102t:203_2: So visesato loke sambhāvanīyassa garukātabbassa abhipatthanāhetukoti panāḷikāya sattānaṃ
tika-s0102t:204_0: 66. “Aññataro”ti appaññāto viya kiñcāpi vuttaṃ, atha kho pākaṭo paññātoti dassetuṃ
tika-s0102t:204_2: So hi sakko viya kāmadevaloke, brahmaloke ca pākaṭo paññāto. Upakkilesabhūtaṃ appaṃ
tika-s0102t:204_3: rāgādirajaṃ etassāti apparajaṃ, apparajaṃ akkhi paññācakkhu yesaṃ te taṃsabhāvāti
tika-s0102t:204_4: katvā apparajakkhajātikāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “paññāmaye”tiādimāha. Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ
tika-s0102t:204_5: yesaṃ te taṃsabhāvā apparajakkhajātikāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Assavanatāti
tika-s0102t:204_6: “sayaṃ abhiññā”tiādīsu viya karaṇe paccattavacananti āha “assavanatāyā”ti. Dasapuññakiriyavatthuvasenāti
tika-s0102t:204_8: Papañcasūdaniyaṃ pana “dvādasapuññakiriyavasenā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ dānādīsu saraṇagamanaparahitapariṇāmanadvaya
tika-s0102t:205_0: 69. Garuṭṭhāniyesu gāravavasena garukarapatthanā ajjhesanā, sāpi atthato patthanā
tika-s0102t:205_1: evāti vuttaṃ “yācana”nti. Padesavisayañāṇadassanaṃ hutvā buddhānaṃyeva āveṇikabhāvato
tika-s0102t:205_2: idaṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ “buddhacakkhū”ti vuccatīti āha “imesañhi dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ buddhacakkhūti
tika-s0102t:205_3: nāma”nti. Tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānanti heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ “dhammacakkhū”ti
tika-s0102t:205_4: nāmaṃ, catusaccadhammadassananti katvā dassanamattabhāvato. Yato tāni ñāṇāni vijjūpamābhāvena
tika-s0102t:205_5: vuttāni, aggamaggañāṇaṃ pana ñāṇakiccassa sikhāppattiyā dassanamattaṃ na hotīti “dhammacakkhū”ti
tika-s0102t:205_6: na vuccatīti. Yato taṃ vajirūpamābhāvena vuttaṃ. Vuttanayenevāti “apparajakkhajātikā”ti
tika-s0102t:205_7: ettha vuttanayeneva. Yasmā mandakilesā “apparajakkhā”ti vuttā, tasmā bahalakilesā
tika-s0102t:205_9: vuttavipariyāyena mudūni. Saddhādayo ākārāti saddahanādippakāre vadati. Sundarāti
tika-s0102t:205_10: kalyāṇā. Sammohavinodaniyaṃ pana “yesaṃ āsayādayo koṭṭhāsā sundarā, te svākārā”ti
tika-s0102t:205_11: vuttaṃ, taṃ imāya atthavaṇṇanāya aññadatthu saṃsandati sametīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yato
tika-s0102t:205_12: saddhāsampadādivasena ajjhāsayassa sundaratāti, tabbipariyāyato asundaratāti. Kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:205_13: nāma paccayākāro, saccāni vā. Paralokanti samparāyaṃ. Taṃ dukkhāvahaṃ vajjaṃ viya
tika-s0102t:205_14: bhayato passitabbanti vuttaṃ “paralokañceva vajjañca bhayato passantī”ti. Sampattibhavato
tika-s0102t:206_0: Ayaṃ panettha pāḷīti ettha “apparajakkhā”dipadānaṃ atthavibhāvane ayaṃ tassa tathābhāvasādhakapāḷi.
tika-s0102t:206_2: dubbalabhāveneva hoti, tesañca balavabhāvo saddhādīnaṃ dubbalabhāvenāti vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ
tika-s0102t:206_3: savisesaṃ atthitānatthitāvasena “apparajakkhā mahārajakkhā”ti ādayo pāḷiyaṃ vibhajitvā
tika-s0102t:206_4: dassitā. Iti saddhādīnaṃ vasena pañca apparajakkhā, asaddhiyādīnaṃ vasena pañca mahārajakkhā.
tika-s0102t:206_5: Evaṃ tikkhindriyamudindriyādayoti vibhāvitā paññāsa puggalā. Saddhādīnaṃ pana antarabhedena
tika-s0102t:206_6: anekabhedā veditabbā. Khandhādayo eva lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko, sampattibhavabhūto
tika-s0102t:206_7: loko sampattibhavaloko, sugatisaṅkhāto upapattibhavo, sampatti sambhavati etenāti
tika-s0102t:207_0: Puna ekakadukādivasena lokaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “eko loko”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āhārādayo
tika-s0102t:207_1: hi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti. Tattha “eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti yāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:207_2: puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā, tāya sabbo
tika-s0102t:207_3: saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassābhāvato. “Dve lokā”tiādīsupi iminā nayena
tika-s0102t:207_4: attho veditabbo. Nāmaggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṃ tassa alokasabhāvattā.
tika-s0102t:207_5: Nanu ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphalānampi lokatā āpajjatīti?
tika-s0102t:207_6: Nāpajjati pariññeyyānaṃ dukkhasaccadhammānaṃ “idha loko”ti adhippetattā. Atha vā
tika-s0102t:207_7: na lujjati na palujjatīti yo gahito, tathā na hoti, so lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ
tika-s0102t:207_8: lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā. Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā upādānakkhandhā. Anurodhādivatthubhūtā
tika-s0102t:207_9: lābhādayo aṭṭha lokadhammā. Dasāyatanānīti dasa rūpāyatanāni vivaṭṭajjhāsayassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0102t:207_10: Tassa ca sabbaṃ tebhūmakakammaṃ garahitabbaṃ, vajjitabbañca hutvā upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:207_11: “sabbe abhisaṅkhārā vajjaṃ, sabbe bhavagāmikammā vajja”nti. Yesaṃ puggalānaṃ saddhādayo
tika-s0102t:207_12: mandā, te idha “assaddhā”tiādinā vuttā. Na pana sabbena sabbaṃ saddhādīnaṃ abhāvatoti
tika-s0102t:207_13: apparajakkhadukādīsu pañcasu dukesu ekekasmiṃ dasa dasa katvā “paññāsāya ākārehi
tika-s0102t:207_14: imāni pañcindriyāni jānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā anvayato, byatirekato ca saddhādīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:207_15: indriyānaṃ paropariyattaṃ jānātīti katvā tathā vuttaṃ. Ettha ca apparajakkhādivasena
tika-s0102t:207_16: āvajjantassa bhagavato te sattā puñjapuñjāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, na ekekā.
tika-s0102t:208_0: Uppalāni ettha santīti uppalinī, gacchopi jalāsayopi, idha pana jalāsayo adhippetoti
tika-s0102t:208_1: āha “uppalavane”ti. Yāni udakassa anto nimuggāneva hutvā pusanti vaḍḍhanti, tāni
tika-s0102t:208_2: antonimuggaposīnī. Dīpitānīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitāni, idheva vā “aññānipī”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:208_3: dīpitāni. Ugghaṭitaññūti ugghaṭanaṃ nāma ñāṇugghaṭanaṃ, ñāṇe ugghaṭitamatte eva jānātīti
tika-s0102t:208_4: attho. Vipañcitaṃ vitthāramevamatthaṃ jānātīti vipañcitaññū. Uddesādīhi netabboti
tika-s0102t:208_5: neyyo. Saha udāhaṭavelāyāti udāhāre dhammassa uddese udāhaṭamatte eva. Dhammābhisamayoti
tika-s0102t:208_6: catusaccadhammassa ñāṇena saddhiṃ abhisamayo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:208_7: nayena saṅkhittena mātikāya dīpiyamānāya desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ
tika-s0102t:208_8: samattho “puggalo ugghaṭitaññū”ti vuccati. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ saṅkhittena mātikaṃ
tika-s0102t:208_9: ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho “puggalo vipañcitaññū”ti
tika-s0102t:208_10: vuccati. Uddesatoti uddesahetu, uddisantassa, uddisāpentassa vāti attho. Paripucchatoti
tika-s0102t:208_11: atthaṃ paripucchantassa. Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotīti anukkamena arahattappatto
tika-s0102t:208_12: hoti. Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā
tika-s0102t:208_13: antamaso jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo padaparamoti
tika-s0102t:208_14: ayaṃ puggalo byañjanapadameva paramaṃ assāti “padaparamo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0102t:209_0: Yeti ye duvidhe puggale sandhāya vuttaṃ vibhaṅge kammāvaraṇenāti pañcavidhena ānantariyakammena.
tika-s0102t:209_1: Vipākāvaraṇenāti ahetukapaṭisandhiyā. Yasmā duhetukānampi ariyamaggapaṭivedho natthi,
tika-s0102t:209_3: Assaddhāti buddhādīsu saddhā rahitā. Acchandikāti kattukamyatākusalacchandarahitā,
tika-s0102t:209_4: uttarakurukā manussā acchandikaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā. Duppaññāti bhavaṅgapaññāya parihīnā,
tika-s0102t:209_5: bhavaṅgapaññāya pana paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa paccayo na hoti,
tika-s0102t:209_6: sopi duppañño eva nāma. Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu
tika-s0102t:209_7: dhammesu sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ ariyamaggaṃ okkamituṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbā. “Na kammāvaraṇenā”tiādīni
tika-s0102t:210: “Rāgacaritā”tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paramatthadīpaniyaṃ [paramatthamañjūsāyaṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyanti bhavitabbaṃ –
tika-s0102t:212: Nidhānato paramattha-mañjūsā nāma nāmato”ti. (visuddhimaggamahāṭīkāya nigamane sayameva vuttattā)] visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ;
tika-s0102t:213_0: 70. Ārabbhāti attano adhippetassa atthassa bhagavato jānāpanaṃ uddissāti attho. Selo
tika-s0102t:213_1: pabbato ucco hoti thiro ca, na paṃsupabbato, missakapabbato vāti āha “sele yathā
tika-s0102t:213_2: pabbatamuddhanī”ti. Dhammamayaṃ pāsādanti lokuttaradhammamāha. So hi pabbatasadiso
tika-s0102t:213_3: ca hoti sabbadhamme atikkamma abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādasadiso ca, paññāpariyāyo vā
tika-s0102t:213_4: idha dhamma-saddo. Sā hi abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādoti abhidhamme niddiṭṭhā. Tathā cāha –
tika-s0102t:216_0: “Yathā hī”tiādīsu yathā pabbate ṭhatvā rattandhakāre heṭṭhā olokentassa purisassa
tika-s0102t:216_1: khette kedārapāḷikuṭiyo, tattha sayitamanussā ca na paññāyanti anujjalabhāvato. Kuṭikāsu
tika-s0102t:216_2: pana aggijālā paññāyati ujjalabhāvato evaṃ dhammapāsādamāruyha sattalokaṃ olokayato
tika-s0102t:216_3: bhagavato ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti akatakalyāṇā sattā ñāṇagginā anujjalabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:216_4: anuḷārabhāvato ca rattiṃ khittā sarā viya honti. Katakalyāṇā pana bhabbapuggalā dūre
tika-s0102t:216_5: ṭhitāpi bhagavato ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti paripakkañāṇaggitāya samujjalabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:216_6: uḷārasantānatāya himavantapabbato viya cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0102t:217_0: Uṭṭhehīti tvaṃ dhammadesanāya appossukkatāsaṅkhātasaṅkocāpattito kilāsubhāvato uṭṭhaha.
tika-s0102t:217_1: Vīriyavantatāyāti sātisaya catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyavantatāya. Vīrassa hi bhāvo,
tika-s0102t:217_2: kammaṃ vā vīriyaṃ. Kilesamārassa viya maccumārassapi āyatiṃ asambhavato “maccukilesamārāna”nti
tika-s0102t:217_3: vuttaṃ. Abhisaṅkhāramāravijayassa aggahaṇaṃ kilesamāravijayeneva tabbijayassa jotitabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:218_0: 71. “Apārutaṃ tesaṃ amatassa dvāra”nti keci paṭhanti. Nibbānassa dvāraṃ pavisanamaggo
tika-s0102t:218_1: vivaritvā ṭhapito mahākaruṇūpanissayena sayambhuñāṇena adhigatattā. Saddhaṃ pamuñcantūti
tika-s0102t:218_2: saddhaṃ pavedentu, attano saddahanākāraṃ upaṭṭhāpentūti attho. Sukhena akicchena
tika-s0102t:218_3: pavattanīyatāya suppavattitaṃ. Na bhāsiṃ na bhāsissāmīti cintesi.
tika-s0102t:220: 73. Sallapitvāti “vippasannāni kho te āvuso indriyānī”tiādinā ālāpasallāpaṃ katvā. Tañhissa aparabhāge satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamanassa paccayo ahosi.
tika-s0102t:221_0: 75-6. Anupubbiṃ kathanti anupubbiyā anupubbaṃ kathetabbaṃ kathaṃ. Kā pana sāti? Dānādikathā.
tika-s0102t:221_1: Tattha dānakathā tāva pacurajanesu pavattiyā sabbasādhāraṇattā, sukarattā, sīle patiṭṭhānassa
tika-s0102t:221_2: upāyabhāvato ca ādito kathitā. Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahavatthūsu nissaṅgabhāvato
tika-s0102t:221_3: sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati, tattha ca suppatiṭṭhito hoti. Sīlena dāyakapaṭiggāhakavisuddhito
tika-s0102t:221_4: parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato, kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato,
tika-s0102t:221_5: bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānakathānantaraṃ sīlakathā
tika-s0102t:221_6: kathitā, tañce dānasīlaṃ vaṭṭanissitaṃ, ayaṃ bhavasampatti tassa phalanti dassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0102t:221_7: imehi ca dānasīlamayehi paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnehi puññakiriyavatthūhi etā cātumahārājikādīsu
tika-s0102t:221_9: tadanantaraṃ saggakathaṃ. Vatvā ayaṃ saggo rāgādīhi upakkiliṭṭho, sabbadā anupakkiliṭṭho
tika-s0102t:221_10: ariyamaggoti dassanatthaṃ saggānantaraṃ maggakathā kathetabbā. Maggañca kathentena
tika-s0102t:221_11: tadadhigamupāyadassanatthaṃ saggapariyāpannāpi, pageva itare sabbepi kāmā nāma bahvādīnavā,
tika-s0102t:221_12: aniccā adhuvā, vipariṇāmadhammāti kāmānaṃ ādīnavo, hīnā, gammā, pothujjanikā, anariyā,
tika-s0102t:221_13: anatthasañhitāti tesaṃ okāro lāmakabhāvo, sabbepi bhavā kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtāti tattha
tika-s0102t:221_14: saṃkileso, sabbaso kilesavippamuttaṃ nibbānanti nekkhamme ānisaṃso ca kathetabboti
tika-s0102t:221_15: ayamattho maggantīti ettha iti-saddena ādiatthajotakena bodhitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:222_1: sabbesampi sukhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Yañhi kiñci loke bhogasukhaṃ nāma, taṃ sabbaṃ dānanidānanti
tika-s0102t:222_2: pākaṭo yamattho. Yaṃ pana taṃ jhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sukhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:222_3: tassāpi dānaṃ upanissayapaccayo hotiyeva. Sampattīnaṃ mūlanti yā imā loke padesarajjaṃ
tika-s0102t:222_5: yā ca cātumahārājikacātumahārājādibhedā dibbasampattiyo, yā vā panaññāpi sampattiyo,
tika-s0102t:222_6: tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ idaṃ dānaṃ nāma mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Bhogānanti bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena “bhogo”ti
tika-s0102t:222_8: patiṭṭhā. Visamagatassāti byasanappattassa. Tāṇanti rakkhā tato paripālanato. Leṇanti
tika-s0102t:222_9: byasanehi paripāciyamānassa olīyanapadeso. Gatīti gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Parāyaṇanti paṭisaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:222_10: Avassayoti vinipatituṃ adento nissayo. Ārammaṇanti olubbhārammaṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:223_1: hutvā sabbaso vinipatituṃ appadānato. Mahāpathavisadisaṃ gatagataṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāya
tika-s0102t:223_2: labhāpanato. Ālambanarajjusadisanti yathā dubbalassa purisassa ālambanarajju uttiṭṭhato,
tika-s0102t:223_3: tiṭṭhato ca upatthambho, evaṃ dānaṃ sattānaṃ sampattibhave uppattiyā, ṭhitiyā ca
tika-s0102t:223_8: Etehi eva durāsadaṭṭhena. Asantāsanaṭṭhenāti anabhibhavanīyatāya santāsābhāvena.
tika-s0102t:223_9: Yo hi dāyako dānapati, so sampatipi kutoci na bhāyati, pageva āyatiṃ. Dhammasīsena
tika-s0102t:223_10: puggalo vutto. Balavantaṭṭhenāti mahābalavatāya. Dāyako hi dānapati sampati pakkhabalena
tika-s0102t:223_11: balavā hoti, āyatiṃ pana kāyabalādīhipi. Abhimaṅgalasammataṭṭhenāti “vaḍḍhikāraṇa”nti
tika-s0102t:224_0: Idāni dānaṃ vaṭṭagatā ukkaṃsappattā sampattiyo viya vivaṭṭagatāpi tā sampādetīti
tika-s0102t:224_1: bodhicariyabhāvenapi dānaguṇe dassetuṃ “dānañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sakkamārabrahmasampattiyo
tika-s0102t:224_2: attahitāya eva, cakkavattisampatti pana attahitāya, parahitāya cāti dassetuṃ sā tāsaṃ
tika-s0102t:224_3: parato vuttā, etā lokiyā, imā pana lokuttarāti dassetuṃ tato paraṃ “sāvakapāramīñāṇa”ntiādi
tika-s0102t:224_4: vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhatarukkaṭṭhatamāti dassetuṃ kamena ñāṇattayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:224_5: Tesaṃ pana dānassa paccayabhāvo heṭṭhā vutto eva. Etenevassa brahmasampattiyāpi paccayabhāvo dīpitoti veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:225_0: Dānañca nāma dakkhiṇeyyesu hitajjhāsayena vā pūjanajjhāsayena vā attano santakassa
tika-s0102t:225_1: paresaṃ pariccajanaṃ, tasmā dāyako sattesu ekantahitajjhāsayo purisapuggalo, so “paresaṃ
tika-s0102t:225_2: hiṃsati, paresaṃ vā santakaṃ haratī”ti aṭṭhānametanti āha “dānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ samādātuṃ
tika-s0102t:225_3: sakkotī”ti. Sīlasadiso alaṅkāro natthīti akittimaṃ hutvā sabbakālaṃ sobhāvisesāvahattā.
tika-s0102t:225_4: Sīlapupphasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthīti
tika-s0102t:225_5: ettha “candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpī”tiādikā gāthā, “gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā
tika-s0102t:225_6: cuto gacchati mālutenā”tiādikā ca vattabbā. Sīlañhi sattānaṃ ābharaṇañceva alaṅkāro
tika-s0102t:225_7: ca gandhavilepanañca parassa dassanīyabhāvāvahañca. Tenāha “sīlālaṅkārena hī”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:226: “Ayaṃ saggo labbhatī”ti idaṃ majjhimehi chandādīhi āraddhaṃ sīlaṃ sandhāyāha. Tenāha sakko devarājā –
tika-s0102t:229_0: Iṭṭhoti sukho, kantoti kamanīyo, manāpoti manavaḍḍhanako, taṃ panassa iṭṭhādibhāvaṃ
tika-s0102t:229_1: dassetuṃ “niccamettha kīḷā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Niccanti sabbakālaṃ kīḷāti kāmūpasaṃhitā
tika-s0102t:229_2: sukhavihārā. Sampattiyoti bhogasampattiyo. Dibbanti dibbabhavaṃ devalokapariyāpannaṃ.
tika-s0102t:229_3: Sukhanti kāyikaṃ, cetasikañca sukhaṃ. Dibbasampattinti dibbabhavaṃ āyusampattiṃ,
tika-s0102t:229_4: vaṇṇayasaissariyasampattiṃ, rūpādisampattiñca. Evamādīti ādi-saddena yāmādīhi anubhavitabbaṃ
tika-s0102t:230_0: Appassādāti nirassādā paṇḍitehi yathābhūtaṃ passantehi tattha assādetabbatābhāvato.
tika-s0102t:230_1: Bahudukkhāti mahādukkhā sampati, āyatiñca vipuladukkhānubandhattā. Bahupāyāsāti anekavidhaparissayā.
tika-s0102t:230_2: Etthāti kāmesu. Bhiyyoti bahuṃ. Dosoti aniccatādinā, appassādatādinā ca dūsitabhāvo,
tika-s0102t:230_3: yato te viññūnaṃ cittaṃ nārādhenti. Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti pavattatīti ādīnavo, paramakapaṇatā,
tika-s0102t:230_4: tathā ca kāmā yathābhūtaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhanti. Lāmakabhāvoti nihīnabhāvo
tika-s0102t:230_5: aseṭṭhehi sevitabbattā, seṭṭhehi na sevitabbattā ca. Saṃkilissananti vibādhetabbatā
tika-s0102t:230_6: upatāpetabbatā. Nekkhamme ānisaṃsanti ettha yattakā kāmesu ādīnavā, tappaṭipakkhato
tika-s0102t:230_7: tattakā nekkhamme ānisaṃsā. Api ca “nekkhammaṃ nāmetaṃ asambādhaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:230_8: nikkhantaṃ kāmehi, nikkhantaṃ kāmasaññāya, nikkhantaṃ kāmavitakkehi, nikkhantaṃ kāmapariḷāhehi,
tika-s0102t:230_9: nikkhantaṃ byāpādato”tiādinā nayena nekkhamme ānisaṃse pakāsesi, pabbajjāya, jhānādīsu
tika-s0102t:231_0: Vuttanayanti ettha yaṃ avuttanayaṃ “kallacitte”tiādi, tattha kallacitteti kammaniyacitte,
tika-s0102t:231_1: heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena
tika-s0102t:231_2: kammakkhamacitteti attho. Assaddhiyādayo hi yasmā cittassa rogabhūtā tadā te vigatā,
tika-s0102t:231_3: tasmā arogacitteti attho. Diṭṭhimānādikilesavigamanena muducitte. Kāmacchandādivigamena
tika-s0102t:231_4: vinīvaraṇacitte. Sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ uḷārapītipāmojjayogena udaggacitte. Tattha saddhāsampattiyā
tika-s0102t:231_5: pasannacitte. Yadā ca bhagavā aññāsīti sambandho. Atha vā kallacitteti kāmacchandavigamena
tika-s0102t:231_6: arogacitte. Muducitteti byāpādavigamena mettāvasena akathinacitte. Vinīvaraṇacitteti
tika-s0102t:231_7: uddhaccakukkuccavigamena vikkhepassa vigatattā tena apihitacitte. Udaggacitteti thinamiddhavigamena
tika-s0102t:232_1: Apagatakāḷakanti vigatakāḷakaṃ. Sammadevāti suṭṭhu eva. Rajananti nīlapītādiraṅgajātaṃ.
tika-s0102t:232_2: Paṭiggaṇheyyāti gaṇheyya pabhassaraṃ bhaveyya. Tasmiṃyeva āsaneti tissameva nisajjāyaṃ,
tika-s0102t:232_3: etena nesaṃ lahuvipassakatā, tikkhapaññatā, sukhapaṭipadākhippābhiññatā ca dassitā
tika-s0102t:232_4: hoti. Virajanti apāyagamanīyarāgarajādīnaṃ vigamena virajaṃ. Anavasesadiṭṭhivicikicchāmalāpagamanena
tika-s0102t:232_6: vītamalaṃ. Dhammacakkhunti brahmāyusutte heṭṭhimā tayo maggā vuttā, cūḷarāhulovāde
tika-s0102t:232_7: āsavakkhayo, idha pana sotāpattimaggo adhippeto. “Yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ
tika-s0102t:232_8: taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti tassa uppattiākāradassananti. Nanu ca maggañāṇaṃ asaṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:232_9: na saṅkhatadhammārammaṇanti? Saccametaṃ. Yasmā taṃ nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena
tika-s0102t:232_10: sabbasaṅkhataṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati, tasmā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:233_0: “Suddhaṃ vattha”nti nidassitaupamāyaṃ idaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ vatthaṃ viya cittaṃ,
tika-s0102t:233_1: vatthassa āgantukamalehi kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo,
tika-s0102t:233_2: dhovanasilā viya anupubbikathā, udakaṃ viya saddhā, udake temetvā ūsagomayachārikābharehi
tika-s0102t:233_3: kāḷakapadese samucchinditvā vatthassa dhovanapayogo viya saddhāsinehena temetvā temetvā
tika-s0102t:233_4: satisamādhipaññāhi dose sithilī katvā sutādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho,
tika-s0102t:233_5: tena payogena vatthe nānākāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ, raṅgajātaṃ
tika-s0102t:233_6: viya ariyamaggo, tena suddhassa vatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa
tika-s0102t:233_7: cittassa maggena pariyodapananti. “Diṭṭhadhammā”ti vatvā dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato
tika-s0102t:233_8: aññampi atthīti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “pattadhammā”ti vuttaṃ. Patti ca ñāṇasampattito
tika-s0102t:233_9: aññampi vijjatīti tato visesadassanatthaṃ “viditadhammā”ti vuttaṃ. Sā pana viditadhammatā
tika-s0102t:233_10: dhammesu ekadesenāpi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyogāḷhadhammā”ti
tika-s0102t:233_11: vuttaṃ, tena nesaṃ saccābhisambodhiṃyeva vibhāveti. Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena
tika-s0102t:233_12: pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesatova catusaccadhammaṃ samantato ogāhantaṃ paṭivijjhatīti.
tika-s0102t:234_0: 77. Cīvaradānādīnīti cīvarādiparikkhāradānaṃ sandhāyāha. Yo hi cīvarādike aṭṭha parikkhāre,
tika-s0102t:234_1: pattacīvarameva vā sotāpannādiariyassa, puthujjanasseva vā sīlasampannassa datvā
tika-s0102t:234_2: “idaṃ parikkhāradānaṃ anāgate ehibhikkhubhāvāya paccayo hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
tika-s0102t:234_3: tassa ca sati adhikārasampattiyaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve iddhimayaparikkhāralābhāya
tika-s0102t:234_4: saṃvattatīti veditabbaṃ. Vassasatikattherā viya ākappasampannāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:235_0: Sandassesīti suṭṭhu paccakkhaṃ katvā dassesi. Idhalokatthanti idhalokabhūtaṃ khandhapañcakasaṅkhātamatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:235_1: Paralokatthanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Dassesīti sāmaññalakkhaṇato, salakkhaṇato ca
tika-s0102t:235_2: dassesi. Tenāha “anicca”ntiādi. Tattha hutvā abhāvato aniccanti dassesi. Udayabbayapaṭipīḷanato
tika-s0102t:235_3: dukkhanti dassesi. Avasavattanato anattāti dassesi. Ime ruppanādilakkhaṇā pañcakkhandhāti
tika-s0102t:235_4: rāsaṭṭhena khandhe dassesi. Ime cakkhādisabhāvā nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti
tika-s0102t:235_5: dassesi. Imāni cakkhādisabhāvāneva dvārārammaṇabhūtāni dvādasa āyatanānīti dassesi.
tika-s0102t:235_6: Ime avijjādayo jarāmaraṇapariyosānā dvādasa paccayadhammā paṭiccasamuppādoti dassesi.
tika-s0102t:235_7: Rūpakkhandhassa heṭṭhā vuttanayena paccayato cattāri, khaṇato ekanti imāni pañca
tika-s0102t:235_8: lakkhaṇāni dassesi. Tathāti iminā “pañca lakkhaṇānī”ti padaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Dassentoti
tika-s0102t:235_12: nānāvidhaṃ petasattalokaṃ. Asurakāyanti kālakañcikāsuranikāyaṃ. Evaṃ tāva duggatibhūtaṃ
tika-s0102t:235_13: paralokatthaṃ vatvā idāni sugatibhūtaṃ vattuṃ “tiṇṇaṃ kusalānaṃ vipāka”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:235_14: Vehapphale subhakiṇṇeyeva saṅgahetvā asaññīsu, arūpīsu ca sampattiyā dassetabbāya
tika-s0102t:237_0: Samuttejanaṃ nāma samādinnadhammānaṃ yathā anupakārakā dhammā parihāyanti, pahīyanti
tika-s0102t:237_1: ca, upakārakā dhammā parivaḍḍhanti, visujjhanti ca, tathā nesaṃ ussāhuppādananti
tika-s0102t:237_2: āha “abbhussāhesī”ti. Yathā pana taṃ ussāhuppādanaṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “idhalokatthañcevā”tiādi
tika-s0102t:237_3: vuttaṃ. Tāsetvā tāsetvāti paribyattabhāvāpādanena tejetvā tejetvā. Adhigataṃ viya
tika-s0102t:237_4: katvāti yesaṃ katheti, tehi tamatthaṃ paccakkhato anubhuyyamānaṃ viya katvā. Veneyyānañhi
tika-s0102t:237_5: buddhehi pakāsiyamāno attho paccakkhatopi pākaṭataro hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Tathā hi bhagavā evaṃ thomīyati –
tika-s0102t:242_2: “jātibhayaṃ jarābhayaṃ byādhibhayaṃ maraṇabhaya”ntiādinā tattha tattha sutte āgatanayena
tika-s0102t:243_0: Paṭiladdhaguṇena codesīti “taṃtaṃguṇādhigamena ayampi tumhehi paṭiladdho, ānisaṃso
tika-s0102t:243_1: ayampī”ti paccakkhato dassento “kiṃ ito pubbe evarūpaṃ atthī”ti codento viya ahosi.
tika-s0102t:244_0: Tappaccayañca kilamathanti saṅkhārapavattihetukaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattasantāne uppajjanakaparissamaṃ
tika-s0102t:244_1: saṃvighātaṃ vihesaṃ. Idhāti heṭṭhā paṭhamamaggādhigamatthāya kathāya. Sabbasaṅkhārūpasamabhāvato
tika-s0102t:244_2: santaṃ. Atittikaraparamasukhatāya paṇītaṃ. Sakalasaṃsārabyasanato tāyanatthena tāṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:244_3: Tato nibbindahadayānaṃ nilīyanaṭṭhānatāya leṇaṃ. Ādi-saddena gatipaṭisaraṇaṃ paramassāsoti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-s0102t:246: 80. Saṅghappahonakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāvā “saṅghassa aparipuṇṇattā”ti vuttaṃ. Dve aggasāvakā eva hi tadā ahesuṃ.
tika-s0102t:248_0: 86. “Kadā udapādī”ti pucchaṃ “sambodhito”tiādinā saṅkhepato vissajjetvā puna taṃ
tika-s0102t:248_1: vitthārato dassetuṃ “bhagavā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pitu saṅgahaṃ karonto vihāsi sambodhito
tika-s0102t:248_2: “satta saṃvaccharāni satta māse satta divase”ti ānetvā sambandho, tañca kho veneyyānaṃ
tika-s0102t:248_3: tadā abhāvato. Kilañjehi bahi chādāpetvā, vatthehi anto paṭicchādāpetvā, upari ca
tika-s0102t:248_4: vatthehi chādāpetvā, tassa heṭṭhā suvaṇṇa…pe… vitānaṃ kārāpetvā. Mālāvacchaketi pupphamālāhi
tika-s0102t:248_5: vacchākārena veṭhite. Gandhantareti cāṭibharitagandhassa antare. Pupphānīti cāṭiādibharitāni
tika-s0102t:249: Kāmañcāyaṃ rājā buddhapitā, tathāpi buddhā nāma lokagaruno, na te kenaci vase vattetabbā, atha kho te eva pare attano vase vattenti, tasmā rājā “nāhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ demī”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:250: Dānamukhanti dānakaraṇūpāyaṃ, dānavattanti attho. Na dāni me anuññātāti idāni me dānaṃ na anuññātā, no na anujānantīti attho.
tika-s0102t:252_0: Sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pahosīti bhagavato aṭṭhasaṭṭhi ca bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ bhāgato
tika-s0102t:252_1: dātuṃ pahosi, na sabbesaṃ pariyattabhāvena. Tenāha “senāpatipi attano deyyadhammaṃ
tika-s0102t:253_0: Tatheva katvāti carapurise ṭhapetvā. Sucinti suddhaṃ. Paṇītanti uḷāraṃ, bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ
tika-s0102t:253_1: “ekamanta”ntiādīsu viya. Bhañjitvāti madditvā, pīḷetvāti attho. Jātisappikhīrādīhiyevāti
tika-s0102t:254_0: 90. Parāpavādaṃ, parāpakāraṃ, sītuṇhādibhedañca guṇāparādhaṃ khamati sahati adhivāsetīti
tika-s0102t:254_1: khanti. Sā pana yasmā sīlādīnaṃ paṭipakkhadhamme savisesaṃ tapati santapati vidhamatīti
tika-s0102t:254_2: paramaṃ uttamaṃ tapo. Tenāha “adhivāsanakhanti nāma paramaṃ tapo”ti. “Adhivāsanakhantī”ti
tika-s0102t:254_3: iminā dhammanijjhānakkhantito viseseti. Titikkhanaṃ khamanaṃ titikkhā.Akkharacintakā
tika-s0102t:254_4: hi khamāyaṃ titikkhā-saddaṃ vaṇṇenti. Tenevāha “khantiyā eva vevacana”ntiādi. Sabbākārenāti
tika-s0102t:254_5: santapaṇītanipuṇasivakhemādinā sabbappakārena. So pabbajito nāma na hoti pabbājitabbadhammassa
tika-s0102t:255_0: “Na hī”tiādinā taṃ evatthaṃ vivarati. Uttamatthena paramanti vuccati para-saddassa
tika-s0102t:255_1: seṭṭhavācakattā, “puggalaparoparaññū”tiādīsu viya. Paranti aññaṃ. Idāni para-saddaṃ
tika-s0102t:255_2: aññapariyāyameva gahetvā atthaṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Malassāti pāpamalassa.
tika-s0102t:255_3: Apabbājitattāti anīhaṭattā anirākatattā. Samitattāti nirodhitattā tesaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:255_4: “Samitattā hi pāpānaṃ samaṇoti pavuccatī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:256_0: Apica bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisanto pātimokkhakathāya ca sīlapadhānattā
tika-s0102t:256_1: sīlassa ca visesato doso paṭipakkhoti tassa niggaṇhanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ādito “khantī
tika-s0102t:256_2: paramaṃ tapo”ti āha, tena aniṭṭhassa paṭihananūpāyo vutto, titikkhāgahaṇena pana
tika-s0102t:256_3: iṭṭhassa, tadubhayenapi uppannaṃ ratiṃ abhibhuyya viharatīti ayamattho dassitoti.
tika-s0102t:256_4: Taṇhāvānassa vūpasamanato nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhā. Tattha khantiggahaṇena
tika-s0102t:256_5: payogavipattiyā abhāvo dassito, titikkhāgahaṇena āsayavipattiyā abhāvo. Tathā khantiggahaṇena
tika-s0102t:256_6: parāparādhasahatā, titikkhāgahaṇena paresu anaparajjhanā dassitā. Evaṃ kāraṇamukhena
tika-s0102t:256_7: anvayato pātimokkhaṃ dassetvā idāni byatirekato taṃ dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:256_8: tena yathā sattānaṃ jīvitā voropanaṃ, pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhi vibādhanañca “parūpaghāto,
tika-s0102t:256_9: paraviheṭhana”nti vuccati, evaṃ tesaṃ mūlasāpateyyāvaharaṇaṃ, dāraparāmasanaṃ, visaṃvādanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:256_11: ucchedavindanaṃ, micchābhinivesanañcaupaghāto, viheṭhanañca hotīti yassa kassaci
tika-s0102t:256_12: akusalassa kammapathassa, kammassa ca karaṇena pabbajito, samaṇo ca na hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:257_1: Karaṇaṃ nāma tassa attano santāne uppādananti tappaṭikkhepato akaraṇaṃ “anuppādana”nti
tika-s0102t:257_2: vuttaṃ. “Kusalassā”ti idaṃ “etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti vakkhamānattā ariyamaggadhamme,
tika-s0102t:257_4: Upasampadāti upasampādanaṃ, taṃ pana tassa samadhigamoti āha “paṭilābho”ti. Cittajotananti
tika-s0102t:257_5: cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇaṃ sabbaso parisodhanaṃ. Yasmā aggamaggasamaṅgino cittaṃ
tika-s0102t:257_6: sabbaso pariyodapīyati nāma, aggaphalakkhaṇe pana pariyodapitaṃ hoti puna pariyodapetabbatāya
tika-s0102t:257_7: abhāvato, iti pariniṭṭhitapariyodapanataṃ sandhāyāha “taṃ pana arahattena hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:257_8: Sabbapāpaṃ pahāya tadaṅgādivasenevāti adhippāyo. “Sīlasaṃvarenā”ti hi iminā tebhūmakassāpi
tika-s0102t:257_9: saṅgahe itarappahānānampi saṅgaho hotīti, evañca katvā sabbaggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ
tika-s0102t:257_10: hoti. Samathavipassanāhīti lokiyalokuttarāhi samathavipassanāhi. Sampādetvāti nipphādetvā.
tika-s0102t:257_11: Sampādanañcettha hetubhūtāhi phalabhūtassa sahajātāhipi, pageva purimasiddhāhīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:258_0: Kassacīti hīnādīsu kassaci sattassa kassaci upavādassa, tena davakamyatāyapi upavadanaṃ
tika-s0102t:258_1: paṭikkhipati. Upaghātassa akaraṇanti etthāpi “kassacī”ti ānetvā sambandho. Kāyenāti
tika-s0102t:258_2: ca nidassanamattametaṃ manasāpi paresaṃ anatthacintanādivasena upaghātakaraṇassa
tika-s0102t:258_3: vajjetabbattā. Kāyenāti vā ettha arūpakāyassāpi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, na copanakāyakarajakāyānameva.
tika-s0102t:258_4: Pa atimokkhanti pakārato ativiya sīlesu mukhyabhūtaṃ. “Atipamokkha”nti tameva padaṃ
tika-s0102t:258_5: upasaggabyattayena vadati. Evaṃ bhedato padavaṇṇanaṃ katvā tatvato vadati “uttamasīla”nti.
tika-s0102t:258_6: “Pāti vā”tiādinā pālanato rakkhaṇato ativiya mokkhanato ativiya mocanato pātimokkhanti
tika-s0102t:258_7: dasseti. “Pāpā ati mokkhetīti atimokkho”ti nimittassa kattubhāvena upacaritabbato.
tika-s0102t:258_8: Yo vā nanti yo vā puggalo naṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ pāti samādiyitvā avikopento
tika-s0102t:258_9: rakkhati, taṃ “pātī”ti laddhanāmaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitaṃ mokkhetīti pātimokkhanti
tika-s0102t:258_10: ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana pātimokkhapadassa attho visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:259_0: Mattaññutāti bhojane mattaññutā, sā pana visesato paccayasannissitasīlavasena gahetabbāti
tika-s0102t:259_3: nirajanasambādhaṃ vivittanti attho. Catupaccayasantoso dīpito paccayasantosatāsāmaññena
tika-s0102t:259_5: payojanadassanavasena yadatthaṃ vivittasenāsanasevanaṃ icchitaṃ, so adhicittānuyogo
tika-s0102t:259_6: vutto. Aṭṭha samāpattiyo cettha vipassanāya pādakabhūtā adhippetā, na yā kācīti sakalassāpi
tika-s0102t:261_0: 91. Ettāvatāti ettakena suttapadesena. Tatthāpi ca iminā…pe… kathanena suppaṭividdhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0102t:261_1: pakāsetvāti yojanā. Ca-saddo byatirekattho, tena idāni vuccamānatthaṃ ullaṅgeti.
tika-s0102t:261_2: Ekamidāhanti ekaṃ ahaṃ. Idaṃ-saddo nipātamattaṃ. Ādi-saddena “bhikkhave samaya”nti
tika-s0102t:261_3: evamādi pāṭho saṅgahito. Ahaṃ bhikkhave ekaṃ samayanti evaṃ pettha padayojanā.
tika-s0102t:262_0: Subhagavaneti subhagattā subhagaṃ, sundarasirikattā, sundarakāmattā vāti attho. Subhagañhi
tika-s0102t:262_1: taṃ sirisampattiyā, sundare cettha kāme manussā patthenti. Bahujanakantatāyapi taṃ
tika-s0102t:262_2: subhagaṃ. Vanayatīti vanaṃ, attasampattiyā attani sinehaṃ uppādetīti attho. Vanute
tika-s0102t:262_3: iti vā vanaṃ, attasampattiyā eva “maṃ paribhuñjathā”ti satte yācati viyāti attho.
tika-s0102t:262_4: Subhagañca taṃ vanañcāti subhagavanaṃ, tasmiṃ subhagavane. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpana kiṃ
tika-s0102t:262_5: iminā papañcenāti “evaṃ nāmake vane”ti vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ sālarukkhopi “sālo”ti vuccati,
tika-s0102t:262_6: yo koci rukkhopi vanappati jeṭṭhakarukkhopi. Idha pana pacchimo eva adhippetoti āha
tika-s0102t:263_0: Na vihāyantīti akuppadhammatāya na vijahanti. “Na kañci sattaṃ tapantīti atappā”ti
tika-s0102t:263_1: idaṃ tesu tassā samaññāya niruḷhatāya vuttaṃ, aññathā sabbepi suddhāvāsā na kañci
tika-s0102t:263_2: sattaṃ tapantīti atappā nāma siyuṃ. “Na vihāyantī”tiādinibbacanesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:263_3: Sundaradassanāti dassanīyāti ayamatthoti āha “abhirūpā”tiādi. Sundarametesaṃ dassananti
tika-s0102t:263_4: sobhanametesaṃ cakkhunā dassanaṃ, viññāṇena dassanaṃ pīti attho. Sabbe heva…pe… jeṭṭhā
tika-s0102t:264_0: Sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ vasenāti sattannaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ apadānavasena. Avihehi ajjhiṭṭhena
tika-s0102t:264_1: ekena avihābrahmunā kathitā tehi sabbehi kathitā nāma hontīti vuttaṃ “tathā avihehī”ti.
tika-s0102t:264_2: Eseva nayo sesesupi. Tenāha bhagavā “devatā maṃ etadavocu”nti. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “anekāni
tika-s0102t:264_3: devatāsatānī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ pacchā attano sāsane visesaṃ adhigantvā tattha
tika-s0102t:264_4: uppannānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Anusandhidvayampīti dhammadhātupadānusandhi, devatārocanapadānusandhīti
tika-s0102t:264_5: duvidhaṃ anusandhiṃ. Niyyātentoti nigamento. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
tika-s0102t:268_0: 95. Janapadinoti janapadavanto, janapadassa vā issarasāmino rājakumārā gottavasena
tika-s0102t:268_1: kurū nāma. Tesaṃ nivāso yadi eko janapado, kathaṃ bahuvacananti āha “ruḷhisaddenā”ti.
tika-s0102t:268_2: Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya īdisaliṅgavacanāni icchanti. Ayamettha
tika-s0102t:268_3: ruḷhi yathā aññatthāpi “aṅgesu viharati, mallesu viharatī”ti ca. Tabbisesanepi janapadasadde
tika-s0102t:268_4: jātisadde ekavacanameva. Aṭṭhakathācariyā panāti pana-saddo visesatthajotano, tena
tika-s0102t:268_6: joteti. Sutvāti mandhātumahārājassa ānubhāvadassanānusārena paramparānugataṃ kathaṃ
tika-s0102t:268_7: sutvā. Anusaṃyāyantenāti anuvicarantena. Etesaṃ ṭhānanti candimasūriyamukhena cātumahārājikabhavanamāha.
tika-s0102t:268_8: Tenāha “tattha agamāsī”tiādi. Soti mandhātumahārājā. Tanti cātumahārājikarajjaṃ.
tika-s0102t:269_0: Dovārikabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti sudhammāya devasabhāya, devapurassa ca catūsu dvāresu
tika-s0102t:270_0: Pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsīti bhassitvā pathaviyā āsannaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. Na hi cakkaratanaṃ
tika-s0102t:270_1: bhūmiyaṃ patati, tathāṭhitañca nacirasseva antaradhāyi tenattabhāvena cakkavattiissariyassa
tika-s0102t:270_2: abhāvato. “Cirataraṃ kālaṃ ṭhatvā”ti apare. Rājā ekakova agamāsi attano ānubhāvena.
tika-s0102t:270_4: aparāpariyāya vedanīyassa kammassa katokāsattā sabbadā soḷasavassuddesikatā mālāmilāyanādi
tika-s0102t:270_5: dibbabhāvo pāturahosi. Tadā manussānaṃ asaṅkheyyāyukatāya sakkarajjaṃ kāretvā. “Kiṃ
tika-s0102t:270_6: me iminā upaddharajjenā”ti atricchatāya atittova. Manussaloke utuno kakkhaḷatāya
tika-s0102t:271: Avayavesu siddho viseso samudāyassa visesako hotīti ekampi raṭṭhaṃ bahuvacanena vohariyati.
tika-s0102t:272_0: Da-kārena atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti niruttinayena. Kammāsoti kammāsapādo vuccati uttarapadalopena
tika-s0102t:272_1: yathā “rūpabhavo rūpa”nti. Kathaṃ pana so “kammāsapādo”ti vuccatīti āha “tassa kirā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:272_2: Damitoti ettha kīdisaṃ damanaṃ adhippetanti āha “porisādabhāvato paṭisedhito”ti.
tika-s0102t:272_3: “Ime pana therāti majjhimabhāṇakā”ti keci. Apare pana “aṭṭhakathācariyā”ti, “dīghabhāṇakā”ti
tika-s0102t:272_4: vadanti. Ubhayathāpi cūḷakammāsadammaṃ sandhāya tathā vadanti. Yakkhiniputto hi kammāsapādo
tika-s0102t:272_5: alīnasattukumārakāle bodhisattena tattha damito. Sutasomakāle pana bārāṇasirājā porisādabhāvapaṭisedhanena
tika-s0102t:272_6: yattha damito, taṃ mahākammāsadammaṃ nāma. “Putto”ti vatvā “atrajo”ti vacanaṃ orasaputtabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:273_0: Yehi āvasitappadeso “kururaṭṭha”nti nāmaṃ labhi, te uttarakuruto āgatamanussā tattha
tika-s0102t:273_1: rakkhitaniyāmeneva pañca sīlāni rakkhiṃsu. Tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiyā pacchimajanatāti
tika-s0102t:273_2: so desadhammavasena avicchedato pavattamāno kuruvattadhammoti paññāyittha. Ayañca
tika-s0102t:273_3: attho kurudhammajātakena dīpetabbo. So aparabhāge paṭhamaṃ yattha saṃkiliṭṭho jāto,
tika-s0102t:273_4: taṃ dassetuṃ “kururaṭṭhavāsīna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yattha bhagavato vasanokāsabhūto koci
tika-s0102t:273_5: vihāro na hoti, tattha kevalaṃ gocaragāmakittanaṃ nidānakathāya pakati yathā taṃ
tika-s0102t:273_6: sakkesu viharati devadahaṃ nāma sakyānaṃ nigamoti imamatthaṃ dassento “avasanokāsato”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:274_0: “Āyasmā”ti vā “devānaṃ piyā”ti vā “tatra bhava”nti vā piyasamudāhāro esoti āha “āyasmāti
tika-s0102t:274_1: piyavacanameta”nti. Tayidaṃ piyavacanaṃ garugāravavasena vuccatīti āha “gāravavacanameta”nti.
tika-s0102t:275_0: Atidūraaccāsannavajjanena nātidūranāccāsannaṃ nāma gahitaṃ, taṃ pana avakaṃsato ubhinnaṃ
tika-s0102t:275_1: pasāritahatthānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanena veditabbaṃ. Cakkhunā cakkhuṃ āhacca daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:275_2: tenāpi agāravameva kataṃ hoti. Gīvaṃ parivattetvāti parivattanavasena gīvaṃ pasāretvā.
tika-s0102t:276_1: nikkhipanto viya bhikkhapaṭiggaṇhanena tesaṃ mahato puññābhisandassa jananena. Paṭisammajjitvāti
tika-s0102t:276_2: antevāsikehi sammajjanaṭṭhānaṃ sakkaccakāritāya puna sammajjitvā. Tikkhattunti “ādito
tika-s0102t:276_3: paṭṭhāya anta”ntiādinā vuttacaturākārūpasañhite tayo vāre, tenassa dvādasakkhattuṃ sammasitabhāvamāha.
tika-s0102t:277_0: Amhākaṃ bhagavato gambhīrabhāveneva kathitattā sesabuddhehipi evameva kathitoti dhammanvaye
tika-s0102t:277_1: ṭhatvā vuttaṃ “sabbabuddhehi…pe… kathito”ti. Sālindanti saparibhaṇḍaṃ. “Sineruṃ ukkhipanto
tika-s0102t:277_2: viyā”ti iminā tādisāya desanāya sudukkarabhāvamāha. Suttameva “suttantakatha”nti
tika-s0102t:277_4: anaññasādhāraṇaṃ sabbaññutañāṇasseva visayo, evaṃ antadvayavinimuttassa kārakavedakarahitassa
tika-s0102t:277_5: paccayākārassa vibhajanaṃ pīti dassetuṃ “buddhānañhī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ṭhānānīti
tika-s0102t:277_6: kāraṇāni. Gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hotīti taṃ desetabbasseva anekavidhatāya, duviññeyyatāya
tika-s0102t:277_7: ca nānānayehi pavattamānaṃ desanāgajjitaṃ mahantaṃ vipulaṃ, bahubhedañca hoti. Ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:277_8: anupavisatīti tato eva desanāñāṇaṃ desetabbadhamme vibhāgaso kurumānaṃ anu anu pavisati,
tika-s0102t:277_9: tena anupavissa ṭhitaṃ viya hotīti attho. Buddhañāṇassa mahantabhāvo paññāyatīti
tika-s0102t:277_10: evaṃvidhassa nāma dhammassa desakaṃ, paṭivedhakañcāti buddhānaṃ desanāñāṇassa, paṭivedhañāṇassa
tika-s0102t:277_11: ca uḷārabhāvo pākaṭo hoti. Ettha ca kiñcāpi “sabbaṃ vacīkammaṃ buddhassa bhagavato
tika-s0102t:277_12: ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivatta”nti vacanato sabbāpi bhagavato desanā ñāṇarahitā
tika-s0102t:277_13: natthi, sīhasamānavuttitāya sabbattha samānappavatti. Desetabbavasena pana desanā
tika-s0102t:277_14: visesato ñāṇena anupaviṭṭhā, gambhīratarā ca hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kathaṃ pana vinayapaññattiṃ
tika-s0102t:277_15: patvā desanā tilakkhaṇabbhāhatā suññatapaṭisaṃyuttā hotīti? Tatthāpi sannisinnaparisāya
tika-s0102t:277_16: ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ pavattamānā desanā saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatādivibhāvanaṃ, sabbadhammānaṃ
tika-s0102t:277_17: attattaniyatābhāvappakāsanañca hoti. Tenevāha “anekapariyāyena dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:278: Āpajjāti patvā yathā ñāṇakoñcanādaṃ vissajjeti, evaṃ pāpuṇitvā.
tika-s0102t:279_0: Pamāṇātikkameti aparimāṇatthe “yāvañcidaṃ tena bhagavatā”tiādīsu viya. Aparimeyyabhāvajotano
tika-s0102t:279_1: hi ayaṃ yāva-saddo. Tenāha “atigambhīro attho”ti. Avabhāsatīti ñāyati upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0102t:279_2: Ñāṇassa tathā upaṭṭhānañhi sandhāya “dissatī”ti vuttaṃ. Nanu esa paṭiccasamuppādo
tika-s0102t:279_3: ekantagambhīrova, tattha kasmā gambhīrāvabhāsatā jotitāti? Saccametaṃ, ekantagambhīratādassanatthameva
tika-s0102t:279_4: panassa gambhīrāvabhāsaggahaṇaṃ. Tasmā aññattha labbhamānaṃ catukoṭikaṃ byatirekamukhena
tika-s0102t:279_5: nidassetvā taṃ evassa ekantagambhīrataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “ekañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Etaṃ natthīti
tika-s0102t:279_6: agambhīro, agambhīrāvabhāso cāti etaṃ dvayaṃ natthi, tena yathādassite catukoṭike
tika-s0102t:279_7: pacchimā eka koṭi labbhatīti dasseti. Tenāha “ayañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:280_0: Yehi gambhīrabhāvehi paṭiccasamuppādo “gambhīro”ti vuccati, te catūhi upamāhi ulliṅgento
tika-s0102t:280_1: “bhavaggaggahaṇāyā”tiādimāha. Yathā bhavaggaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā gahetuṃ na sakkā
tika-s0102t:280_3: gahetuṃ na sakkā. Yathā sineruṃ bhinditvā miñjaṃ pabbatarasaṃ pākatikapurisena nīharituṃ
tika-s0102t:280_4: na sakkā, evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādagate dhammatthādike pākatikañāṇena bhinditvā vibhajja
tika-s0102t:280_5: paṭivijjhanavasena jānituṃ na sakkā. Yathā mahāsamuddaṃ pākatikapurisassa bāhudvayena
tika-s0102t:280_6: padhārituṃ na sakkā, evaṃ vepullaṭṭhena mahāsamuddasadisaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ pākatikañāṇena
tika-s0102t:280_7: desanāvasena padhārituṃ na sakkā. Yathā mahāpathaviṃ parivattetvā pākatikapurisassa
tika-s0102t:280_8: pathavojaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ “itthaṃ avijjādayo saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayā hontī”ti
tika-s0102t:280_9: tesaṃ paccayabhāvo pākatikañāṇena nīharitvā gahetuṃ na sakkāti. Evaṃ catubbidhagambhīratāvasena
tika-s0102t:280_10: catasso upamā yojetabbā. Pākatikañāṇavasena cāyamatthayojanā katā diṭṭhasaccānaṃ
tika-s0102t:280_11: tattha paṭivedhasabhāvato, tathāpi yasmā sāvakānaṃ, paccekabuddhānañca tattha sappadesameva
tika-s0102t:280_12: ñāṇaṃ, buddhānaṃyeva nippadesaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “buddhavisayaṃ pañha”ntiādi.
tika-s0102t:281: Ussādentoti paññāya ukkaṃsento, uggaṇhantoti attho. Apasādentoti nibbhacchanto, niggaṇhantoti attho.
tika-s0102t:283_0: Tenāti mahāpaññābhāvena. Tatthāti therassa satipi uttānabhāve, paṭiccasamuppādassaaññesaṃ
tika-s0102t:283_1: gambhīrabhāve. Subhojanarasapuṭṭhassāti sundarena bhojanarasena positassa. Katayogassāti
tika-s0102t:283_2: nibaddhapayogena kataparicayassa. Mallapāsāṇanti mallehi mahabbaleheva ukkhipitabbapāsāṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:283_3: Kuhiṃ imassa bhāriyaṭṭhānanti kasmiṃ passe imassa pāsāṇassa garutarappadesoti tassa
tika-s0102t:284_0: Timirapiṅgaleneva dīpenti tassa mahāvipphārabhāvato. Tenāha “tassa kirā”tiādi. Pakkuthatīti
tika-s0102t:284_1: pakkuthantaṃ viya parivattati parito vivattati. Lakkhaṇavacanañhetaṃ. Piṭṭhiyaṃ sakalinapadakāpiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:284_2: Kāyūpapannassāti mahatā kāyena upetassa, mahākāyassāti attho.
tika-s0102t:285: Piñchavaṭṭīti piñchakalāpo. Supaṇṇavātanti nāgaggahaṇādīsu pakkhapapphoṭanavasena uppajjanakavātaṃ.
tika-s0102t:287_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha itoti ito kappato. Satasahassimeti satasahassame. Haṃsāvatī nāma nagaraṃ
tika-s0102t:287_2: ahosi jātanagaraṃ. Dhurapattānīti bāhirapattāni, yāni dīghatamāni.
tika-s0102t:288_0: Kaniṭṭhabhātāti vemātikabhātā kaniṭṭho yathā amhākaṃ bhagavato nandatthero. Buddhānañhi
tika-s0102t:288_1: sahodarā bhātaro nāma na honti. Kathaṃ jeṭṭhā tāva na uppajjanti, kaniṭṭhānaṃ pana
tika-s0102t:288_2: asambhavo eva. Bhoganti vibhavaṃ. Upasantoti corajanitasaṅkhobhavūpasamena upasanto janapado.
tika-s0102t:289: Dve sāṭake nivāsetvāti sāṭakadvayameva attano kāyaparihārikaṃ katvā itaraṃ sabbasambhāraṃ attato mocetvā.
tika-s0102t:290_1: pattaggahaṇatthaṃ. Uttarisāṭakanti attano uttarisāṭakaṃ. Etāni pākaṭaṭṭhānānīti etāni
tika-s0102t:290_2: yathāvuttāni bhagavato desanāya pākaṭāni therassa puññakaraṇaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0102t:291: Paṭisandhiṃ gahetvāti amhākaṃ mahābodhisattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase eva paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0102t:293_0: Uggahaṇaṃ pāḷiyā uggaṇhanaṃ. Savanaṃ atthasavanaṃ. Paripucchanaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānesu atthaparipucchanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:293_1: Dhāraṇaṃ pāḷiyāpi pāḷiatthassapi citte ṭhapanaṃ. Sabbañcetaṃ idha paṭiccasamuppādavasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:294_1: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti attapaccakkhavasena upaṭṭhānato. Nāmarūpaparicchedoti
tika-s0102t:296_1: Jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭhoti jātipaccayato sambhūtaṃ hutvā sahitassa attano
tika-s0102t:296_2: paccayānurūpassa jarāmaraṇassa uddhaṃ uddhaṃ āgatabhāvo, anupavattatthoti attho.
tika-s0102t:296_3: Atha vā sambhūtaṭṭho ca samudāgataṭṭho ca sambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho. “Na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:296_4: na hoti,” na ca jātiṃ vinā “aññato hotī”ti hi jātipaccayasambhūtaṭṭho vutto, itthañca
tika-s0102t:296_5: jātito samudāgacchatīti jātipaccayasamudāgataṭṭho, yā yā jāti yathā yathā paccayo
