tika-s0102t:399_0: Vipaccituṃ aladdhokāse pāpakamme, tassa kammassa vipāke vā anavasarova devatopasaggo,
tika-s0102t:399_1: tasmiṃ pana laddhokāse siyā devatopasaggassa avasaroti āha “anuppannaṃ…pe… vaḍḍhentī”ti.
tika-s0102t:399_2: Eteneva anuppannaṃ sukhanti etthāpi attho veditabbo. “Balakāyassa diguṇatiguṇatādassanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:399_3: paṭibhayabhāvadassana”nti evaṃ ādinā devatānaṃ saṅgāmasīse sahāyatā veditabbā.
tika-s0102t:400_0: Anicchitanti aniṭṭhaṃ. Āvaraṇatoti nisedhanato. Yassa dhammato anapetā dhammiyāti
tika-s0102t:400_1: idha “dhammikā”ti vuttā. Migasūkarādighātāya sunakhādīnaṃ kaḍḍhitvā vanacaraṇaṃ vājo,
tika-s0102t:400_2: migavā, tattha niyuttā, te vā vājenti nentīti vājikā, migavadhacārino. Cittappavattiṃ
tika-s0102t:400_3: pucchati. Kāyikavācasikapayogena hi sā loke pākaṭā pakāsabhūtāti.
tika-s0102t:401: 135. Devāyatanabhāvena citattā, lokassa cittīkāraṭṭhānattā ca cetiyaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0102t:402_0: Kāmaṃkāravasena kiñcipi na karaṇīyāti akaraṇīyā. Kāmaṃkāro pana hatthagatakaraṇavasenāti
tika-s0102t:402_1: āha “aggahetabbāti attho”ti. Abhimukhayuddhenāti abhimukhaṃ ujukameva saṅgāmakaraṇena.
tika-s0102t:402_2: Upalāpanaṃ sāmaṃ dānañcāti dassetuṃ “ala”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Bhedopi idha upāyo evāti
tika-s0102t:402_3: vuttaṃ “aññatra mithubhedāyā”ti. Yuddhassa pana anupāyatā pageva pakāsitā. Idanti
tika-s0102t:402_4: “aññatra upalāpanāya, aññatra mithubhedā”ti ca idaṃ vacanaṃ. Kathāya nayaṃ labhitvāti
tika-s0102t:402_5: “yāvakīvañca…pe… no parihānī”ti imāya bhagavato kathāya nayaṃ upāyaṃ labhitvā.
tika-s0102t:404: Kathanti vajjīhi saddhiṃ kātabbayuddhakathaṃ. Ujuṃ karissāmīti paṭirājāno ānetvā pākāraparikhānaṃ aññathābhāvāpādanena ujubhāvaṃ karissāmi.
tika-s0102t:405_0: Patiṭṭhitaguṇoti patiṭṭhitācariyaguṇo. Issarā sannipatantu, mayaṃ anissarā, tattha
tika-s0102t:405_1: gantvā kiṃ karissāmāti licchavino na sannipatiṃsūti yojanā. Sūrā sannipatantūti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:408_0: 136. Aparihānāya hitāti aparihāniyā, na parihāyanti etehīti vā aparihāniyā, te pana
tika-s0102t:408_1: yasmā aparihāniyā kārakā nāma honti, tasmā vuttaṃ “aparihānikare”ti. Yasmā pana te
tika-s0102t:408_2: parihānikarānaṃ ujupaṭipakkhabhūtā, tasmā āha “vuddhihetubhūte”ti. Yasmā bhagavato
tika-s0102t:408_3: desanā uparūpari ñāṇālokaṃ pasādentī sattānaṃ hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamati, pakāsetabbe
tika-s0102t:408_4: ca atthe hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya suṭṭhutaraṃ pākaṭe katvā dasseti, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:409_0: Yasmā bhagavā “tassa brāhmaṇassa sammukhā vajjīnaṃ abhiṇhasannipātādipaṭipattiṃ kathentoyeva
tika-s0102t:409_1: ayaṃ aparihāniyakathā aniyyānikā vaṭṭanissitā, mayhaṃ pana sāsane tathārūpī kathā
tika-s0102t:409_2: kathetabbā, sā hoti niyyānikā vivaṭṭanissitā, yāya sāsanaṃ mayhaṃ parinibbānato parampi
tika-s0102t:409_3: addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitika”nti cintesi, tasmā bhikkhū sannipātāpetvā tesaṃ aparihāniye
tika-s0102t:409_4: dhamme desento teneva niyāmena desesi. Tena vuttaṃ “idaṃ vajjisattake vuttasadisamevā”ti.
tika-s0102t:409_5: Evaṃ saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “idhāpi cā”tiādimāha. Tattha “tato”tiādi
tika-s0102t:409_6: disāsu āgatasāsane vuttaṃ taṃ kathanaṃ. Vihārasīmā ākulā yasmā, tasmā uposathapavāraṇā ṭhitā.
tika-s0102t:410: Olīyamānakoti pāḷito, atthato ca vinassamāno. Ukkhipāpentāti paguṇabhāvakaraṇena, atthasaṃvaṇṇanena ca paggaṇhantā.
tika-s0102t:411_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ bhikkhū viya pācittiyaṃ desāpetabboti. Vajjiputtakā viya dasavatthudīpanena.
tika-s0102t:411_1: “Gihigatānīti gihipaṭisaṃyuttānī”ti vadanti. Gihīsu gatāni, tehi ñātāni gihigatāni.
tika-s0102t:411_2: Dhūmakālo etassāti dhūmakālikaṃ citakadhūmavūpasamato paraṃ appavattanato.
tika-s0102t:412_0: Thirabhāvappattāti sāsane thirabhāvaṃ anivattitabhāvaṃ upagatā. Therakārakehīti therabhāvasādhakehi
tika-s0102t:412_1: sīlādiguṇehi asekkhadhammehi. Bahū rattiyoti pabbajitā hutvā bahū rattiyo jānanti.
tika-s0102t:412_2: Sīlādiguṇesu patiṭṭhāpanameva sāsane pariṇāyakatāti āha “tīsu sikkhāsu pavattentī”ti.
tika-s0102t:413_0: Ovādaṃ na denti abhājanabhāvato. Paveṇīkathanti ācariyaparamparābhataṃ sammāpaṭipattidīpanaṃ
tika-s0102t:414: Punabbhavadānaṃ punabbhavo uttarapadalopena. Itareti ye na paccayavasikā na āmisacakkhukā, te na gacchanti taṇhāya vasaṃ.
tika-s0102t:415_0: Āraññakesūti araññabhāgesu araññapariyāpannesu. Nanu yattha katthacipi taṇhā sāvajjā
tika-s0102t:415_1: evāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “gāmantasenāsanesu hī”tiādi, tena “anuttaresu vimokkhesu
tika-s0102t:415_2: pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato”ti ettha vuttasinehādayo viya āraññakesu senāsanesu sālayatā
tika-s0102t:416_0: Attanāvāti sayameva, tena parehi anussāhitānaṃ saraseneva anāgatānaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0102t:416_1: āgamanaṃ, āgatānañca phāsuvihāraṃ paccāsisantīti dasseti. Iminā nīhārenāti imāya
tika-s0102t:416_2: paṭipattiyā. Aggahitadhammaggahaṇanti aggahitassa pariyattidhammassa uggahaṇaṃ. Gahitasajjhāyakaraṇanti
tika-s0102t:416_3: uggahitassa suṭṭhu atthacintanaṃ. Cintanattho hi sajjhāyasaddo.
tika-s0102t:418_0: 137. Āramitabbaṭṭhena kammaṃ ārāmo. Kamme ratā, na ganthadhure, vāsadhure vāti kammaratā,
tika-s0102t:418_1: anuyuttāti tapparabhāvena punappunaṃ pasutā. Iti kātabbakammanti taṃ taṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0102t:418_3: dupaṭṭatipaṭṭādikaraṇaṃ. Tañhi paṭhamapaṭalādīnaṃ upatthambhanakāraṇattā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:418_4: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ ayaṃ kammarāmatā paṭikkhittāti āha “ekacco hī”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:419_0: Karonto yevāti yathāvuttatiracchānakathaṃ kathentoyeva. Atiracchānakathābhāvepi tassa
tika-s0102t:419_1: tattha tapparabhāvadassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇavacanaṃ. Pariyantakārīti sapariyantaṃ katvā
tika-s0102t:419_2: vattā. “Pariyantavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Appabhasso vāti parimitakathoyeva
tika-s0102t:419_3: ekantena kathetabbasseva kathanato. Samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ ariyo tuṇhībhāvo.
tika-s0102t:420: Niddāyatiyevāti niddokkamane anādīnavadassī niddāyatiyeva. Iriyāpathaparivattanādinā na naṃ vinodeti.
tika-s0102t:421: Evaṃ saṃsaṭṭho vāti vuttanayena gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya saṃsaṭṭho eva viharati.
tika-s0102t:422: Dussīlā pāpicchā nāmāti sayaṃ nissīlā asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya samannāgatattā pāpā lāmakā icchā etesanti pāpicchā.
tika-s0102t:423: Pāpapuggalehi mettikaraṇato pāpamittā. Tehi sadā saha pavattanena pāpasahāyā. Tattha ninnatādinā tadadhimuttatāya pāpasampavaṅkā.
tika-s0102t:424_0: 138. Saddhā etesaṃ atthīti saddhāti āha “saddhāsampannā”ti. Āgamanīyapaṭipadāya āgatasaddhā
tika-s0102t:424_1: āgamanīyasaddhā, sā sātisayā mahābodhisattānaṃ paropadesena vinā saddheyyavatthuṃ
tika-s0102t:424_2: aviparītato ogāhetvā adhimuccanatoti āha “sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ hotī”ti. Saccapaṭivedhato
tika-s0102t:424_5: okkantitvā pakkhanditvā saddahanavasena kappanaṃ okappanaṃ. Duvidhāpīti pasādasaddhāpi
tika-s0102t:424_6: okappanasaddhāpi. Tattha pasādasaddhā aparaneyyarūpā hoti savanamattena pasīdanato.
tika-s0102t:424_7: Okappanasaddhā saddheyyavatthuṃ ogāhetvā anupavisitvā “evameta”nti paccakkhaṃ karontī
tika-s0102t:424_8: viya pavattati. Tenāha “saddhādhimutto vakkalittherasadiso hotī”ti. Tassa hīti okappanasaddhāya
tika-s0102t:424_9: samannāgatassa. Hirī etassa atthīti hiri, hiri mano etesanti hirimanāti āha “pāpa…pe…
tika-s0102t:424_10: cittā”ti. Pāpato ottappenti ubbijjanti bhāyantīti ottappī.
tika-s0102t:425_0: Bahu sutaṃ suttageyyādi etenāti bahussuto, sutaggahaṇaṃ cettha nidassanamattaṃ dhāraṇaparicayaparipucchānupekkhanadiṭṭhinijjhānānaṃ
tika-s0102t:425_1: pettha icchitabbattā. Savanamūlakattā vā tesampi taggahaṇeneva gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:425_3: ca pariyatti, tīṇi piṭakāni. Saccappaṭivedho saccānaṃ paṭivijjhanaṃ. Tadapi bāhusaccaṃ
tika-s0102t:425_5: bahussutabhāvassa idha icchitattā. Soti pariyattibahussuto. Catubbidho hoti pañcamassa
tika-s0102t:425_6: pakārassa abhāvato. Sabbatthakabahussutoti nissayamuccanakabahussutādayo viya padesiko
tika-s0102t:425_7: ahutvā piṭakattaye sabbatthakameva bāhusaccasabbhāvato sabbassa atthassa kāyanato
tika-s0102t:425_8: kathanato sabbatthakabahussuto. Te idha adhippetā paṭipattipaṭivedhasaddhammānaṃ
tika-s0102t:426: Āraddhanti paggahitaṃ. Taṃ pana duvidhampi vīriyārambhavibhāgena dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ekakāti ekākino, vūpakaṭṭhavihārinoti attho.
tika-s0102t:427_0: Pucchitvāti parato pucchitvā. Sampaṭicchāpetunti “tvaṃ asukanāmo”ti vatvā tehi “āmā”ti
tika-s0102t:428_1: bojjhaṅgo, pasattho, sundaro vā bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo. Upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇoti kāyavedanācittadhammānaṃ
tika-s0102t:428_3: upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇo. Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ pīḷanādippakārato vicayo upaparikkhā lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:428_4: etassāti pavicayalakkhaṇo. Anuppannā kusalānuppādanādivasena cittassa paggaho paggaṇhanaṃ
tika-s0102t:428_5: lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti paggahalakkhaṇo. Pharaṇaṃ vipphārikatā lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti pharaṇalakkhaṇo.
tika-s0102t:428_6: Upasamo kāyacittapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti upasamalakkhaṇo. Avikkhepo
tika-s0102t:428_7: vikkhepaviddhaṃsanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti avikkhepalakkhaṇo. Līnuddhaccarahite adhicitte
tika-s0102t:429_1: tadadhimuttatāti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi. Chahi kāraṇehīti paripucchakatā, vatthuvisadakiriyā,
tika-s0102t:429_3: imehi chahi kāraṇehi. Mahāsatipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “sattahi kāraṇehī” vakkhati,
tika-s0102t:429_4: taṃ gambhīrañāṇacariyāpaccavekkhaṇāti imaṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvā veditabbaṃ. Navahi
tika-s0102t:429_9: imehi saddhiṃ “ekādasā”ti vakkhati. Dasahi kāraṇehīti buddhānussati, dhammānussati,
tika-s0102t:429_11: tadadhimuttatāti imehi dasahi. Mahāsatipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana pasādaniyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāya
tika-s0102t:429_12: saddhiṃ “ekādasā”ti vakkhati. Sattahi kāraṇehīti paṇītabhojanasevanatā, utusukhasevanatā,
tika-s0102t:429_14: tadadhimuttatāti imehi sattahi. Dasahi kāraṇehīti vatthuvisadakiriyā, indriyasamattapaṭipādanā,
tika-s0102t:429_15: nimittakusalatā, samaye cittassa paggahaṇaṃ, samaye cittassa niggahaṇaṃ, samaye cittassa
tika-s0102t:429_16: sampahaṃsanaṃ, samaye cittassa ajjhupekkhanaṃ, asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanaṃ, samāhitapuggalasevanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:429_17: tadadhimuttatāti imehi dasahi kāraṇehi. Mahāsatipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “jhānavimokkhapaccavekkhaṇā”ti
tika-s0102t:429_18: iminā saddhiṃ “ekādasahī”ti vakkhati. Pañcahi kāraṇehīti sattamajjhattatā, saṅkhāramajjhattatā,
tika-s0102t:429_20: imehi pañcahi kāraṇehi. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgamissati.
tika-s0102t:429_21: Kāmaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammā nāma nippariyāyato ariyamaggasampayuttā eva niyyānikabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:429_22: Suttantadesanā nāma pariyāyakathāti “iminā vipassanā…pe… kathesī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:430_0: 140. Tebhūmake saṅkhāre “aniccā”ti anupassati etāyāti aniccānupassanā, tathā pavattā
tika-s0102t:430_1: vipassanā, sā pana yasmā attanā sahagatasaññāya bhāvitāya vibhāvitā eva hotīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:430_2: “aniccānupassanāya saddhiṃ uppannasaññā”ti. Saññāsīsena vāyaṃ vipassanāya eva niddeso.
tika-s0102t:430_3: Anattasaññādīsupi eseva nayo. Lokiyavipassanāpi honti, yasmā “anicca”ntiādinā tā
tika-s0102t:430_4: pavattantīti. Lokiyavipassanāpīti pi-saddena missakāpettha santīti atthato āpannanti
tika-s0102t:430_5: atthāpattisiddhamatthaṃ niddhāretvā sarūpato dassetuṃ “virāgo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0102t:430_6: āgatavasenāti tathā āgatapāḷivasena “virāgo nirodho”ti hi tattha nibbānaṃ vuttanti
tika-s0102t:430_7: idha “virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññā”ti vuttasaññā nibbānārammaṇāpi siyuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:431_0: 141. Mettā etassa atthīti mettaṃ, cittaṃ. Taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ.
tika-s0102t:431_1: Esa nayo sesadvayepi. Imānipi mettākāyakammādīni bhikkhūnaṃ vasena āgatāni tesaṃ
tika-s0102t:431_2: seṭṭhaparisabhāvato. Yathā pana bhikkhūsupi labbhanti, evaṃ gihīsupi labbhanti catuparisasādhāraṇattāti
tika-s0102t:431_4: labbhanti, nippariyāyato pana cārittadhammassavanena ayamattho icchitoti dassento
tika-s0102t:432_0: Āvīti pakāsaṃ, pakāsabhāvo cettha yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati, tassa sammukhabhāvatoti
tika-s0102t:432_1: āha “sammukhā”ti. Rahoti appakāsaṃ, appakāsatā ca yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati,
tika-s0102t:432_2: tassa paccakkhābhāvatoti āha “parammukhā”ti. Sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ tesaṃ purato. Ubhayehīti
tika-s0102t:434_0: Kāmaṃ mettāsinehasiniddhānaṃ nayanānaṃ ummīlanā, pasannena mukhena olokanañca mettaṃ
tika-s0102t:434_1: kāyakammameva, yassa pana cittassa vasena nayanānaṃ mettāsinehasiniddhatā, mukhassa
tika-s0102t:434_2: ca pasannatā, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-s0102t:435_0: Lābhasaddo kammasādhano “lābhāvata, lābho laddho”tiādīsu viya, so cettha “dhammaladdhā”ti
tika-s0102t:435_1: vacanato atītakālikoti āha “cīvarādayo laddhapaccayā”ti. Dhammato āgatāti dhammikā.
tika-s0102t:435_2: Tenāha “dhammaladdhā”ti. Imameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “kuhanādī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cittena
tika-s0102t:435_3: vibhajanapubbakaṃ kāyena vibhajananti mūlameva dassetuṃ “evaṃ cittena vibhajana”nti
tika-s0102t:435_4: vuttaṃ, tena cittuppādamattenapi paṭivibhāgo na kātabboti dasseti. Appaṭivibhattanti
tika-s0102t:435_5: bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, appaṭivibhattaṃ vā lābhaṃ bhuñjatīti kammaniddeso eva.
tika-s0102t:436_0: Taṃ taṃ neva gihīnaṃ deti attano ājīvasodhanatthaṃ. Na attanā bhuñjatīti attanāva
tika-s0102t:436_1: na paribhuñjati “mayhaṃ asādhāraṇabhogitā mā hotū”ti. “Paṭiggaṇhanto ca…pe… passatī”ti
tika-s0102t:436_2: iminā tassa lābhassa tīsupi kālesu sādhāraṇato ṭhapanaṃ dassitaṃ. “Paṭiggaṇhanto
tika-s0102t:436_3: ca saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotū”ti iminā paṭiggahaṇakālo dassito, “gahetvā…pe… passatī”ti
tika-s0102t:436_4: iminā paṭiggahitakālo, tadubhayaṃ pana tādisena pubbābhogena vinā na hotīti atthasiddho
tika-s0102t:436_5: purimakālo. Tayidaṃ paṭiggahaṇato pubbe vassa hoti “saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti paṭiggahessāmī”ti.
tika-s0102t:436_6: Paṭiggaṇhantassa hoti “saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti paṭiggaṇhāmī”ti. Paṭiggahetvā hoti
tika-s0102t:436_7: “saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti paṭiggahitaṃ mayā”ti evaṃ tilakkhaṇasampannaṃ katvā laddhalābhaṃ
tika-s0102t:436_8: osānalakkhaṇaṃ avikopetvā paribhuñjanto sādhāraṇabhogī, appaṭivibhattabhogī ca hoti.
tika-s0102t:437_0: Imaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammanti imaṃ catutthaṃ saritabbayuttadhammaṃ. Na hi…pe… gaṇhanti,
tika-s0102t:437_1: tasmā sādhāraṇabhogitā eva dussīlassa natthīti ārambhopi tāva na sambhavati, kuto
tika-s0102t:437_2: pūraṇanti adhippāyo. “Parisuddhasīlo”ti iminā lābhassa dhammikabhāvaṃ dasseti. “Vattaṃ
tika-s0102t:437_3: akhaṇḍento”ti iminā appaṭivibhattabhogitaṃ, sādhāraṇabhogitañca dasseti. Sati pana
tika-s0102t:437_4: tadubhaye sāraṇīyadhammo pūrito eva hotīti āha “pūretī”ti. “Odissakaṃ katvā”ti etena
tika-s0102t:437_5: anodissakaṃ katvā pituno, ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ vā therāsanato paṭṭhāya dentassa sāraṇīyadhammoyeva
tika-s0102t:437_6: hotīti. Sāraṇīyadhammo panassa na hotīti paṭijagganaṭṭhāne odissakaṃ katvā dinnattā.
tika-s0102t:437_7: Tenāha “palibodhajagganaṃ nāma hotī”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sāraṇīyadhammapūrakassa
tika-s0102t:437_8: odissakadānaṃ na vaṭṭatīti? No na vaṭṭati yuttaṭṭhāneti dassento “tena panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:437_9: Gilānādīnaṃ odissakaṃ katvā dānaṃ appaṭivibhāgapakkhikaṃ “asukassa na dassāmī”ti
tika-s0102t:437_10: paṭikkhepassa abhāvato. Byatirekappadhāno hi paṭivibhāgo. Tenāha “avasesa”ntiādi.
tika-s0102t:437_11: Adātumpīti pi-saddena dātumpi vaṭṭatīti dasseti, tañca kho karuṇāyanavasena, na vattapūraṇavasena.
tika-s0102t:438_0: Susikkhitāyāti sāraṇīyadhammapūraṇavidhimhi suṭṭhu sikkhitāya, sukusalāyāti attho.
tika-s0102t:438_1: Idāni tassā kosallaṃ dassetuṃ “susikkhitāya hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Dvādasahi vassehi pūrati,
tika-s0102t:438_2: na tato ora”nti iminā tassa duppūraṇaṃ dasseti. Tathā hi so mahapphalo mahānisaṃso,
tika-s0102t:438_3: diṭṭhadhammikehipi tāva garutarehi phalānisaṃsehi ca anugato. Taṃsamaṅgī ca puggalo
tika-s0102t:438_4: visesalābhī ariyapuggalo viya loke acchariyabbhutadhammasamannāgato hoti. Tathā hi
tika-s0102t:438_5: so duppajahaṃ dānamayassa, sīlamayassa ca puññassa paṭipakkhadhammaṃ sudūre vikkhambhitaṃ
tika-s0102t:438_6: katvā suvisuddhena cetasā loke pākaṭo paññāto hutvā viharati, tassimamatthaṃ byatirekato,
tika-s0102t:438_7: anvayato ca vibhāvetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0102t:439_0: Idāni ye samparāyike, diṭṭhadhammike ca ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Neva
tika-s0102t:439_1: issā, na macchariyaṃ hoti cirakālabhāvanāya vidhutabhāvato. Manussānaṃ piyo hoti
tika-s0102t:439_2: pariccāgasīlatāya visuddhattā. Tenāha “dadaṃ piyo hoti bhajanti naṃ bahū”tiādi. Sulabhapaccayo
tika-s0102t:439_3: hoti dānavasena uḷārajjhāsayānaṃ paccayalābhassa idhānisaṃsabhāvato dānassa. Pattagataṃ
tika-s0102t:439_4: assa diyyamānaṃ na khīyati pattagatavasena dvādasavassikassa mahāpattassa avicchedena
tika-s0102t:439_5: pūritattā. Aggabhaṇḍaṃ labhati devasikaṃ dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ aggato paṭṭhāya dānassa dinnattā.
tika-s0102t:439_6: Bhayevā…pe… āpajjanti deyyapaṭiggāhakavikappaṃ akatvā attani nirapekkhacittena cirakālaṃ
tika-s0102t:440_0: Tatrāti tesu ānisaṃsesu vibhāvetabbesu. Imāni taṃ dīpanāni vatthūni kāraṇāni. Alabhantāpīti
tika-s0102t:440_1: amahāpuññatāya na lābhino samānāpi. Bhikkhācāramaggasabhāganti sabhāgaṃ tabbhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0102t:441_1: pūrito”ti āha. Tathā hi dutiyavatthusmimpi therena attā pakāsito. Manussānaṃ piyatāya,
tika-s0102t:441_2: sulabhapaccayatāyapi idaṃ vatthumeva. Pattagatākhīyanassa pana visesaṃ vibhāvanato
tika-s0102t:442_0: Giribhaṇḍamahāpūjāyāti cetiyagirimhi sakalalaṅkādīpe, yojanappamāṇe samudde ca nāvāsaṅghāṭādike
tika-s0102t:442_1: ṭhapetvā dīpapupphagandhādīhi kariyamānamahāpūjāyaṃ. Pariyāyenapīti lesenapi. Anucchavikanti
tika-s0102t:442_2: sāraṇīyadhammapūraṇatopi idaṃ yathābhūtappavedanaṃ tumhākaṃ anucchavikanti attho.
tika-s0102t:443: Anārocetvāva palāyiṃsu corabhayena. “Attano dujjīvikāyā”ti ca vadanti.
tika-s0102t:444: Vaṭṭissatīti kappissati. Therī sāraṇīyadhammapūrikā ahosi, therassa pana sīlatejeneva devatā ussukkaṃ āpajji.
tika-s0102t:445_0: Natthi etesaṃ khaṇḍanti akhaṇḍāni. Taṃ pana nesaṃ khaṇḍaṃ dassetuṃ “yassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:445_1: Tattha upasampannasīlānaṃ uddesakkamena ādi antā veditabbā. Tenāha “sattasū”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:445_2: Anupasampannasīlānaṃ pana samādānakkamenapi ādi antā labbhanti. Pariyante chinnasāṭako
tika-s0102t:445_3: viyāti vatthante, dasante vā chinnavatthaṃ viya, visadisūdāharaṇaṃ cetaṃ “akhaṇḍānī”ti
tika-s0102t:445_4: imassa adhigatattā. Evaṃ sesānipi udāharaṇāni. Khaṇḍitabhinnatā khaṇḍaṃ, taṃ etassa
tika-s0102t:445_5: atthīti khaṇḍaṃ, sīlaṃ. “Chidda”ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. Vemajjhe bhinnaṃ vinivijjhanavasena
tika-s0102t:445_6: visabhāgavaṇṇena gāvī viyāti sambandho. Sabalarahitāni asabalāni. Tathā akammāsāni.
tika-s0102t:445_7: Sīlassa taṇhādāsabyato mocanaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayabhāvāpādanaṃ. Yasmā ca taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo
tika-s0102t:445_8: serī sayaṃvasī bhujisso nāma hoti, tasmāpi bhujissāni. Tenevāha “bhujissabhāvakāraṇato
tika-s0102t:445_9: bhujissānī”ti. Suparisuddhabhāvena pāsaṃsattā viññupasatthāni. Imināhaṃ sīlena devo
tika-s0102t:445_10: vā bhaveyyaṃ, devaññataro vā, tattha “nicco dhuvo sassato”ti, “sīlena suddhī”ti ca
tika-s0102t:445_11: evaṃ ādinā taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā. “Ayaṃ te sīlesu doso”ti catūsupi vipattīsu
tika-s0102t:445_12: yāya kāyaci vipattiyā dassanena parāmaṭṭhuṃ anuddhaṃsetuṃ. Samādhisaṃvattanappayojanāni
tika-s0102t:446_0: Samānabhāvūpagatasīlāti sīlasampattiyā samānabhāvaṃ upagatasīlā sabhāgavuttikā. Kāmaṃ
tika-s0102t:446_1: puthujjanānañca catupārisuddhisīle nānattaṃ na siyā, taṃ pana na ekantikaṃ, idaṃ
tika-s0102t:446_2: ekantikaṃ niyatabhāvatoti āha “natthi maggasīle nānatta”nti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti
tika-s0102t:446_3: maggasīlaṃ sandhāya etaṃ “yāni tāni sīlānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:447_0: Yāyanti yā ayaṃ mayhañceva tumhākañca paccakkhabhūtā. Diṭṭhīti maggasammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0102t:447_1: Niddosāti nidhutadosā, samucchinnarāgādipāpadhammāti attho. Niyyātīti vaṭṭadukkhato
tika-s0102t:447_2: nissarati nigacchati. Sayaṃ niyyantasseva hi “taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato niyyāpetī”ti
tika-s0102t:447_3: vuccati. Yā satthu anusiṭṭhi, taṃ karotīti takkaro, tassa, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanakassāti
tika-s0102t:447_5: Vuddhiyevāti ariyavinaye guṇehi vuḍḍhiyeva, no parihānīti ayaṃ aparihāniyadhammadesanā
tika-s0102t:447_6: attanopi sāsanassa addhaniyataṃ ākaṅkhantena bhagavatā idha desitā.
tika-s0102t:448_1: katvā vuttaṃ. Etaṃyevāti “iti sīla”ntiādikaṃyeva iti sīlanti ettha iti-saddo pakārattho,
tika-s0102t:448_2: parimāṇattho ca ekajjhaṃ katvā gahitoti āha “evaṃ sīlaṃ ettakaṃ sīla”nti. Evaṃ sīlanti
tika-s0102t:448_3: evaṃ pabhedaṃ sīlaṃ. Ettakanti etaṃ paramaṃ, na ito bhiyyo. Catupārisuddhisīlanti
tika-s0102t:448_4: maggassa sambhārabhūtaṃ lokiyacatupārisuddhisīlaṃ. Cittekaggatā samādhīti etthāpi
tika-s0102t:448_5: eseva nayo. Yasmiṃ sīle ṭhatvāti yasmiṃ lokuttarakusalassa padaṭṭhānabhūte “pubbeva
tika-s0102t:448_6: kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti evaṃ vuttasīle patiṭṭhāya.
tika-s0102t:448_7: Esoti maggaphalasamādhi. Paribhāvitoti tena sīlena sabbaso bhāvito sambhāvito. Mahapphalo
tika-s0102t:448_8: hoti mahānisaṃsoti maggasamādhi tāva sāmaññaphalehi mahapphalo, vaṭṭadukkhavūpasamena
tika-s0102t:448_9: mahānisaṃso. Itaro paṭippassaddhippahānena mahapphalo, nibbutisukhuppattiyā mahānisaṃso.
tika-s0102t:448_10: Yamhi samādhimhi ṭhatvāti yasmiṃ lokuttarakusalassa padaṭṭhānabhūte pādakajjhānasamādhimhi
tika-s0102t:448_11: ceva vuṭṭhānagāminisamādhimhi ca ṭhatvā. Sāti maggaphalapaññā. Tena paribhāvitāti
tika-s0102t:448_12: tena yathāvuttasamādhinā sabbaso bhāvitā paribhāvitā. Mahapphalamahānisaṃsatā samādhimhi
tika-s0102t:448_13: vuttanayena veditabbā. Api ca te bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgappabhedahetutāya mahapphalā
tika-s0102t:448_14: sattadakkhiṇeyyapuggalavibhāgahetutāya mahānisaṃsāti veditabbā. Yāya paññāya ṭhatvāti
tika-s0102t:448_15: yāyaṃ vipassanāpaññāyaṃ, samādhivipassanāpaññāyaṃ vā ṭhatvā. Samathayānikassa hi
tika-s0102t:448_16: samādhisahagatāpi paññā maggādhigamāya visesapaccayo hotiyeva. Sammadevāti suṭṭhuyeva
tika-s0102t:448_17: yathā āsavānaṃ lesopi nāvasissati, evaṃ sabbaso āsavehi vimuccati. Aggamaggakkhaṇañhi sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:449_0: 143. Lokiyatthasaddānaṃ viya abhiranta-saddassa siddhi daṭṭhabbā. Abhirantaṃ abhirataṃ
tika-s0102t:449_1: abhiratīti hi atthato ekaṃ. Abhiranta-saddo cāyaṃ abhirucipariyāyo, na assādapariyāyo.
tika-s0102t:449_2: Assādavasena hi katthaci vasantassa assādavatthuvigamena siyā tassa tattha anabhirati,
tika-s0102t:449_3: yadidaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ natthi, pageva buddhānanti āha “buddhānaṃ…pe… natthī”ti. Abhirativasena
tika-s0102t:449_4: katthaci vasitvā tadabhāvato aññattha gamanaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ natthi. Veneyyavinayanatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:449_5: pana katthaci vasitvā tasmiṃ siddhe veneyyavinayanatthameva tato aññattha gacchanti,
tika-s0102t:449_6: ayamettha yathāruci. Āyāmāti ettha ā-saddo “āgacchā”ti iminā samānatthoti āha “ehi
tika-s0102t:449_7: yāmā”ti. Ayāmāti pana pāṭhe a-kāro nipātamattaṃ. Santikāvacarattā theraṃ ālapati,
tika-s0102t:449_8: na pana tadā satthu santike vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāvato. Aparicchinnagaṇano hi
tika-s0102t:449_9: tadā bhagavato santike bhikkhusaṅgho. Tenāha “mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhi”nti.
tika-s0102t:449_11: eseva nayo. Uttānameva anantaraṃ, heṭṭhā ca saṃvaṇṇitarūpattā.
tika-s0102t:451: 145. “Āyasmā sāriputto”tiādi pāṭhajātaṃ. Sampasādanīyeti sampasādanīyasutte vitthāritaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, tasmā mayampi tattheva naṃ atthato vitthārayissāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:453_0: 148. Āgantvā vasanti ettha āgantukāti āvasatho, tadeva agāranti āha “āvasathāgāranti
tika-s0102t:453_1: āgantukānaṃ āvasathageha”nti. Dvinnaṃ rājūnanti licchavirājamagadharājūnaṃ. Sahāyakāti
tika-s0102t:453_2: sevakā. Kulānīti kuṭumbike. Santhatanti santhari, sabbaṃ santhari sabbasanthari,
tika-s0102t:453_3: taṃ sabbasanthariṃ. Bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso cāyaṃ. Tenāha “yathā sabbaṃ santhataṃ hoti, eva”nti.
tika-s0102t:454_0: 149. Dussīloti ettha du-saddo abhāvattho “duppañño”tiādīsu viya, na garahatthoti
tika-s0102t:454_1: āha “asīlo nissīlo”ti. Bhinnasaṃvaroti ettha yo samādinnasīlo kenaci kāraṇena sīlabhedaṃ
tika-s0102t:454_2: patto, so tāva bhinnasaṃvaro hoti. Yo pana sabbena sabbaṃ asamādinnasīlo ācārahīno,
tika-s0102t:454_3: so kathaṃ bhinnasaṃvaro nāma hotīti? Sopi sādhusamācārassa parihāniyassa bheditattā
tika-s0102t:454_4: bhinnasaṃvaro eva nāma. Vissaṭṭhasaṃvaro saṃvararahitoti hi vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:455: Taṃ taṃ sippaṭṭhānaṃ. Māghātakāleti “mā ghātetha pāṇino”ti evaṃ māghātāti ghosanaṃ ghositadivase.
tika-s0102t:458_0: Tassāti dussīlassa. Samādāya pavattiṭṭhānanti uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya katakāraṇaṃ. Āpāthaṃ
tika-s0102t:458_1: āgacchatīti taṃ manaso upaṭṭhāti. Ummīletvā idhalokanti ummīlanakāle attano puttadārādidassanavasena
tika-s0102t:458_2: idha lokaṃ passati. Nimīletvā paralokanti nimīlanakāle gatinimittupaṭṭhānavasena
tika-s0102t:458_3: paralokaṃ passati. Tenāha “cattāro apāyā”tiādi. Pañcamapadanti “kāyassa bhedā”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:460_0: 150. Vuttavipariyāyenāti vuttāya ādīnavakathāya vipariyāyena. “Appamatto taṃ taṃ
tika-s0102t:460_1: kasivāṇijjādiṃ yathākālaṃ sampādetuṃ sakkotī”tiādinā “pāsaṃsaṃ sīlamassa atthīti
tika-s0102t:460_2: sīlavā. Sīlasampannoti sīlena samannāgato. Sampannasīlo”ti evamādikaṃ pana atthavacanaṃ
tika-s0102t:461: 151. Pāḷimuttakāyāti saṅgītianāruḷhāya dhammikathāya. Tatthevāti āvasathāgāre eva.
tika-s0102t:463_0: 152. Issariyamattāyāti issariyappamāṇena, issariyena ceva vittūpakaraṇena cāti evaṃ
tika-s0102t:463_1: vā attho daṭṭhabbo. Upabhogūpakaraṇānipi hi loke “mattā”ti vuccanti. Pāṭaligāmaṃ
tika-s0102t:463_2: nagaraṃ katvāti pubbe “pāṭaligāmo”ti laddhanāmaṃ ṭhānaṃ idāni nagaraṃ katvā. Māpentīti
tika-s0102t:463_4: vā pāṭho, sahassaso eva. Tenāha “ekekavaggavasena sahassaṃ sahassaṃ hutvā”ti. Gharavatthūnīti
tika-s0102t:463_5: gharapatiṭṭhāpanaṭṭhānāni. Cittāni namantīti taṃtaṃdevatānubhāvena tattha tattheva
tika-s0102t:463_6: cittāni namanti vatthuvijjāpāṭhakānaṃ, yattha yattha tāhi vatthūni pariggahitāni.
tika-s0102t:463_8: Sesadvayesupi eseva nayo. Pāsāṇoti appalakkhaṇapāsāṇo. Khāṇukoti yo koci khāṇuko.
tika-s0102t:463_9: Sippaṃ jappitvā tādisaṃ sārambhaṭṭhānaṃ pariharitvā anārambhe ṭhāne tāhi vatthupariggāhikāhi
tika-s0102t:463_10: devatāhi saddhiṃ mantayamānā viya taṃtaṃgehāni māpenti upadesadānavasena. Nesanti
tika-s0102t:463_11: vatthuvijjāpāṭhakānaṃ, sabbāsaṃ devatānaṃ. Maṅgalaṃ vaḍḍhāpessantīti maṅgalaṃ brūhessanti.
tika-s0102t:464: Saddo abbhuggacchati avayavadhammena samudāyassa apadisitabbato yathā “alaṅkato devadatto”ti.
tika-s0102t:465_1: rāsivaseneva, appakassa pana bhaṇḍassa kayavikkayo aññatthāpi labbhatevāti “rāsivasenevā”ti
tika-s0102t:465_2: vuttaṃ. Vāṇijāya patho pavattiṭṭhānanti vaṇippathoti purimavikappe attho dutiyavikappe
tika-s0102t:465_3: pana vāṇijānaṃ patho pavattiṭṭhānanti, vaṇippathoti imamatthaṃ dassento “vāṇijānaṃ
tika-s0102t:465_4: vasanaṭṭhāna”nti āha. Bhaṇḍapuṭe bhindanti mocenti etthāti puṭabhedananti ayamettha
tika-s0102t:467_0: 153. Kāḷakaṇṇī sattāti attanā kaṇhadhammabahulatāya paresañca kaṇhavipākānatthanibbattinimittatāya
tika-s0102t:467_1: “kāḷakaṇṇī”ti laddhanāmā parūpaddavakarā appesakkhasattā. Tanti bhagavantaṃ. Pubbaṇhasamayanti
tika-s0102t:467_2: pubbaṇhe ekaṃ samayaṃ. Gāmappavisananīhārenāti gāmappavesana nivasanākārena. Kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ
tika-s0102t:467_3: katvāti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā, pattaṃ hatthena gahetvāti attho.
tika-s0102t:468: Etthāti etasmiṃ vā sakappitappadese. Saññateti sammadeva saññate susaṃvutakāyavācācitte.
tika-s0102t:469_0: Pattiṃ dadeyyāti attanā pasutaṃ puññaṃ tāsaṃ devatānaṃ anuppadajjeyya. “Pūjitā”tiādīsu
tika-s0102t:469_1: tadeva pattidānaṃ pūjā, anāgate eva upaddave ārakkhasaṃvidhānaṃ paṭipūjā. “Yebhuyyena
tika-s0102t:469_2: ñātimanussā ñātipetānaṃ pattidānādinā pūjanamānanādīni karonti ime pana aññātakāpi
tika-s0102t:469_3: samānā tathā karonti, tasmā nesaṃ sakkaccaṃ ārakkhā saṃvidhātabbā”ti aññamaññaṃ sampavāretvā
tika-s0102t:469_4: devatā tattha ussukkaṃ āpajjantīti dassento “ime”tiādimāha. Balikammakaraṇaṃ mānanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:470: Sundarāni passatīti sundarāni iṭṭhāni eva passati, na aniṭṭhāni.
tika-s0102t:471_0: 154. Āṇiyo koṭṭetvāti lahuke dārudaṇḍe gahetvā kavāṭaphalake viya aññamaññaṃ sambandhe
tika-s0102t:471_1: kātuṃ āṇiyo koṭṭetvā. Nāvāsaṅkhepena kataṃ uḷumpaṃ, veḷunaḷādike saṅgharitvā valliādīhi
tika-s0102t:472_0: Udakaṭṭhānassetaṃ adhivacananti yathāvuttassa yassa kassaci udakaṭṭhānassa etaṃ “aṇṇava”nti
tika-s0102t:472_1: adhivacanaṃ, samuddassevāti adhippāyo. Saranti idha nadī adhippetā sarati sandatīti
tika-s0102t:472_2: katvā. Gambhīravitthatanti agādhaṭṭhena gambhīraṃ, sakalalokattayabyāpitāya vitthataṃ.
tika-s0102t:472_3: Visajjāti anāsajja appatvā. Pallalāni tesaṃ ataraṇato. Vināyeva kullenāti īdisaṃ
tika-s0102t:472_4: udakaṃ kullena īdisena vinā eva tiṇṇā medhāvino janā, taṇhāsaraṃ pana ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0102t:475_0: 155. Mahāpanādassa rañño. Pāsādakoṭiyaṃ katagāmoti pāsādassa patitathupikāya patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne
tika-s0102t:475_1: niviṭṭhagāmo. Ariyabhāvakarānanti ye paṭivijjhanti, tesaṃ ariyabhāvakarānaṃ nimittassa
tika-s0102t:475_2: kattubhāvūpacāravaseneva vuttaṃ. Tacchāvipallāsabhūtabhāvena saccānaṃ. Anubodho pubbabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0102t:475_3: ñāṇaṃ, paṭivedho maggañāṇena abhisamayo, tattha yasmā anubodhapubbako paṭivedho anubodhena
tika-s0102t:475_4: vinā na hoti, anubodhopi ekacco paṭivedhena sambandho, tadubhayābhāvahetukañca vaṭṭeva
tika-s0102t:475_5: saṃsaraṇaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “ananubodhā…pe… tumhākañcā”ti. Paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena
tika-s0102t:475_6: bhavato bhavantarūpagamanaṃ sandhāvanaṃ, aparāparaṃ cavanupapajjanavasena sañcaraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:475_8: “mayā ca tumhehi cā”ti paṭhamavikappe. Dutiyavikappe pana bhāvasādhanataṃ hadaye
tika-s0102t:475_9: katvā “mamañceva tumhākañcā”ti yathārutavaseneva vuttaṃ. Nayanasamatthāti pāpanasamatthā,
tika-s0102t:475_10: dīgharajjunā baddhasakuṇaṃ viya rajjuhattho puriso desantaraṃ taṇhārajjunā baddhaṃ
tika-s0102t:475_11: sattasantānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro bhavantaraṃ neti etāyāti bhavanetti, taṇhā, sā ariyamaggasatthena
tika-s0102t:477_0: 156. Dve gāmā “nātikā”ti evaṃ laddhanāmo, ña-kārassa cāyaṃ na-kārādesena niddeso
tika-s0102t:477_1: “animittā na nāyare”tiādīsu viya. Tenāha “ñātigāmake”ti. Giñjakā vuccanti iṭṭhakā,
tika-s0102t:477_2: giñjakāhi eva kato āvasathoti giñjakāvasatho. So kira āvāso yathā sudhāparikammena
tika-s0102t:477_3: sampayojanaṃ natthi, evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā chādetvā kato. Tena vuttaṃ “iṭṭhakāmaye
tika-s0102t:478_0: 157. Oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, paccayabhāvena taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni, orambhāgassa
tika-s0102t:478_1: vā hitāni orambhāgiyāni. Tenāha “heṭṭhābhāgiyāna”ntiādi. Tīhi maggehīti heṭṭhimehi
tika-s0102t:478_2: tīhi maggehi. Tehi pahātabbatāya hi nesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ orambhāgiyatā. Orambhañjiyāni
tika-s0102t:478_3: vā orambhāgiyāni vuttāni niruttinayena. Idāni byatirekamukhena nesaṃ orambhāgiyabhāvaṃ
tika-s0102t:478_5: samucchinnāni sabbaso abhāvena ariyānaṃ rūpārūpabhavūpapattiyā vibandhāya na hontīti
tika-s0102t:478_7: Gantuṃ na denti mahaggatagāmikammāyūhanassa vinibandhanato. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni tīṇi
tika-s0102t:478_8: saṃyojanāni kāmacchandabyāpādā viya mahaggatūpapattiyā avinibandhabhūtānipi kāmabhavūpapattiyā
tika-s0102t:478_10: kāmabhavūpapattipaccayatāya mahaggatabhavato ānetvā puna idheva kāmabhave eva nibbattāpenti,
tika-s0102t:478_11: tasmā sabbānipi pañcapi saṃyojanāni orambhāgiyāni eva. Paṭisandhivasena anāgamanasabhāvāti
tika-s0102t:478_12: paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena tasmā lokā idha na āgamanasabhāvā. Buddhadassanatheradassanadhammassavanānaṃ
tika-s0102t:479_0: Kadāci karahaci uppattiyā saviraḷākāratā pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya abahalatāti dvedhāpi
tika-s0102t:479_1: tanubhāvo. Abhiṇhanti bahuso. Bahalabahalāti tibbatibbā. Yattha uppajjanti, taṃ santānaṃ
tika-s0102t:479_2: maddantā, pharantā, sādhentā, andhakāraṃ karontā uppajjanti, dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā
tika-s0102t:479_3: tanukatanukā mandamandā uppajjanti. “Puttadhītaro hontī”ti idaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Tathā hi
tika-s0102t:479_4: aṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanamattenapi te honti. Idanti “rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā”ti idaṃ
tika-s0102t:479_5: vacanaṃ. Bhavatanukavasenāti appakabhavavasena. Tanti mahāsivattherassa vacanaṃ paṭikkhittanti
tika-s0102t:479_6: sambandho. Ye bhavā ariyānaṃ labbhanti, te paripuṇṇalakkhaṇabhavā eva. Ye na labbhanti,
tika-s0102t:479_7: tattha kīdisaṃ taṃ bhavatanukaṃ, tasmā ubhayathāpi bhavatanukassa asambhavo evāti
tika-s0102t:479_8: dassetuṃ “sotāpannassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhame bhave bhavatanukaṃ natthi aṭṭhamasseva
tika-s0102t:479_9: bhavassa sabbasseva abhāvato. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:480_0: Kāmāvacaralokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ itarassa lokassa vasena tathā vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0102t:480_1: Yo hi sakadāgāmī devamanussalokesu vomissakavasena nibbattati, sopi kāmabhavavaseneva
tika-s0102t:480_2: paricchinditabbo. Bhagavatā ca kāmaloke ṭhatvā “sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:480_3: “imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā”ti ca iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito.
tika-s0102t:480_4: Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāyati, ekacco idha patvā devaloke
tika-s0102t:480_5: parinibbāyati, ekacco devaloke patvā tattheva parinibbāyati, ekacco devaloke patvā
tika-s0102t:480_6: idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati, ime cattāro idha na labbhanti. Yo pana idha patvā devaloke
tika-s0102t:480_7: yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ idha adhippeto. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:480_8: pana imaṃ lokanti kāmabhavo adhippetoti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “sace hī”tiādinā aññaṃyeva catukkaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-s0102t:481_0: Catūsu …pe… sabhāvoti attho apāyagamanīyānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ sabbaso pahīnattā. Dhammaniyāmenāti
tika-s0102t:483_0: 158. Tesaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇagatinti tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ “asuko sotāpanno, asuko sakadāgāmī”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:483_1: taṃtaṃñāṇādhigamanaṃ. Ñāṇūpapattiṃ ñāṇābhisamparāyanti tato parampi “niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo,
tika-s0102t:483_2: sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissatī”tiādinā ca ñāṇasahitaṃ uppattipaccayabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0102t:483_3: Olokentassa ñāṇacakkhunā pekkhantassa kāyakilamathova, na tena kāci veneyyānaṃ atthasiddhīti
tika-s0102t:483_4: adhippāyo. Cittavihesāti cittakhedo, sā kilesūpasaṃhitattā buddhānaṃ natthi. Ādīyati
tika-s0102t:483_5: ālokīyati attā etenāti ādāsaṃ, dhammabhūtaṃ ādāsaṃ dhammādāsaṃ, ariyamaggañāṇassetaṃ
tika-s0102t:483_6: adhivacanaṃ, tena ariyasāvakā catūsu ariyasaccesu viddhastasammohattā attānampi yāthāvato
tika-s0102t:483_7: ñatvā yāthāvato byākareyya, tappakāsanato pana dhammapariyāyassa suttassa dhammādāsatā
tika-s0102t:483_8: veditabbā. Yena dhammādāsenāti idha pana maggadhammameva vadati.
tika-s0102t:484_0: Avecca yāthāvato jānitvā tannimittauppannapasādo aveccapasādo, maggādhigamena uppannapasādo,
tika-s0102t:484_1: so pana yasmā pāsāṇapabbato viya niccalo, na ca kenaci kāraṇena vigacchati, tasmā
tika-s0102t:485: “Pañcasīlānī”ti gahaṭṭhavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ tehi ekantapariharaṇīyato. Ariyānaṃ pana sabbāni sīlāni kantāneva. Tenāha “sabbopi panettha saṃvaro labbhatiyevā”ti.
tika-s0102t:486: Sabbesanti sabbesaṃ ariyānaṃ. Sikkhāpadāvirodhenāti yathā bhūtarocanāpatti na hoti, evaṃ. Yuttaṭṭhāneti kātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0102t:488_0: 161. Tadā kira vesālī iddhā phītā sabbaṅgasampannā ahosi vepullappattā, taṃ sandhāyāha
tika-s0102t:488_1: “khandhake vuttanayena vesāliyā sampannabhāvo veditabbo”ti. Tasmiṃ kira bhikkhusaṅghe
tika-s0102t:488_2: pañcasatamattā bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā ahesuṃ osannavīriyā ca. Tathā hi vakkhati
tika-s0102t:488_3: “tattha kira ekacce bhikkhū osannavīriyā”tiādi. Satipaccupaṭṭhānatthanti tesaṃ satipaccupaṭṭhāpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:488_4: Saratīti kāyādike yathāsabhāvato ñāṇasampayuttāya satiyā anussarati upadhāreti. Sampajānātīti
tika-s0102t:488_5: samaṃ pakārehi jānāti avabujjhati. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana parato satipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgamissati.
tika-s0102t:489_0: Sabbasaṅgāhakanti sarīragatassa ceva vatthālaṅkāragatassa cāti sabbassa nīlabhāvassa
tika-s0102t:489_1: saṅgāhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Tassevāti nīlāti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttaatthasseva. Vibhāgadassananti
tika-s0102t:489_2: pabhedadassanaṃ. Yathā te licchavirājāno apītādivaṇṇā eva keci vilepanavasena pītādivaṇṇā
tika-s0102t:489_3: khāyiṃsu, evaṃ anīlādivaṇṇā eva keci vilepanavasena nīlādivaṇṇā khāyiṃsūti vuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:489_4: “na tesaṃ pakativaṇṇo nīlo”tiādi. Nīlo maṇi etesūti nīlamaṇi, indanīlamahānīlādinīlaratanavinaddhā
tika-s0102t:489_5: alaṅkārā. Te kira suvaṇṇaviracite hi maṇiobhāsehi ekanīlā viya khāyanti. Nīlamaṇikhacitāti
tika-s0102t:489_8: paṭighaṭṭesi. Āharanti imasmā rājapurisā balinti āhāro, tappattajanapadoti āha “sāhāranti
tika-s0102t:489_9: sajanapada”nti. Aṅguliphoṭopi aṅguliyā cālanavaseneva hotīti vuttaṃ “aṅguliṃ cālesu”nti.
tika-s0102t:489_10: Ambakāyāti mātugāmena. Upacāravacanaṃ hetaṃ itthīsu, yadidaṃ “ambakā mātugāmo jananikā”ti.
tika-s0102t:490_0: Avalokethāti apavattitvā olokanaṃ oloketha. Taṃ pana apavattitvā olokanaṃ anu anu
tika-s0102t:490_1: dassanaṃ hotīti āha “punappunaṃ passathā”ti. Upanethāti “yathāyaṃ licchavirājaparisā
tika-s0102t:490_2: sobhātisayena yuttā, evaṃ tāvatiṃsaparisā”ti upanayaṃ karotha. Tenāha “tāvatiṃsehi
tika-s0102t:491_1: niyojanaṃ, kevalaṃ pana dibbasampattisadisā etesaṃ rājūnaṃ issariyasampattīti anupubbikathāya
tika-s0102t:491_2: saggasampattikathanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesu pana bhikkhūsu ekaccānaṃ tattha nimittaggāhopi
tika-s0102t:491_3: siyā, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “nimittaggāhe uyyojetī”ti. Hitakāmatāya tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0102t:491_4: yathā āyasmato nandassa hitakāmatāya saggasampattidassanaṃ. Tenāha “tatra kirā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:491_5: Osannavīriyāti sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ avasannavīriyā, ossaṭṭhavīriyā vāti attho. Aniccalakkhaṇavibhāvanatthanti
tika-s0102t:493: 163. Samīpe veḷuvagāmoti pubbaṇhaṃ vā sāyanhaṃ vā gantvā nivattanayogye āsannaṭṭhāne niviṭṭhā parivāragāmo. Saṅgammāti sammā gantvā. Assāti bhagavato.
tika-s0102t:494_0: 164. Pharusoti kakkhaḷo, garutaroti attho. Visabhāgarogoti dhātuvisabhāgatāya samuṭṭhito
tika-s0102t:494_1: bahalatararogo, na ābādhamattaṃ. Ñāṇena paricchinditvāti vedanānaṃ khaṇikataṃ, dukkhataṃ,
tika-s0102t:494_2: attasuññatañca yāthāvato ñāṇena paricchijja parituletvā. Adhivāsesīti tā abhibhavanto
tika-s0102t:494_3: yathāparimadditākārasallakkhaṇena attani āropetvā vāsesi, na tāhi abhibhuyyamāno.
tika-s0102t:494_5: pana “natthī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ. Asati hi tasmiṃ adhivāsanāya eva asambhavoti. Anāmantetvāti
tika-s0102t:494_6: anālapitvā. Anapaloketvāti avissajjitvā. Tenāha “ovādānusāsaniṃ adatvāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:494_8: phalasamāpattisampayuttavīriyena. Vikkhambhetvāti vinodetvā. Yathā nāma pupphanasamaye
tika-s0102t:494_9: campakādirukkhe vekhe dinne yāva so vekho nāpanīyati, tāvassa pupphanasamatthatā
tika-s0102t:494_10: vikkhambhitā vinoditā hoti, evameva yathāvuttavīriyavekhadānena tā vedanā satthu
tika-s0102t:494_11: sarīre yathāparicchinnaṃ kālaṃ vikkhambhitā vinoditā ahesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “vikkhambhetvāti
tika-s0102t:494_12: vinodetvā”ti. Jīvitampi jīvitasaṅkhāro kammunā saṅkharīyatīti katvā. Chijjamānaṃ
tika-s0102t:494_13: virodhipaccayasamāyogena payogasampattiyā ghaṭetvā ṭhapīyati. Adhiṭṭhāyāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:494_14: katvā. Tenāha “dasamāse mā uppajjitthāti samāpattiṃ samāpajjī”ti. Taṃ pana “adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:494_15: pavattana”nti ca vattabbataṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ “adhiṭṭhahitvā pavattetvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:495_0: Khaṇikasamāpattīti tādisaṃ pubbābhisaṅkhāraṃ akatvā ṭhānaso samāpajjitabbasamāpatti.
tika-s0102t:495_1: Puna sarīraṃ vedanā ajjhottharati savisesapubbābhisaṅkhārassa akatattā. Rūpasattakaarūpasattakāni
tika-s0102t:495_2: visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu vitthāritanayena veditabbāni. Suṭṭhu vikkhambheti pubbābhisaṅkhārassa
tika-s0102t:495_3: sātisayattā. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Apabyūḷhoti
tika-s0102t:495_4: apanīto. Cuddasahākārehi sannetvāti tesaṃyeva rūpasattakaarūpasattakānaṃ vasena cuddasahi
tika-s0102t:495_6: sinehetvā na uppajjiyeva sammāsambuddhena sātisayasamāpattivegena suvikkhambhitattā.
tika-s0102t:496_0: Gilāno hutvā puna vuṭṭhitoti pubbe gilāno hutvā puna tato gilānabhāvato vuṭṭhito.
tika-s0102t:496_1: Madhurakabhāvo nāma sarīrassa thambhitattaṃ, taṃ pana garubhāvapubbakanti āha “sañjātagarubhāvo
tika-s0102t:496_2: sañjātathaddhabhāvo”ti. “Nānākārato na upaṭṭhahantī”ti iminā disāsammohopi me ahosi
tika-s0102t:496_3: sokabalenāti dasseti. Satipaṭṭhānādidhammāti kāyānupassanādayo anupassanādhammā pubbe
tika-s0102t:496_4: vibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahantāpi idāni mayhaṃ pākaṭā na honti.
tika-s0102t:497_0: 165. Abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma attaniyeva ṭhapanato. Puggalaṃ abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma
tika-s0102t:497_1: samānattatāvasena dhammena pubbe tassa saṅgaṇhato. Daharakāleti attano daharakāle.
tika-s0102t:497_2: Kassaci akathetvāti kassaci attano antevāsikassa upanigūhabhūtaṃ ganthaṃ akathetvā.
tika-s0102t:497_3: Muṭṭhiṃ katvāti muṭṭhigataṃ viya rahasibhūtaṃ katvā. Yasmiṃ vā naṭṭhe sabbo taṃmūlako
tika-s0102t:497_4: dhammo vinassati, so ādito mūlabhūto dhammo, mussati vinassati dhammo etena naṭṭhenāti
tika-s0102t:497_5: muṭṭhi, taṃ tathārūpaṃ muṭṭhiṃ katvā pariharitvā ṭhapitaṃ kiñci natthīti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:498_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uddisitabbaṭṭhenāti “satthā”ti uddisitabbaṭṭhena. Mā vā ahesuṃ bhikkhūti
tika-s0102t:498_3: adhippāyo. “Mā vā ahosī”ti vā pāṭho. Evaṃ na hotīti “ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”tiādi
tika-s0102t:498_4: ākārena cittappavatti na hoti. “Pacchimavayaanuppattabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vutta”nti iminā
tika-s0102t:498_5: vayo viya buddhakiccampi pariyositakammanti dīpeti. Sakaṭassa bāhappadese daḷhībhāvāya
tika-s0102t:498_6: veṭhadānaṃ bāhabandho. Cakkanemisandhīnaṃ daḷhībhāvāya veṭhadānaṃ cakkabandho.
tika-s0102t:499_0: Tamatthanti veṭhamissakena maññeti vuttamatthaṃ. Rūpādayo eva dhammā saviggaho viya
tika-s0102t:499_1: upaṭṭhānato rūpanimittādayo, tesaṃ rūpanimittādīnaṃ. Lokiyānaṃ vedanānanti yāsaṃ
tika-s0102t:499_2: nirodhanena phalasamāpatti samāpajjitabbā, tāsaṃ nirodhā phāsu hoti, tathā bāḷhavedanābhitunnasarīrassāpi.
tika-s0102t:499_3: Tadatthāyāti phalasamāpattivihāratthāya. Dvīhi bhāgehi āpo gato etthāti dīpo, oghena
tika-s0102t:499_4: parigato hutvā anajjhotthaṭo bhūmibhāgo, idha pana catūhipi oghehi, saṃsāramahogheneva
tika-s0102t:499_5: vā anajjhotthaṭo attā “dīpo”ti adhippeto. Tenāha “mahāsamuddagatā”tiādi. Attassaraṇāti
tika-s0102t:499_6: attappaṭisaraṇā. Attagatikā vāti attaparāyaṇāva. Mā aññagatikāti aññaṃ kiñci gatiṃ
tika-s0102t:499_7: paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ mā cintayittha. Kasmā? Attā nāmettha paramatthato dhammo abbhantaraṭṭhena,
tika-s0102t:499_8: so evaṃ sampādito tumhākaṃ dīpaṃ tāṇaṃ gati parāyaṇanti. Tena vuttaṃ “dhammadīpā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:499_9: Tathā cāha “attā hi attano nātho, ko hi nātho paro siyā”ti upadesamattameva hi parasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:499_10: paṭibaddhaṃ, aññā sabbā sampatti purisassa attādhīnā eva. Tenāha bhagavā “tumhehi
tika-s0102t:499_11: kiccaṃ ātappaṃ, akkhātāro tathāgatā”ti. Tamaggeti tamayogassa agge tassa atikkantābhāvato.
tika-s0102t:499_12: Tenevāha “ime aggatamā”tiādi. Mamāti mama sāsane. Sabbepi te catusatipaṭṭhānagocarā
tika-s0102t:499_13: vāti catubbidhaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā tadeva gocaraṃ attano pavattiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:499_14: katvā ṭhitā eva bhikkhū agge bhavissanti.
tika-s0102t:502_0: 166. Anekavāraṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati, tasmā imaṃ vesālippavesanaṃ niyametvā
tika-s0102t:502_1: dassetuṃ “kadā pāvisī”ti pucchitvā āgamanato paṭṭhāya taṃ dassento “bhagavā kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:502_2: Āgatamaggenevāti pubbe yāva veḷuvagāmakā āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattento. Yathāparicchedenāti
tika-s0102t:502_3: yathāparicchinnakālena. Tatoti phalasamāpattito. Ayanti idāni vuccamānākāro. Divāṭṭhānolokanādi
tika-s0102t:502_4: parinibbānassa ekantikabhāvadassanaṃ. Ossaṭṭhoti vissaṭṭho āyusaṅkhāro “sattāhameva mayā jīvitabba”nti.
tika-s0102t:504_0: Paṭipādessāmīti maggapaṭipattiyā niyojessāmi. Maṇiphalaketi maṇikhacite pamukhe atthataphalake.
tika-s0102t:504_1: Taṃ paṭhamaṃ dassananti yaṃ veḷuvane paribbājakarūpena āgatassa siddhaṃ dassanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:504_2: taṃ paṭhamadassanaṃ. Yaṃ vā anomadassissa bhagavato vacanaṃ saddahantena tadā abhinīhārakāle
tika-s0102t:504_3: paccakkhato viya tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ siddhaṃ, taṃ paṭhamadassanaṃ. Paccāgamanacārikanti
tika-s0102t:505_0: Sattāhanti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Therassa jātovarakagehaṃ kira itaragehato
tika-s0102t:505_2: paṭijaggathā”ti vuttaṃ. Soti uparevato. Taṃ pavattinti tattha vasitukāmatāya vuttaṃ taṃ.
tika-s0102t:506_0: “Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchantī”ti iminā nīhārena thero “ke tumhe”ti pucchi. “Tvaṃ
tika-s0102t:506_1: catūhi mahārājehi mahantataro”ti puṭṭho attano mahattaṃ satthu upari pakkhipanto
tika-s0102t:506_2: “ārāmikasadisā ete upāsike amhākaṃ satthuno”ti āha. Sāvakasampattikittanampi hi atthato
tika-s0102t:507: Sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāyāti therassa desanānubhāvena, attano ca upanissayasampattiyā ñāṇassa paripakkattā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā.
tika-s0102t:508: Ayanti yathāvuttā. Etthāti “vesāliṃ piṇḍāya pāvisī”ti etasmiṃ vesālīpavese. Anupubbīkathāti anupubbadīpanī kathā.
tika-s0102t:509_0: 167. Udenayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāneti udenassa nāma yakkhassa āyatanabhāvena iṭṭhakāhi
tika-s0102t:509_1: cite mahājanassa cittīkataṭṭhāne. Katavihāroti bhagavantaṃ uddissa katavihāro. Vuccatīti
tika-s0102t:509_3: ādīsupi. Eseva nayoti cetiyaṭṭhāne katavihārabhāvaṃ atidisati. Vaḍḍhitāti bhāvanāpāripūrivasena
tika-s0102t:509_4: paribrūhitā. Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā. Yuttayānaṃ
tika-s0102t:509_5: viya katāti yathā yuttaṃ ājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati,
tika-s0102t:509_6: evaṃ yathārucipavattirahataṃ gamitā. Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena. Vatthu
tika-s0102t:509_7: viya katāti sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisayatāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu
tika-s0102t:509_8: viya katā. Adhiṭṭhitāti paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato subhāvitabhāvena taṃtaṃadhiṭṭhānayogyatāya
tika-s0102t:509_9: ṭhapitā. Samantato citāti sabbabhāgena bhāvanupacayaṃ gamitā. Tenāha “suvaḍḍhitā”ti.
tika-s0102t:509_10: Suṭṭhu samāraddhāti iddhibhāvanāya sikhāppattiyā sammadeva saṃsevitā.
tika-s0102t:510_1: niyametvā. Āyuppamāṇanti paramāyuppamāṇaṃ vadati, tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:510_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Mahāsivatthero pana “mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave paṭisandhidāyino
tika-s0102t:510_3: kammassa asaṅkhyeyyāyukatāsaṃvattanasamatthataṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ āyusaṅkhārassa
tika-s0102t:510_4: parissayavikkhambhanasamatthatā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā evāti imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyyā”ti
tika-s0102t:510_5: avoca. “Khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyatī”ti etena yathā iddhibalena jarāya na paṭighāto,
tika-s0102t:510_6: evaṃ tena maraṇassapi na paṭighātoti atthato āpannamevāti. “Kva saro khitto, kva
tika-s0102t:510_7: ca nipatito”ti aññathā vuṭṭhitenāpi theravādena aṭṭhakathāvacanameva samatthitanti
tika-s0102t:511_0: Pariyuṭṭhitacittoti yathā kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ abhibhūtacitto.
tika-s0102t:511_1: So pana abhibhavo mahatā udakoghena appakassa udakassa ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya ahosīti
tika-s0102t:511_2: vuttaṃ “ajjhotthaṭacitto”ti. Aññopīti therato, ariyehi vā aññopi yo koci puthujjano.
tika-s0102t:511_3: Puthujjanaggahaṇañcettha yathā sabbena sabbaṃ appahīnavipallāso mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto
tika-s0102t:511_4: kiñci atthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ thero bhagavatā kataṃ nimittobhāsaṃ sabbaso
tika-s0102t:511_5: na sallakkhesīti dassanatthaṃ. Tenāha “māro hī”tiādi. Cattāro vipallāsāti asubhe
tika-s0102t:511_7: ime cattāro vipallāsā. Tenāti yadipi itare aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā, tathāpi yathāvuttānaṃ
tika-s0102t:511_8: catunnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ appahīnabhāvena. Assāti therassa. Maddatīti phusanamattena
tika-s0102t:511_9: maddanto viya hoti, aññathā tena maddite sattānaṃ maraṇameva siyā. Kiṃ sakkhissati,
tika-s0102t:511_10: na sakkhissatīti adhippāyo. Kasmā na sakkhissati, nanu esa aggasāvakassa kucchiṃ
tika-s0102t:511_11: paviṭṭhoti? Saccaṃ paviṭṭho, tañca kho attano ānubhāvadassanatthaṃ, na vibādhanādhippāyena.
tika-s0102t:511_12: Vibādhanādhippāyena pana idha “kiṃ sakkhissatī”ti vuttaṃ hadayamaddanassa adhigatattā.
tika-s0102t:511_13: Nimittobhāsanti ettha “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya
tika-s0102t:511_14: “yassa kassaci ānanda cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena
tika-s0102t:511_15: kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvasena saññuppādanaṃ nimittaṃ, tathā pana pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā
tika-s0102t:511_16: ujukaṃyeva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ obhāso. Jānantoyeva vāti mārena pariyuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ
tika-s0102t:511_17: jānanto eva. Attano aparādhahetuto sattānaṃ soko tanuko hoti, na balavāti āha “dosāropanena
tika-s0102t:511_18: sokatanukaraṇattha”nti. Kiṃ pana thero mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittakāle pavattiṃ pacchā
tika-s0102t:511_19: jānātīti? Na jānāti sabhāvena, buddhānubhāvena pana anujānāti.
tika-s0102t:513_0: 168. Anatthe niyojento guṇamāraṇena māreti, virāgavibandhanena vā jātinimittatāya
tika-s0102t:513_1: tattha tattha jātaṃ jātaṃ mārento viya hotīti “māretīti māro”ti vuttaṃ. Ativiya pāpatāya
tika-s0102t:513_2: pāpimā. Kaṇhadhammehi samannāgato kaṇho. Virāgādiguṇānaṃ antakaraṇato antako. Sattānaṃ
tika-s0102t:513_3: anatthāvahapaṭipattiṃ na muccatīti namuci. Attano mārapāsena pamatte bandhati, pamattā
tika-s0102t:513_4: vā bandhū etassāti pamattabandhu. Sattamasattāhato paraṃ satta ahāni sandhāyāha “aṭṭhame
tika-s0102t:513_5: sattāhe”ti na pana pallaṅkasattāhādi viya niyatakiccassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma labbhanato.
tika-s0102t:513_6: Sattamasattāhassa hi parato ajapālanigrodhamūle mahābrahmuno, sakkassa ca devarañño
tika-s0102t:513_7: paṭiññātadhammadesanaṃ bhagavantaṃ ñatvā “idāni satte dhammadesanāya mama visayaṃ
tika-s0102t:513_8: atikkamāpessatī”ti sañjātadomanasso hutvā ṭhito cintesi “handa dānāhaṃ naṃ upāyena
tika-s0102t:513_9: parinibbāpessāmi, evamassa manoratho aññathattaṃ gamissati, mama ca manoratho ijjhissatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:513_10: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃ antaṃ ṭhito “parinibbātu dāni bhante
tika-s0102t:513_11: bhagavā”tiādinā parinibbānaṃ yāci, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “aṭṭhame sattāhe”tiādi. Tattha
tika-s0102t:513_12: ajjāti āyusaṅkhārossajjanadivasaṃ sandhāyāha. Bhagavā cassa abhisandhiṃ jānantopi
tika-s0102t:513_13: taṃ anāvikatvā parinibbānassa akālabhāvameva pakāsento yācanaṃ paṭikkhipi. Tenāha “na tāvāha”ntiādi.
tika-s0102t:514_0: Maggavasena viyattāti saccasampaṭivedhaveyyattiyena byattā. Tatheva vinītāti maggavasena
tika-s0102t:514_1: kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayanena vinītā. Tathā visāradāti ariyamaggādhigameneva satthusāsane
tika-s0102t:514_3: visāradabhāvaṃ pattāti attho. Yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0102t:514_4: taṃ idha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena “suta”nti adhippetanti āha “tepiṭakavasenā”ti. Tiṇṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:514_5: piṭakānaṃ samūho tepiṭakaṃ, tīṇi vā piṭakāni tipiṭakaṃ, tipiṭakameva tepiṭakaṃ, tassa
tika-s0102t:514_6: vasena. Tamevāti yaṃ taṃ tepiṭakaṃ sotabbabhāvena “suta”nti vuttaṃ, tameva. Dhammanti
tika-s0102t:514_7: pariyattidhammaṃ. Dhārentīti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantaṃ
tika-s0102t:514_8: katvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti. Iti pariyattidhammavasena
tika-s0102t:514_9: bahussutadhammadharabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni paṭivedhadhammavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “atha
tika-s0102t:514_10: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ariyadhammassāti maggaphaladhammassa, navavidhassāpi vā lokuttaradhammassa.
tika-s0102t:514_11: Anudhammabhūtanti adhigamāya anurūpadhammabhūtaṃ. Anucchavikapaṭipadanti ca tameva
tika-s0102t:514_12: vipassanādhammamāha, chabbidhā visuddhiyo vā. Anudhammanti tassā yathāvuttapaṭipadāya
tika-s0102t:514_13: anurūpaṃ abhisallekhitaṃ appicchatādidhammaṃ. Caraṇasīlāti samādāya pavattanasīlā.
tika-s0102t:514_14: Anu maggaphaladhammo etissāti vā anudhammā, vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā, tassā caraṇasīlā.
tika-s0102t:514_15: Attano ācariyavādanti attano ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa vādaṃ. Sadevakassa lokassa
tika-s0102t:514_16: ācārasikkhāpanena ācariyo, bhagavā. Tassa vādo, catusaccadesanā.
tika-s0102t:515_0: Ācikkhissantīti ādito kathessanti, attanā uggahitaniyāmena pare uggaṇhāpessantīti
tika-s0102t:515_1: attho. Desessantīti vācessanti, pāḷiṃ sammā pabodhessantīti attho. Paññāpessantīti
tika-s0102t:515_2: pajānāpessanti, saṅkāpessantīti attho. Paṭṭhapessantīti pakārehi ṭhapessanti, pakāsessantīti
tika-s0102t:515_3: attho. Vivarissantīti vivaṭaṃ karissanti. Vibhajissantīti vibhattaṃ karissanti. Uttāniṃ
tika-s0102t:515_4: karissantīti anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti. Saha dhammenāti ettha
tika-s0102t:515_5: dhamma-saddo kāraṇapariyāyo “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viyāti āha
tika-s0102t:515_6: “sahetukena sakāraṇena vacanenā”ti. Sappāṭihāriyanti sanissaraṇaṃ, yathā paravādaṃ
tika-s0102t:515_7: bhañjitvā sakavādo patiṭṭhahati, evaṃ hetudāharaṇehi yathādhigatamatthaṃ sampādetvā
tika-s0102t:515_8: dhammaṃ kathessanti. Tenāha “niyyānikaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desessantī”ti, navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ
tika-s0102t:515_9: pabodhessantīti attho. Ettha ca “paññāpessantī”tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni
tika-s0102t:515_10: dassitāni, ādito pana dvīhi padehi cha byañjanapadāni. Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ
tika-s0102t:515_11: saṃvaṇṇanānayena saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ nettiyaṃ “dvādasapadāni suttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:516_1: anavasesaṃ satthusāsanabhūtaṃ seṭṭhacariyaṃ. Samiddhanti sammadeva vaḍḍhitaṃ. Jhānassādavasenāti
tika-s0102t:516_2: tehi tehi bhikkhūhi samadhigatajhānasukhavasena. Vuddhippattanti uḷārapaṇītabhāvagamanena
tika-s0102t:516_3: sabbaso parivuddhiṃ upagataṃ. Sabbapāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāsampattivasena abhiññāsampadāhi
tika-s0102t:516_5: attho. Paṭivedhavasena bahuno janassa hitanti bāhujaññaṃ. Tenāha “bahujanābhisamayavasenā”ti.
tika-s0102t:516_6: Puthu puthulaṃ bhūtaṃ jātaṃ, puthu vā puthuttaṃ bhūtaṃ pattanti puthubhūtaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0102t:516_7: “sabbākāra…pe… patta”nti. Suṭṭhu pakāsitanti suṭṭhu sammadeva ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paveditaṃ.
tika-s0102t:518_0: 169. Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvāti ayaṃ kāyādivibhāgo attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro mayā
tika-s0102t:518_1: ettakaṃ kālaṃ vahito, idāni pana na vahitabbo, etassa avahanatthaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ
tika-s0102t:518_2: ariyamaggasambhāro sambhato, svāyaṃ ariyamaggo paṭividdho, yato ime kāyādayo asubhādito
tika-s0102t:518_3: sammadeva pariññātā, catubbidhampi sammāsatiṃ yathātathaṃ visaye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0102t:518_4: katvā. Ñāṇena paricchinditvāti yasmā imassa attabhāvasaññitassa dukkhabhārassa vahane
tika-s0102t:518_5: payojanabhūtaṃ attahitaṃ tāva mahābodhimūle eva parisamāpitaṃ, parahitaṃ pana buddhaveneyyavinayanaṃ
tika-s0102t:518_6: parisamāpitabbaṃ, taṃ idāni māsattayeneva parisamāpanaṃ pāpuṇissati, tasmā abhāsi
tika-s0102t:518_8: nicchayaṃ katvā. Āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajjīti āyuno jīvitassa abhisaṅkhārakaṃ phalasamāpattidhammaṃ
tika-s0102t:518_9: “na samāpajjissāmī”ti vissajji taṃvissajjaneneva tena abhisaṅkhariyamānaṃ jīvitasaṅkhāraṃ
tika-s0102t:518_11: mahanto pathavīkampo. Tattha ṭhānamahantatāya bhūmicālassa mahattaṃ dassetuṃ “tadā
tika-s0102t:518_12: kira…pe… kampitthā”ti vuttaṃ. Sā pana jātikkhettabhūtā dasasahassī lokadhātu eva,
tika-s0102t:518_13: na yā kāci, yā mahābhinīhāramahājātiādīsupi kampittha. Tadāpi tattikāya eva kampane
tika-s0102t:518_14: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Jātikkhettabhāvena tasseva ādito pariggahassa katattā. Pariggahakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:518_15: cassa dhammatāvasena veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi purimabuddhānampi tāvatakameva jātikkhettaṃ
tika-s0102t:518_16: ahosi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “dasasahassī lokadhātū, nissaddā honti nirākulā…pe… mahāsamuddo
tika-s0102t:518_17: ābhujati, dasasahassī pakampatī”ti ca ādi. Udakapariyantaṃ katvā chappakārapavedhanena
tika-s0102t:518_18: avītarāge bhiṃsetīti bhiṃsano, so eva bhiṃsanakoti āha “bhayajanako”ti. Devabheriyoti
tika-s0102t:518_19: devadundubhisaddassa pariyāyavacanamattaṃ. Na cettha kāci bherī “devadundubhī”ti
tika-s0102t:518_20: adhippetā, atha kho uppātabhāvena labbhamāno ākāsagato nigghosasaddo. Tenāha “devo”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:518_21: Devoti megho. Tassa hi acchabhāvena ākāsassa vassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite sadde
tika-s0102t:519_0: Pītivegavissaṭṭhanti “evaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ vahito ayaṃ attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro,
tika-s0102t:519_1: idāni na cirasseva nikkhipissatī”ti sañjātasomanasso bhagavā sabhāveneva pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0102t:519_2: udānaṃ udānesi. Evaṃ pana udānentena ayampi attho sādhito hotīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:520_0: Tulīyatīti tulanti tula-saddo kammasādhanoti dassetuṃ “tulita”nti vuttaṃ. Appānubhāvatāya
tika-s0102t:520_1: paricchinnaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ parito khaṇḍitabhāvena “paritta”nti vuccati. Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato
tika-s0102t:520_2: dīghasantānatāya, vipulaphalatāya ca na tulaṃ na paricchinnaṃ. Yehi kāraṇehi pubbe
tika-s0102t:520_3: avisesato mahaggataṃ “atula”nti vuttaṃ, tāni kāraṇāni rūpāvacarato āruppassa sātisayāni
tika-s0102t:520_4: vijjantīti “arūpāvacaraṃ atula”nti vuttaṃ, itarañca “tula”nti, appavipākaṃ tīsupi
tika-s0102t:520_5: kammesu yaṃ tanuvipākaṃ hīnaṃ, taṃ tulaṃ. Bahuvipākanti yaṃ mahāvipākaṃ paṇītaṃ,
tika-s0102t:520_6: taṃ atulaṃ. Yaṃ panettha majjhimaṃ, taṃ hīnaṃ, ukkaṭṭhanti dvidhā bhinditvā dvīsu
tika-s0102t:520_7: bhāgesu pakkhipitabbaṃ. Hīnattikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva appabahuvipākataṃ niddhāretvā
tika-s0102t:520_8: tassa vasena tulātulabhāvo veditabbo. Sambhavati etasmāti sambhavoti āha “sambhavassa
tika-s0102t:520_10: ca nirato. Savipākaṃ samānaṃ pavattivipākamattadāyikammaṃ savipākaṭṭhena sambhavaṃ.
tika-s0102t:520_11: Na ca taṃ kāmādibhavābhisaṅkhārakanti tato visesanatthaṃ “sambhava”nti vatvā “bhavasaṅkhāra”nti
tika-s0102t:520_12: vuttaṃ. Ossajjīti ariyamaggena avassajji. Kavacaṃ viya attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā
tika-s0102t:520_13: ṭhitaṃ attani sambhūtattā attasambhavaṃ kilesañca abhindīti kilesabhedasahabhāvikammossajjanaṃ
tika-s0102t:521_0: Tīrentoti “uppādo bhayaṃ, anuppādo khema”ntiādinā vīmaṃsanto. “Tulento tīrento”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:521_1: saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “pañcakkhandhā”ti ādiṃ vatvā bhavasaṅkhārassa
tika-s0102t:521_2: avassajjanākāraṃ sarūpato dassesi. “Eva”ntiādinā pana udānavaṇṇanāyaṃ ādito vuttamatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:523_0: 171. Yanti karaṇe vā adhikaraṇe vā paccattavacananti adhippāyena āha “yena samayena,
tika-s0102t:523_1: yasmiṃ vā samaye”ti. Ukkhepakavātāti udakasandhārakavātaṃ upacchinditvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato
tika-s0102t:523_2: khepakavātā. “Saṭṭhi…pe… bahala”nti idaṃ tassa vātassa ubbedhappamāṇameva gahetvā
tika-s0102t:523_4: upacchindatiyeva. Ākāseti pubbe vātena patiṭṭhitokāse. Puna vātoti ukkhepakavāte
tika-s0102t:523_5: tathākatvā vigate udakasandhārakavāto puna ābandhitvā gaṇhāti yathā taṃ udakaṃ na
tika-s0102t:523_6: bhassati, evaṃ utthambhentaṃ ābandhanavitānavasena bandhitvā gaṇhāti. Tato udakaṃ
tika-s0102t:523_7: uggacchatīti tato ābandhitvā gahaṇato tena vātena utthambhitaṃ udakaṃ uggacchati
tika-s0102t:523_8: upari gacchati. Hotiyevāti antarantarā hotiyeva. Bahalabhāvenāti mahāpathaviyā mahantabhāvena.
tika-s0102t:523_9: Sakalā hi mahāpathavī tadā oggacchati, uggacchati ca, tasmā kampanaṃ na paññāyati.
tika-s0102t:524_1: paṭiladdhamattā nātisubhāvitā. Tathā ca bhāvanā balavatī na hotīti āha “dubbalā”ti.
tika-s0102t:524_2: Saññāsīsena hi bhāvanā vuttā. Appamāṇāti paguṇā subhāvitā. Sā hi thirā daḷhatarā
tika-s0102t:524_3: hotīti āha “balavā”ti. “Parittā pathavīsaññā, appamāṇā āposaññā”ti desanāmattameva,
tika-s0102t:524_4: āposaññāya pana subhāvitāya pathavīkampo sukheneva ijjhatīti ayamettha adhippāyo
tika-s0102t:524_5: veditabbo. Saṃvejento dibbasampattiyā pamattaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ. Vīmaṃsanto vā
tika-s0102t:524_6: tāvadeva samadhigataṃ attano iddhibalaṃ. Mahāmoggallānattherassa pāsādakampanaṃ pākaṭanti
tika-s0102t:524_7: taṃ anāmasitvā saṅgharakkhitasāmaṇerassa pāsādakampanaṃ dassetuṃ “so kirāyasmā”tiādi
tika-s0102t:524_8: vuttaṃ. Pūtimisso gandho etassāti pūtigandho, tena pūtigandheneva adhigatamātukucchisambhavaṃ
tika-s0102t:524_9: viya gandheneva sīsena, ativiya dārako evāti attho.
tika-s0102t:525_0: Ācariyanti ācariyūpadesaṃ. Iddhābhisaṅkhāro nāma iddhividhappaṭipakkhādībhāvena icchitabbo,
tika-s0102t:525_1: so ca upāye kosallassa attanā na sammā uggahitattā na tāva sikkhitoti āha “asikkhitvāva
tika-s0102t:525_2: yuddhaṃ paviṭṭhosī”ti. “Pilavanta”nti iminā sakalameva pāsādavatthuṃ udakaṃ katvā
tika-s0102t:525_3: adhiṭṭhātabbapāsādova tattha pilavatīti dasseti. Adhiṭṭhānakkamaṃ pana upamāya dassento
tika-s0102t:525_4: “tāta…pe… jānāhī”ti āha. Tattha kapallakapūvanti āsittakapūvaṃ, taṃ pacantā kapāle
tika-s0102t:525_5: paṭhamaṃ kiñci piṭṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā anukkamena vaḍḍhetvā antantena paricchindanti pūvaṃ
tika-s0102t:525_6: samantato paricchinnaṃ katvā ṭhapenti, evaṃ “āpokasiṇavasena ‘pāsādena patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:525_7: udakaṃ hotū’ti adhiṭṭhahanto samantato pāsādassa yāva pariyantā yathā udakaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:526_0: Mahāpadāne vuttamevāti “dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yadā bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā
tika-s0102t:526_1: mātukucchiṃ okkamatī”ti vatvā “ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati
tika-s0102t:526_2: sampavedhatī”ti, tathā “dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yadā bodhisatto mātukucchimhā nikkhamatī”ti
tika-s0102t:526_3: vatvā “ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhatī”ti ca mahābodhisattassa
tika-s0102t:526_5: itaresupi catūsu ṭhānesu pathavīkampo dhammatāvasenevāti mahāpadāneatthato vuttaṃ evāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:527_0: Idāni nesaṃ pathavīkampanaṃ kāraṇato, pavattiākārato ca vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “iti imesū”tiādi
tika-s0102t:527_1: vuttaṃ. Dhātukopenāti ukkhepakadhātusaṅkhātāya vāyodhātuyā pakopena. Iddhānubhāvenāti
tika-s0102t:527_2: ñāṇiddhiyā vā kammavipākajiddhiyā vā pabhāvena, tejenāti attho. Puññatejenāti puññānubhāvena,
tika-s0102t:527_3: mahābodhisattassa puññabalenāti attho. Ñāṇatejenāti paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvena. Sādhukāradānavasenāti
tika-s0102t:527_4: yathā anaññasādhāraṇena paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvena abhihatā mahāpathavī abhisambodhiyaṃ
tika-s0102t:527_5: akampittha, evaṃ anaññasādhāraṇena desanāñāṇānubhāvena abhihatā mahāpathavī akampittha,
tika-s0102t:527_6: taṃ panassā sādhukāradānaṃ viya hotīti “sādhukāradānavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:528_2: paramukkaṃsagato asamo asamasamo appaṭipuggalo arahaṃ sammāsambuddho attano attabhāvasaññitaṃ
tika-s0102t:528_3: khandhapañcakaṃ kappaṃ vā kappāvasesaṃ vā ṭhapetuṃ samatthopi saṅkhatadhammaṃ paṭijigucchanākārappavattena
tika-s0102t:528_4: ñāṇavisesena tiṇāyapi amaññamāno āyusaṅkhārossajjanavidhinā nirapekkho ossajji. Tadanubhāvābhihatā
tika-s0102t:528_5: mahāpathavī āyusaṅkhārossajjane akampittha, taṃ panassā kāruññasabhāvasaṇṭhitā viya
tika-s0102t:528_6: hotīti vuttaṃ “kāruññasabhāvenā”ti. Yasmā bhagavā parinibbānasamaye catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā
tika-s0102t:528_7: samāpattiyo samāpajji antarantarā phalasamāpattisamāpajjanena, tassa pubbabhāge sātisayaṃ
tika-s0102t:528_8: tikkhaṃ sūraṃ vipassanāñāṇañca pavattesi, “yadatthañca mayā evaṃ sucirakālaṃ anaññasādhāraṇo
tika-s0102t:528_9: paramukkaṃsagato ñāṇasambhāro sambhato, anuttaro ca vimokkho samadhigato, tassa vata
tika-s0102t:528_10: me sikhāppattaphalabhūtā accantaniṭṭhā anupādisesanibbānadhātu ajja samijjhatī”ti
tika-s0102t:528_11: bhiyyo ativiya somanassappattassa bhagavato pītivipphārādiguṇavipulatarānubhāvo parehi
tika-s0102t:528_12: asādhāraṇañāṇātisayo udapādi, yassa samāpattibalasamupabrūhitassa ñāṇātisayassa ānubhāvaṃ
tika-s0102t:528_13: sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “dveme piṇḍapātā samasamaphalā samasamavipākā”tiādi, tasmā tassa
tika-s0102t:528_14: ānubhāvena samabhihatā mahāpathavī akampittha. Taṃ panassā tassaṃ velāyaṃ ārodanākārappatti
tika-s0102t:529_0: Idāni saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “mātukucchiṃ okkamante”tiādimāha. Ayaṃ panatthoti
tika-s0102t:529_1: “sādhukāradānavasenā”tiādinā vutto attho. Pathavīdevatāya vasenāti ettha samuddadevatā
tika-s0102t:529_2: viya mahāpathaviyā adhidevatā kira nāma atthi. Tādise kāraṇe sati tassā cittavasena
tika-s0102t:529_3: ayaṃ mahāpathavī saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati, yathā vātavalāhakadevatānaṃ
tika-s0102t:529_4: cittavasena vātā vāyanti, sītuṇhaabbhavassavalāhakadevatānaṃ cittavasena sītādayo
tika-s0102t:529_5: bhavanti. Tathā hi visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ abhisambodhiatthaṃ bodhirukkhamūle nisinnassa
tika-s0102t:532_0: Vacanasamanantaraṃ mahāpathavī bhijjitvā saparisaṃ māraṃ parivattesi. Etanti sādhukāradānādi.
tika-s0102t:532_1: Yadipi natthi acetanattā, dhammatāvasena pana vuttanayena siyāti sakkā vattuṃ. Dhammatā
tika-s0102t:532_2: pana atthato dhammasabhāvo, so puññadhammassa vā ñāṇadhammassa vā ānubhāvasabhāvoti.
tika-s0102t:536_0: Niddiṭṭhanidassananti niddiṭṭhassa atthassa niyyātanaṃ, nigamananti attho. Ettāvatāti
tika-s0102t:536_1: pathavīkampādiuppādajananena ceva pathavīkampassa bhagavato hetunidassanena ca. “Addhā
tika-s0102t:536_2: ajja bhagavatā āyusaṅkhāro ossaṭṭho”ti sallakkhesi pārisesañāyena. Evañhi tadā thero
tika-s0102t:536_3: tamatthaṃ vīmaṃseyya nāyaṃ bhūmikampo dhātuppakopahetuko tassa apaññāyamānarūpattā,
tika-s0102t:536_4: bāhirakopi isi evaṃ mahānubhāvo buddhakāle natthi, sāsanikopi satthu anārocetvā evaṃ
tika-s0102t:536_5: karonto nāma natthi, sesānaṃ pañcannaṃ idāni asambhavo, evaṃ bhūmikampo cāyaṃ mahābhiṃsanako
tika-s0102t:536_6: salomahaṃso ahosi, tasmā pārisesato āha “ajja bhagavatā āyusaṅkhāro ossaṭṭhoti sallakkhesī”ti.
tika-s0102t:538_0: 172. Okāsaṃ adatvāti “tiṭṭhatu bhante bhagavā kappa”ntiādi nayappavattāya therassa
tika-s0102t:538_1: āyācanāya avasaraṃ adatvā. Aññānipi aṭṭhakāni sampiṇḍento hetuaṭṭhakato aññāni parisābhibhāyatanavimokkhavasena
tika-s0102t:538_2: tīṇi aṭṭhakāni saṅgahetvā dassento “aṭṭha kho imā”tiādimāha. “Āyasmato ānandassa
tika-s0102t:538_3: sokuppattiṃ pariharanto vikkhepaṃ karonto”ti keci sahasā bhaṇite balavasoko uppajjeyyāti.
tika-s0102t:539_0: Samāgantabbato, samāgacchatīti vā samāgamo, parisā. Bimbisārapamukho samāgamo bimbisārasamāgamo.
tika-s0102t:539_1: Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Bimbisāra…pe… samāgamādisadisaṃ khattiyaparisanti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:539_2: Aññesu cakkavāḷesupi labbhateyeva satthu khattiyaparisādiupasaṅkamanaṃ. Ādito tehi
tika-s0102t:539_3: saddhiṃ satthu bhāsanaṃ ālāpo. Kathanapaṭikathanaṃ sallāpo. Dhammupasañhitā pucchā
tika-s0102t:539_4: paṭipucchā dhammasākacchā. Saṇṭhānaṃ paṭicca kathanaṃ saṇṭhānapariyāyattā vaṇṇa-saddassa
tika-s0102t:539_6: “tesampi lakkhaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ viya satthu sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ, tesaṃ kevalaṃ paññāyati evā”ti.
tika-s0102t:539_7: Nāpi āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalo bhagavā hotīti yojanā. Chinnassarāti dvidhābhūtassarā. Gaggarassarāti
tika-s0102t:539_8: jajjaritassarā. Bhāsantaranti tesaṃ sattānaṃ bhāsato aññaṃ bhāsaṃ. Vīmaṃsāti cintanā.
tika-s0102t:539_9: “Kimatthaṃ…pe… desetī”ti idaṃ nanu attānaṃ jānāpetvā dhamme kathite tesaṃ sātisayo
tika-s0102t:539_10: pasādo hotīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ? Yesaṃ attānaṃ ajānāpetvāva dhamme kathite
tika-s0102t:539_11: pasādo hoti, na jānāpetvā, tādise sandhāya satthā tathā karoti. Tattha payojanamāha
tika-s0102t:539_12: “vāsanatthāyā”ti. Evaṃ sutopīti evaṃ aviññātadesako aviññātāgamanopi suto dhammo
tika-s0102t:539_13: attano dhammasudhammatāyeva anāgate paccayo hoti suṇantassa.
tika-s0102t:540: “Ānandā”tiādiko saṅgītianāruḷho pāḷidhammo eva tathā dassito. Esa nayo ito paresupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0102t:542_0: 173. Abhibhavatīti abhibhu, parikammaṃ, ñāṇaṃ vā. Abhibhu āyatanaṃ etassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:542_1: jhānaṃ. Abhibhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ etassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ. Ārammaṇābhibhavanato
tika-s0102t:542_2: abhibhu ca taṃ āyatanañca yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato
tika-s0102t:542_3: vātipi sasampayuttaṃ jhānaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ. Tenāha “abhibhavanakāraṇānī”tiādi. Tāni
tika-s0102t:542_4: hīti abhibhāyatanasaññitāni jhānāni. “Puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāyā”ti idaṃ ubhayatthāpi
tika-s0102t:542_5: yojetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Paṭipakkhabhāvena paccanīkadhamme abhibhavanti puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāya
tika-s0102t:542_6: ārammaṇāni abhibhavanti. Ñāṇabaleneva hi ārammaṇābhibhavanaṃ viya paṭipakkhābhibhavo pīti.
tika-s0102t:543_0: Parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī, na appanāvasena. Na hi paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā
tika-s0102t:543_1: appanā ajjhattavisayā sambhavati, taṃ pana ajjhattaparikammavasena laddhaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ
tika-s0102t:543_2: avisuddhameva hoti, na bahiddhāparikammavasena laddhaṃ viya visuddhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:544_1: vaṇṇavasena ābhoge vijjamānepi parittavaseneva idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ. Parittatā
tika-s0102t:544_2: hettha abhibhavanassa kāraṇaṃ. Vaṇṇābhoge satipi asatipi abhibhāyatanabhāvanā nāma
tika-s0102t:544_3: tikkhapaññasseva sambhavati, na itarassāti āha “ñāṇuttariko puggalo”ti. Abhibhavitvā
tika-s0102t:544_5: appanājhānuppādananti āha “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī”ti. Saha nimittuppādenāti
tika-s0102t:544_6: ca appanāparivāsābhāvassa lakkhaṇaṃ vacanametaṃ. Yo “khippābhiñño”ti vuccati, tatopi
tika-s0102t:544_7: ñāṇuttarasseva abhibhāyatanabhāvanā. Etthāti etasmiṃ nimitte. Appanaṃ pāpetīti bhāvanaṃ appanaṃ neti.
tika-s0102t:545_0: Ettha ca keci “uppanne upacārajjhāne taṃ ārabbha ye heṭṭhimantena dve tayo javanavārā
tika-s0102t:545_1: pavattanti, te upacārajjhānapakkhikā eva, tadanantarañca bhavaṅgaparivāsena, upacārāsevanāya
tika-s0102t:545_2: ca vinā appanā hoti, saha nimittuppādeneva appanaṃ pāpetī”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ.
tika-s0102t:545_3: Na hi parivāsitaparikammena appanāvāro icchito, nāpi mahaggatappamāṇajjhānesu viya
tika-s0102t:545_4: upacārajjhāne ekantato paccavekkhaṇā icchitabbā, tasmā upacārajjhānādhigamanato paraṃ
tika-s0102t:545_6: pāpetī”ti vutto. Saha nimittuppādenevāti ca adhippāyikamidaṃ vacanaṃ, na nītatthaṃ,
tika-s0102t:545_7: adhippāyo vuttanayeneva veditabbo, na antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathārūpassa ābhogassa
tika-s0102t:545_8: asambhavato. Samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāyavasena jhānakkhaṇe
tika-s0102t:545_9: pavattaṃ abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-s0102t:545_10: “iminā tassa pubbābhogo kathito”ti vuttaṃ. Antosamāpattiyaṃ tathā ābhogābhāve kasmā
tika-s0102t:546_0: Vaḍḍhitappamāṇānīti vipulappamāṇānīti attho, na ekaṅguladvaṅgulādivasena vaḍḍhiṃ
tika-s0102t:546_1: pāpitānīti tathā vaḍḍhanassevettha asambhavato. Tenāha “mahantānī”ti. Bhattavaḍḍhitakanti
tika-s0102t:546_2: bhuñjanabhājanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dinnabhattaṃ, ekāsane purisena bhuñjitabbabhattato upaḍḍhabhattanti attho.
tika-s0102t:547: Rūpe saññā rūpasaññā, sā assa atthīti rūpasaññī, na rūpasaññī arūpasaññī, saññāsīsena jhānaṃ vadati. Rūpasaññāya anuppādanaṃ evettha alābhitā.
tika-s0102t:548_0: Bahiddhāva uppannanti bahiddhā vatthusmiṃyeva uppannaṃ. Abhidhamme pana “ajjhattaṃ
tika-s0102t:548_1: arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni…pe… appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti
tika-s0102t:548_2: evaṃ catunnaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ āgatattā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā pana ‘yathā
tika-s0102t:548_3: suttante ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānītiādi vuttaṃ, evaṃ
tika-s0102t:548_4: avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttā’ti codanaṃ katvā
tika-s0102t:548_5: ‘ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato’ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā, tattha vā hi idha vā bahiddhā
tika-s0102t:548_6: rūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni, tasmā tāni niyamato vattabbānīti tatrāpi idhāpi vuttāni.
tika-s0102t:548_7: ‘Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī’ti idaṃ pana satthu desanāvilāsamattamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca
tika-s0102t:548_8: vaṇṇābhogarahitāni, sahitāni ca sabbāni parittāni “parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti
tika-s0102t:548_9: vuttāni, tathā appamāṇāni “appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti. Atthi hi so pariyāyo
tika-s0102t:548_10: parittāni abhibhuyya tāni ce kadāci vaṇṇavasena ābhujitāni honti, suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni
tika-s0102t:548_11: abhibhuyyāti. Pariyāyakathā hi suttantadesanāti. Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā
tika-s0102t:548_12: vaṇṇābhogarahitāni visuṃ vuttāni, tathā sahitāni. Atthi hi ubhayattha abhibhavanavisesoti.
tika-s0102t:548_13: Tathā idha pariyāyadesanattā vimokkhānampi abhibhavanapariyāyo atthīti “ajjhattaṃ
tika-s0102t:548_15: dutiyavimokkho, vaṇṇābhibhāyatanesu tatiyavimokkho ca abhibhavanappavattito saṅgahito.
tika-s0102t:548_16: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vimokkhe
tika-s0102t:548_17: vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni; sabbāni ca vimokkhakiccāni jhānāni vimokkhadesanāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:548_18: vuttāni. Tadetaṃ “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”ti āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa abhidhamme
tika-s0102t:548_20: vavatthānaṃ katanti viññāyati. “Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti idaṃ katthacipi
tika-s0102t:548_21: “ajjhattaṃ rūpāni passatī”ti avatvā sabbattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti,
tika-s0102t:548_22: tassa kāraṇavacanaṃ, tena yaṃ aññahetukaṃ, taṃ tena hetunā vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana desanāvilāsahetukaṃ
tika-s0102t:548_23: ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāya eva abhidhamme vacanaṃ, na tassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ maggitabbanti
tika-s0102t:548_24: dasseti. Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatā ca tesaṃ bahiddhā rūpānaṃ viya abhūtattā.
tika-s0102t:548_25: Desanāvilāso ca yathāvuttavavatthānavasena veditabbo veneyyajjhāsayavasena vijjamānapariyāyakathābhāvato.
tika-s0102t:548_26: “Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti eteneva siddhattā na nīlādi abhibhāyatanāni vattabbānīti ce?
tika-s0102t:548_27: Taṃ na, nīlādīsu katādhikārānaṃ nīlādibhāvasseva abhibhavanakāraṇattā. Na hi tesaṃ
tika-s0102t:548_28: parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇānaṃ parittatā, appamāṇatā vā abhibhavanakāraṇaṃ, atha kho
tika-s0102t:548_29: nīlādibhāvo evāti. Etesu ca parittādikasiṇarūpesu yaṃ yaṃ caritassa imāni abhibhāyatanāni
tika-s0102t:549_2: gahetabbatāvasena. Obhāsavasenāti sappabhāsatāya avabhāsanavasena. Umāpupphanti atasipupphaṃ.
tika-s0102t:549_3: Nīlameva hoti vaṇṇasaṅkarābhāvato. Bārāṇasisambhavanti bārāṇasiyaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-s0102t:550_0: Ekaccassa ito bāhirakassa appamāṇaṃ ativitthāritaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ olokentassa bhayaṃ
tika-s0102t:550_1: uppajjeyya “kiṃ nu kho idaṃ sakalaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā gaṇhātī”ti,
tika-s0102t:550_2: tathāgatassa pana tādisaṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā natthīti abhītabhāvadassanatthameva ānītāni.
tika-s0102t:552_0: 174. Uttānatthāyeva heṭṭhā atthato vibhattattā. Ekaccassa vimokkhoti ghosopi bhayāvaho
tika-s0102t:552_1: vaṭṭābhiratabhāvato, tathāgatassa pana vimokkhe upasampajja viharatopi taṃ natthīti
tika-s0102t:554_1: taṃmūlakattā. Evaṃ vuttabhāvanti “ākaṅkhamāno ānanda tathāgato kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyyā”ti evaṃ vuttabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0102t:555: 179. Tampi oḷārikanimittaṃ kataṃ tassa mārena pariyuṭṭhitacetaso na paṭividdhaṃ na sallakkhitaṃ.
tika-s0102t:556_0: 183. Ādikehīti evamādīhi mittāmaccasuhajjāhi. Piyāyitabbato piyehi. Manavaḍḍhanato
tika-s0102t:556_1: manāpehi. Jātiyāti jātianurūpagamanena. Nānābhāvo visuṃbhāvo asambaddhabhāvo. Maraṇena
tika-s0102t:556_2: vinābhāvoti cutiyā tenattabhāvena apunarāvattanato vippayogo. Bhavena aññathābhāvoti
tika-s0102t:556_4: tatthāpi “manusso devo hotī”tiādināpi yojetabbo. Kutettha labbhāti kuto kuhiṃ kismiṃ
tika-s0102t:556_5: nāma ṭhāne ettha etasmiṃ khandhappavatte “yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ…pe… mā palujjī”ti laddhuṃ
tika-s0102t:556_6: sakkā. Na sakkā eva tādisassa kāraṇassa abhāvatoti āha “netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:556_7: Evaṃ acchariyabbhutadhammaṃ tathāgatassāpi sarīraṃ, kimaṅgaṃ pana aññesanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:556_8: “Paccāvamissatī”ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā
tika-s0102t:556_9: āyusaṅkhārānaṃ ossaṭṭhattā, buddhakiccassa ca pariyosāpitattā. Na hettha māsattayato
tika-s0102t:557_0: 184. Sāsanassa ciraṭṭhiti nāma sasambhārehi ariyamaggadhammehi kevalehīti āha “sabbaṃ
tika-s0102t:557_1: lokiyalokuttaravaseneva kathita”nti lokiyāhi sīlasamādhipaññāhi vinā lokuttaradhammasamadhigamassa asambhavato.
tika-s0102t:560_0: 186. Nāgāpalokitanti nāgassa viya apalokitaṃ, hatthināgassa apalokanasadisaṃ apalokananti
tika-s0102t:560_1: attho. Āhaccāti phusitvā. Aṅkusakalaggāni viyāti aṅkusakāni viya aññamaññasmiṃ laggāni
tika-s0102t:560_2: āsattāni hutvā ṭhitāni. Ekābaddhānīti aññamaññaṃ ekato ābaddhāni. Tasmāti gīvaṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:560_3: ekagghanānaṃ viya ekābaddhabhāvena, na kevalaṃ gīvaṭṭhīnaṃyeva, atha kho sabbānipi
tika-s0102t:560_4: tāni buddhānaṃ ṭhapetvā bāhusandhiādikā dvādasa mahāsandhiyo, aṅgulisandhiyo ca itarasandhīsu
tika-s0102t:560_5: ekābaddhāni hutvā ṭhitāni, yato nesaṃ pakatihatthīnaṃ koṭisahassabalappamāṇaṃ kāyabalaṃ
tika-s0102t:560_6: hoti. Vesālinagarābhimukhaṃ akāsi kaṇṭakaparivattane viya kapilanagarābhimukhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:560_7: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ taṃ nāgāpalokitaṃ nāma jātaṃ? Tadajjhāsayaṃ upādāya. Bhagavā hi
tika-s0102t:560_8: nāgāpalokitavaseneva apaloketukāmo jāto, puññānubhāvena panassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:561_0: “Idaṃ pacchimakaṃ ānanda tathāgatassa vesāliyā dassana”nti nayidaṃ vesāliyā apalokanassa
tika-s0102t:561_1: kāraṇavacanaṃ anekantikattā, bhūtakathanamattaṃ panetaṃ. Maggasodhanavasena taṃ dassetvā
tika-s0102t:561_2: aññadevettha apalokanakāraṇaṃ dassetukāmo “nanu cā”tiādimāha. Taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ pacchimadassanameva
tika-s0102t:561_3: anukkamena kusināraṃ gantvā parinibbātukāmatāya tato tato nikkhantattā. “Anacchariyattā”ti
tika-s0102t:561_4: iminā yathāvuttaṃ anekantikattaṃ pariharati, tayidaṃ sodhanamattaṃ. Idaṃ panettha
tika-s0102t:561_5: aviparītaṃ kāraṇanti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na hi bhagavā sāpekkho vesāliṃ
tika-s0102t:561_6: apalokesi, “idaṃ pana me gamanaṃ apunarāgamana”nti dassanamukhena bahujanahitāya
tika-s0102t:562_0: Antakaroti sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sakasantāne, parasantāne ca vināsakaro abhāvakaro.
tika-s0102t:562_2: cakkhumā. Savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā sātisayaṃ kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto.
tika-s0102t:564_0: 187. Mahāokāseti mahante okāse. Mahantāni dhammassa patiṭṭhāpanaṭṭhānāni. Yesu patiṭṭhāpito
tika-s0102t:564_1: dhammo nicchīyati asandehato, kāni pana tāni? Āgamanavisiṭṭhāni suttotaraṇādīni.
tika-s0102t:564_2: Dutiyavikappe apadisantīti apadesā, “sammukhā metaṃ āvuso bhagavato suta”ntiādinā
tika-s0102t:564_3: kenaci ābhatassa “dhammo”ti vinicchinane kāraṇaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti? Tassa yathābhatassa
tika-s0102t:564_4: suttotaraṇādi eva. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ cattāroti? Yasmā dhammassa dve samparāyā satthā,
tika-s0102t:564_5: sāvakā ca, tesu ca sāvakā saṅghagaṇapuggalavasena tividhā, evaṃ “tumhākaṃ mayā yaṃ
tika-s0102t:564_6: dhammo paṭiggahito”ti apadisitabbānaṃ bhedena cattāro. Tenāha “sammukhā me taṃ āvuso
tika-s0102t:564_7: bhagavato suta”ntiādi. Tathā ca vuttaṃ nettiyaṃ “cattāro mahāpadesā buddhāpadeso
tika-s0102t:564_8: saṅghāpadeso sambahulattherāpadeso ekattherāpadeso. Ime cattāro mahāpadesā”ti buddho
tika-s0102t:564_9: apadeso etassāti buddhāpadeso. Esa nayo sesesupi. Tenāha “buddhādayo…pe… mahākāraṇānī”ti.
tika-s0102t:565_0: 188. Neva abhinanditabbanti na sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Ganthassa sampaṭicchanaṃ nāma savananti
tika-s0102t:565_1: āha “na sotabba”nti. Padabyañjanānīti padāni ca byañjanāni ca, atthapadāni, byañjanapadāni
tika-s0102t:565_2: cāti attho. Pajjati attho etehīti padāni, akkharādīni byañjanapadāni. Pajjitabbato
tika-s0102t:565_4: byañjanapadāneva vuttānī”ti keci, taṃ na, atthaṃ byañjentīti byañjanāni, byañjanapadāni,
tika-s0102t:565_5: tehi byañjitabbato byañjanāni, atthapadānīti ubhayasaṅgahato. Imasmiṃ ṭhāneti tenābhatasuttassa
tika-s0102t:565_6: imasmiṃ padese. Pāḷi vuttāti kevalo pāḷidhammo pavatto. Attho vuttoti pāḷiyā attho
tika-s0102t:565_7: pavatto niddiṭṭho. Anusandhi kathitoti yathāraddhadesanāya, upari desanāya ca anusandhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:565_8: kathitaṃ sambandho kathito. Pubbāparaṃ kathitanti pubbenāparaṃ avirujjhanañceva visesādhānañca
tika-s0102t:565_9: kathitaṃ pakāsitaṃ. Evaṃ pāḷidhammādīni sammadeva sallakkhetvā gahaṇaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahaṇanti
tika-s0102t:565_10: āha “suṭṭhu gahetvā”ti. Sutte otāretabbānīti ñāṇena sutte ogāhetvā tāretabbāni, taṃ
tika-s0102t:565_11: pana ogāhetvā taraṇaṃ tattha otaraṇaṃ anuppavesanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “sutte otāretabbānī”ti.
tika-s0102t:566_0: Kiṃ pana taṃ suttaṃ, ko vā vinayoti vicāraṇāya ācariyānaṃ matibhedamukhena tamatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:566_1: dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vinayoti vibhaṅgapāṭhamāha. So hi mātikāsaññitassa
tika-s0102t:566_2: suttassa atthasūcanato “sutta”nti vattabbataṃ arahati. Vividhanayattā, visiṭṭhanayattā
tika-s0102t:566_3: ca vinayo, khandhakapāṭho. Evanti evaṃ suttavinayesu pariggayhamānesu vinayapiṭakampi
tika-s0102t:566_4: na pariyādīyati parivārapāḷiyā asaṅgahitattā. Suttantābhidhammapiṭakāni vā suttaṃ
tika-s0102t:566_6: vinayo”ti evaṃ suttavinayavibhāge vuccamānepi. Na tāva pariyādīyantīti na tāva anavasesato
tika-s0102t:566_7: pariggayhanti, kasmāti āha “asuttanāmakañhī”tiādi. Yasmā “sutta”nti imaṃ nāmaṃ anāropetvā
