tika-s0102t:1119_3: pamattākāraṃ pāpenti, māno pana jātimadādi vasena mattākārampi, tasmā “mattapamattākārapāpanaṭṭhenā”ti
tika-s0102t:1119_4: vuttaṃ. Saṅkhā vuccati koṭṭhāso bhāgaso saṅkhāyati upaṭṭhātīti. Yasmā papañcasaññā
tika-s0102t:1119_5: taṃtaṃdvāravasena, ārammaṇavasena ca bhāgaso vitakkassa paccayā honti, na kevalā,
tika-s0102t:1119_6: tasmā papañcasaññāsaṅkhānidāno vitakko vutto, papañcasaññānaṃ vā anekabhedabhinnattā
tika-s0102t:1120_0: Yo nirodho vūpasamoti nirodhasaccamāha. Tassa sāruppanti tassa papañcasaññāsaṅkhāya
tika-s0102t:1120_1: nirodhassa vūpasamassa adhigamupāyatāya sāruppaṃ anucchavikaṃ, etena vipassanaṃ vadati.
tika-s0102t:1120_2: Tattha yathāvuttanirodhe ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gacchati pavattatīti tatthagāminī,
tika-s0102t:1120_3: etena maggaṃ. Tenāha “saha vipassanāya maggaṃ pucchatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1122_0: 359. Pucchitameva kathitaṃ. Yasmā sakkena devānaṃ indena papañcasaññāsaṅkhānirodhagāminipaṭipadā
tika-s0102t:1122_1: pucchitāva, bhagavā ca tadadhigamupāyaṃ arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ tassa ajjhāsayavasena vedanāmukhena
tika-s0102t:1122_2: kathento tisso vedanā ārabhi, iti pucchitameva kathentena pucchānusandhivasena sānusandhimeva
tika-s0102t:1122_3: ca kathitaṃ. Na hi buddhānaṃ ananusandhikā kathā nāma atthi. Idānissa vedanāmukhena
tika-s0102t:1122_4: arūpakammaṭṭhānasseva kathane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “devatānañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Karajakāyassa
tika-s0102t:1122_5: sukhumatāvacaneneva accantamudusukhumālabhāvāpi vuttā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kammajanti
tika-s0102t:1122_6: kammajatejaṃ. Tassa balavabhāvo uḷārapuññakammanibbattattā, ativiya garumadhurasiniddhasuddhāhārajīraṇato
tika-s0102t:1122_7: ca. Ekāhārampīti ekāhāravārampi. “Vilīyantī”ti etena karajakāyassa mandatāya kammajatejassa
tika-s0102t:1122_8: balavabhāvena āhāravelātikkamena nesaṃ balavatī dukkhavedanā uppajjamānā supākaṭā
tika-s0102t:1122_9: hotīti dasseti. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ, sukhavedanāpi pana nesaṃ uḷārapaṇītesu ārammaṇesu
tika-s0102t:1122_10: uparūpari aniggahaṇavasena pavattamānā supākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhātiyeva. Upekkhāpi tesaṃ
tika-s0102t:1122_11: kadāci uppajjamānā santapaṇītarūpā eva iṭṭhamajjhatte eva ārammaṇe pavattanato. Tenevāha “tasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1123_0: Rūpakammaṭṭhānanti rūpapariggahaṃ, rūpamukhena vipassanābhinivesanti attho. Arūpakammaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0102t:1123_1: etthāpi eseva nayo. Tattha rūpakammaṭṭhānena samathābhinivesopi saṅgayhati, vipassanābhiniveso
tika-s0102t:1123_2: pana idhādhippetoti dassento “rūpapariggaho arūpapariggahotipi etadeva vuccatī”ti
tika-s0102t:1123_3: āha. Catudhātuvavatthānanti ettha yebhuyyena catudhātuvavatthānaṃ vitthārento rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1123_4: kathetīti adhippāyo. Rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvāva katheti “evaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ vuccamānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1123_5: suṭṭhu vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātī”ti. “Etena idhāpi rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ ekadesena
tika-s0102t:1124_0: Kāmañcettha vedanāvasena arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ, tadaññadhammavasenapi arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1124_1: labbhatīti taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tividho hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha abhinivesoti anuppaveso,
tika-s0102t:1124_2: ārambhoti attho. Ārambhe eva hi ayaṃ vibhāgo, sammasanaṃ pana anavasesatova dhamme
tika-s0102t:1124_3: pariggahetvā pavattatīti. “Pariggahite rūpakammaṭṭhāne”ti idaṃ rūpamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ
tika-s0102t:1124_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ, arūpamukhena pana vipassanābhiniveso yebhuyyena samathayānikassa
tika-s0102t:1124_5: icchitabbo, so ca paṭhamaṃ jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvā tato paraṃ sesadhamme pariggaṇhāti.
tika-s0102t:1124_6: Paṭhamābhinipātoti sabbe cetasikā cittāyattā cittakiriyābhāvena vuccantīti phasso
tika-s0102t:1124_7: cittassa paṭhamābhinipāto vutto. Taṃ ārammaṇanti yathāpariggahitaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānasaññitaṃ
tika-s0102t:1124_8: ārammaṇaṃ. Uppannaphasso puggalo, cittacetasikarāsi vā ārammaṇena phuṭṭho phassasahajātāya
tika-s0102t:1124_9: vedanāya taṃsamakālameva vedeti, phasso pana obhāsassa viya padīpo vedanādīnaṃ paccayaviseso
tika-s0102t:1124_10: hotīti purimakālo viya vuccati, yā tassa ārammaṇābhiniropanalakkhaṇatā vuccati. Phusantoti
tika-s0102t:1124_11: ārammaṇassa phusanākārena. Ayañhi arūpadhammattā ekadesena anallīyamānopi rūpaṃ viya
tika-s0102t:1124_12: cakkhuṃ, saddo viya ca sotaṃ, cittaṃ, ārammaṇañca phusanto viya, saṅghaṭṭento viya
tika-s0102t:1125_0: Ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantīti issaravatāya visavitāya sāmibhāvena ārammaṇarasaṃ saṃvedentī.
tika-s0102t:1125_1: Phassādīnañhi sampayuttadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe ekadeseneva pavatti phusanādimattabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1125_2: vedanāya pana iṭṭhākārasambhogādivasena pavattanato ārammaṇe nippadesato pavatti.
tika-s0102t:1125_3: Phusanādibhāvena hi ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ ekadesānubhavanaṃ, vedayitabhāvena gahaṇaṃ yathākāmaṃ
tika-s0102t:1125_4: sabbānubhavanaṃ, evaṃsabhāvāneva tāni gahaṇānīti na vedanāya viya phassādīnampi yathā
tika-s0102t:1125_6: visesato jānantaṃ. Viññāṇañhi minitabbavatthuṃ nāḷiyā minanto puriso viya ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1125_7: paricchijja vibhāventaṃ pavattati, na saññā viya sañjānanamattaṃ hutvā. Tathā hi
tika-s0102t:1125_8: anena kadāci lakkhaṇattayavibhāvanāpi hoti, imesaṃ pana phassādīnaṃ tassa tassa pākaṭabhāvo
tika-s0102t:1126_0: Evaṃ tassa tasseva pākaṭabhāvepi “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyya”nti, “sabbañca kho,
tika-s0102t:1126_1: bhikkhave, abhijāna”nti ca evamādi vacanato sabbe sammasanupagā dhammā pariggahetabbāti
tika-s0102t:1126_2: dassento “tattha yassā”tiādimāha. Tattha phassapañcamakeyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ tadantogadhattā
tika-s0102t:1126_3: taggahaṇeneva gahitattā catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ. Phassapañcamakaggahaṇañhi tassa
tika-s0102t:1126_4: sabbassa sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇabhāvato. Tattha ca phassacetanāggahaṇena sabbasaṅkhārakkhandhadhammasaṅgaho
tika-s0102t:1126_5: cetanappadhānattā tesaṃ. Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhavibhaṅge “cakkhusamphassajā
tika-s0102t:1126_6: cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva vibhattā, itare pana khandhā sarūpeneva gahitā.
tika-s0102t:1127_0: Vatthunissitāti ettha vatthu-saddo karajakāyavisayo, na chabbatthuvisayoti. Kathamidaṃ
tika-s0102t:1127_1: viññāyatīti āha “yaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti. Kattha pana vuttaṃ? Sāmaññaphalasutte. Soti
tika-s0102t:1127_2: karajakāyo. “Pañcakkhandhavinimuttaṃ nāmarūpaṃ natthī”ti idaṃ adhikāravasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1127_3: Aññathā hi khandhavinimuttampi nāmaṃ atthevāti. Avijjādihetukāti avijjātaṇhupādānādihetukā.
tika-s0102t:1127_4: “Vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti sammasanto vicaratī”ti iminā balavavipassanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1127_5: vatvā puna tassa ussukkāpanaṃ, visesādhigamañca dassento “so”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1128_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ sakkapañhasutte. Vedanāvasena cettha arūpakammaṭṭhānakathane kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1128_1: heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Yathāvuttesu ca tīsu kammaṭṭhānābhinivesesu vedanāvasena kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso
tika-s0102t:1128_2: sukaro vedanānaṃ vibhūtabhāvatoti dassetuṃ “phassavasena hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Na pākaṭaṃ
tika-s0102t:1128_3: hotī”ti idaṃ sakkapamukhānaṃ tesaṃ devānaṃ yathā vedanā vibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0102t:1128_4: na evaṃ itaradvayanti katvā vuttaṃ. Vedanāya eva ca nesaṃ vibhūtabhāvo vedanāmukhenevettha
tika-s0102t:1128_5: bhagavatā desanāya āraddhattā. “Vedanānaṃ uppattiyā pākaṭatāyā”ti idaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1128_6: vasena vuttaṃ. Tāsañhi pavatti oḷārikā, na itarāya. Tadubhayaggahaṇamukhena vā gahetabbattā
tika-s0102t:1128_7: itarāyapi pavatti viññūnaṃ pākaṭā evāti sukhadukkhavedanānañhī”ti visesaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1128_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Yadā sukhaṃ uppajjatī”tiādi sukhavedanāya pākaṭabhāvavibhāvanaṃ, tayidaṃ
tika-s0102t:1128_9: asamāhitabhūmivasena veditabbaṃ. Tattha “sakalaṃ sarīraṃ kho bhante”ntiādinā kāmaṃ
tika-s0102t:1128_10: pavattioḷārikatāya avūpasantasabhāvametaṃ sukhaṃ, sātalakkhaṇatāya pana sampayuttadhamme,
tika-s0102t:1128_11: nissayañca anuggaṇhantameva pavattatīti dasseti. “Yadā dukkhaṃ uppajjatī”tiādīsu
tika-s0102t:1129_0: Duddīpanāti ñāṇena dīpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyā, dubbiññeyyāti attho. Tenāha “andhakārā abhibhūtā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1129_1: Andhakārāti andhakāragatasadisī, jānitukāme ca andhakārinī. Pubbāparaṃ samaṃ sukare
tika-s0102t:1129_2: supalakkhitamaggavasena pāsāṇatale migagatamaggo viya iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇesu sukhadukkhānubhavanehi
tika-s0102t:1129_3: majjhattārammaṇesu anuminitabbatāya vuttaṃ “sā sukhadukkhānaṃ…pe… pākaṭā hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1129_4: Tenāha “yathā”tiādi. Nayato gaṇhantassāti etthāyaṃ nayo – yasmā iṭṭhāniṭṭhavisayāya
tika-s0102t:1129_5: ārammaṇūpaladdhiyā anubhavanato niṭṭhāmajjhattavisayā ca upaladdhi, tasmā na tāya
tika-s0102t:1129_6: niranubhavanāya bhavitabbaṃ, yaṃ tatthānubhavanaṃ, sā adukkhamasukhā. Tathā anupalabbhamānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1129_7: rūpādianubhuyyamānaṃ diṭṭhaṃ upalabbhati, yo pana majjhattārammaṇaṃ tabbisayassa
tika-s0102t:1129_8: viññāṇappavattiyaṃ, tasmā ananubhuyyamānena tena na bhavitabbaṃ. Sakkā hi vattuṃ
tika-s0102t:1129_10: pana niranubhavanaṃ taṃ anupaladdhisabhāvameva diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ yathārūpanti. Nivattetvāti
tika-s0102t:1130_0: Ayañca rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ vedanāvasena nivattetvā desanā
tika-s0102t:1130_1: tathāvinetabbapuggalāpekkhāya suttantaresupi āgatā evāti dassento “na kevala”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1130_2: Tattha mahāsatipaṭṭhāne tathā desanāya āgatabhāvo anantarameva āvi bhavissati, majjhimanikāye
tika-s0102t:1130_3: satipaṭṭhānadesanāpi tādisī eva. Cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhaye “evaṃ cetaṃ, devānaṃ inda, bhikkhuno
tika-s0102t:1130_4: sutaṃ hoti ‘sabbe dhammā nālaṃ abhinivesāyā’ti, so sabbaṃ dhammaṃ abhijānāti, sabbaṃ
tika-s0102t:1130_5: dhammaṃ abhiññāya sabbaṃ dhammaṃ parijānāti, sabbaṃ dhammaṃ pariññāya yaṃ kiñci vedanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1130_6: vedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, so tāsu vedanāsu aniccānupassī viharati,
tika-s0102t:1130_7: virāgānupassī”tiādinā āgataṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ vedanāvasena nivattetvā
tika-s0102t:1130_8: dassesī”ti. Mahātaṇhāsaṅkhaye pana “so evaṃ anurodhavirodhavippahīno yaṃ kiñci vedanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1130_9: vedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, so taṃ vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati
tika-s0102t:1130_10: nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati. Tassa taṃ vedanaṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato
tika-s0102t:1130_11: yā vedanāsu nandī sā nirujjhatī”tiādinā āgataṃ. Cūḷavedalle “kati panāyyevedanā”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:1130_12: āgataṃ. Mahāvedalle “vedanāti, āvuso, vuccati, kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, ‘vedanā’ti
tika-s0102t:1130_13: vuccatī”tiādinā āgataṃ. Evaṃ raṭṭhapālasuttādīsupi vedanākammaṭṭhānassa āgataṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1131_0: “Paṭhamaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā”ti vuttaṃ, kathaṃ tamettha kathitanti āha “rūpakammaṭṭhāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0102t:1131_1: Saṅkhittaṃ, kathaṃ saṅkhittaṃ? Vedanāya ārammaṇamattakaṃyeva, yebhuyyena vedanā rūpadhammārammaṇā
tika-s0102t:1131_2: pañcadvāravasena pavattanato. Tena cassā purimasiddhā eva ārammaṇanti vedanaṃ vadantena
tika-s0102t:1131_3: tassārammaṇadhammā atthato paṭhamataraṃ gahitā eva nāma hontīti imāya atthāpattiyā
tika-s0102t:1131_4: rūpakammaṭṭhānassevettha paṭhamaṃ gahitatā jotitā, na sarūpeneva gahitattā. Tenāha
tika-s0102t:1132_0: 360. Dvīhi koṭṭhāsehīti sevitabbāsevitabbabhāgehi. Evarūpanti yaṃ akusalānaṃ abhibuddhiyā,
tika-s0102t:1132_1: kusalānañca parihānāya saṃvattati, evarūpaṃ, taṃ pana kāmūpasañhitatāya “gehanissita”nti
tika-s0102t:1132_2: vuccatīti āha “gehasitasomanassa”nti. Iṭṭhānanti piyānaṃ. Kantānanti kamanīyānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1132_3: Manāpānanti manavaḍḍhanakānaṃ. Tato eva mano ramentīti manoramānaṃ. Lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānanti
tika-s0102t:1132_4: taṇhāsannissitānaṃ kāmūpasañhitānaṃ. Paṭilābhato samanupassatoti “aho mayā imāni
tika-s0102t:1132_5: laddhānī”ti yathāladdhāni rūpārammaṇādīni assādayato. Atītanti atikkantaṃ. Niruddhanti
tika-s0102t:1132_6: nirodhappattaṃ. Vipariṇatanti sabhāvavigamena vigataṃ. Samanussaratoti assādanavasena
tika-s0102t:1132_7: anucintayato. Gehasitanti kāmaguṇanissitaṃ. Kāmaguṇā hi kāmarāgassa gehasadisattā
tika-s0102t:1133_0: Evarūpanti yaṃ akusalānaṃ parihānāya, kusalānañca abhibuddhiyā saṃvattati, evarūpaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1133_1: taṃ pana pabbajjādivasena pavattiyā nekkhammūpasañhitanti āha “nekkhammasitaṃ somanassa”nti.
tika-s0102t:1133_2: Idāni taṃ pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “tattha katamānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha vipassanālakkhaṇe
tika-s0102t:1133_3: nekkhamme dassite itarāni tassa kāraṇato, phalato, atthato ca dassitāneva hontīti
tika-s0102t:1133_5: jarāya vipariṇāmetabbatañceva jarāmaraṇehi palujjanaṃ nirujjhanañca viditvāti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1133_6: Uppajjati somanassanti vipassanāya vīthipaṭipattiyā kamena uppannānaṃ pāmojjapītipassaddhīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:1133_7: upari anappakaṃ somanassaṃ uppajjati. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
tika-s0102t:1135: Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
tika-s0102t:1137: Labhatī pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānata”nti. ca –
tika-s0102t:1138_1: santikaṃ gacchantassa, pabbajantassa, catupārisuddhisīlaṃ anutiṭṭhantassa, taṃ sodhentassa,
tika-s0102t:1138_2: dhutaguṇe samādāya vattantassa, kasiṇaparikammādīni karontassa ca yā paṭipatti, sabbā
tika-s0102t:1138_3: sā idha “nekkhamma”nti adhippetā. Yebhuyyena anussatiyā upacārajjhānaṃ niṭṭhātīti
tika-s0102t:1138_4: katvā “anussativasenā”ti vatvā “paṭhamajjhānādivasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca yathā pabbajjā
tika-s0102t:1138_5: gharabandhanato nikkhamanaṭṭhena nekkhammaṃ, evaṃ vipassanādayopi taṃpaṭipakkhato. Tenāha –
tika-s0102t:1141_0: Yaṃ ceti ettha ceti nipātamattaṃ somanassassa adhippetattā. Catukkanayavaseneva ca
tika-s0102t:1141_2: savicāraṃ avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti vuttesu dvīsu somanassesu.
tika-s0102t:1142_0: Savitakkasavicāre somanasseti parittabhūmike, paṭhamajjhāne vā somanasse. Abhiniviṭṭhasomanassesūti
tika-s0102t:1142_1: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapitasomanassesu. Pi-saddena sammaṭṭhasomanassesu pīti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1142_3: Avitakkaavicāra vipassanā paṇītatarā sammasitadhammavasenapi vipassanāya visesasiddhito,
tika-s0102t:1142_4: yato maggepi tathārūpā visesā ijjhanti. Ayaṃ panattho “ariyamagga bojjhaṅgādivisesaṃ
tika-s0102t:1142_5: vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentī”ti evaṃ pavattena moravāpīvāsimahādattattheravādena dīpetabbo.
tika-s0102t:1143_0: 361. Gehasitadomanassaṃ nāma kāmaguṇānaṃ appaṭilābhanimittaṃ, vigatanimittañca uppajjanakadomanassaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1143_1: Appaṭilābhato samanupassatoti appaṭilābhena “ahameva na labhāmī”ti paritassanato.
tika-s0102t:1143_2: Samanussaratoti “ahu vata me taṃ vata natthī”tiādinā anussaraṇavasena cintayato.
tika-s0102t:1144_0: Anuttaresu vimokkhesūti suññataphalādiariyaphalavimokkhesu. Pihanti apekkhaṃ, āsanti
tika-s0102t:1144_1: attho. Kathaṃ pana lokuttaradhamme ārabbha āsā uppajjatīti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ
tika-s0102t:1144_2: “yaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tattha pihā pavattatī”ti avisayattā, puggalassa ca anadhigatabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1144_3: Anussavūpaladdhe pana anuttaravimokkhe uddissa pihaṃ upaṭṭhapento “tattha pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetī”ti
tika-s0102t:1144_4: vutto. Tenāha “kudāssu nāmāha”ntiādi. Chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate aniccādivasena
tika-s0102t:1144_5: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvāti yojanā. “Iṭṭhārammaṇe”ti ca iminā nayidaṃ domanassaṃ sabhāvato
tika-s0102t:1144_6: aniṭṭhadhammeyeva ārabbha uppajjanakaṃ, atha kho icchitālābhahetukaṃ icchābhighātavasena
tika-s0102t:1144_7: yattha katthaci ārammaṇe uppajjanakanti dasseti. Evaṃ “kudāssu nāmāha”nti vuttākārena
tika-s0102t:1144_8: pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā evaṃ imampi pakkhaṃ…pe… nāsakkhinti anusocatoti yojanā. “Imasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:1144_9: pakkhe, imasmiṃ māse, imasmiṃ saṃvacchare pabbajituṃ nāladdhaṃ, kasiṇaparikammaṃ
tika-s0102t:1145_0: Yato eva-kāro, tato aññattha niyamoti katvā “tasmimpi…pe… gehasitadomanassamevā”ti
tika-s0102t:1145_1: vuttaṃ. Na hettha gehasitadomanassatā savitakkasavicāre niyatā, atha kho gehasitadomanasse
tika-s0102t:1145_3: savitakkasavicārameva, na avitakkaavicāra”nti. Nekkhammasitadomanassaṃ pana siyā
tika-s0102t:1145_4: savitakkasavicāraṃ, siyā avitakkaavicāraṃ. Savitakkasavicārasseva kāraṇabhūtaṃ domanassaṃ
tika-s0102t:1145_5: savitakkasavicāradomanassaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Gehasitadomanassaṃ, yaṃ pana nekkhammādivasena
tika-s0102t:1145_6: uppannaṃ, taṃ avitakkaavicārassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ avitakkaavicāradomanassanti. Ayañca
tika-s0102t:1145_7: nayo pariyāyavasena vuttoti āha “nippariyāyena panā”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ kasmā “yaṃ ce
tika-s0102t:1145_8: avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti āha “etassa panā”tiādi. Maññanavasenāti parikappanavasena. Vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1146_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ maññane. Ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno nayo. Domanassapaccayabhūteti domanassassa
tika-s0102t:1146_1: paccayabhūte. Upacārajjhānañhi paṭhamajjhānādīni vā pādakāni katvā maggaphalāni nibbattetukāmassa
tika-s0102t:1146_2: tesaṃ alābhe domanassassa uppajjane tāni tassa paccayā nāma honti iti te dhammā phalūpacārena
tika-s0102t:1146_3: “domanassa”nti vuttā. Yo pana tathā uppannadomanasso dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā anukkamena
tika-s0102t:1146_4: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggaphaladhamme nibbatteti, te kāraṇūpacārena “domanassa”nti
tika-s0102t:1146_5: vuttāti imamatthaṃ dassento “idha bhikkhū”tiādimāha. Nanu etassa tadā domanassameva
tika-s0102t:1146_6: uppannaṃ, na domanassahetukā vipassanāmaggaphaladhammā uppannā, tattha kathaṃ domanassasamaññaṃ
tika-s0102t:1146_7: āropetvā voharatīti āha “aññesaṃ paṭipattidassanavasena domanassanti gahetvā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1146_8: Savitakkasavicāradomanasseti savitakkasavicāranimitte domanasse. Tīhi māsehi nibbattetabbā
tika-s0102t:1146_9: temāsikā, taṃ temāsikaṃ. Imā ca temāsikādayo paṭipadā tathāpavattaukkaṭṭhamajjhimamudindriyavasena
tika-s0102t:1146_10: veditabbā, adhikamajjhimamudussāhavasena vā. Jaggatīti jāgarikaṃ anuyuñjati.
tika-s0102t:1149: Aṭṭhakathātherāti aṭṭhakathāya atthapaṭipucchanakatherā. Antarāmaggeti bhikkhaṃ gahetvā gāmato vihāraṃ paṭigamanamagge. Tayo…pe… gāhāpetvāti tīṇi cattāri uṇhāpanāni.
tika-s0102t:1150: Kenaci papañcenāti kenaci sarīrakiccabhūtena papañcena. Saññaṃ akāsi rattiyaṃ pacchato gacchantaṃ asallakkhento.
tika-s0102t:1151_0: Kasmā pana thero antevāsikānaṃ anārocetvāva gatoti āha “thero kirā”tiādi. Arahattaṃ
tika-s0102t:1151_1: nāma kinti tadadhigamassa adukkarabhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati. Catūhi iriyāpathehīti catūhipi
tika-s0102t:1151_2: iriyāpathehi pavattamānassa, tasmā yāva arahattādhigamā sayanaṃ paṭikkhipāmīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:1152: “Anucchavikaṃ nu kho te eta”nti saṃvegajāto vīriyaṃ samuttejento arahattaṃ aggahesi ettakaṃ kālaṃ vipassanāya suciṇṇabhāvato ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā.
tika-s0102t:1153: Parimajjīti parimasi. Keci pana “parimajjīti parivattetvā therena dhoviyamānaṃ pariggahetvā dhovī”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0102t:1156_0: 362. Evarūpāti yā akusalānaṃ abhibuddhiyā, kusalānaṃ parihānāya ca saṃvattati, evarūpā,
tika-s0102t:1156_2: bālakaradhammayogato bālassa attahitaparahitabyāmūḷhatāya mūḷhassa puthūnaṃ kilesādīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:1156_3: jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjanassa kilesodhīnaṃ maggodhīhi ajitattā anodhijinassa,
tika-s0102t:1156_4: odhijino vāyapekkhā, odhiso ca kilesānaṃ jitattā, tenassa sekkhabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0102t:1156_5: Sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattanavipākassa ajitattā avipākajinassa, vipākajinā vā
tika-s0102t:1156_6: arahanto appaṭisandhikattā, tenassa asekkhattaṃ paṭikkhipati. Anekādīnave sabbesampi
tika-s0102t:1156_7: pāpadhammānaṃ mūlabhūte sammohe ādīnavānaṃ adassanasīlatāya anādīnavadassāvino. Āgamādhigamābhāvā
tika-s0102t:1156_8: assutavato. Ediso ekaṃsena andhaputhujjano nāma hotīti tassa andhaputhujjanabhāvaṃ
tika-s0102t:1156_9: dassetuṃ punapi “puthujjanassā”ti vuttaṃ. Evarūpāti vuttappakārā sammohapubbikā.
tika-s0102t:1156_10: Rūpaṃ sā nātivattatīti rūpānaṃ samatikkamanāya kāraṇaṃ na hoti, rūpārammaṇe kilese
tika-s0102t:1156_11: nātikkamatīti adhippāyo. Aññāṇāvibhūtatāya ārammaṇe ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattamānā
tika-s0102t:1156_12: lobhasampayuttaupekkhā idhādhippetāti tassa lobhassa anucchavikameva ārammaṇaṃ dassento
tika-s0102t:1156_13: “iṭṭhārammaṇe”ti āha. Anativattamānā anādīnavadassitāya. Tato eva assādānupassanato
tika-s0102t:1156_14: tattheva laggā. Abhisaṅgassa lobhassa vasena, dummocanīyatāya ca tena laggitā viya hutvā uppannā.
tika-s0102t:1157_0: Evarūpāti yā akusalānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānañca abhibuddhiyā saṃvattati, evarūpā, sā
tika-s0102t:1157_1: pana pabbajjādivasena pavattiyā nekkhammūpasañhitāti āha “nekkhammasitā”ti. Idāni
tika-s0102t:1157_2: taṃ pāḷivasena dassetuṃ “tattha katamā”tiādi vuttaṃ, tassattho heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena
tika-s0102t:1157_3: veditabbo. Rūpaṃ sā ativattatīti rūpasmiṃ sammadeva ādīnavadassanato. Rūpaniyātāti
tika-s0102t:1157_4: kilesehi anabhibhavanīyato. Iṭṭheti sabhāvato, saṅkappato ca iṭṭhe ārammaṇe. Arajjantassāti
tika-s0102t:1157_5: na rajjantassa rāgaṃ anuppādentassa. Aniṭṭhe adussantassāti ettha vuttanayena attho
tika-s0102t:1157_6: veditabbo. Samaṃ sammā yoniso na pekkhanaṃ asamapekkhanaṃ, taṃ pana iṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhatte
tika-s0102t:1157_8: asammuyhantassā”ti vuttaṃ, tividhepi ārammaṇe asamapekkhanavasena muyhantassāti attho.
tika-s0102t:1157_9: Vipassanāñāṇasampayuttā upekkhā. Nekkhammasitā upekkhā vedanāsabhāgāti udāsinākārena
tika-s0102t:1157_10: pavattiyā, upekkhā vedanāya ca sabhāgā. Ettha upekkhā vāti ettha etasmiṃ upekkhāniddese
tika-s0102t:1157_11: “upekkhā”ti gahitā eva. Tasmāti tatramajjhattupekkhāyapi idha upekkhāggahaṇena gahitattā.
tika-s0102t:1158: Tāyapi nekkhammasitaupekkhāyāti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. “Yaṃ nekkhammavasenā”tiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttā natthameva.
tika-s0102t:1159_0: 363. Yadi sakkassa tadā sotāpattiphalapattiyāva upanissayo, atha kasmā bhagavā yāva
tika-s0102t:1159_1: arahattaṃ desanaṃ vaḍḍhesīti āha “buddhānañhī”tiādi. Taruṇasakkoti abhinavo adhunā
tika-s0102t:1159_2: pātubhūto sakko. Sampati pātubhāvañhi sandhāya “taruṇasakko”ti vuttaṃ, na tassa kumāratā,
tika-s0102t:1159_3: vuddhatā vā atthi. Gatāgataṭṭhānanti gamanāgamanakāraṇaṃ. Na paññāyati na upalabbhati.
tika-s0102t:1159_4: Gabbhaseyyakānañhi cavantānaṃ kammajarūpaṃ vigacchati anudeva cittajaṃ, āhārajañca
tika-s0102t:1159_5: paccayābhāvato, utujaṃ pana sucirampi kālaṃ paveṇiṃ ghaṭṭentaṃ bhassantaṃ vā sosantaṃ
tika-s0102t:1159_6: vā kilesantaṃ vā viṭṭhataṃ vā hoti, na evaṃ devānaṃ. Tesañhi opapātikattā kammajarūpe
tika-s0102t:1159_7: antaradhāyante sesatisantatirūpampi tena saddhiṃ antaradhāyati. Tenāha “dīpasikhāgamanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1159_8: viya hotī”ti. Sesadevatā na jāniṃsu punapi sakkattabhāvena tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nibbattattā.
tika-s0102t:1159_10: sappimhā sappimaṇḍo viya āgamanīyapaṭipadāya nibbattitaphalabhūtaṃ lokuttaramaggaphalameva
tika-s0102t:1159_11: kathitaṃ. Sakuṇikāya viya kiñci gayhūpagaṃ uppatitvā uḍḍetvā ullaṅghitvā. Assāti
tika-s0102t:1161_2: antevāsiko panassa tepiṭakacūḷanāgatthero “pātimokkhasaṃvaro eva sīlaṃ, itarāni pana
tika-s0102t:1161_3: ‘sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī’ti ananujānanto indriyasaṃvaro nāma chadvārarakkhāmattakaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1161_4: ājīvapārisuddhi dhammena samena paccayuppādanamattakaṃ, paccayasannissitaṃ paṭiladdhapaccaye
tika-s0102t:1161_6: sīlaṃ. Tathā hi yassa so bhinno, so itarāni rakkhituṃ abhabbattā asīlo hoti. Yassa
tika-s0102t:1161_7: pana sabbaso arogo sesānaṃ rakkhituṃ bhabbattā sampannasīlo”ti vadati, tasmā itaresaṃ
tika-s0102t:1161_8: tassa parivārabhāvato, sabbaso ekadesena ca tadantogadhabhāvato tadeva padhānasīlaṃ
tika-s0102t:1161_9: nāmāti āha “uttamajeṭṭhakasīlasaṃvarāyā”ti. Tattha yathā heṭṭhā papañcasaññāsaṅkhānirodhasāruppagāminiṃ
tika-s0102t:1161_10: paṭipadaṃ pucchitena bhagavatā papañcasaññānaṃ, paṭipadāya ca mūlabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1161_11: vibhajitvā paṭipadā desitā sakkassa ajjhāsayavasena saṃkilesadhammappahānamukhena
tika-s0102t:1161_12: vodānadhammapāripūrīti, evaṃ tassā eva paṭipadāya mūlabhūtampi sīlasaṃvaraṃ pucchitena
tika-s0102t:1161_13: bhagavatā yato so visujjhati, yathā ca visujjhati, tadubhayaṃ sakkassa ajjhāsayavasena
tika-s0102t:1161_15: katvā. Sīlakathāyaṃ asevitabbakāyasamācārādikathane kāraṇaṃ vuttameva, tasmā kammapathavasenāti
tika-s0102t:1162_0: Kammapathavasenāti ca kammapathavicāravasena. Kammapathabhāvaṃ apattānampi hi kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:1162_2: sikkhāpadapaṇṇattivasena. Yato yato hi yā yā veramaṇī, tadubhayepi vibhāvento paṇṇattivasena
tika-s0102t:1162_3: katheti nāma. Tenāha “kāyadvāre”tiādi. Sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamati etenāti sikkhāpadavītikkamo,
tika-s0102t:1162_4: sikkhāpadassa vītikkamanākārena pavatto akusaladhammo yaṃ, tassa asevitabbakāyasamācārāditā.
tika-s0102t:1162_5: Vītikkamapaṭipakkho avītikkamo, na vītikkamati etenāti avītikkamo, sīlaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1163_0: Micchā sammā ca pariyesati etāyāti pariyesanā, ājīvo, atthato paccayagavesanabyāpāro
tika-s0102t:1163_1: kāyavacīdvāriko. Yadi evaṃ kasmā visuṃ gahaṇanti āha “yasmā”tiādi. Ariyā niddosā
tika-s0102t:1163_2: pariyesanā gavesanāti ariyapariyesanā, ariyehi sādhūhi pariyesitabbātipi ariyapariyesanāti.
tika-s0102t:1164_0: Jātidhammoti jāyanasabhāvo jāyanapakatiko. Jarādhammoti jīraṇasabhāvo. Byādhidhammoti
tika-s0102t:1164_1: byādhisabhāvo. Maraṇadhammoti mīyanasabhāvo. Sokadhammoti socanakasabhāvo. Saṃkilesadhammoti
tika-s0102t:1165_0: Puttabhariyanti puttā ca bhariyā ca. Esa nayo sabbattha. Dvandekattavasena tesaṃ
tika-s0102t:1165_1: niddeso. Jātarūparajatanti ettha pana yato vikāraṃ anāpajjitvā sabbaṃ jātarūpameva
tika-s0102t:1165_2: hotīti jātarūpaṃ nāma suvaṇṇaṃ. Dhavalasabhāvatāya rajatīti rajataṃ, rūpiyaṃ. Idha
tika-s0102t:1165_3: pana suvaṇṇaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci upabhogaparibhogārahaṃ “rajata”ntveva gahitaṃ vohārūpagamāsakādi.
tika-s0102t:1165_4: Jātidhammā hete, bhikkhave, upadhayoti ete kāmaguṇūpadhayo nāma honti, te sabbepi
tika-s0102t:1166_0: Byādhidhammavārādīsu jātarūparajataṃ na gahitaṃ. Na hetassa sīsarogādayo byādhayo
tika-s0102t:1166_1: nāma santi, na sattānaṃ viya cutisaṅkhātaṃ maraṇaṃ, na soke uppajjati, cutisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0102t:1166_2: maraṇanti ca ekabhavapariyāpannakhandhanirodho, so tassa natthi, khaṇikanirodho pana
tika-s0102t:1166_3: khaṇe khaṇe labbhateva. Rāgādīhi pana saṃkilesehi saṃkilissatīti saṃkilesadhammavāre
tika-s0102t:1166_4: gahitaṃ jātarūpaṃ, tathā utusamuṭṭhānattā jātidhammavāre, malaṃ gahetvā jīraṇato
tika-s0102t:1166_5: jarādhammavāre ca. Ariyehi na araṇīyā, pariyesanātipi anariyapariyesanā.
tika-s0102t:1167: Idāni anesanāvasenāpi taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā nayena sukkapakkhepi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1168_1: tādisaṃ upakkamanibbattanaṃ, pāṇātipātādiatthaṃ gamanaṃ, paccekaṃ kāla-saddo yojetabbo
tika-s0102t:1168_3: Itaroti “sevitabbo”ti vuttakāyasamācārādiko. Cittampi uppādetabbaṃ. Tathā uppāditacitto
tika-s0102t:1168_4: hi sati paccayasamavāye tādisaṃ payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karonto paṭipattiyā matthakaṃ
tika-s0102t:1168_5: gaṇhāti. Tenāha “cittuppādampi kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, kusalesu dhammesu bahupakāraṃ vadāmī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1169_0: Idāni taṃ matthakappattaṃ asevitabbaṃ, sevitabbañca dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1169_2: dhammaratanupaṭṭhānasiddhīti āha “divasassa dvattikkhattuṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ upaṭṭhānagamanādivasenā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1169_3: Dhanuggahapesanaṃ dhanuggahapurisānaṃ uyyojanaṃ. Ādi-saddena pañcavarayācanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0102t:1170_0: Pāripūriyāti pāripūriatthaṃ. Aggamaggaphalavaseneva hi sevitabbānaṃ pāripūrīti tadatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1170_1: sabbā pubbabhāgapaṭipadā, pātimokkhasaṃvaropi aggamaggeneva paripuṇṇo hotīti tadatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1172_0: 365. Indriyānaṃ pidhānāyāti indriyānaṃ pidahanatthāya. Indriyāni ca cakkhādīni dvārāni,
tika-s0102t:1172_1: tesaṃ pidhānaṃ saṃvaraṇaṃ akusaluppattito gopanāti āha “guttadvāratāyā”ti. Asevitabbarūpādivasena
tika-s0102t:1172_3: Kāmaṃ pāḷiyaṃ asevitabbampi rūpādi dassitaṃ, sakkena pana indriyasaṃvarāya paṭipatti
tika-s0102t:1172_4: pucchitāti tameva nivattetvā dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃvuttaṃ “cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpampītiādi
tika-s0102t:1172_6: tuṇhībhāvassa kāraṇaṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāvetuṃ “kathetukāmopī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayanti sakko devānaṃ indo.
tika-s0102t:1173_0: Rūpanti rūpāyatanaṃ, tassa asevanaṃ nāma adassanaṃ evāti āha “na sevitabbaṃ na daṭṭhabba”nti.
tika-s0102t:1173_1: Yaṃ pana sattasantānagataṃ rūpaṃ passato paṭikūlamanasikāravasena, asubhasaññā vā
tika-s0102t:1173_2: saṇṭhāti dassanānuttariyavasena. Atha vā kammaphalasaddahanavasena pasādo vā uppajjati.
tika-s0102t:1174_0: Pariyāyakkharaṇato akkharaṃ, vaṇṇo, so eva nirantaruppattiyā samuddito padavākyasaññito,
tika-s0102t:1174_1: adhippetamatthaṃ byañjetīti byañjanaṃ, tayidaṃ kābyanāṭakādigatavevacanavasena, uccāraṇavasena
tika-s0102t:1174_3: sandhāyāha “yaṃ cittakkharaṃ cittabyañjanampi saddaṃ suṇato rāgādayo uppajjantī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1174_6: Nibbidā vāti aniccasaññādivasena vaṭṭato ukkaṇṭhā vā.
tika-s0102t:1175_0: Gandharasāviparodhādivasena seviyamānaṃ ayoniso paṭipannattā asevitabbaṃ nāma. Yoniso
tika-s0102t:1175_1: paccavekkhitvā seviyamānaṃ sampajaññavasena gahaṇato sevitabbaṃ nāma. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:1176_0: Yaṃ pana phusatoti yaṃ pana sevitabbaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ anipphannasseva phusato. Āsavakkhayo
tika-s0102t:1176_1: ceva hoti jāgariyānuyogassa matthakappattito. Vīriyañca supaggahitaṃ hoti catutthassa
tika-s0102t:1176_2: ariyavaṃsassa ukkaṃsanato. Pacchimā ca…pe… anuggahitā hoti sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ niyojanato.
tika-s0102t:1177_0: Ye manoviññeyye dhamme iṭṭhādibhede samannāharantassa āvajjantassa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti.
tika-s0102t:1177_2: ye manoviññeyyā dhammā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, evarūpā sevitabbāti yojanā. Ādi-saddena
tika-s0102t:1177_3: karuṇādīnañceva aniccādīnañca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ dhammāti idāni vuccamānapaṭipattīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:1177_4: tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ manoviññeyyā dhammā. Bahi dhāvituṃ na adāsinti antopariveṇaṃ āgatameva
tika-s0102t:1177_5: rūpādiṃ ārabbha imasmiṃ temāse kammaṭṭhānavinimuttaṃ cittaṃ kadāci uppannapubbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1177_6: antopariveṇe ca visabhāgarūpādīnaṃ asambhavo eva, tasmā visaṭavitakkavasena cittaṃ
tika-s0102t:1177_7: bahi dhāvituṃ na adāsinti dasseti. Nivāsagehato nivāsanagabbhato. Niyakajjhattakhandhapañcakato
tika-s0102t:1177_8: vipassanāgocarato. Thero kira sabbampi attanā kātabbakiriyaṃ kammaṭṭhānasīseneva paṭipajjati.
tika-s0102t:1178_0: 366. Asammohasampajaññavasena advejjhābhāvato eko anto etassāti ekanto, ekanto vādo
tika-s0102t:1178_1: etesanti ekantavādā. Tenāha “ekaṃyeva vadantī”ti, abhinnavādāti attho. Ekācārāti
tika-s0102t:1179_0: Iti sakko pubbe attanā sutaṃ puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ nānāvādā cāraladdhiniṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1179_1: idāni saccapaṭivedhena asārato ñatvā ṭhito, tassa kāraṇaṃ ñātukāmo tameva tāva byatirekamukhena
tika-s0102t:1180_0: Dhātūti ajjhāsayadhātu uttarapadalopena vuttā, ajjhāsayadhātūti ca atthato ajjhāsayo
tika-s0102t:1180_1: evāti āha “anekajjhāsayo nānajjhāsayo”ti. “Ekasmiṃ gantukāme eko ṭhātukāmo hotī”ti
tika-s0102t:1180_2: idaṃ nidassanavasena vuttaṃ iriyāpathepi nāma sattā ekajjhāsayā dullabhā, pageva
tika-s0102t:1180_3: laddhīsūti dassanatthaṃ. Yaṃ yadeva ajjhāsayanti yaṃ yameva sassatādiajjhāsayaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1180_4: Abhinivisantīti taṃ taṃ laddhiṃ diṭṭhābhinivesavasena abhimukhā hutvā duppaṭinissaggibhāvena
tika-s0102t:1180_5: nivisanti, ādānaggāhaṃ gaṇhanti. Thāmena ca parāmāsena cāti diṭṭhithāmena ca diṭṭhiparāmāsena
tika-s0102t:1180_6: ca. Suṭṭhu gaṇhitvāti ativiya daḷhaggāhaṃ gaṇhitvā. Voharantīti yathābhiniviṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0102t:1180_7: diṭṭhivādaṃ paññāpenti pare hi gāhenti patiṭṭhapenti. Tenāha “kathenti dīpenti kittentī”ti, ugghosentīti attho.
tika-s0102t:1181_0: Antaṃ atītā accantā, accantā niṭṭhā etesanti accantaniṭṭhā. Sabbesanti sabbesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1181_1: Yogakkhemotipi nibbānaṃ catūhipi yogehi anuppaduṭṭhattā. “Accantayogakkhemā”ti vattabbe
tika-s0102t:1181_2: i-kārena niddesena “accantayogakkhemī”ti vuttaṃ, accantayogakkhemo vā etesaṃ atthīti
tika-s0102t:1181_3: accantayogakkhemīti. Caranti upagacchanti, adhigacchantīti attho. Pariyassati parikkhissati
tika-s0102t:1182: Saṅkhiṇātīti samucchindanena khepeti. Vināsetīti tato eva sabbaso adassanaṃ pāpeti. Vimuttāti vaṭṭadukkhato accantaniggamena visesena muttā.
tika-s0102t:1183_0: “Issāmacchariyaṃ eko pañho”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu issāmacchariyaṃ vissajjananti? Saccametaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1183_1: yo pana ñātuṃ icchito attho, so pañho. So eva ca vissajjīyatīti nāyaṃ doso, aññathā
tika-s0102t:1183_2: ambaṃ puṭṭhassa labujaṃ byākaraṇaṃ viya siyā, evaṃ pañhasīsena pañhabyākaraṇaṃ vadati.
tika-s0102t:1183_4: eseva nayo. Papañcasaññāti saññāsīsena papañcā eva vuttāti āha “papañco eko”ti. Ettha
tika-s0102t:1183_5: ca yathā pātimokkhasaṃvarapucchā kāyasamācārādivibhāgena vissajjitattā tayo pañhā
tika-s0102t:1183_6: jātā, evaṃ indriyasaṃvarapucchā rūpādivibhāgena vissajjitattā cha pañhā siyuṃ. Tathā
tika-s0102t:1183_7: sati ekūnavīsati pucchā siyuṃ, atha indriyasaṃvaratāsāmaññena ekova pañho kato, evaṃ
tika-s0102t:1183_8: sati pātimokkhasaṃvarapucchābhāvasāmaññena tepi tayo ekova pañhoti sabbeva dvādaseva
tika-s0102t:1183_9: pañhā bhaveyyunti? Nayidamevaṃ. Yasmā kāyasamācārādīsu vibhajja vuccamānesu mahāvisayatāya
tika-s0102t:1183_10: aparimāṇo vibhāgo sambhavati vissajjetuṃ. Sakalampi vinayapiṭakaṃ tassa niddeso.
tika-s0102t:1183_11: Rūpādīsu pana vibhajja vuccamānesu appavisayatāya na tādiso vibhāgo sambhavati vissajjetuṃ.
tika-s0102t:1183_12: Iti mahāvisayatāya pātimokkhasaṃvarapucchā tayo pañhā katā, indriyasaṃvarapucchā
tika-s0102t:1183_13: pana appavisayatāya ekova pañho kato. Tena vuttaṃ “cuddasa mahāpañhā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1184_0: 367. Calanaṭṭhenāti kampanaṭṭhena. Taṇhā hi kāmarāgarūparāgaarūparāgādivasena pavattiyā
tika-s0102t:1184_1: anavaṭṭhitatāya sayampi calati, yattha uppannā, tampi santānaṃ bhavādīsu parikaḍḍhanena
tika-s0102t:1184_2: cāleti, tasmā calanaṭṭhena taṇhā ejā nāma. Pīḷanaṭṭhenāti vibādhanaṭṭhena tassa tassa
tika-s0102t:1184_4: kilesāsucipaggharaṇena ca pakārato dussanaṭṭhena gaṇḍo. Anuppaviṭṭhaṭṭhenāti āsayassa
tika-s0102t:1184_5: dunnīharaṇīyabhāvena anuppavisanaṭṭhena. Kaḍḍhati attano ca ruciyā upaneti. Uccāvacanti
tika-s0102t:1184_6: paṇītabhāvaṃ, nihīnabhāvañca. Yesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu. “Yesāha”ntipi pāḷi, tassā keci
tika-s0102t:1184_7: “yesaṃ aha”nti atthaṃ vadanti. Evanti sutānurūpaṃ, uggahānurūpañca. “Ahaṃ kho pana
tika-s0102t:1184_8: bhante aññesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ dhammācariyo hontopi bhagavato sāvako…pe… sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti
tika-s0102t:1186_0: 368. Samāpannoti samogāḷho pavattasampahāro viyātibyūḷho. Jiniṃsūti yathā asurā puna
tika-s0102t:1186_1: sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, evaṃ devā vijiniṃsuyevāti dassento āha “devā puna apaccāgamanāya
tika-s0102t:1186_2: asure jiniṃsū”ti. Tādiso hissa jayo sātisayaṃ vedapaṭilābhāya ahosi. Duvidhampi ojanti
tika-s0102t:1186_3: dibbaṃ, asuraṃ cāti dvippakārampi ojaṃ. Devāyeva paribhuñjissanti asurānaṃ pavesābhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1186_4: Daṇḍassa avacaraṇaṃ āvaraṇaṃ daṇḍāvacaro, saha daṇḍāvacarenāti sadaṇḍāvacaro, daṇḍena
tika-s0102t:1186_5: paharitvā vā āvaritvā vā sādhetabbanti attho.
tika-s0102t:1187: 369. Imasmiṃyeva okāseti imissameva indasālaguhāyaṃ. Devabhūtassa meti pubbepi devabhūtassa sakkasseva me bhūtassa. Satoti idānipi sakkasseva sato punarāyu ca me laddho.
tika-s0102t:1188_0: Diviyā kāyāti dibbā, khandhapañcakasaṅkhātā kāyāti āha “dibbā attabhāvā”ti. “Amūḷho
tika-s0102t:1188_1: gabbhaṃ essāmī”ti iminā ariyasāvakānaṃ andhaputhujjanānaṃ viya sammohamaraṇaṃ, asampajānagabbhokkamanañca
tika-s0102t:1188_2: natthi, atha kho asammohamaraṇañceva sampajānagabbhokkamanañca hotīti dasseti. Ariyasāvakā
tika-s0102t:1188_3: niyatagatikattā sugatīsu eva uppajjanti, tatthāpi manussesu uppajjantā uḷāresu eva
tika-s0102t:1188_4: kulesu paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhissanti, sakkassāpi tādiso ajjhāsayo. Tena vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0102t:1188_5: “yattha me ramatī mano”ti, taṃ sandhāyāha “yattha me”tiādi. Sakko pana attano dibbānubhāvenāpi
tika-s0102t:1190_0: Sakadāgāmimaggaṃ sandhāya vadati chaṭṭhe atthavase anāgāmimaggassa vakkhamānattā.
tika-s0102t:1190_1: Ājānitukāmoti appattaṃ visesaṃ paṭivijjhitukāmo. Manussaloke anto bhavissati puna
tika-s0102t:1191: Punadevāti manussesu uppanno tato cavitvā punadeva. Imasmiṃ tāvatiṃsadevalokasmiṃ. Uttamo, kīdisoti āha “sakko”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1192_0: Antime bhaveti mama sabbabhavesu antime sabbapariyosāne bhave. “Āyunā”ti iminā ca
tika-s0102t:1192_1: taṃsahabhāvino sabbepi vaṇṇādike saṅgaṇhāti. “Paññāyā”ti ca iminā sabbepi saddhāsativīriyādike.
tika-s0102t:1192_2: Tasmiṃ attabhāveti tasmiṃ sabbantime sakkattabhāve. Akaniṭṭhagāmī hutvāti antarāyaparinibbāyiādibhāvaṃ
tika-s0102t:1192_3: anupagantvā ekaṃsato uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī eva hutvā. Tato eva anukkamena avihādīsu
tika-s0102t:1192_4: nibbattanto. Evamāhāti “so nivāso bhavissatī”ti evamāha. “Avihādīsu…pe… nibbattissatī”ti
tika-s0102t:1192_5: saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “esa kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayañca nayo na kevalaṃ
tika-s0102t:1192_6: sakkasseva, atha kho mahāseṭṭhimahāupāsikānampi hotiyevāti dassento “sakko devarājā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1193_1: taṃ taṃ pattukāmoyeva hutvā ṭhito. Ye ca samaṇeti ye ca pabbajite. Pavivittavihārinoti
tika-s0102t:1194_0: Sampādanāti maggassa upasampādanaṃ tassa sampāpanaṃ sammadeva pāpanaṃ. Virādhanāti
tika-s0102t:1194_1: anārādhanā anupāyapaṭipatti. Na sambhontīti anabhisambhuṇanti. Yathāpucchite atthe
tika-s0102t:1194_2: anabhisambhuṇanaṃ nāma sammā kathetuṃ asamatthatā evāti āha “sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkontī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1195_0: Tasmāti yasmā ādiccena samānagottatāya. Tenevāha “ādicca nāma gottenā”ti, tasmā.
tika-s0102t:1195_1: Ādicco bandhu etassāti ādiccabandhu, atha vā ādiccassa bandhūti ādiccabandhu, bhagavā,
tika-s0102t:1195_2: taṃ ādiccabandhunaṃ. Ādicco hi sotāpannatāya bhagavato orasaputto. Tenevāha –
tika-s0102t:1200: Sāmanti sāmaṃpayogaṃ, satthu pana sāvakassa sāmaṃpayogo nāma sanipāto evāti āha “namakkāraṃ karomā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1201_0: 371. Parāmasitvāti “imāya nāma pathaviyaṃ nisinnena mayā ayaṃ acchariyadhammo adhigato”ti
tika-s0102t:1201_1: somanassajāto, “imāya nāma pathaviyaṃ evaṃ acchariyabbhutaṃ buddharatanaṃ uppanna”nti
tika-s0102t:1201_2: acchariyabbhutacittajāto ca pathaviṃ parāmasitvā. Patthitapañhāti dīgharattānusayitasaṃsayasamugghātatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1201_3: “kadā nu kho bhagavantaṃ pucchituṃ labhāmī”ti evaṃ abhipatthitapañhā. Yaṃ panettha
tika-s0102t:1205_0: 373. “Kasmā bhagavā idaṃ suttamabhāsī”ti asādhāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati, sādhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1205_1: pana “pākaṭa”nti anāmasitvā “kururaṭṭhavāsīna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Samuṭṭhānanti hi desanānidānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1205_2: taṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇabhedato duvidhaṃ, sādhāraṇampi ajjhattikabāhirabhedato duvidhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1205_3: Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ ajjhattikaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhagavato mahākaruṇā. Tāya hi samussāhitassa
tika-s0102t:1205_4: bhagavato veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya cittaṃ udapādi. Yathāha “sattesu ca kāruññataṃ
tika-s0102t:1205_5: paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”tiādi. bāhiraṃ pana sādhāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1205_6: nāma dasasahassamahābrahmaparivārassa sahampatimahābrahmuno ajjhesanaṃ. Tathā cāha
tika-s0102t:1205_8: appossukkataṃ paṭipassambhetvā bhagavā dhammaṃ desetuṃ ussāhajāto ahosi. Yathā ca
tika-s0102t:1205_9: mahākaruṇā, evaṃ dasabalañāṇādayo ca desanāya ajjhattasamuṭṭhānabhāve vattabbā. Sabbañhi
tika-s0102t:1205_10: ñeyyadhammaṃ, tesaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ, sattānañca āsayānusayādiṃ yāthāvato jānitvā
tika-s0102t:1205_11: bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu kosallena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vicittanayadesanaṃ pavattesīti.
tika-s0102t:1205_12: Asādhāraṇampi ajjhattikabāhirabhedato duvidhameva. Tattha ajjhattikaṃ yāya mahākaruṇāya,
tika-s0102t:1205_13: yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ pavattitaṃ, tadubhayaṃ veditabbaṃ, bāhiraṃ pana
tika-s0102t:1205_15: tena “attajjhāsayādīsu catūsu suttanikkhepesu kataroya”nti suttanikkhepo pucchito
tika-s0102t:1206_0: Kururaṭṭhaṃ kira tadā taṃnivāsisattānaṃ yonisomanasikāravantatādinā yebhuyyena suppaṭipannatāya,
tika-s0102t:1206_1: pubbe ca katapuññatābalena tadā utuādisampattiyuttameva ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ “utupaccayādisampannattā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1206_2: Ādi-saddena bhojanādisampattiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Keci pana “pubbe pavattakuruvattadhammānuṭṭhānavāsanāya
tika-s0102t:1206_3: uttarakuru viya yebhuyyena utuādisampannameva hontaṃ bhagavato kāle sātisayaṃ utusappāyādiyuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:1206_4: taṃ raṭṭhaṃ ahosī”ti vadanti. Cittasarīrakallatāyāti cittassa, sarīrassa ca arogatāya.
tika-s0102t:1206_5: Anuggahitapaññābalāti laddhūpakārañāṇānubhāvā, anu anu vā āciṇṇapaññātejā. Ekavīsatiyā
tika-s0102t:1206_6: ṭhānesuti kāyānupassanāvasena cuddasasu ṭhānesu, vedanānupassanāvasena ekasmiṃ ṭhāne,
tika-s0102t:1206_7: tathā cittānupassanāvasena, dhammānupassanāvasena pañcasu ṭhānesūti evaṃ ekavīsatiyā
tika-s0102t:1206_8: ṭhānesu. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvāti catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ yathā arahattaṃ
tika-s0102t:1206_9: pāpeti, evaṃ desanāvasena arahatte pakkhipitvā. Suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakasuvaṇṇamañjūsāsu
tika-s0102t:1206_10: pakkhittāni sumanacampakādinānāpupphāni, maṇimuttādisattaratanāni ca yathā bhājanasampattiyā
tika-s0102t:1206_11: savisesaṃ sobhanti, kiccakarāni ca honti manuññabhāvato, evaṃ sīladassanādisampattiyā
tika-s0102t:1206_12: bhājanavisesabhūtāya kururaṭṭhavāsiparisāya desitā bhagavato ayaṃ desanā bhiyyoso
tika-s0102t:1206_13: mattāya sobhati, kiccakārī ca hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “yathā hi puriso”tiādinā. Etthāti kururaṭṭhe.
tika-s0102t:1207: Pakatiyāti sarasatopi, imissā satipaṭṭhānasuttadesanāya pubbepīti adhippāyo. Anuyuttā viharanti satthu desanānusārato bhāvanānuyogaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1208_0: Vissaṭṭhaattabhāvenāti aniccādivasena kismiñci yonisomanasikāre cittaṃ aniyojetvā
tika-s0102t:1208_1: rūpādiārammaṇe abhirativasena vissaṭṭhacittena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati, pamādavihāraṃ
tika-s0102t:1209_0: Ekāyanoti ettha ayana-saddo maggapariyāyo. Na kevalaṃ ayanameva, atha kho aññepi
tika-s0102t:1209_1: bahū maggapariyāyāti paduddhāraṃ karonto “maggassa hī”ti ādiṃ vatvā yadi maggapariyāyo
tika-s0102t:1209_2: ayana-saddo, kasmā puna “maggo”ti vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tasmā”tiādi. Tattha
tika-s0102t:1209_3: ekamaggoti eko eva maggo. Na hi nibbānagāmimaggo añño atthīti. Nanu satipaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1209_4: idha maggoti adhippetaṃ, tadaññe ca bahū maggadhammā atthīti? Saccaṃ atthi, te pana
tika-s0102t:1209_5: satipaṭṭhānaggahaṇeneva gahitā tadavinābhāvato. Tathā hi ñāṇavīriyādayo niddese gahitā,
tika-s0102t:1209_6: uddese pana satiyā eva gahaṇaṃ veneyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Na dvidhāpathabhūto”ti
tika-s0102t:1209_7: iminā imassa maggassa anekamaggabhāvābhāvaṃ viya anibbānagāmibhāvābhāvañca dasseti.
tika-s0102t:1209_8: Ekenāti asahāyena. Asahāyatā ca duvidhā attadutiyatābhāvena vā, yā “vūpakaṭṭhakāyatā”ti
tika-s0102t:1209_9: vuccati, taṇhādutiyatābhāvena vā, yā “pavivittacittatā”ti vuccati. Tenāha “vūpakaṭṭhena
tika-s0102t:1209_10: pavivittacittenā”ti. Seṭṭhopi loke “eko”ti vuccati “yāva pare ekāhaṃ vo karomī”tiādīsūti
tika-s0102t:1209_11: āha “ekassāti seṭṭhassā”ti. Yadi saṃsārato nissaraṇaṭṭho ayanaṭṭho, aññesampi upanissayasampannānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1209_12: sādhāraṇato, kathaṃ bhagavatoti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi. Imasmiṃ khoti ettha kho-saddo
tika-s0102t:1209_13: avadhāraṇe, tasmā imasmiṃ yevāti attho. Desanābhedoyeva heso, yadidaṃ “maggo”ti vā
tika-s0102t:1209_14: “ayano”ti vā. Ayana-saddo vā kammakaraṇādivibhāgo. Tenāha “atthato pana eko vā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1210_1: pavatto. Ekāyananti ekagāminaṃ, nibbānagāminanti attho. Nibbānañhi adutiyabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1210_2: seṭṭhabhāvato ca “eka”nti vuccati. Yathāha “ekañhi saccaṃ na dutīyamatthī”ti. “Yāvatā
tika-s0102t:1210_3: bhikkhave dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā virāgo tesaṃ aggaṃ akkhāyatī”ti. khayo
tika-s0102t:1210_4: eva antoti khayanto, jātiyā khayantaṃ diṭṭhavāti jātikhayantadassī. Avibhāgena sabbepi
tika-s0102t:1210_5: satte hitena anukampatīti hitānukampī. Atariṃsūti tariṃsu. Pubbeti purimakā buddhā, pubbe vā atītakāle.
tika-s0102t:1211_0: Tanti tesaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ vā kiriyāvuttivācakattaṃ na yujjati. Na hi saṅkheyyappadhānatāya
tika-s0102t:1211_1: sattavācino ekasaddassa kiriyāvuttivācakatā atthi. “Sakimpi uddhaṃ gaccheyyā”tiādīsu
tika-s0102t:1211_2: viya sakiṃ ayanoti iminā byañjanena bhavitabbaṃ. Evamatthaṃ yojetvāti “ekaṃ ayanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1211_3: assā”ti evaṃ samāsapadatthaṃ yojetvā. Ubhayathāpīti purimanayena, pacchimanayena
tika-s0102t:1211_4: ca. Na yujjati idhādhippetamaggassa anekavāraṃ pavattisabbhāvato. Tenāha “kasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1211_5: “Anekavārampi ayatī”ti purimanayassa ayuttatādassanaṃ, “anekañcassa ayanaṃ hotī”ti pacchimanayassa.
tika-s0102t:1212_0: Imasmiṃ padeti “ekāyano ayaṃ bhikkhave maggo”ti imasmiṃ vākye, imasmiṃ vā “pubbabhāgamaggo,
tika-s0102t:1212_1: lokuttaramaggo”ti vidhānapade. Missakamaggoti lokiyena missako lokuttaramaggo. Visuddhiādīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:1212_2: nippariyāyahetukaṃ saṅgaṇhanto ācariyatthero “missakamaggo”ti āha. Itaro pariyāyahetu
tika-s0102t:1213_0: Saddaṃ sutvāti “kālo bhante dhammasavanāyā”ti kālārocanasaddaṃ paccakkhato, paramparāya
tika-s0102t:1213_1: ca sutvā. Evaṃ ukkhipitvāti evaṃ “sundaraṃ manoharaṃ imaṃ kathaṃ chaḍḍemā”ti achaḍḍentā
tika-s0102t:1213_2: ucchubhāraṃ viya paggahetvā na vicaranti. Āluḷetīti viluḷito ākulo hotīti attho.
tika-s0102t:1213_3: Ekāyanamaggo vuccati pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamaggoti ettāvatā idhādhippetatthe siddhe
tika-s0102t:1213_4: tasseva alaṅkāratthaṃ so pana yassa pubbabhāgamaggo, taṃ dassetuṃ “maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko”tiādikā
tika-s0102t:1214_0: Nibbānagamanaṭṭhenāti nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati etenāti nibbānagamanaṃ,soyeva
tika-s0102t:1214_1: aviparītasabhāvatāya attho, tena nibbānagamanaṭṭhena, nibbānādhigamūpāyatāyāti attho.
tika-s0102t:1214_3: attho. “Rāgādīhī”ti iminā rāgadosamohānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ “rāgo malaṃ, doso malaṃ, moho
tika-s0102t:1214_4: mala”nti vacanato. “Abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhī”ti pana iminā sabbesampi upakkilesānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1214_5: saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ te visuṃ uddhaṭā. “Sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vuttassa atthassa ekantikataṃ
tika-s0102t:1214_6: dassento “tathā hī”tiādimāha. Kāmaṃ “visuddhiyā”ti sāmaññajotanā, cittasseva pana
tika-s0102t:1214_7: visuddhi idhādhippetāti dassetuṃ “rūpamalavasena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na kevalaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanameva,
tika-s0102t:1214_8: atha kho idaṃ ettha āhacca bhāsitanti dassento “tathā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1215_0: Sā panāyaṃ cittavisuddhi sijjhamānā yasmā sokādīnaṃ anuppādāya saṃvattati, tasmā
tika-s0102t:1215_2: cetaso santāpo antonijjhānaṃ soko. Ñātibyasanādinimittameva sokāvatiṇṇato “kahaṃ
tika-s0102t:1215_3: ekaputtaka kahaṃ ekaputtakā”tiādinā paridevanavasena vācāvippalāpo paridavanaṃ paridevo.
tika-s0102t:1215_4: Āyatiṃ anuppajjanaṃ idha samatikkamoti āha “pahānāyā”ti. Taṃ panassa samatikkamāvahataṃ
tika-s0102t:1216_0: Tattha yaṃ pubbe, taṃ visodhehīti atītesu khandhesu taṇhāsaṃkilesavisodhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1216_1: Pacchāti parato. Teti tuyhaṃ. Māhūti mā ahu. Kiñcananti rāgādikiñcanaṃ, etena anāgatesu
tika-s0102t:1216_2: khandhesu saṃkilesavisodhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Majjheti tadubhayavemajjhe. No ce gahessasīti
tika-s0102t:1216_3: na upādiyissasi ce, etena paccuppanne khandhappabandhe upādānappavatti vuttā. Upasanto
tika-s0102t:1216_4: carissasīti evaṃ addhattayagatasaṃkilesavisodhane sati nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya upasanto
tika-s0102t:1216_5: hutvā viharissasīti arahattanikūṭena gāthaṃ niṭṭhapesi. Tenāha “imaṃ gātha”ntiādi.
tika-s0102t:1217_0: Puttāti orasā, aññepi vā dinnakakittimādayo ye keci. Pitāti janako, aññepi vā pituṭṭhāniyā.
tika-s0102t:1217_1: Bandhavāti ñātakā. Ayañhettha attho – puttā vā pitā vā bandhavā vā antakena maccunā
tika-s0102t:1217_2: adhipannassa abhibhūtassa maraṇato tāṇāya na honti. Kasmā? Natthi ñātīsu tāṇatāti.
tika-s0102t:1217_3: Na hi ñātīnaṃ vasena maraṇato ārakkhā atthi, tasmā paṭācāre “ubho puttā kālaṅkatā”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:1217_4: mā niratthakaṃ paridevi, dhammaṃyeva pana yāthāvato passāti adhippāyo. Sotāpattiphale
tika-s0102t:1217_5: patiṭṭhitāti yathānulomaṃ pavattitāya sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya pariyosāne sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍite
tika-s0102t:1217_6: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ satipaṭṭhānamaggavasena sotāpattiphale
tika-s0102t:1217_7: patiṭṭhāsīti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi. Na hi catusaccakammaṭṭhānakathāya vinā sāvakānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1217_8: ariyamaggādhigamo atthi. “Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā”ti panidaṃ sokavinodanavasena pavattitāya
tika-s0102t:1217_9: gāthāya paṭhamaṃ sutattā vuttaṃ, sāpi hi saccadesanāya parivārabandhā eva aniccatākathāti
tika-s0102t:1217_10: katvā. Itaragāthāyaṃ pana vattabbameva natthi. Bhāvanāti paññābhāvanā. Sā hi idha
tika-s0102t:1217_11: adhippetā. Tasmāti yasmā rūpādīnaṃ aniccādito anupassanāpi satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāva,
tika-s0102t:1218_0: Pañcasate coreti satasatacoraparivāre pañcacore paṭipāṭiyā pesesi, te araññaṃ pavisitvā
tika-s0102t:1218_1: theraṃ pariyesantā anukkamena therassa samīpe samāgacchiṃsu. Tenāha “te gantvā theraṃ
tika-s0102t:1218_2: parivāretvā nisīdiṃsū”ti. Vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ūruṭṭhibhedapaccayaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1218_3: amanasikārena vinodetvā. Pītipāmojjaṃ uppajji vippaṭisāralesassapi asambhavato. Tenāha
tika-s0102t:1218_4: “parisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāyā”ti. Therassa hi sīlaṃ paccavekkhato parisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ
tika-s0102t:1218_5: nissāya uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ūruṭṭhibhedajanitaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ vikkhambhesi.
tika-s0102t:1218_6: Tiyāmarattinti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ, tenassa vipassanāyaṃ appamādaṃ, paṭipattiussukkāpanañca
tika-s0102t:1218_7: dasseti. Pādānīti pāde. Saṃyamessāmīti saññapessāmi, saññattiṃ karissāmīti attho.
tika-s0102t:1218_8: Aṭṭiyāmīti jigucchāmi. Harāyāmīti lajjāmi. Vipassisanti sampassiṃ.
tika-s0102t:1219_0: Pacalāyantānanti pacalāyikānaṃ niddaṃ upagatānaṃ. Agatinti agocaraṃ. Vatasampannoti
tika-s0102t:1219_1: dhutaguṇasampanno. Pamādanti pacalāyanaṃ sandhāyāha. Oruddhamānasoti uparuddhaadhicitto.
tika-s0102t:1219_2: Pañjarasminti sarīre. Sarīrañhi nhārusambandhaaṭṭhisaṅghāṭatāya idha “pañjara”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1220_0: Pītavaṇṇāya pana paṭākāya kāyaṃ pariharaṇato, mallayuddhacittakatāya ca “pītamallo”ti
tika-s0102t:1220_1: paññāto pabbajitvā pītamallatthero nāma jāto. Tīsu rajjesūti paṇḍucoḷagoḷarajjesu.
tika-s0102t:1220_2: “Sabbamallā sīhaḷadīpe sakkārasammānaṃ labhantī”ti tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ āgamma. Taṃyeva
tika-s0102t:1220_3: aṅkusaṃ katvāti “rūpādayo ‘mamā’ti na gahetabbā”ti natumhākavaggena pakāsitamatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1220_4: attano cittamattahatthino aṅkusaṃ katvā. Pādesu avahantesūti ativelaṃ caṅkamanena
tika-s0102t:1220_5: akkamituṃ asamatthesu. Jaṇṇukehi caṅkamati “nisinne niddāya avasaro hotī”ti. Byākaritvāti
tika-s0102t:1220_6: attano vīriyārambhassa saphalatāpavedanamukhena sabrahmacārīnaṃ tattha ussāhaṃ janento
tika-s0102t:1220_7: aññaṃ byākaritvā. Bhāsitanti vacanaṃ, kassa pana tanti āha “buddhaseṭṭhassa sabbalokaggavādino”ti.
tika-s0102t:1220_8: “Na tumhāka”ntiādi tassa pavattiākāradassanaṃ. Tayidaṃ me saṅkhārānaṃ accantavūpasamakāraṇanti
tika-s0102t:1220_9: dassento “aniccā vatā”ti gāthamāhari, tena idānāhaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhaṅgasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0102t:1221: Assāti sakkassa. Upapattīti devūpapatti. Puna pākatikāva ahosi sakkabhāveneva upapannattā.
tika-s0102t:1222_0: Subrahmāti evaṃnāmo. Accharānaṃ nirayūpapattiṃ disvā tato pabhuti satataṃ pavattamānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1222_1: attano cittutrāsaṃ sandhāyāha “niccaṃ utrastamidaṃ citta”ntiādi. Tattha utrastanti
tika-s0102t:1222_2: santastaṃ bhītaṃ. Ubbigganti saṃviggaṃ. Utrastanti vā saṃviggaṃ. Ubbigganti bhayavasena
tika-s0102t:1222_3: saha nissayena sañcalitaṃ. Anuppannesūti anāgatesu. Kiccesūti tesu tesu itikattabbesu.
tika-s0102t:1222_4: “Kicchesū”ti vā pāṭho, dukkhesūti attho, nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummaṃ, bhāvidukkhanimittanti
tika-s0102t:1222_5: attho. Uppatitesūti uppannesu kiccesūti yojanā. Tadā attano parivārassa uppannaṃ
tika-s0102t:1223_0: Bojjhāti bodhito, ariyamaggatoti attho. “Aññatrā”ti ca padaṃ apekkhitvā nissakkavacanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1223_1: bodhiṃ ṭhapetvāti attho. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Tapasāti tapokammato, tena maggādhigamassa
tika-s0102t:1223_2: upāyabhūtaṃ sallekhapaṭipadaṃ dasseti. Indriyasaṃvarāti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1223_3: saṃvaraṇato, etena satisaṃvarasīsena sabbampi saṃvarasīlaṃ, lakkhaṇahāranayena vā
tika-s0102t:1223_4: sabbampi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ dasseti. Sabbanissaggāti sabbassapi nissajjanato sabbakilesappahānato.
tika-s0102t:1223_5: Kilesesu hi nissaṭṭhesu kammavaṭṭaṃ, vipākavaṭṭañca nissaṭṭhameva hotīti. Sotthinti
tika-s0102t:1224_0: Ñāyati nicchayena kamati nibbānaṃ, taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo, ariyamaggoti
tika-s0102t:1224_1: āha “ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti. Taṇhāvānavirahitattāti taṇhāsaṅkhātavānavivittattā.
tika-s0102t:1224_2: Taṇhā hi khandhehi khandhaṃ, kammunā phalaṃ, sattehi ca dukkhaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti
tika-s0102t:1224_3: “vāna”nti vuccati, tayidaṃ natthi ettha vānaṃ, na vā etasmiṃ adhigate puggalassa
tika-s0102t:1224_4: vānanti nibbānaṃ, asaṅkhatā dhātu. Parappaccayena vinā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sacchikiriyāti
tika-s0102t:1225_1: gahitā eva honti, te puna kasmā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi
tika-s0102t:1225_3: Taṃ tamatthaṃ ñāpetīti ye ye bodhaneyyapuggalā saṅkhepavitthārādivasena yathā yathā
tika-s0102t:1225_4: bodhetabbā, attano desanāvilāsena bhagavā te te tathā tathā bodhento taṃ tamatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1225_5: ñāpeti. Taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassentoti atthāpattiṃ agaṇento taṃ tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ
tika-s0102t:1225_6: katvā dassento. Na hi sammāsambuddho atthāpattiñāpakādisādhanīyavacanāti. Saṃvattatīti
tika-s0102t:1225_7: jāyati, hotīti attho. Yasmā anatikkantasokaparidevassa na kadāci cittavisuddhi atthi
tika-s0102t:1225_9: samatikkamena hotī”ti. Yasmā pana domanassapaccayehi dukkhadhammehi phuṭṭhaṃ puthujjanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1225_10: sokādayo abhibhavanti, pariññātesu ca tesu te na honti, tasmā vuttaṃ “sokaparidevānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1225_11: samatikkamo dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamenā”ti. Ñāyassāti aggamaggassa, tatiyamaggassa
tika-s0102t:1225_12: ca. Tadadhigamena hi yathākkamaṃ dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamo. Sacchikiriyābhisamayasahabhāvīpi
tika-s0102t:1225_13: itarābhisamayo tadavinābhāvato sacchikiriyābhisamayahetuko viya vutto. Ñāyassādhigamo
tika-s0102t:1225_14: nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti phalañāṇena vā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, “nibbānassa
tika-s0102t:1226_0: Vaṇṇabhaṇananti pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. Tayidaṃ na idheva, atha kho aññatthāpi satthu āciṇṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1226_1: evāti dassento “yatheva hī”tiādimāha. Tattha ādimhi kalyāṇamādi vā kalyāṇaṃ etassāti
tika-s0102t:1226_2: ādikalyāṇaṃ. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ. Byañjanasampattiyā
tika-s0102t:1226_3: sabyañjanaṃ. Sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhapāripūrito, upanetabbassa abhāvato ca kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1226_4: Nirupakkilesato apanetabbassa ca abhāvato parisuddhaṃ. Seṭṭhacariyabhāvato sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1226_5: maggabrahmacariyañca vo pakāsessāmīti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge
tika-s0102t:1226_6: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Ariyavaṃsāti ariyānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ vaṃsā paveṇiyo. Aggaññāti
tika-s0102t:1226_7: aggāti jānitabbā sabbavaṃsehi seṭṭhabhāvato. Rattaññāti cirarattāti jānitabbā. Vaṃsaññāti
tika-s0102t:1226_8: buddhādīnaṃ vaṃsāti jānitabbā. Porāṇāti purātanā anadhunātanattā. Asaṅkiṇṇāti avikiṇṇā
tika-s0102t:1226_9: anapanītā. Asaṅkiṇṇapubbāti “kiṃ imehī”ti ariyehi na apanītapubbā. Na saṅkīyantīti
tika-s0102t:1226_10: idānipi tehi na apanīyanti. Na saṅkīyissantīti anāgatepi tehi na apanīyissanti. Appaṭikuṭṭhā…pe…
tika-s0102t:1226_11: viññūhīti ye loke viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā, tehi appaccakkhatā aninditā, agarahitāti
tika-s0102t:1226_13: vā dhammakoṭṭhāsehi. Upaddaveti anatthe. Visuddhinti visujjhanaṃ saṃkilesappahānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1226_14: Vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho. Pariyāpuṇanaṃ paricayo. Atthassa hadaye ṭhapanaṃ dhāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1227_0: Gandhārakoti gandhāradese uppanno. Pahontīti sakkonti. Aniyyānikamaggāti micchāmaggā,
tika-s0102t:1227_1: micchattaniyatāniyatamaggāpi vā. Suvaṇṇanti kūṭasuvaṇṇampi vuccati. Maṇīti kācamaṇipi,
tika-s0102t:1227_2: muttāti veḷujāpi, pavāḷanti pallavopi vuccatīti rattajambunadādipadehi te visesitā.
tika-s0102t:1228_0: Na tato heṭṭhāti idhādhippetakāyādīnaṃ vedanādisabhāvattābhāvā, kāyavedanācittavimuttassa
tika-s0102t:1228_1: tebhūmakadhammassa visuṃ vipallāsavatthantarabhāvena gahitattā ca heṭṭhā gahaṇesu
tika-s0102t:1228_2: vipallāsavatthūnaṃ aniṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, pañcamassa pana vipallāsavatthuno
tika-s0102t:1228_3: abhāvā “na uddha”nti āha. Ārammaṇavibhāgena hettha satipaṭṭhānavibhāgoti. Tayo satipaṭṭhānāti
tika-s0102t:1228_4: satipaṭṭhāna-saddassa atthuddhāradassanaṃ, na idha pāḷiyaṃ vuttassa satipaṭṭhāna-saddassa
tika-s0102t:1228_5: atthadassananti. Ādīsu hi satigocaroti ettha ādi-saddena “phassasamudayā vedanānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1228_6: samudayo, nāmarūpasamudayā cittassa samudayo, manasikārasamudayā dhammānaṃ samudayo”ti
tika-s0102t:1228_7: “satipaṭṭhānā”ti vuttānaṃ sabhigocarānaṃ pakāsake suttappadese saṅgaṇhāti. Evaṃ “paṭisambhidāpāḷiya”mpi
tika-s0102t:1228_8: avasesapāḷippadesadassanattho ādi-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Satiyā paṭṭhānanti satiyā patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1228_9: Dānādīni karontassa rūpādīni satiyā ṭhānaṃ hontīti taṃnivāraṇatthamāha “padhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1228_10: ṭhāna”nti. Pa-saddo hi idha “paṇītā dhammā”tiādīsu viya padhānatthadīpakoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:1229: Ariyoti ariyaṃ sabbasattaseṭṭhaṃ sammāsambuddhamāha. Etthāti etasmiṃ saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasutte. suttekadesena hi suttaṃ dasseti. Tattha hi –
tika-s0102t:1230_0: “Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo…pe… arahatīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca
tika-s0102t:1230_1: vuttaṃ. Idha, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ
tika-s0102t:1230_2: upādāya ‘idaṃ vo hitāya idaṃ vo sukhāyā’ti. Tassa sāvakā na sussūsanti. Na sotaṃ
tika-s0102t:1230_3: odahanti, na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, vokkamma ca satthu sāsanā vattanti. Tatra,
tika-s0102t:1230_4: bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti,
tika-s0102t:1230_5: anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Yadariyo sevati…pe… arahati.
tika-s0102t:1231_0: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, satthā…pe...idaṃ vo sukhāyāti. Tassa ekacce sāvakā na sussūsanti…pe…
tika-s0102t:1231_1: na ca vokkamma satthu sāsanā vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano
tika-s0102t:1231_2: hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, na ca attamano hoti, na ca attamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti,
tika-s0102t:1231_3: anattamanatā ca attamanatā ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
tika-s0102t:1232_0: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave…pe… sukhāyāti, tassa sāvakā sussūsanti…pe… vattanti. Tatra,
tika-s0102t:1232_1: bhikkhave, tathāgato attamano ceva hoti, attamanatañca paṭisaṃvedeti, anavassuto
tika-s0102t:1232_2: ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, tatiya”nti.
tika-s0102t:1233_0: Evaṃ paṭighānunayehi anavassutatā, niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāya tadubhayavītivattatā
tika-s0102t:1233_1: “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuttā. Buddhānaṃyeva hi niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitā hoti āveṇikadhammabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1233_2: na paccekabuddhādīnaṃ. Pa-saddo ārambhaṃ joteti, ārambho ca pavattīti katvā āha “pavattayitabbatoti
tika-s0102t:1233_3: attho”ti. Satiyā karaṇabhūtāya paṭṭhānaṃ paṭṭhapetabbaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Ana-saddo
tika-s0102t:1233_4: hi bahulaṃvacanena kammatthopi hotīti. Tathāssa kattuatthopi labbhatīti “paṭṭhātīti
tika-s0102t:1233_5: paṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Paṭṭhātīti ettha pa-saddo bhusatthavisiṭṭhaṃ pakkhandanaṃ dīpetīti
tika-s0102t:1233_6: “okkanditvā pakkhanditvā pattharitvā pavattatīti attho”ti āha. Puna bhāvatthaṃ sati,
tika-s0102t:1233_7: saddaṃ, paṭṭhānasaddañca vaṇṇento “atha vā”tiādimāha, tena purimavikappe sati, saddo,
tika-s0102t:1233_8: paṭṭhāna-saddo ca kattuatthoti viññāyati. Saraṇaṭṭhenāti cirakatassa, cirabhāsitassa
tika-s0102t:1233_9: ca anussaraṇaṭṭhena. Idanti yaṃ “satiyeva satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ, idaṃ. Idha imasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:1234_0: Yadi evanti. Yadi sati eva satipaṭṭhānaṃ, sati nāma eko dhammo, evaṃ sante kasmā
tika-s0102t:1234_1: “satipaṭṭhānā”ti bahuvacananti āha “satibahuttā”tiādi. Yadi bahukā tā satiyo, atha
tika-s0102t:1234_2: kasmā “maggo”ti ekavacananti yojanā. Maggaṭṭhenāti niyyānaṭṭhena. Niyyāniko hi maggadhammo,
tika-s0102t:1234_3: teneva niyyānikabhāvena ekattūpagato ekantato nibbānaṃ gacchati, atthikehi ca tadatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1234_4: maggīyatīti āha “vuttañheta”nti, attanāva pubbe vuttaṃ paccāharati. Tattha catassopi
tika-s0102t:1234_5: cetāti kāyānupassanādivasena catubbidhāpi ca etā satiyo. Aparabhāgeti ariyamaggakkhaṇe.
tika-s0102t:1234_6: Kiccaṃ sādhayamānāti pubbabhāge kāyādīsu subhasaññādividhamanavasena visuṃ visuṃ
tika-s0102t:1234_7: pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe satiyeva tattha catubbidhassapi vipallāsassa samucchedavasena
tika-s0102t:1234_8: pahānakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nibbānaṃ gacchati. Catukiccasādhaneneva
tika-s0102t:1234_9: hettha bahuvacananiddeso. Evañca satīti evaṃ maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ upādāya “maggo”ti
tika-s0102t:1234_10: ekavacanena, ārammaṇabhedena catubbidhataṃ upādāya “cattāro”ti ca vattabbatāya sati
tika-s0102t:1234_11: vijjamānattā. Vacanānusandhinā “ekāyano aya”ntiādikā desanā sānusandhikāva, na ananusandhikāti
tika-s0102t:1235_0: Visesato kāyo, vedanā ca assādassa kāraṇanti tappahānatthaṃ tesu taṇhāvatthūsu oḷārikasukhumesu
tika-s0102t:1235_1: asubhadukkhabhāvadassanāni mandatikkhapaññehi taṇhācaritehi sukarānīti tāni tesaṃ
tika-s0102t:1235_2: “visuddhimaggo”ti vuttāni. Tathā “niccaṃ attā”ti abhinivesavatthutāya diṭṭhiyā visesakāraṇesu
tika-s0102t:1235_4: ca nātippabhedātippabhedagatesu tesu tappahānatthaṃ mandatikkhapaññānaṃ diṭṭhicaritānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1235_5: sukarānīti tesaṃ tāni “visuddhimaggo”ti vuttāni. Ettha ca yathā cittadhammānampi
tika-s0102t:1235_6: taṇhāya vatthubhāvo sambhavati, tathā kāyavedanānampi diṭṭhiyāti satipi nesaṃ catunnampi
tika-s0102t:1235_7: taṇhādiṭṭhivatthubhāve yo yassā sātisayapaccayo, taṃ dassanatthaṃ visesaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1235_8: katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tikkhapaññasamathayāniko oḷārikārammaṇaṃ pariggaṇhanto tattha
tika-s0102t:1235_9: aṭṭhatvā jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya vedanaṃ pariggaṇhātīti vuttaṃ “oḷārikārammaṇe
tika-s0102t:1235_10: asaṇṭhahanato”ti. Vipassanāyānikassa pana sukhume citte, dhammesu ca cittaṃ pakkhandatīti
tika-s0102t:1236_0: Tesaṃ tatthāti ettha tattha-saddassa “pahānattha”nti etena yojanā. Parato tesaṃ tatthāti
tika-s0102t:1236_1: etthāpi eseva nayo. Pañca kāmaguṇā savisesā kāye labbhantīti visesena kāyo kāmoghassa
tika-s0102t:1236_2: vatthu, bhavesu sukhaggahaṇavasena bhavassādo hotīti bhavoghassa vedanā vatthu, santatighanaggahaṇavasena
tika-s0102t:1236_3: visesato citte attābhiniveso hotīti diṭṭhoghassa cittaṃ vatthu, dhammesu vinibbhogassa
tika-s0102t:1236_4: dukkarattā, dhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya duppaṭivijjhattā ca sammoho hotīti avijjoghassa
tika-s0102t:1236_5: dhammā vatthu, tasmā tesu tesaṃ pahānatthaṃ cattārova vuttā.
tika-s0102t:1237_1: dīpito hoti oghehi tesaṃ atthato anaññattā. Yadaggena ca kāyo kāmoghādīnaṃ vatthu,
tika-s0102t:1237_2: tadaggena abhijjhākāyaganthassa vatthu. “Dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti
tika-s0102t:1237_4: vatthu. Citte niccaggahaṇavasena sassatassa attano sīlena suddhīti ādi parāmasanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1237_5: hotīti sīlabbataparāmāsassa cittaṃ vatthu. Nāmarūpaparicchedena bhūtaṃ bhūtato apassantassa
tika-s0102t:1237_6: bhavavibhavadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto idaṃsaccābhiniveso hotīti tassa dhammā vatthu. Kāyassa
tika-s0102t:1237_7: kāmupādānavatthutā vuttanayāva. Yadaggena hi kāyo kāmoghassa vatthu, tadaggena kāmupādānassapi
tika-s0102t:1237_8: vatthu atthato abhinnattā. Sukhavedanassādavasena paralokanirapekkho “natthi dinna”ntiādikaṃ
tika-s0102t:1237_9: parāmāsaṃ uppādetīti diṭṭhupādānassa vedanā vatthu. Cittadhammānaṃ itarupādānavatthutā
tika-s0102t:1237_12: sammoho hotīti mohāgatiyā cittaṃ vatthu. Dhammasabhāvānavabodhe bhayaṃ hotīti bhayāgatiyā dhammā vatthu.
tika-s0102t:1238_0: Āhārasamudayā kāyassa samudayā, phassasamudayā vedanānaṃ samudayo, saṅkhārapaccayā
tika-s0102t:1238_1: viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti vacanato kāyādīnaṃ samudayabhūtā kabaḷīkāraphassamanosañcetanāviññāṇāhārā
tika-s0102t:1239_0: Saraṇavasenāti kāyādīnaṃ, kusalādidhammānañca upadhāraṇavasena. Saranti gacchanti
tika-s0102t:1239_1: nibbānaṃ etāyāti satīti imasmiṃ atthe ekatte ekasabhāve nibbāne samosaraṇaṃ samāgamo
tika-s0102t:1239_2: ekattasamosaraṇaṃ. Etadeva hi dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1240_0: Ekanibbānapavesahetubhūto vā samānatāya eko satipaṭṭhānasabhāvo ekattaṃ, tattha samosaraṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1240_2: Etasmiṃ atthe saraṇekattasamosaraṇāni saheva satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇattena vuttānīti
tika-s0102t:1240_3: daṭṭhabbāni, purimasmiṃ visuṃ. Saraṇavasenāti vā gamanavasenāti atthe sati tadeva
tika-s0102t:1240_4: gamanaṃ samosaraṇanti, samosaraṇe vā sati-saddatthavasena avuccamāne dhāraṇatāva
tika-s0102t:1240_5: satīti sati-saddatthantarābhāvā purimaṃ satibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ, pacchimaṃ ekabhāvassāti
tika-s0102t:1240_6: nibbānasamosaraṇepi sahitāneva tāni satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇāni vuttāni honti.
tika-s0102t:1241_0: “Cuddasavidhena, navavidhena, soḷasavidhena, pañcavidhenā”ti idaṃ upari pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1241_1: ānāpānapabbādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, tesaṃ pana anantarabhedavasena, tadanugatabhedavasena
tika-s0102t:1241_2: ca bhāvanāya anekavidhatā labbhatiyeva, catūsu disāsu uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍasadisatā kāyānupassanāditaṃtaṃsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanānubhāvassa daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0102t:1242_0: Kathetukamyatāpucchā itarāsaṃ pucchānaṃ idha asambhavato, niddesādivasena desetukamyatāya
tika-s0102t:1242_1: ca tathā vuttattā. “Idhā”ti vuccamānapaṭipattisampādakassa bhikkhuno sannissayadassanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1242_2: so cassa sannissayo sāsanato añño natthīti vuttaṃ “idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane”ti. Dhamma…pe…
tika-s0102t:1242_3: lapanametaṃ tesaṃ attano sammukhābhimukhabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ, tañca dhammassa sakkaccasavanatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1242_4: “Gocare bhikkhave caratha sake pettike visaye”tiādi vacanato bhikkhugocarā ete dhammā,
tika-s0102t:1242_5: yadidaṃ kāyānupassanādayo. Tattha yasmā kāyānupassanādipaṭipattiyā bhikkhu hoti,
tika-s0102t:1242_6: tasmā “kāyānupassī viharatī”tiādinā bhikkhuṃ dasseti bhikkhumhi taṃniyamatoti āha
tika-s0102t:1242_8: ca sabbappakārāya anusāsaniyā bhājanabhāvo. Tasmiṃ gahiteti bhikkhumhi gahite. Bhikkhuparisāya
tika-s0102t:1242_9: jeṭṭhabhāvato rājagamanañāyena itarā parisāpi atthato gahitāva hontīti āha “sesā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1242_10: Evaṃ paṭhamaṃ kāraṇaṃ vibhajitvā itarampi vibhajituṃ “yo ca ima”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1243_0: Samaṃ careyyāti kāyādi visamacariyaṃ pahāya kāyādīhi samaṃ careyya. Rāgādivūpasamena
tika-s0102t:1243_1: santo, indriyadamena danto, catumagganiyāmena niyato, seṭṭhacaritāya brahmacārī,
tika-s0102t:1243_2: sabbattha kāyadaṇḍādioropanena nidhāya daṇḍaṃ. Ariyabhāve ṭhito so evarūpo bāhitapāpasamitapāpabhinnakilesatāhi
tika-s0102t:1244_0: “Ayañceva kāyo, bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”ntiādīsu khandhapañcakaṃ, tathā “sukhañca kāyena
tika-s0102t:1244_1: paṭisaṃvedetī”tiādīsu, “yā tasmiṃ samaye kāyassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhī”tiādīsu
tika-s0102t:1244_2: ca vedanādayo cetasikā khandhā kāyoti vuccantīti tato visesanatthaṃ “kāyeti rūpakāye”ti
tika-s0102t:1244_3: āha. Kesādīnañca dhammānanti kesādisaññitānaṃ bhūtupādādhammānaṃ. Evaṃ “cayaṭṭho
tika-s0102t:1244_4: sarīraṭṭho kāyaṭṭho”ti saddanayena kāya-saddaṃ dassetvā idāni niruttinayenapi taṃ
tika-s0102t:1245_0: Asammissatoti vedanādayopi ettha sitā, ettha paṭibaddhāti kāye vedanādianupassanāpasaṅgepi
tika-s0102t:1245_1: āpanne tato asammissatoti attho. Samūhavisayatāya cassa kāya-saddassa, samudāyupādānatāya
tika-s0102t:1245_2: ca asubhākārassa “kāye”ti ekavacanaṃ, tathā ārammaṇādivibhāgena anekabhedabhinnampi
tika-s0102t:1245_3: cittaṃ cittabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “citte”ti ekavacanaṃ, vedanā pana sukhādibhedabhinnā
tika-s0102t:1245_4: visuṃ visuṃ anupassitabbāti dassentena “vedanāsū”ti bahuvacanena vuttā, tatheva ca
tika-s0102t:1245_5: niddeso pavattito, dhammā ca paropaṇṇāsabhedā, anupassitabbākārena ca anekabhedā
tika-s0102t:1246_1: tāni ca kesādīhi, kesādike ca bhūtupādāyarūpehi vinibbhuñjanto “tathā na kāye”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1246_2: Pāsādādinagarāvayavasamūhe avayavīvādinopi avayavīgāhaṃ na karonti, “nagaraṃ nāma
tika-s0102t:1246_3: koci attho atthī”ti pana kesañci samaññātidhāvanaṃ siyāti itthipurisādisamaññātidhāvane
tika-s0102t:1246_5: ca yathāvuttasamūho, tabbinimutto kāyopi nāma koci natthi, pageva itthiādayoti āha
tika-s0102t:1246_6: “kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci dhammo dissatī”ti. “Koci dhammo”ti iminā
tika-s0102t:1246_7: sattajīvādiṃ paṭikkhipati, avayavī pana kāyapaṭikkhepeneva paṭikkhittoti. Yadi evaṃ
tika-s0102t:1246_8: kathaṃ kāyādisamaññātidhāvanānīti āha “yathāvuttadhamma…pe… karontī”ti. Tathā tathāti kāyādiākārena.
tika-s0102t:1247_0: Yaṃ passatīti yaṃ itthiṃ, purisaṃ vā passati. Nanu cakkhunā itthipurisadassanaṃ natthīti?
tika-s0102t:1247_1: Saccametaṃ, “itthiṃ passāmi, purisaṃ passāmī”ti pana pavattasaññāya vasena “yaṃ passatī”ti
tika-s0102t:1247_2: vuttaṃ micchādassanena vā diṭṭhiyā yaṃ passati, na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ rūpāyatanaṃ na
tika-s0102t:1247_3: hotīti attho viparītaggāhavasena micchāparikappitarūpattā. Atha vā taṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0102t:1247_4: diṭṭhaṃ na hoti, acakkhuviññāṇaviññeyyattā diṭṭhaṃ vā taṃ na hoti. Yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0102t:1247_5: na passatīti yaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ paññācakkhunā
tika-s0102t:1247_6: bhūtato na passatīti attho. Apassaṃ bajjhateti imaṃ attabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ paññācakkhunā
tika-s0102t:1247_7: apassanto “etaṃ mama, eso hamasmi, eso me attā”ti kilesabandhanena bajjhati.
tika-s0102t:1248_0: Na aññadhammānupassīti na aññasabhāvānupassī, asubhādito aññākārānupassī na hotīti
tika-s0102t:1248_1: attho. “Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādinā taṃ evatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti. Pathavīkāyanti kesādikoṭṭhāsaṃ
tika-s0102t:1248_2: pathaviṃ dhammasamūhattā “kāyo”ti vadati, lakkhaṇapathavimeva vā anekappabhedaṃ sakalasarīragataṃ,
tika-s0102t:1248_3: pubbāpariyabhāvena ca pavattamānaṃ samūhavasena gahetvā “kāyo”ti vadati. “Āpokāya”ntiādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:1249: Evaṃ gahetabbassāti “ahaṃ mama”nti evaṃ attattaniyabhāvena andhabālehi gahetabbassa.
tika-s0102t:1250_0: Idāni sattannaṃ anupassanākārānampi vasena kāyānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1250_1: Tattha aniccato anupassatīti catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ kāyaṃ “anicca”nti anupassati, evaṃ
tika-s0102t:1250_2: passanto evañcassa aniccākārampi “anupassatī”ti vuccati. Tathābhūtassa cassa niccaggāhassa
tika-s0102t:1250_3: lesopi na hotīti vuttaṃ “no niccato”ti. Tathā hesa “niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”ti vutto.
tika-s0102t:1250_4: Ettha ca “aniccato eva anupassatī”ti eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1250_5: dassetuṃ “no niccato”ti vuttaṃ. Na cettha dukkhato anupassanādinivattanaṃ āsaṅkitabbaṃ
tika-s0102t:1250_6: paṭiyogīnivattanaparattā eva-kārassa, upari desanāruḷhattā ca tāsaṃ. “Dukkhato anupassatī”tiādīsupi
tika-s0102t:1250_7: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – aniccassa dukkhattā tameva ca kāyaṃ dukkhato anupassati,
tika-s0102t:1250_8: dukkhassa anattattā anattato anupassati. Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, na
tika-s0102t:1250_9: taṃ abhinanditabbaṃ, yañca na abhinanditabbaṃ, na tattha rañjitabbaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:1250_10: “nibbindati, no nandati. Virajjati, no rajjatī”ti. So evaṃ arajjanto rāgaṃ nirodheti,
tika-s0102t:1250_11: no samudeti samudayaṃ na karotīti attho. Evaṃ paṭipanno ca paṭinissajjati, no ādiyati.
tika-s0102t:1250_12: Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ kāyaṃ tannissayakhandhābhisaṅkhārehi
tika-s0102t:1250_13: kilesānaṃ pariccajanato, saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato
tika-s0102t:1250_14: “pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cā”ti vuccati, tasmā tāya samannāgato
tika-s0102t:1250_15: bhikkhu vuttanayena kilese pariccajati, nibbāne ca pakkhandati, tathābhūto ca nibbattanavasena
tika-s0102t:1250_16: kilese na ādiyati, nāpi adosadassitāvasena saṅkhatārammaṇaṃ, tena vuttaṃ “paṭinissajjati,
tika-s0102t:1250_17: no ādiyatī”ti. Idānissa tāhi anupassanāhi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0102t:1250_18: “aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha niccasaññanti “saṅkhārā
tika-s0102t:1250_19: niccā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ. Diṭṭhicittavipallāsappahānamukheneva saññāvipallāsappahānanti
tika-s0102t:1250_20: saññāggahaṇaṃ, saññāsīsena vā tesampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nandinti sappītikataṇhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1251_1: iriyāpathaṃ pavattetīti attho. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena abhibyāpanato “tīsu bhavesū”ti
tika-s0102t:1251_2: vuttaṃ, uppajjanavasena pana kilesā parittabhūmakā evāti. Yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1251_3: ātāpananti taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva, ātappa-saddo viya pana ātāpasaddo vīriyeyeva
tika-s0102t:1251_4: niruḷhoti vuttaṃ “vīriyassetaṃ nāma”nti. Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1251_5: abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā
tika-s0102t:1251_6: vuccati, na aññe dhammā. Ātāpīti cāyamīkāro pasaṃsāya, atisayassa vā dīpakoti ātāpīgahaṇena
tika-s0102t:1251_7: sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti. Sammā, samantato, sāmañca pajānanto sampajāno, asammissato
tika-s0102t:1251_8: vavatthāne aññadhammānupassitābhāvena sammā aviparītaṃ, sabbākārapajānanena samantato,
tika-s0102t:1251_9: uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena pavattiyā sāmaṃ pajānantoti attho. Yadi paññāya anupassati,
tika-s0102t:1251_10: kathaṃ satipaṭṭhānatāti āha “na hī”tiādi. Sabbatthikanti sabbattha bhavaṃ sabbattha
tika-s0102t:1251_11: līne, uddhate ca citte icchitabbattā. Sabbe vā līne, uddhate ca bhāvetabbā bojjhaṅgā
tika-s0102t:1251_12: atthikā etāyāti sabbatthikā. Satiyā laddhupakārāya eva paññāya ettha yathāvutte kāye
tika-s0102t:1251_13: kammaṭṭhāniko bhikkhu kāyānupassī viharati. Anto saṅkhepo antoolīyano, kosajjanti
tika-s0102t:1251_14: attho. Upāyapariggaheti ettha sīlavisodhanādi, gaṇanādi, uggahakosallādi ca upāyo,
tika-s0102t:1251_15: tabbipariyāyato anupāyo veditabbo. Yasmā ca upaṭṭhitassati yathāvuttaṃ upāyaṃ na
tika-s0102t:1251_16: pariccajati, anupāyañca na upādiyati, tasmā vuttaṃ “muṭṭhassatī …pe… asamattho hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1251_17: Tenāti upāyānupāyānaṃ pariggahaparivajjanesu, pariccāgāpariggahesu ca asamatthabhāvena. Assa yogino.
tika-s0102t:1252_0: Yasmā satiyevettha satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmāssa sampayuttadhammā vīriyādayo aṅganti
tika-s0102t:1252_1: āha “sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā”ti. Aṅga-saddo cettha kāraṇapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:1252_2: Satiggahaṇeneva cettha samādhissāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0102t:1252_3: Yasmā vā satisīsenāyaṃ desanā. Na hi kevalāya satiyā kilesappahānaṃ sambhavati, nibbānādhigamo
tika-s0102t:1252_4: vā, nāpi kevalā sati pavattati, tasmāssa jhānadesanāyaṃ savitakkādivacanassa viya
tika-s0102t:1252_6: kāmehī”tiādīsu viya pahātabbaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ. Yasmā ettha lokiyamaggo adhippeto, na
tika-s0102t:1252_7: lokuttaramaggo, tasmā pubbabhāgiyameva vinayaṃ dassento “tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena
tika-s0102t:1252_8: vā”ti āha. Tesaṃ dhammānanti vedanādidhammānaṃ. Tesañhi tattha anadhippetattā “atthuddhāranayenetaṃ
tika-s0102t:1252_9: vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Tatthāti vibhaṅge. Etthāti “loke”ti etasmiṃ pade.
tika-s0102t:1253_0: Avisesena dvīhipi nīvaraṇappahānaṃ vuttanti katvā puna ekekena vuttaṃ pahānavisesaṃ
tika-s0102t:1253_1: dassetuṃ “visesenā”ti āha. Atha vā “vineyya nīvaraṇānī”ti avatvā abhijjhādomanassavinayavacanassa
tika-s0102t:1253_4: Vuttavipariyāyato kāyavipattimūlako virodho veditabbo. Kāyabhāvanāyāti kāyānupassanābhāvanāya.
tika-s0102t:1253_5: Sā hi idha kāyabhāvanāti adhippetā. Subhasukhabhāvādīnanti ādi-saddena manuññaniccatādisaṅgaho
tika-s0102t:1253_6: daṭṭhabbo. Asubhāsukhabhāvādīnanti ettha pana ādi-saddena amanuññaaniccatādīnaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1253_8: Yogānubhāvo hi bhāvanānubhāvo. Yogasamatthoti yogamanuyuñjituṃ samattho. Purimena
tika-s0102t:1253_10: dutiyena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa paṭipatti. Na hi anurodhavirodhādīhi upaddutassa bhāvanā ijjhati.
tika-s0102t:1254_0: Anupassīti etthāti “anupassī”ti etasmiṃ pade labbhamānāya anupassanāya anupassanājotanāya
tika-s0102t:1254_1: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo, aññathā “anupassanāyā”ti karaṇavacanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1254_2: na yujjeyya. Anupassanā eva hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ, na ettha ārammaṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, yujjati
tika-s0102t:1254_3: vā. Kāyapariharaṇaṃ vuttanti sambandho. Kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇassa cettha atthasiddhattā
tika-s0102t:1254_4: “kāyapariharaṇa”ntveva vuttaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānikassa hi kāyapariharaṇaṃ yāvadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1254_6: vuttaṃ. Kāyaggahaṇena vā nāmakāyassāpi gahaṇaṃ, na rūpakāyasseva, teneva kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇampi
tika-s0102t:1254_7: saṅgahitaṃ hoti, evañca katvā “viharatīti ettha vuttavihārenā”ti etthaggahaṇañca
tika-s0102t:1254_8: samatthitaṃ hoti “kāyānupassī viharatī”ti vihārassa visesetvā vuttattā. “Ātāpī”tiādi
tika-s0102t:1254_9: pana saṅkhepato vuttassa kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇassa saha sādhanena vitthāretvā dassanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1254_11: buddhānussati, mettā, maraṇassati, asubhabhāvanā ca. Idañhi catukkaṃ yoginā parihariyamānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1254_14: vuttatā vuttā. Satiyā vā samatho vutto tassā samādhikkhandhena saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0102t:1255_0: Vibhaṅge pana attho vuttoti yojanā. Tenāti saddatthaṃ anādiyitvā bhāvatthasseva vibhajanavasena
tika-s0102t:1255_1: pavattena vibhaṅgapāṭhena saha. Aṭṭhakathānayoti saddatthassāpi vivaraṇavasena yathārahaṃ
tika-s0102t:1255_2: vutto atthasaṃvaṇṇanānayo. Yathā saṃsandatīti yathā atthato, adhippāyato ca avilomento
tika-s0102t:1256_0: Vedanādīnaṃ puna vacaneti ettha nissayapaccayabhāvavasena cittadhammānaṃ vedanāsannissitattā,
tika-s0102t:1256_1: pañcavokārabhave arūpadhammānaṃ rūpapaṭibaddhavuttito ca vedanāya kāyādianupassanāppasaṅgepi
tika-s0102t:1256_2: āpanne tato asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassanatthaṃ, ghanavinibbhogādidassanatthañca
tika-s0102t:1256_3: dutiyaṃ vedanāggahaṇaṃ, tena na vedanāyaṃ kāyānupassī, cittadhammānupassī vā, atha
tika-s0102t:1256_4: kho vedanānupassī evāti vedanāsaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ vedanānupassanākārasseva dassanena
tika-s0102t:1256_5: asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Tathā “yasmiṃ samaye sukhā vedanā, na tasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:1256_6: samaye dukkhā, adukkhamasukhā vā vedanā, yasmiṃ vā pana samaye dukkhā, adukkhamasukhā
tika-s0102t:1256_7: vā vedanā, na tasmiṃ samaye itarā vedanā”ti vedanābhāvasāmaññe avatvā taṃ taṃ vedanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1256_8: vinibbhujjitvā dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dhuvabhāvaviveko dassito hoti, tena tāsaṃ
tika-s0102t:1256_9: khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānadassanena aniccatāya, tato eva dukkhatāya, anattatāya ca dassanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1256_10: vibhāvitaṃ hoti. Ghanavinibbhogādīti ādi-saddena ayampi attho veditabbo. Ayañhi vedanāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:1256_11: vedanānupassī eva, na aññadhammānupassī. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā nāma bālo amaṇisabhāvepi
tika-s0102t:1256_12: udakapubbuḷake maṇiākārānupassī hoti, na evaṃ ayaṃ ṭhitiramaṇīyepi vedayite, pageva
tika-s0102t:1256_13: itarasmiṃ manuññākārānupassī, atha kho khaṇapabhaṅguratāya, avasavattitāya kilesāsucipaggharaṇatāya
tika-s0102t:1256_14: ca aniccaanattaasubhākārānupassī, vipariṇāmadukkhatāya, saṅkhāradukkhatāya ca visesato
tika-s0102t:1256_15: dukkhānupassī yevāti. Evaṃ citta dhammesupi yathārahaṃ punavacane payojanaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1256_16: Lokiyā eva sammasanacārassa adhippetattā. “Kevalaṃ panidhā”tiādinā “idha ettakaṃ
tika-s0102t:1256_17: veditabba”nti veditabbaparicchedaṃ dasseti. “Esa nayo”ti iminā yathā cittaṃ, dhammā
tika-s0102t:1256_18: ca anupassitabbā, tathā tāni anupassanto citte cittānupassī, dhammesu dhammānupassīti
tika-s0102t:1256_19: veditabboti imamatthaṃ atidisati. Dukkhatoti dukkhasabhāvato, dukkhanti anupassitabbāti
tika-s0102t:1257_0: Yo sukhaṃ dukkhato addāti yo bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatāya “dukkhā”ti
tika-s0102t:1257_1: paññācakkhunā addakkhi. Dukkhaṃ addakkhi sallatoti dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ pīḷājananato,
tika-s0102t:1257_2: antotudanato, dunnīharaṇato ca sallato addakkhi passi. Adukkhamasukhanti upekkhāvedanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1257_3: Santanti sukhadukkhāni viya anoḷārikatāya, paccayavasena vūpasantasabhāvatāya ca
tika-s0102t:1257_4: santaṃ. Aniccatoti hutvāabhāvato, udayavayavantato, tāvakālikato, niccapaṭipakkhato
tika-s0102t:1257_5: ca “anicca”nti yo addakkhi. Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu ekaṃsena, paribyattaṃ vā vedanāya
tika-s0102t:1258_0: Dukkhātipīti saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhā itipi. Taṃ dukkhasminti sabbaṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ
tika-s0102t:1258_1: dukkhasmiṃ antogadhaṃ pariyāpannaṃ vadāmi saṅkhāradukkhatānativattanato. Sukhadukkhatopi
tika-s0102t:1258_3: vuttattā tissopi ca sukhato, tissopi ca dukkhato anupassitabbāti attho. Satta anupassanā
tika-s0102t:1258_4: heṭṭhā pakāsitā eva. Sesanti yathāvuttaṃ sukhādivibhāgato sesaṃ sāmisanirāmisādibhedaṃ
tika-s0102t:1259_8: Yaṃ vibhāvetuṃ abhidhamme“tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti, khandhā hontī”tiādinā
