tika-s0102t:1259_9: suññatāvāradesanā pavattā, taṃ pahīnameva pubbe pahīnattā, tasmā tassa tassa puna
tika-s0102t:1259_10: pahānaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Na hi kilesā pahīyamānā ārammaṇavibhāgena pahīyanti anāgatānaṃyeva
tika-s0102t:1259_11: uppajjanārahānaṃ pahātabbattā, tasmā abhijjhādīnaṃ ekattha pahānaṃ vatvā itarattha
tika-s0102t:1259_12: na vattabbaṃ evāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “kāmañcetthā”tiādinā. Atha vā maggacittakkhaṇe
tika-s0102t:1259_13: ekattha pahīnaṃ sabbattha pahīnameva hotīti visuṃ visuṃ pahānaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Maggena
tika-s0102t:1259_14: hi pahīnāti vattabbataṃ arahanti. Tattha purimāya codanāya nānāpuggalaparihāro, na
tika-s0102t:1259_15: hi ekassa pahīnaṃ tato aññassa pahīnaṃ nāma hoti. Pacchimāya nānācittakkhaṇikaparihāro.
tika-s0102t:1259_16: Nānācittakkhaṇeti hi lokiyamaggacittakkhaṇeti adhippāyo. Pubbabhāgamaggo hi idhādhippeto.
tika-s0102t:1259_17: Lokiyabhāvanāya ca kāye pahīnaṃ na vedanādīsu vikkhambhitaṃ hoti. Yadipi nappavatteyya,
tika-s0102t:1259_18: paṭipakkhabhāvanāya suppahīnattā tattha sā “abhijjhādomanassassa appavattī”ti na
tika-s0102t:1259_19: vattabbā, tasmā punapi tappahānaṃ vattabbameva. Ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:1259_20: hotīti lokuttarasatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ, lokiyabhāvanāya vā sabbattha appavattimattaṃ
tika-s0102t:1259_21: sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Pañcapi khandhā upādānakkhandhā loko”ti hi vibhaṅgecatūsupi ṭhānesu vuttanti.
tika-s0102t:1263_1: catudhā bhinditvā. Tato catubbidhasatipaṭṭhānato ekekaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā kāyaṃ
tika-s0102t:1264_0: Kathañcāti ettha kathanti pakārapucchā, tena niddisiyamāne kāyānupassanāpakāre pucchati.
tika-s0102t:1264_1: Ca-saddo byatireko, tena uddesavārena apākaṭaṃ niddesavārena vibhāviyamānaṃ visesaṃ
tika-s0102t:1264_2: joteti. Bāhirakesupi ito ekadesassa sambhavato sabbappakāraggahaṇaṃ kataṃ “sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassā”ti,
tika-s0102t:1264_3: tena ye ime ānāpānapabbādivasena āgatā cuddasappakārā, tadantogadhā ca ajjhattādianupassanāppakārā,
tika-s0102t:1264_5: lokiyādippakārā ca, te sabbepi anavasesato saṅgaṇhāti. Ime ca pakārā imasmiṃyeva
tika-s0102t:1264_6: sāsane, na ito bahiddhāti vuttaṃ “sabbappakāra…pe… paṭisedhano cā”ti. Tattha tathābhāvapaṭisedhanoti
tika-s0102t:1264_8: etena idha bhikkhaveti ettha idha-saddo antogadhaevasaddatthoti dasseti. Santi hi
tika-s0102t:1264_9: ekapadānipi avadhāraṇāni yathā “vāyubhakkho”ti. Tenāha “idheva bhikkhave samaṇo”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1264_10: Paripuṇṇasamaṇappakaraṇadhammo hi so puggalo, yo sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattako.
tika-s0102t:1264_11: Parappavādāti paresaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ nānappakārā vādā titthāyatanāni.
tika-s0102t:1265_1: damathaṃ anupagato goṇo kūṭagoṇo. Dohanakāle yathā thanehi anavasesato khīraṃ na
tika-s0102t:1265_2: paggharati, evaṃ dohapaṭibandhinī kūṭadhenu. Rūpa-saddādike paṭicca uppajjanakaassādo
tika-s0102t:1265_3: rūpārammaṇādiraso. Pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇanti pabbajjato pubbe, anādimati vā saṃsāre
tika-s0102t:1265_4: paricitārammaṇaṃ. Nibandheyyāti bandheyya. Satiyāti sammadeva kammaṭṭhānassa sallakkhaṇavasena
tika-s0102t:1265_5: pavattāya satiyā. Ārammaṇeti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe. Daḷhanti thiraṃ, yathā satokārissa
tika-s0102t:1265_6: upacārappanābhedo samādhi ijjhati, tathā thāmagataṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0102t:1266_1: buddhasāvakānañca visesādhigamassa aññena kammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1267_0: Vatthuvijjācariyo viya bhagavā yogīnaṃ anurūpanivāsaṭṭhānupadisanato. Bhikkhu dīpisadiso
tika-s0102t:1267_1: araññe ekako viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanavasena icchitatthasādhanato phalamuttamanti
tika-s0102t:1267_2: sāmaññaphalaṃ sandhāya vadati. Parakkamajavayoggabhūminti bhāvanussāhajavassa yoggakaraṇabhūmibhūtaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1268_0: Addhānavasena pavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena dīghaṃ vā assasanto, ittaravasena
tika-s0102t:1268_1: pavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena rassaṃ vā assasantoti yojanā. Evaṃ sikkhatoti
tika-s0102t:1268_3: bhāvanaṃ sikkhato, tathābhūto vā hutvā tisso sikkhā pavattayato. Assāsapassāsanimitteti
tika-s0102t:1268_5: vipassanaṃ abhinivisanto, yo “assāsapassāsakammiko”ti vutto. Jhānaṅgāni pariggaṇhāti
tika-s0102t:1268_6: arūpamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisanto. Vatthu nāma karajakāyo cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1268_7: Añño satto vā puggalo vā natthīti visuddhidiṭṭhi “tayidaṃ dhammamattaṃ, na ahetukaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1268_8: nāpi issarādivisamahetukaṃ, atha kho avijjādihetuka”nti addhāttayepi kaṅkhāvitaraṇena
tika-s0102t:1268_9: vitiṇṇakaṅkho. “Yaṃ kiñci bhikkhu rūpa”ntiādinā nayena kalāpasammasanavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1268_10: āropetvā. Udayavayānupassanādivasena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento. Anukkamena maggapaṭipāṭiyā.
tika-s0102t:1269_0: “Parassa vā assāsapassāsakāye”ti idaṃ sammasanavāravasenāyaṃ pāḷi pavattāti katvā
tika-s0102t:1269_1: vuttaṃ, samathavasena pana parassa assāsapassāsakāye appanānimittuppatti eva natthi.
tika-s0102t:1269_2: Aṭṭhapetvāti antarantarā na ṭhapetvā. Aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakāloti ajjhattabahiddhādhammesupi
tika-s0102t:1269_3: nirantaraṃ vā bhāvanāya pavattanakālo kathito. Ekasmiṃ kāle panidaṃ ubhayaṃ na labbhatīti
tika-s0102t:1269_4: “ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā”ti ca vuttaṃ idaṃ dhammadvayaṃ ghaṭitaṃ ekasmiṃ kāle ekato ārammaṇabhāvena
tika-s0102t:1269_5: na labbhati, ekajjhaṃ ālambituṃ na sakkāti attho.
tika-s0102t:1270_0: Samudeti etasmāti samudayo, so eva kāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti samudayadhammo. Assāsapassāsānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1270_1: uppattihetu karajakāyādi, tassa anupassanasīlo samudayadhammānupassī, taṃ pana samudayadhammaṃ
tika-s0102t:1270_2: upamāya dassento “yathā nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha bhastanti ruttiṃ. Gaggaranāḷinti ukkāpanāḷiṃ.
tika-s0102t:1270_3: Teti karajakāyādike. Yathā assāsapassāsakāyo karajakāyādisambandhī taṃnimittatāya,
tika-s0102t:1270_5: kāyasmi”nti vattabbataṃ labhantīti vuttaṃ “samudaya…pe… vuccatī”ti. Pakativācī vā
tika-s0102t:1270_7: vā “samudayadhammānupassī”ti vutto. Tenāha “karajakāyañcā”tiādi. Evañca katvā kāyasminti
tika-s0102t:1271_0: Vayadhammānupassīti ettha ahetukattepi vināsassa yesaṃ hetudhammānaṃ abhāve yaṃ na
tika-s0102t:1271_1: hoti, tadabhāvo tassa abhāvassa hetu viya voharīyatīti upacārato karajakāyādiabhāvo
tika-s0102t:1271_2: assāsapassāsakāyassa vayakāraṇaṃ vutto. Tenāha “yathā bhastāyā”tiādi. Ayaṃ tāvettha
tika-s0102t:1271_3: paṭhamavikappavasena atthavibhāvanā. Dutiyavikappavasena upacārena vināyeva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1272_1: ekakāle na labbhatīti āha “kālena samudayaṃ kālena vayaṃ anupassanto”ti. “Atthi kāyo”ti
tika-s0102t:1272_2: eva-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti “kāyova atthī”ti vatvā avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ dassento
tika-s0102t:1272_3: “na satto”tiādimāha. Tassattho – yo rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya, paresañca sajjāpanaṭṭhena,
tika-s0102t:1272_4: satvaguṇayogato vā “satto”ti parehi parikappito, tassa sattanikāyassa pūraṇato ca
tika-s0102t:1272_5: cavanupapajjanadhammatāya galanato ca “puggalo”ti, thīyati saṃhaññati ettha gabbhoti
tika-s0102t:1272_6: “itthī”ti, puri pure bhāge seti pavattatīti “puriso”ti, āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti “attā”ti,
tika-s0102t:1272_7: attano santakabhāvena “attaniya”nti, paro na hotīti katvā “aha”nti, mama santakanti
tika-s0102t:1272_8: katvā “mamā”ti, vuttappakāravinimutto aññoti katvā “kocī”ti, tassa santakabhāvena
tika-s0102t:1272_9: “kassacī”ti, vikappetabbo koci natthi, kevalaṃ “kāyo eva atthī”ti. Dasahipi padehi
tika-s0102t:1272_10: attattaniyasuññatameva kāyassa vibhāveti. Evanti “kāyova atthī”tiādinā vuttappakārena.
tika-s0102t:1273_0: Ñāṇapamāṇatthāyāti kāyānupassanāñāṇaṃ paraṃ pamāṇaṃ pāpanatthāya. Satipamāṇatthāyāti
tika-s0102t:1273_1: kāyapariggāhikaṃ satiṃ pavattanasatiṃ paraṃ pamāṇaṃ pāpanatthāya. Imassa hi vuttanayena
tika-s0102t:1273_2: “atthi kāyo”ti aparāparuppattivasena paccupaṭṭhitā sati bhiyyoso mattāya tattha ñāṇassa,
tika-s0102t:1273_3: satiyā ca paribrūhanāya hoti. Tenāha “satisampajaññānaṃ vuḍḍhatthāyā”ti. Imissā bhāvanāya
tika-s0102t:1273_4: taṇhādiṭṭhiggāhānaṃ ujupaṭipakkhattā vuttaṃ “taṇhā…pe… viharatī”ti. Tathābhūto ca
tika-s0102t:1273_5: loke kiñcipi “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā gahetabbaṃ na passati, kuto gaṇheyyāti āha
tika-s0102t:1273_6: “na ca kiñcī”tiādi. Evampīti ettha pi-saddo heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhassa tādisassa atthassa
tika-s0102t:1273_7: abhāvato avuttasamuccayatthoti dassento “upari atthaṃ upādāyā”ti āha yathā “antamaso
tika-s0102t:1273_8: tiracchānagatāyapi, ayampi pārājiko hotī”ti. evanti pana niddiṭṭhākārassa paccāmasanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1274_0: Pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānassa idha adhippetattā vuttaṃ “sati dukkhasacca”nti. Sā pana
tika-s0102t:1274_1: sati yasmiṃ attabhāve, tassa samuṭṭhāpikā taṇhā, tassāpi samuṭṭhāpikā eva nāma hoti
tika-s0102t:1274_2: tadabhāve abhāvatoti āha “tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā”ti, yathā “saṅkhārapaccayā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1274_4: viññāṇaṃ” tveva vuccati suttantanayena. Appavattīti appavattinimittaṃ, ubhinnaṃ appavattiyā
tika-s0102t:1274_5: nimittabhūtoti attho. Na pavattati etthāti vā appavatti. “Dukkhaparijānano”tiādi
tika-s0102t:1274_6: ekantato catukiccasādhanavaseneva ariyamaggassa pavattīti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Avuttasiddho
tika-s0102t:1274_7: hi tassa bhāvanāpaṭivedho. Catusaccavasenāti catusaccakammaṭṭhānavasena. Ussakkitvāti
tika-s0102t:1274_8: visuddhiparamparāya āruhitvā, bhāvanaṃ upari netvāti attho. Niyyānamukhanti vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇūpāyo.
tika-s0102t:1277_0: 375. Iriyāpathavasenāti iriyanaṃ iriyā, kiriyā, idha pana kāyikapayogo veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1277_1: Iriyānaṃ patho pavattimaggoti iriyāpatho, gamanādivasena pavattā sarīrāvatthā. Gacchanto
tika-s0102t:1277_2: vā hi satto kāyena kātabbakiriyaṃ karoti ṭhito vā nisinno vā nipanno vāti, tesaṃ
tika-s0102t:1277_3: iriyāpathānaṃ vasena, iriyāpathavibhāgenāti attho. Puna caparanti puna ca aparaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1277_5: suṇāthāti vā adhippāyo. “Gacchanto vā”tiādi gamanādimattajānanassa, gamanādigatavisesajānanassa
tika-s0102t:1277_6: ca sādhāraṇavacanaṃ, tattha gamanādimattajānanaṃ na idha nādhippetaṃ, gamanādigatavisesajānanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1277_7: pana adhippetanti taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tattha kāma”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sattūpaladdhinti
tika-s0102t:1277_8: “satto atthī”ti upaladdhiṃ sattaggāhaṃ. Na pajahati na pariccajati “ahaṃ gacchāmi,
tika-s0102t:1277_9: mama gamana”nti gāhasabbhāvato. Tato eva attasaññaṃ “atthi attā kārako vedako”ti
tika-s0102t:1277_10: evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ na ugghāṭeti nāpaneti appaṭipakkhabhāvato, ananubrūhanato
tika-s0102t:1277_11: vā. Evaṃ bhūtassa cassa kuto kammaṭṭhānādibhāvoti āha “kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā
tika-s0102t:1277_12: vā na hotī”ti. “Imassa panā”tiādi sukkapakkho, tassa vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1278_0: Tattha ko gacchatīti sādhanaṃ, kiriyañca avinibbhuttaṃ katvā gamanakiriyāya kattupucchā,
tika-s0102t:1278_2: gamananti tamevatthaṃ pariyāyantarena vadati sādhanaṃ, kiriyañca vinibbhuttaṃ katvā
tika-s0102t:1278_4: ubhayatthaṃ kiṃ-saddo pavatto. Kiṃ kāraṇāti pana paṭikkhittakattukāya gamanakiriyāya
tika-s0102t:1278_5: aviparītakāraṇapucchā. Idañhi gamanaṃ nāma attā manasā saṃyujjati, mano indriyehi,
tika-s0102t:1278_6: indriyāni attehīti evamādi micchākāraṇavinimuttaanurūpapaccayahetuko dhammānaṃ pavattiākāraviseso.
tika-s0102t:1279_0: Na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhito, tabbinimuttassa
tika-s0102t:1279_1: ca kassaci abhāvato. Idāni dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhiṃ dassetuṃ “cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphārenā”tiādi
tika-s0102t:1279_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha cittakiriyā ca sā, vāyodhātuyā vipphāro vipphandanañcāti cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāro,
tika-s0102t:1279_3: tena. Ettha ca cittakiriyaggahaṇena anindriyabaddhavāyodhātuvipphāraṃ nivatteti,
tika-s0102t:1279_5: pana kāyaviññattiṃ vibhāveti. “Gacchatī”ti vatvā yathā pavattamāne kāye “gacchatī”ti
tika-s0102t:1279_6: vohāro hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tanti gantukāmatāvasena pavattacittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1279_7: Vāyaṃ janetīti vāyodhātuadhikaṃ rūpakalāpaṃ uppādeti, adhikatā cettha sāmatthiyato,
tika-s0102t:1279_9: paccayabhūtena ākāravisesena pavattamānaṃ vāyodhātuṃ sandhāyāha “vāyo viññattiṃ janetī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1279_10: Adhippāyasahabhāvī hi vikāro viññatti. Yathāvuttaadhikabhāveneva ca vāyogahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1279_11: na vāyodhātuyā eva janakabhāvato, aññathā viññattiyā upādāyarūpabhāvo durupapādo
tika-s0102t:1279_12: siyā. Purato abhinīhāro puratobhāgena kāyassa pavattanaṃ, yo “abhikkamo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0102t:1280: “Eseva nayo”ti atidesena saṅkhepato vatvā tamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “tatrāpi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Koṭito paṭṭhāyāti heṭṭhimakoṭito paṭṭhāya pādatalato paṭṭhāya. Ussitabhāvoti ubbiddhabhāvo.
tika-s0102t:1281_0: Evaṃ pajānatoti evaṃ cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva gamanādi hotīti pajānato. Tassa
tika-s0102t:1281_1: evaṃ pajānanāya nicchayagamanatthaṃ “evaṃ hotī”ti vicāraṇā vuccati loke yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0102t:1281_2: ajānantehi micchābhinivesavasena, lokavohāravasena vā. Atthi panāti attano evaṃ vīmaṃsanavasena
tika-s0102t:1281_3: pucchāvacanaṃ. Natthīti nicchayavasena sattassa paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. “Yathā panā”tiādi
tika-s0102t:1281_4: tasseva atthassa upamāya vibhāvanaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0102t:1282_0: Nāvā mālutavegenāti yathā acetanā nāvā vātavegena desantaraṃ yāti, yathā ca acetano
tika-s0102t:1282_1: tejanaṃ kaṇḍo jiyāvegena desantaraṃ yāti, tathā acetano kāyo vātāhato yathāvuttavāyunā
tika-s0102t:1282_2: nīto desantaraṃ yātīti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sace pana koci vadeyya “yathā
tika-s0102t:1282_3: nāvātejanānaṃ pellakassa purisassa vasena desantaragamanaṃ, evaṃ kāyassāpī”ti, hotu,
tika-s0102t:1282_4: evaṃ icchito vāyamattho yathā hi nāvātejanānaṃ saṃhatalakkhaṇasseva purisassa vasena
tika-s0102t:1282_5: gamanaṃ, na asaṃhatalakkhaṇassa, evaṃ kāyassāpīti. Kā no hāni, bhiyyopi dhammamattatāva
tika-s0102t:1283_0: Tattha payuttanti heṭṭhā vuttanayena gamanādikiriyāvasena paccayehi payojitaṃ. Ṭhātīti
tika-s0102t:1283_1: tiṭṭhati. Etthāti imasmiṃ loke. Vinā hetupaccayeti gantukāmatācittataṃsamuṭṭhānavāyodhātuādihetupaccayehi
tika-s0102t:1283_2: vinā. Tiṭṭheti tiṭṭheyya. Vajeti vajeyya gaccheyya ko nāmāti sambandho. Paṭikkhepattho
tika-s0102t:1283_3: cettha kiṃ-saddoti hetupaccayavirahena ṭhānagamanapaṭikkhepamukhena sabbāyapi dhammappavattiyā
tika-s0102t:1283_4: paccayādhīnavuttitāvibhāvanena attasuññatā viya aniccadukkhatāpi vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0102t:1284_0: Paṇihitoti yathā yathā paccayehi pakārehi nihito ṭhapito. Sabbasaṅgāhikavacananti
tika-s0102t:1284_1: sabbesampi catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ ekajjhaṃ saṅgaṇhanavacanaṃ, pubbe visuṃ visuṃ iriyāpathānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1284_2: vuttattā idaṃ nesaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vacananti attho. Purimanayo vā iriyāpathappadhāno
tika-s0102t:1284_3: vuttoti tattha kāyo appadhāno anunipphādīti idha kāyaṃ padhānaṃ, apadhānañca iriyāpathaṃ
tika-s0102t:1284_4: anunipphādiṃ katvā dassetuṃ dutiyanayo vuttoti evampettha dvinnaṃ nayānaṃ viseso
tika-s0102t:1285_0: Iriyāpathapariggaṇhanampi iriyāpathavato kāyasseva pariggaṇhanaṃ tassa avatthāvisesabhāvatoti
tika-s0102t:1285_1: vuttaṃ “iriyāpathapariggaṇhanena kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti. Tenevettha rūpakkhandhavaseneva
tika-s0102t:1285_2: samudayādayo uddhaṭā. Esa nayo sesavāresupi. Ādināti ettha ādi-saddena yathā “taṇhāsamudayā
tika-s0102t:1285_3: kammasamudayā āhārasamudayā”ti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ
tika-s0102t:1285_4: passatīti ime cattāro ākārā saṅgayhanti, evaṃ “avijjānirodhā”ti ādayopi pañca ākārā
tika-s0102t:1288_0: 376. Catusampajaññavasenāti samantato pakārehi, pakaṭṭhaṃ vā savisesaṃ jānātīti sampajāno,
tika-s0102t:1288_1: sampajānassa bhāvo sampajaññaṃ, tathāpavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ, hatthavikārādibhedabhinnattā
tika-s0102t:1288_2: cattāri sampajaññāni samāhaṭāni catusampajaññaṃ, tassa vasena. “Abhikkante”tiādīni
tika-s0102t:1288_3: sāmaññaphale vaṇṇitāni, na puna vaṇṇetabbāni, tasmā taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanāpi
tika-s0102t:1288_4: tattha vihitanayeneva gahetabbā. “Abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotī”tiādi
tika-s0102t:1288_6: adhippetoti āha “rūpakkhandhasseva samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo”ti. Rūpadhammānaṃyeva
tika-s0102t:1291_0: 377. Paṭikkūlamanasikāravasenāti jigucchanīyatāya paṭikūlameva paṭikkūlaṃ, yo paṭikkūlasabhāvo
tika-s0102t:1291_1: paṭikkūlākāro, tassa manasi karaṇavasena. Antarenāpi hi bhāvavācinaṃ saddaṃ bhāvattho
tika-s0102t:1291_2: viññāyati yathā “paṭassa sukka”nti. Yasmā visuddhimagge vuttaṃ, tasmā tattha, taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca
tika-s0102t:1292_0: Vatthādīhi pasibbakākārena bandhitvā kataṃ āvāṭanaṃ putoḷi. Nānākārā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-s0102t:1292_1: sammissāti ettāvatā nānāvaṇṇānaṃ kesādīnañca upameyyatā. Vibhūtakāloti paṇṇattiṃ
tika-s0102t:1292_2: samatikkamitvā kesādīnaṃ asubhākārassa upaṭṭhitakālo. Iti-saddassa ākāratthataṃ dassento
tika-s0102t:1292_3: “eva”nti vatvā taṃ ākāraṃ sarūpato dassento “kesādipariggaṇhanenā”tiādimāha. Kesādisaññitānañhi
tika-s0102t:1295_0: 378. Dhātumanasikāravasenāti pathavīdhātuādikā catasso dhātuyo ārabbha pavattabhāvanāmanasikāravasena,
tika-s0102t:1295_2: hi atthato ekaṃ. Goghātakoti jīvikatthāya gunnaṃ ghātako. Antevāsikoti kammakaraṇavasena
tika-s0102t:1295_3: tassa samīpavāsī taṃ nissāya jīvanako. Vinivijjhitvāti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne aññamaññaṃ vinivijjhitvā.
tika-s0102t:1295_4: Mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāteti catunnaṃ mahāpathānaṃ tāya eva vinivijjhanaṭṭhānatāya
tika-s0102t:1295_5: vemajjhasaṅkhāte. Yasmā te cattāro mahāpathā catūhi disāhi āgantvā tattha samohitā
tika-s0102t:1295_6: viya honti, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ catumahāpathaṃ, tasmiṃ catumahāpathe. Ṭhita-saddo “ṭhito
tika-s0102t:1295_8: aññattha ṭhapetvā gamanaṃ sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya bodhako, idha pana yathā tathā
tika-s0102t:1295_9: rūpakāyassa pavattiākārabodhako adhippetoti āha “catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci
tika-s0102t:1295_10: ākārena ṭhitattā yathā ṭhita”nti. Tattha ākārenāti ṭhānādinā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārena.
tika-s0102t:1295_11: Ṭhānādayo hi iriyāpathasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya patho pavattimaggoti “iriyāpatho”ti vuccantīti
tika-s0102t:1295_12: vutto vāyamattho. Yathāṭhitanti yathāpavattaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ ṭhānamevettha paṇidhānanti
tika-s0102t:1295_13: adhippetanti āha “yathā ṭhitattā ca yathāpaṇihita”nti. “Ṭhita”nti vā kāyassa ṭhānasaṅkhātairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1295_15: rūpadhammānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccavasena avaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ, paṇihitanti
tika-s0102t:1295_16: paccayavasena tehi tehi paccayehi pakārato nihitaṃ paṇihitanti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1295_17: Paccavekkhatīti pati pati avekkhati, ñāṇacakkhunā vinibbhujjitvā visuṃ visuṃ passati.
tika-s0102t:1296_2: saṃvaḍḍhentassa. Vadhitaṃ matanti hiṃsitaṃ hutvā mataṃ. Matanti ca matamattaṃ. Tenevāha
tika-s0102t:1296_3: “tāvadevā”ti. Gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyatīti yāni aṅgapaccaṅgāni yathāsanniviṭṭhāni
tika-s0102t:1296_4: upādāya gāvīsamaññā matamattāyapi gāviyā tesaṃ taṃsannivesassa avinaṭṭhattā. Vilīyanti
tika-s0102t:1296_5: bhijjanti vibhujjantīti bīlā, bhāgā va-kārassa ba-kāraṃ, ikārassa ca īkāraṃ katvā.
tika-s0102t:1296_6: Bīlasoti bīlaṃ bīlaṃ katvā. Vibhajitvāti aṭṭhisaṅghātato maṃsaṃ vivecetvā, tato vā
tika-s0102t:1296_7: vivecitaṃ maṃsaṃ bhāgaso katvā. Tenevāha “maṃsasaññā pavattatī”ti. Pabbajitassāpi
tika-s0102t:1296_9: vivecanaṃ. Dhātuso paccavekkhatoti ghanavinibbhogakaraṇena dhātuṃ dhātuṃ pathavīādidhātuṃ
tika-s0102t:1296_10: visuṃ visuṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa. Sattasaññāti attānudiṭṭhivasena pavattā sattasaññāti
tika-s0102t:1296_11: vadanti, vohāravasena pavattasattasaññāyapi tadā antaradhānaṃ yuttameva yāthāvato
tika-s0102t:1296_12: ghanavinibbhogassa sampādanato. Evañhi sati yathāvuttaopammatthena upameyyattho aññadatthu
tika-s0102t:1296_13: saṃsandati sameti. Tenevāha “dhātuvaseneva cittaṃ santiṭṭhatī”ti. Dakkhoti cheko
tika-s0102t:1296_15: avibhatte gāvīsamaññā, na vibhatte. Vibhatte pana aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamaññā”ti jānanato.
tika-s0102t:1296_16: Catumahāpatho viya catuiriyāpathoti gāviyā ṭhitacatumahāpatho viya kāyassa pavattimaggabhūto
tika-s0102t:1296_17: catubbidho iriyāpatho yasmā visuddhimagge vitthāritā, tasmā tattha, taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca
tika-s0102t:1299_2: Tenāha “sivathikapabbehi vibhajitu”nti. Maritvā ekāhātikkantaṃ ekāhamataṃ. Uddhaṃ
tika-s0102t:1299_3: jīvitapariyādānāti jīvitakkhayato upari maraṇato paraṃ. Samuggatenāti samuṭṭhitena.
tika-s0102t:1299_4: Uddhumātattāti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ dhumātattā sūnattā. Setarattehi viparibhinnaṃ vimissitaṃ
tika-s0102t:1299_5: nīlaṃ vinīlaṃ, purimavaṇṇavipariṇāmabhūtaṃ vā nīlaṃ vinīlaṃ. Vinīlameva vinīlakanti
tika-s0102t:1299_6: ka-kārena padavaḍḍhanaṃ anatthantarato yathā “pītakaṃ lohitaka”nti. Paṭikkūlattāti
tika-s0102t:1299_7: jigucchanīyattā. Kucchitaṃ vinīlanti vinīlakanti kucchanattho vā ayaṃ ka-kāroti dassetuṃ
tika-s0102t:1299_8: vuttaṃ yathā “pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti. paribhinnaṭṭhānehi kākakaṅkādīhi.
tika-s0102t:1299_9: Vissandamānapubbanti vissavantapubbaṃ, tahaṃ tahaṃ paggharantapubbanti attho. Tathābhāvanti
tika-s0102t:1300_0: So bhikkhūti yo “passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍita”nti vutto, so bhikkhu. Upasaṃharati
tika-s0102t:1300_1: sadisataṃ. “Ayampi kho”tiādi upasaṃharaṇākāradassanaṃ. Āyūti rūpajīvitindriyaṃ, arūpajīvitindriyaṃ
tika-s0102t:1300_2: panettha viññāṇagatikameva. Usmāti kammajatejo. Evaṃ pūtikasabhāvoyevāti evaṃ ativiya
tika-s0102t:1300_3: duggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlapūbhikasabhāvo eva, na āyuādīnaṃ avigame viya mattasoti
tika-s0102t:1300_4: adhippāyo. Ediso bhavissatīti evaṃbhāvīti āha “evaṃ uddhumātādibhedo bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1301_0: Luñcitvā luñcitvāti uppāṭetvā uppāṭetvā. Sāvasesamaṃsalohitayuttanti sabbaso akhāditattā
tika-s0102t:1301_1: tahaṃ tahaṃ sesena appāvasesena maṃsalohitena yuttaṃ. “Aññena hatthaṭṭhika”nti avisesena
tika-s0102t:1301_2: hatthaṭṭhikānaṃ vippakiṇṇatā jotitāti anavasesato tesaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ dassento “catusaṭṭhibhedampī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1302_0: Terovassikānīti tirovassaṃ gatāni, tāni pana saṃvaccharaṃ vītivattāni hontīti āha
tika-s0102t:1302_2: so yathā hoti, taṃ dassento “abbhokāse”tiādimāha. Terovassikānevāti saṃvaccharamattātikkantāni
tika-s0102t:1304_0: Imāneva dveti avadhāraṇena appanākammaṭṭhānaṃ tattha niyameti aññapabbesu tadabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1304_1: Yato hi eva-kāro, tato aññattha niyameti, tena pabbadvayassa vipassanākammaṭṭhānatāpi
tika-s0102t:1304_2: appaṭisiddhā daṭṭhabbā aniccatādidassanato. Saṅkhāresu ādīnavavibhāvanāni sivathikapabbānīti
tika-s0102t:1304_4: pākaṭā evāti “sesāni dvādasapī”ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0102t:1307_0: 380. Sukhaṃ vedananti ettha sukhayatīti sukhā. Sampayuttadhamme, kāyañca laddhassāde
tika-s0102t:1307_1: karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khādati, khanati vā kāyikaṃ, cetasikañcābādhanti sukhā.
tika-s0102t:1307_2: “Sukaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etissāti sukhā”ti apare. Vedayati ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavatīti
tika-s0102t:1307_3: vedanā. Vedayamānoti anubhavamāno. “Kāma”ntiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ iriyāpathapabbe
tika-s0102t:1308_1: “vatthū”ti adhippetaṃ. Assāti bhaveyya. Dhammavinimuttassa kattu abhāvato dhammasseva
tika-s0102t:1308_2: kattubhāvaṃ dassento “vedanāva vedayatī”ti āha. “Vohāramattaṃ hotī”ti etena “sukhaṃ
tika-s0102t:1308_3: vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti idaṃ vohāramattanti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:1309_0: Nitthunantoti balavato vedanāvegassa nirodhane ādīnavaṃ disvā tassa avasaradānavasena
tika-s0102t:1309_1: nitthunanto. Vegasandhāraṇe hi atimahantaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjatīti aññampi vikāraṃ uppādeyya,
tika-s0102t:1309_2: tena thero aparāparaṃ parivattati. Vīriyasamathaṃ yojetvāti adhivāsanavīriyassa adhimattattā
tika-s0102t:1309_3: tassa hāpanavasena samādhinā samarasatāpādanena vīriyasamathaṃ yojetvā. Saha paṭisambhidāhīti
tika-s0102t:1309_4: lokuttarapaṭisambhidāhi saha. Ariyamaggakkhaṇe hi paṭisambhidānaṃ asammohavasena
tika-s0102t:1309_5: adhigamo, atthapaṭisambhidāya pana ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapi. Lokiyānampi vā sati uppattikāle
tika-s0102t:1309_6: tattha samatthataṃ sandhāyāha “saha paṭisambhidāhī”ti. Samasīsīti vārasamasīsī hutvā,
tika-s0102t:1310_0: Yathā ca sukhaṃ, evaṃ dukkhanti yathā “sukhaṃ ko vedayatī”tiādinā sampajānavediyanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1310_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ, evaṃ dukkhampi. Tattha dukkhayatīti dukkhā, sampayuttadhamme, kāyañca
tika-s0102t:1310_2: pīḷeti vibādhatīti attho. Duṭṭhuṃ vā khādati, khanati kāyikaṃ, cetasikañca sātanti
tika-s0102t:1310_3: dukkhā. “Dukkaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etissāti dukkhā”ti apare. Arūpakammaṭṭhānanti arūpapariggahaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1310_4: arūpadhammamukhena vipassanābhinivesananti attho. Na pākaṭaṃ hoti phassassa, cittassa
tika-s0102t:1310_5: ca avibhūtākārattā. Tenāha “andhakāraṃ viya khāyatī”ti. “Na pākaṭaṃ hotī”ti ca idaṃ
tika-s0102t:1310_6: tādise puggale sandhāya vuttaṃ, tesaṃ ādito vedanāva vibhūtatarā hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0102t:1310_7: Evañhi yaṃ vuttaṃ sakkapañhavaṇṇanā dīsu “phasso pākaṭo hoti, viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī”ti,
tika-s0102t:1310_8: taṃ avirodhitaṃ hoti. Vedanāvasena kathiyamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1310_9: “Vedanānaṃ uppattipākaṭatāyā”ti ca idaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Tāsañhi
tika-s0102t:1310_10: pavatti oḷārikā, na itarāya. Tadubhayaggahaṇamukhena vā gahetabbattā itarāyapi pavatti
tika-s0102t:1310_11: viññūnaṃ pākaṭā evāti “vedanāna”nti avisesaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakkapañhe vuttanayeneva
tika-s0102t:1310_12: veditabbo, tasmā tattha vattabbo atthaviseso tattha līnatthappakāsaniyaṃ vuttanayeneva gahetabbo.
tika-s0102t:1311_0: Pubbe “vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatī”ti vedanāya ārammaṇādhīnavuttitāya
tika-s0102t:1311_1: ca anattatāya ca pajānanaṃ vuttaṃ, idāni tassā aniccatādipajānanaṃ dassento “ayaṃ
tika-s0102t:1311_2: aparopi pajānanapariyāyo”ti āha. Yathā ekasmiṃ khaṇe cittadvayassa asambhavo ekajjhaṃ
tika-s0102t:1311_3: anekantapaccayābhāvato, evaṃ vedanādvayassa visiṭṭhārammaṇavuttito cāti āha “sukhavedanākkhaṇe
tika-s0102t:1311_4: dukkhāya vedanāya abhāvato”ti. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ tadā upekkhāvedanāyapi abhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1311_5: tena sukhavedanākkhaṇe bhūtapubbānaṃ itaravedanānaṃ hutvāabhāvapajānanena sukhavedanāyapi
tika-s0102t:1311_6: hutvā abhāvo ñāto eva hotīti tassā pākaṭabhāvameva dassento “imissā ca sukhāya vedanāya
tika-s0102t:1311_7: ito paṭhamaṃ abhāvato”ti āha, eteneva ca tāsampi vedanānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo dassitoti
tika-s0102t:1311_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “vedanā nāma aniccā adhuvā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti. Aniccaggahaṇena
tika-s0102t:1311_9: hi vedanānaṃ viddhaṃsanabhāvo dassito viddhaste aniccatāya suviññeyyattā. Adhuvaggahaṇena
tika-s0102t:1311_10: pākaṭabhāvo tassa asadābhāvitādibhāvanato. Vipariṇāmaggahaṇena dukkhabhāvo tassa
tika-s0102t:1311_11: aññathattadīpanato, tena sukhāpi vedanā dukkhā, pageva itarāti tissannampi vedanānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1311_12: dukkhatā dassitā hoti. Iti “yadaniccaṃ dukkhaṃ, taṃ ekantato anattā”ti tīsupi vedanāsu
tika-s0102t:1311_13: lakkhaṇattayapajānanā jotitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “itiha tattha sampajāno hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1312_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ suttena sādhetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādimāha. Tattha neva tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0102t:1312_1: dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedetīti tasmiṃ sukhavedanāsamaṅgisamaye neva dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti
tika-s0102t:1312_2: niruddhattā, anuppannattā ca yathākkamaṃ atītānāgatānaṃ. Paccuppannāya pana asambhavo
tika-s0102t:1312_3: vutto eva. Sakiccakkhaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato aniccā. Samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katattā
tika-s0102t:1312_4: saṅkhatā. Vatthārammaṇādipaccayaṃ paṭicca uppannattā paṭiccasamuppannā. Khayavayapalujjananirujjhanapakatitāya
tika-s0102t:1313: Kilesehi āmasitabbato āmisaṃ nāma, pañca kāmaguṇā, ārammaṇakaraṇavasena saha āmisehīti sāmisaṃ. Tenāha “pañcakāmaguṇāmisanissitā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1314: Ito paranti “atthi vedanā”ti evamādi pāḷiṃ sandhāyāha “kāyānupassanāyaṃ vuttanayamevā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1317_0: 381. Sampayogavasena pavattamānena saha rāgenāti sarāgaṃ. Tenāha “lobhasahagata”nti.
tika-s0102t:1317_1: Vītarāganti ettha kāmaṃ sarāgapadapaṭiyoginā vītarāgapadena bhavitabbaṃ, sammasanacārassa
tika-s0102t:1317_2: pana adhippetattā tebhūmakasseva gahaṇanti “lokiyakusalābyākata”nti vatvā “idaṃ panā”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:1317_3: tameva adhippāyaṃ vivarati. Sesāni dve dosamūlāni, dve mohamūlānīti cattāri akusalacittāni.
tika-s0102t:1317_4: Tesañhi rāgena sampayogābhāvato nattheva sarāgatā, taṃnimittakatāya pana siyā taṃsahitakāle
tika-s0102t:1317_5: soti nattheva vītarāgatāpīti dukkhavinimuttatā evettha labbhatīti āha “neva purimapadaṃ
tika-s0102t:1317_6: na pacchimapadaṃ bhajantī”ti. Yadi evaṃ padesikaṃ pajānanaṃ āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati,
tika-s0102t:1317_7: dukantarapariyāpannattā tesaṃ. Ye pana “paṭipakkhabhāve agayhamāne sampayogābhāvo
tika-s0102t:1317_8: evettha pamāṇaṃ ekaccaabyākatānaṃ viyā”ti icchanti, tesaṃ matena sesākusalacittānampi
tika-s0102t:1317_9: dutiyapadasaṅgaho veditabbo. Dutiyadukepi vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Akusalamūlesu
tika-s0102t:1317_10: saha moheneva vattatīti samohanti āha “vicikicchāsahagatañceva uddhaccasahagatañcā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1317_11: Yasmā cettha “saheva mohenāti samoha”nti purimapadāvadhāraṇampi labbhatiyeva, tasmā
tika-s0102t:1317_12: vuttaṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi. Yathā pana atimūḷhatāya pāṭipuggalikanayena savisesamohavantatāya
tika-s0102t:1317_14: vuccati, na tathā sesākusalacittānīti “vaṭṭantiyevā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Sampayogavasena
tika-s0102t:1317_16: saṅkucitacittaṃ, saṅkucitacittaṃ nāma ārammaṇe saṅkocanavasena pavattanato. Paccayavisesavasena
tika-s0102t:1317_17: thāmajātena uddhaccena sahagataṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti uddhaccasahagataṃ, aññathā sabbampi
tika-s0102t:1317_18: akusalacittaṃ uddhaccasahagatamevāti. Pasaṭacittaṃ nāma ārammaṇe savisesaṃ vikkhepavasena
tika-s0102t:1318_0: Kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāya vipulaphalatāya ca dīghasantānatāya ca mahantabhāvaṃ
tika-s0102t:1318_1: gataṃ, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gataṃ paṭipannanti mahaggataṃ, taṃ pana rūpārūpabhūmigataṃ
tika-s0102t:1318_2: tato mahantassa loke abhāvato. Tenāha “rūpārūpāvacara”nti. Tassa cettha paṭiyogī
tika-s0102t:1318_3: parittaṃ evāti āha “amahaggatanti kāmāvacara”nti. Attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi saha
tika-s0102t:1318_4: uttarehīti sauttaraṃ. Tappaṭipakkhena anuttaraṃ. Tadubhayaṃ upādāyupādāya veditabbanti
tika-s0102t:1318_6: āhitaṃ samāhitaṃ. Tenāha “yassā”tiādi. Yassāti yassa cittassa. Yathāvuttena samādhinā
tika-s0102t:1318_7: na samāhitanti asamāhitaṃ. Tenāha “ubhayasamādhirahita”nti. Tadaṅgavimuttiyā vimuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1318_10: taṃ ubhayavimuttirahitanti gayhamāne lokuttaracittepi siyāsaṅkāti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1318_11: “samuccheda…pe… okāsova natthī”ti āha. Okāsabhāvo ca sammasanacārassa adhippetattā
tika-s0102t:1318_12: veditabbo. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānameva.
tika-s0102t:1322_1: pāḷito eva viññāyatīti tamatthaṃ ulliṅgento “pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ kathetu”nti
tika-s0102t:1322_2: āha. Yadi evaṃ kasmā nīvaraṇādivaseneva niddiṭṭhanti? Vineyyajjhāsayato. Yesañhi
tika-s0102t:1322_3: veneyyānaṃ pahātabbadhammesu paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇāni vibhāgena vattabbāni, tesaṃ vasenettha
tika-s0102t:1322_4: bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇesu dhammānupassanā kathitā. Tathā hi kāyānupassanāpi samathapubbaṅgamā
tika-s0102t:1322_5: desitā, tato pariññeyyesu khandhesu, āyatanesu ca bhāvetabbesu bojjhaṅgesu, pariññeyyādivibhāgesu
tika-s0102t:1322_6: saccesu ca uttarā desanā, tasmā cettha samathabhāvanāpi yāvadeva vipassanatthā icchitā.
tika-s0102t:1322_7: Vipassanāpadhānā, vipassanābahulā ca satipaṭṭhānadesanāti tassā vipassanābhinivesavibhāgena
tika-s0102t:1323_1: vuttaṃ. Saṃvijjamānanti attano santāne upalabbhamānaṃ. Yathāti yenākārena, so pana
tika-s0102t:1323_2: “kāmacchandassa uppādo hotī”ti vuttattā kāmacchandassa kāraṇākārova, atthato kāraṇamevāti
tika-s0102t:1324_0: Tatthāti “yathā cā”tiādinā vuttapade. Subhampīti kāmacchandopi. So hi attano gahaṇākārena
tika-s0102t:1324_1: “subha”nti vutto, tenākārena pavattanakassa aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā “nimitta”nti
tika-s0102t:1324_2: ca. Iṭṭhaṃ, iṭṭhākārena vā gayhamānaṃ rūpādi subhārammaṇaṃ. Ākaṅkhitassa hitasukhassa
tika-s0102t:1324_3: pattiyā anupāyabhūto manasikāro anupāyamanasikāro. Tanti ayonisomanasikāraṃ. Tatthāti
tika-s0102t:1324_4: tasmiṃ sabhāgahetubhūte, ārammaṇabhūte ca duvidhe subhanimitte. Āhāroti paccayo attano
tika-s0102t:1325_0: Asubhanti asubhajjhānaṃ uttarapadalopena, taṃ pana dasasu aviññāṇakaasubhesu ca kesādīsu
tika-s0102t:1325_1: saviññāṇakaasubhesu ca pavattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kesādīsu hi saññā “asubhasaññā”ti girimānandasutte
tika-s0102t:1325_2: vuttā. Ettha ca catubbidhassa ayonisomanasikārassa, yonisomanasikārassa ca gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1325_3: niravasesadassanatthaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tesu pana asubhesu “subha”nti, “asubha”nti
tika-s0102t:1325_4: ca manasikāro idhādhippeto, tadanukūlattā pana itare pīti.
tika-s0102t:1326_0: Ekādasasu asubhesu paṭikkūlākārassa uggaṇhanaṃ, yathā vā tattha uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0102t:1326_1: tathā paṭipatti asubhanimittassa uggaho. Upacārappanāvahāya asubhabhāvanāya anuyuñjanā
tika-s0102t:1326_3: alabhamāno kāmacchando pahīyatī”ti vadanti, ayameva ca attho niddesepi vuccati. Yo
tika-s0102t:1326_4: pana bhojanassa paṭikkūlataṃ, tabbipariṇāmassa tadādhārassa tassa ca upanissayabhūtassa
tika-s0102t:1326_5: ativiya jegucchataṃ, kāyassa ca āhāraṭṭhitikattaṃ sammadeva jānāti, so sabbaso bhojane
tika-s0102t:1326_6: pamāṇassa jānanena bhojanemattaññū nāma. Tādisassa hi kāmacchando pahīyateva.
tika-s0102t:1327_1: Ito paresupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu eseva nayo. Abhidhammapariyāyena sabbopi lobho kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti
tika-s0102t:1328: Paṭighampi purimuppannaṃ paṭighanimittaṃ parato uppajjanakassa paṭighassa kāraṇanti katvā.
tika-s0102t:1329_0: Mejjati siniyhatīti mitto, hitesī puggalo, tasmiṃ mitte bhavā, mittassa vā esāti
tika-s0102t:1329_1: mettā, hitesitā, tassā mettāya. Appanāpi upacāropi vaṭṭati sādhāraṇavacanabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1329_2: “Cetovimuttī”ti vutte appanāva vaṭṭati appanaṃ appattāya paṭipakkhato suṭṭhu muccanassa
tika-s0102t:1329_3: abhāvato. Tanti yonisomanasikāraṃ. Tatthāti mettāya. Bahulaṃ pavattayatoti bahulīkāravato.
tika-s0102t:1330_0: Sattesu mettāyanassa hitūpasaṃhārassa uppādanaṃ pavattanaṃ mettānimittassa uggaho,
tika-s0102t:1330_1: paṭhamuppanno mettāmanasikāro parato uppajjanakassa kāraṇabhāvato mettāmanasikārova
tika-s0102t:1330_2: mettānimittaṃ. Kammameva sakaṃ etesanti kammassakā, sattā, tabbhāvo kammassakatā,
tika-s0102t:1330_3: kammadāyādatā. Dosamettāsu yāthāvato ādīnavānisaṃsānaṃ paṭisaṅkhānaṃ vīmaṃsā idha
tika-s0102t:1330_6: odissakatā, sīmāsambhede kate anodissakatā. Ekādidisāpharaṇavasena disāpharaṇatā
tika-s0102t:1330_7: mettāya uggahaṇe veditabbā. Vihāraracchāgāmādivasena vā odissakadisāpharaṇaṃ. Vihārādiuddesarahitaṃ
tika-s0102t:1330_8: puratthimādidisāvasena anodissakadisāpharaṇanti evaṃ dvidhā uggahaṇaṃ sandhāya “odissakaanodissakadisāpharaṇāna”nti
tika-s0102t:1330_9: vuttaṃ. Uggahoti ca yāva upacārā daṭṭhabbo. Uggahitāya āsevanā bhāvanā. Tattha sabbe
tika-s0102t:1330_10: sattā, pāṇā, bhūtā, puggalā, attabhāvapariyāpannāti etesaṃ vasena pañcavidhā, ekekasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:1330_11: averā hontu, abyāpajjhā, anīghā, sukhī attānaṃ pariharantūti catudhā pavattito vīsatividhā
tika-s0102t:1330_12: anodissakapharaṇā mettā. Sabbā itthiyo, purisā, ariyā, anariyā, devā, manussā, vinipātikāti
tika-s0102t:1330_13: sattodhikaraṇavasena pavattā sattavidhā, aṭṭhavīsati vidhā vā, dasahi disāhi disodhikaraṇavasena
tika-s0102t:1330_14: pavattā dasavidhā, ekekāya vā disāya sattādiitthādiaverādibhedena asītādhikacatusatappabhedā
tika-s0102t:1331_0: Yena ayonisomanasikārena aratiādikāni uppajjanti, so aratiādīsu ayonisomanasikāro.
tika-s0102t:1331_1: Tena nipphādetabbe hi idaṃ bhummaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi. Ukkaṇṭhitā pantasenāsanesu,
tika-s0102t:1331_2: adhikusaladhammesu ca uppajjanabhāvariñcanā. Kāyavinamanāti karajakāyassa virūpenākārena
tika-s0102t:1332_1: ca ārambhadhātuādito pavattavīriyanti āha “paṭhamārambhavīriya”nti. Yasmā paṭhamārambhamattassa
tika-s0102t:1332_2: kosajjavidhamanaṃ, thāmagamanañca natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ “kosajjato nikkhantatāya tato
tika-s0102t:1332_3: balavatara”nti. Yasmā pana aparāparuppattiyā laddhāsevanaṃ uparūpari visesaṃ āvahantaṃ
tika-s0102t:1332_4: ativiya thāmagatameva hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavatara”nti.
tika-s0102t:1333_0: Atibhojane nimittaggāhoti atibhojane thinamiddhassa nimittaggāho, ettake bhutte taṃ
tika-s0102t:1333_1: bhojanaṃ thinamiddhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti, ettake na hotīti thinamiddhassa kāraṇākāraṇagāho
tika-s0102t:1333_2: hotīti attho. Byatirekavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā “ettake bhutte taṃ bhojanaṃ thinamiddhassa
tika-s0102t:1333_3: kāraṇaṃ na hotī”ti bhojane mattaññutā ca atthato dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “catupañca…pe…
tika-s0102t:1333_4: na hotī”ti. Divā sūriyālokanti divā gahitanimittaṃ sūriyālokaṃ rattiyaṃ manasi karontassāpīti
tika-s0102t:1333_5: evamettha attho veditabbo. Dhutaṅgānaṃ vīriyanissitattā vuttaṃ “dhutaṅganissitasappāyakathāyapī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1334: Kukkuccampi katākatānusocanavasena pavattamānaṃ cetaso avūpasamāvahatāya uddhaccena samānalakkhaṇamevāti “avūpasamo nāma avūpasantākāro, uddhaccakukkuccamevetaṃ atthato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1335_0: Bahussutassa ganthato, atthato ca suttādīni vicārentassa tabbahulavihārino atthavedādipaṭilābhasabbhāvato
tika-s0102t:1335_1: vikkhepo na hotīti, yathāvidhipaṭipattiyā, yathānurūpapatikārappavattiyā ca katākatānusocanañca
tika-s0102t:1335_2: na hotīti “bāhusaccenapi…pe… uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatī”ti āha. Yadaggena bāhusaccena
tika-s0102t:1335_3: uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati, tadaggena paripucchakatāvinayapakataññutāhipi taṃ pahīyatīti
tika-s0102t:1335_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vuddhasevitā ca vuddhasīlitaṃ āvahatīti cetovūpasamakarattā uddhaccakukkuccappahānakārī
tika-s0102t:1335_5: vuttā. Vuddhattaṃ pana anapekkhitvā kukkuccavinodakā vinayadharā kalyāṇamittā vuttāti
tika-s0102t:1335_6: daṭṭhabbā. Vikkhepo ca pabbajitānaṃ yebhuyyena kukkuccahetuko hotīti “kappiyākappiyaparipucchābahulassā”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:1335_7: vinayanayeneva paripucchakatādayo niddiṭṭhā. Pahīne uddhaccakukkucceti niddhāraṇe
tika-s0102t:1335_8: bhummaṃ. Kukkuccassa domanassasahagatattā anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo vutto.
tika-s0102t:1336_0: Tiṭṭhati pavattati etthāti ṭhānīyā vicikicchāya ṭhānīyā vicikicchāṭhānīyā, vicikicchāya
tika-s0102t:1336_1: kāraṇabhūtā dhammā, tiṭṭhatīti vā ṭhānīyā, vicikicchā ṭhānīyā etissāti vicikicchāṭhānīyā,
tika-s0102t:1336_2: atthato vicikicchā eva. Sā hi purimuppannā parato uppajjanakavicikicchāya sabhāgahetutāya
tika-s0102t:1337_0: Kusalākusalāti kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalā, tappaṭipakkhato akusalā. Ye akusalā,
tika-s0102t:1337_1: te sāvajjā, asevitabbā, hīnā ca. Ye kusalā, te anavajjā, sevitabbā, paṇītā ca. Kusalā
tika-s0102t:1337_2: vā hīnehi chandādīhi āraddhā hīnā, paṇītehi paṇītā. Kaṇhāti kāḷakā cittassa apabhassarabhāvakaraṇā.
tika-s0102t:1337_3: Sukkāti odātā cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇā. Kaṇhābhijātihetuto vā kaṇhā. Sukkābhijātihetuto
tika-s0102t:1337_4: sukkā. Te eva sappaṭibhāgā. Kaṇhā hi ujuvipaccanīkatāya sukkasappaṭibhāgā, tathā
tika-s0102t:1337_5: sukkāpi itarehi. Atha vā kaṇhasukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā ca kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā. Sukhā
tika-s0102t:1337_6: hi vedanā dukkhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgā, dukkhā ca vedanā sukhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgāti.
tika-s0102t:1338_0: Kāmaṃ bāhusaccaparipucchakatāhi sabbāpi aṭṭhavatthukā vicikicchā pahīyati, tathāpi
tika-s0102t:1338_1: ratanattayavicikicchāmūlikā sesavicikicchāti katvā āha “tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1338_3: pakataññutā “sikkhāya kaṅkhatī”ti vuttāya vicikicchāya pahānaṃ karotīti āha “vinaye
tika-s0102t:1339_1: asubhanimittādīsū”ti ādi-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha paṭhamena ādi-saddena paṭighanimittādīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:1339_2: saṅgaho, dutiyenamettācetovimuttiādīnaṃ. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-s0102t:1342: 383. Upādānehi ārammaṇakaraṇādivasena upādātabbā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā.
tika-s0102t:1343_0: Iti rūpanti ettha iti-saddo idaṃ-saddena samānatthoti adhippāyenāha “idaṃ rūpa”nti.
tika-s0102t:1343_1: Tayidaṃ sarūpaggahaṇabhāvato anavasesapariyādānaṃ hotīti āha “ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito
tika-s0102t:1343_2: paraṃ rūpaṃ atthī”ti. Itīti vā pakāratthe nipāto, tasmā “iti rūpa”nti iminā bhūtupādādivasena
tika-s0102t:1343_3: yattako rūpassa pabhedo, tena saddhiṃ rūpaṃ anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dasseti. Sabhāvatoti
tika-s0102t:1343_4: ruppanasabhāvato, cakkhādivaṇṇādisabhāvato ca. Vedanādīsupīti ettha “ayaṃ vedanā,
tika-s0102t:1343_5: ettakā vedanā, na ito paraṃ vedanā atthīti sabhāvato vedanaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā, sabhāvatoti
tika-s0102t:1343_6: ca “anubhavanasabhāvato, sātādisabhāvato cā”ti evamādinā yojetabbaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0102t:1346_0: 384. Chasu ajjhattikabāhiresūti “chasu ajjhattikesu chasu bāhiresū”ti “chasū”ti padaṃ
tika-s0102t:1346_1: paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Kasmā panetāni ubhayāni chaḷeva vuttāni? Chaviññāṇakāyuppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato.
tika-s0102t:1346_2: Cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā pariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṃ,
tika-s0102t:1346_3: rūpāyatanameva ca ārammaṇaṃ, tathā itarāni itaresaṃ, chaṭṭhassa pana bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto
tika-s0102t:1346_4: manāyatanekadeso uppattidvāraṃ, asādhāraṇañca dhammāyatanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Cakkhatīti
tika-s0102t:1346_5: cakkhu, rūpaṃ assādeti, vibhāveti cāti attho. Suṇātīti sotaṃ. Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Jīvitanimittatāya
tika-s0102t:1346_6: raso jīvitaṃ, taṃ jīvitaṃ avhāyatīti jivhā. Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyo uppattidesoti
tika-s0102t:1346_7: kāyo. Munāti ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti mano. Rūpayati vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ
tika-s0102t:1346_8: pakāsetīti rūpaṃ. Sappati attano paccayehi harīyati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ gamīyatīti
tika-s0102t:1346_9: saddo. Gandhayati attano vatthuṃ sūcetīti gandho. Rasanti taṃ sattā assādentīti raso.
tika-s0102t:1346_10: Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ. Attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhammā. Sabbāni pana āyānaṃ tananādiatthena
tika-s0102t:1346_11: āyatanāni. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1347_0: Cakkhuñca pajānātīti ettha cakkhu nāma pasādacakkhu, na sasambhāracakkhu, nāpi dibbacakkhuādikanti
tika-s0102t:1347_1: āha cakkhupasādanti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya
tika-s0102t:1347_3: attano rasassa ceva lakkhaṇassa ca vasena, rūpesu āviñchanakiccassa ceva rūpābhighātārahabhūtapasādalakkhaṇassa
tika-s0102t:1347_5: vā yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasenāti yāthāvasarasavasena ceva lakkhaṇavasena ca, yāthāvasarasoti
tika-s0102t:1347_6: ca aviparītasabhāvo veditabbo. So hi rasīyati aviraddhapaṭivedhavasena assādīyati
tika-s0102t:1347_7: ramīyatīti “raso”ti vuccati, tasmā salakkhaṇavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Lakkhaṇavasenāti
tika-s0102t:1348_0: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādīsu samuditāniyeva rūpāyatanāni
tika-s0102t:1348_1: cakkhuviññāṇuppattihetu, na visuṃ visunti imassa atthassa jotanatthaṃ “rūpe cā”ti
tika-s0102t:1348_2: puthuvacanaggahaṇaṃ, tāya eva ca desanāgatiyā kāmaṃ idhāpi “rūpe ca pajānātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1348_3: rūpabhāvasāmaññena pana sabbaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā bahiddhā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpañcāti
tika-s0102t:1348_4: ekavacanavasena attho. Sarasalakkhaṇa vasenāti cakkhuviññāṇassa visayabhāvakiccassa
tika-s0102t:1348_5: vasena ceva cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇassa vasena cāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1349_0: Ubhayaṃ paṭiccāti cakkhuṃ upanissayapaccayavasena paccayabhūtaṃ, rūpe ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayavasena
tika-s0102t:1349_1: paccayabhūte ca paṭicca. Kāmaṃ ayaṃ suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā, nippariyāyakathā nāma abhidhammasannissitā
tika-s0102t:1349_2: evāti abhidhammanayeneva saṃyojanāni dassento “kāmarāga…pe… avijjāsaṃyojana”nti āha.
tika-s0102t:1349_3: Tattha kāmesu rāgo, kāmo ca so rāgo cāti vā kāmarāgo. So eva bandhanaṭṭhena saṃyojanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1349_4: Ayañhi yassa saṃvijjati, taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojeti bandhati iti dukkhena sattaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1349_5: bhavādike vā bhavantarādīhi, kammunā vā vipākaṃ saṃyojeti bandhatīti saṃyojanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1349_6: Evaṃ paṭighasaṃyojaṃādīnampi yathārahamattho vattabbo. Sarasalakkhaṇavasenāti ettha
tika-s0102t:1349_7: pana sattassa vaṭṭato anissajjanasaṅkhātassa attano kiccassa ceva yathāvuttabandhanasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0102t:1350_1: Abhinandatoti sappītikataṇhāvasena nandantassa. Padadvayenāpi balavato kāmarāgassa
tika-s0102t:1350_2: paccayabhūtā kāmarāguppatti vuttā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Aniṭṭhārammaṇeti ettha “āpāthagate”ti
tika-s0102t:1350_3: vibhattivipariṇāmanavasena “āpāthagata”nti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Etaṃ ārammaṇanti
tika-s0102t:1350_4: etaṃ evaṃsukhumaṃ evaṃdubbibhāgaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. “Niccaṃ dhuva”nti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1350_5: “Ucchijjissati vinassissatīti gaṇhato”ti evamādīnampi saṅgaho icchitabbo. Paṭhamāya
tika-s0102t:1350_6: sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā anurodhavasena “satto nu kho”ti, itarāya anurodhavasena “sattassa
tika-s0102t:1350_7: nu kho”ti vicikicchato. Attattaniyādigāhānugatā hi vicikicchā diṭṭhiyā asati abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1350_8: Bhavaṃ patthentassāti “īdise sampattibhave yasmā amhākaṃ idaṃ iṭṭhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1350_9: sulabhaṃ jātaṃ, tasmā āyatimpi ediso, ito vā uttaritaro sampattibhavo bhaveyyā”ti
tika-s0102t:1350_10: bhavaṃ nikāmentassa. Evarūpanti evarūpaṃ rūpaṃ. Taṃsadise hi tabbohāravasenevaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1350_11: Bhavati hi taṃsadisesu tabbohāro yathā “sā eva tittirī, tāni eva osadhānī”ti. Usūyatoti
tika-s0102t:1350_12: usūyaṃ issaṃ uppādayato. Aññassa maccharāyatoti aññena asādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇena macchariyaṃ
tika-s0102t:1351_1: tajjāyonisomanasikārañcāti tassa tassa saṃyojanassa kāraṇaṃ. Avikkhambhitāsamūhatabhūmiladdhuppannaṃ
tika-s0102t:1351_2: taṃ sandhāya “appahīnaṭṭhena uppannassā”ti vuttaṃ. Vattamānuppannatā samudācāraggahaṇeneva
tika-s0102t:1351_3: gahitā. Yena kāraṇenāti yena vipassanāsamathabhāvanāsaṅkhātena kāraṇena. Tañhi tassa
tika-s0102t:1351_4: tadaṅgavasena ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca pahānakāraṇaṃ. Issāmacchariyānaṃ apāyagamanīyatāya
tika-s0102t:1351_5: paṭhamamaggavajjhatā vuttā. Yadi evaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hotī”ti
tika-s0102t:1351_6: suttapadaṃ kathanti? Taṃ suttantapariyāyena vuttaṃ. Yathānulomasāsanā hi suttantadesanā,
tika-s0102t:1351_7: ayaṃ pana abhidhammanayena saṃvaṇṇanāti nāyaṃ dosoti. Oḷārikassāti thūlassa, yato
tika-s0102t:1351_9: aṇubhāvaṃ sukhumabhāvaṃ gatassa. Uddhaccasaṃyojanassapettha anuppādo vuttoyevāti
tika-s0102t:1351_10: daṭṭhabbo yathāvuttasaṃyojanehi avinābhāvato. Ekatthatāya sotādīnaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇavasena
tika-s0102t:1351_11: pajānanā, tappaccayānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ uppādādipajānanā ca vuttanayeneva veditabbāti
tika-s0102t:1352_0: Attano vā dhammesūti attano ajjhattikāyatanadhammesu, attano ubhayadhammesu vā. Imasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:1352_2: Evañca anavasesato saparasantānesu āyatanānaṃ pariggaho siddho hoti. Parassa vā dhammesūti
tika-s0102t:1352_3: etthāpi eseva nayo. Rūpāyatanassāti aḍḍhekādasappabhedassa rūpasabhāvassa āyatanassa
tika-s0102t:1352_7: vibhāveti, itaraṃ pana sabbattha samānanti khandhapabbe viya āyatanapabbepi lokuttaranivattanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1352_8: pāḷiyaṃ gahitaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ “lokuttaradhammā na gahetabbā”ti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-s0102t:1355_1: paṭivijjhanakasattassa. Aṅgesūti kāraṇesu, avayavesu vā. Udayavayañāṇuppattito paṭṭhāya
tika-s0102t:1355_2: sambodhipaṭipadāyaṃ ṭhito nāma hotīti āha “āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti
tika-s0102t:1355_3: sambodhī”ti. Suttantadesanā nāma pariyāyakathā, ayañca satipaṭṭhānadesanā lokiyamaggavasena
tika-s0102t:1356: “Satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā”ti padassa attho “vicikicchāṭṭhānīyā”ti ettha vuttanayena veditabbo. Tanti yonisomanasikāraṃ. Tatthāti satiyaṃ, nipphādetabbe cetaṃ bhummaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1357_0: Sati ca sampajaññañca satisampajaññaṃ. Atha vā satippadhānaṃ abhikkantādisātthakabhāvapariggaṇhanañāṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1357_1: satisampajaññaṃ. Taṃ sabbattha satokārībhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya
tika-s0102t:1357_2: hoti. Yathā paccanīkadhammappahānaṃ, anurūpadhammasevanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1357_3: dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti, evaṃ satirahitapuggalavivajjanā, satokārīpuggalasevanā,
tika-s0102t:1357_4: tattha ca yuttappayuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti
tika-s0102t:1357_5: “satisampajañña”ntiādinā. Tissadattatthero nāma, yo bodhimaṇḍe suvaṇṇasalākaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0102t:1357_6: “aṭṭhārasasu bhāsāsu katarabhāsāya dhammaṃ kathemī”ti parisaṃ pavāresi. Abhayattheroti
tika-s0102t:1358_0: Dhammānaṃ, dhammesu vā vicayo dhammavicayo, so eva sambojjhaṅgo, tassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa.
tika-s0102t:1358_1: “Kusalākusalā dhammā”tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāroti
tika-s0102t:1358_4: tadābhogatāya āvajjanāpi taggatikā eva, tassa abhiṇhaṃ pavattanaṃ bahulīkāro. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti
tika-s0102t:1358_5: punappunaṃ bhāvāya. Vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāya. Pāripūriyāti paribrūhanāya.
tika-s0102t:1359_0: Paripucchakatāti pariyogāhetvā pucchakabhāvo. Ācariye payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye
tika-s0102t:1359_1: saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ, taṃ taṃ “idaṃ
tika-s0102t:1359_2: bhante kathaṃ, imassa ko attho”ti khandhāyatanādiatthaṃ pucchantassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo
tika-s0102t:1359_3: uppajjati. Tenāha “khandhadhātu…pe… bahulatā”ti. Vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇanti ettha
tika-s0102t:1359_4: cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ, tappaṭibaddhāni cīvarāni ca “vatthūnī”ti
tika-s0102t:1359_5: adhippetāni, tāni yathā cittassa sukhāvahāni honti, tathā karaṇaṃ tesaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1359_7: sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena ca makkhitaṃ. Ca-saddena aññampi sarīrassa,
tika-s0102t:1359_8: cittassa ca pīḷāvahaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Senāsanaṃ vāti vā-saddena pattādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:1359_9: Avisade sati, visayabhūte vā. Kathaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa tāni visayo? Antarantarā
tika-s0102t:1359_10: pavattanakacittuppādavasenevaṃ vuttaṃ. Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya aparisuddhabhāvāya
tika-s0102t:1359_11: saṃvattanti. Cittacetasikesu nissayādipaccayabhūtesu. Ñāṇampīti pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho,
tika-s0102t:1359_12: tena na kevalaṃ taṃ vatthuyeva, atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ
tika-s0102t:1359_13: hotīti nissayāparisuddhiyā taṃnissitāparisuddhi viya visayassa aparisuddhatāya visayino
tika-s0102t:1360_1: adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena, paññāya avisadatāya, vīriyādīnañca sithilatādinā
tika-s0102t:1360_2: saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti. Tenāha “itarāni mandānī”ti. Tatoti tasmā saddhindriyassa
tika-s0102t:1360_3: balavabhāvato, itaresañca mandattā. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1360_4: paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho, paggahova kiccaṃ paggahakiccaṃ, “kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti
tika-s0102t:1360_5: ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ. Vikkhepapaṭikkhepo,
tika-s0102t:1360_6: yena vā sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so avikkhepo. Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato
tika-s0102t:1360_7: visayasabhāvaṃ passati, taṃ dassanakiccaṃ. Kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena
tika-s0102t:1360_8: abhibhūtattā. Sahajātadhammesu hi indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1360_9: ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi, na aññathā. Tasmāti vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati.
tika-s0102t:1360_10: Tanti saddhindriyaṃ. Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenāti yassa saddheyyassa vatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe
tika-s0102t:1360_11: adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tassa paccayapaccayuppannatādivibhāgato
tika-s0102t:1360_12: yāthāvato vīmaṃsanena. Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro
tika-s0102t:1360_13: adhimokkho na hoti “ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo”ti parijānanavasena paññābyāpārassa
tika-s0102t:1360_14: sātisayattā. Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0102t:1360_15: evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hotīti. Tena vuttaṃ “taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena
tika-s0102t:1360_16: vā, yathā vā manasikaroto balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena hāpetabba”nti. Tathā
tika-s0102t:1360_17: amanasikārenāti yenākārena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tenākārena
tika-s0102t:1360_18: bhāvanāya ananuyuñjanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo
tika-s0102t:1360_19: attano vā paccayavisesena kiccuttariyato, vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya. Tattha paṭhamavikappe
tika-s0102t:1360_20: hāpanavidhi dassito. Dutiyakappe pana yathā manasi karoto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya
tika-s0102t:1360_21: saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena, vīriyādīnaṃ paṭukiccabhāvāvahena
tika-s0102t:1360_22: manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ. Iminā nayena sesindriyesupi
tika-s0102t:1361_0: Vakkalittheravatthūti. So hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttatāya katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassanappasuto
tika-s0102t:1361_1: eva hutvā viharanto satthārā “kiṃ te vakkali iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho vakkali
tika-s0102t:1361_2: dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī”tiādinā ovaditvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto
tika-s0102t:1361_3: paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi, atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova
tika-s0102t:1364_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā “ehi vakkalī”ti āha. So tena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā
tika-s0102t:1364_1: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Saddhāya balavabhāvato vipassanāvīthiṃ na otarati, taṃ ñatvā
tika-s0102t:1364_2: bhagavā tassa indriyasamattapaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. So satthārā
tika-s0102t:1364_3: dinnanaye ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggappaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tenetaṃ
tika-s0102t:1364_4: vuttaṃ “vakkalittheravatthu cettha nidassana”nti. Etthāti saddhindriyassa adhimattabhāve
tika-s0102t:1365_1: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena
tika-s0102t:1365_2: hāyati, evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhiyattā
tika-s0102t:1365_3: tassā. Tathā hi samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā
tika-s0102t:1365_4: viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhantī ekaṃsato hāpeti. Tena
tika-s0102t:1365_6: vatthu. so hi āyasmā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto “mama
tika-s0102t:1365_7: sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ, kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo
tika-s0102t:1365_8: kātabbo”ti taṃ ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānaṃ anuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu
tika-s0102t:1365_9: uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ
tika-s0102t:1365_10: nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavīthiṃ
tika-s0102t:1365_11: dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ
tika-s0102t:1365_12: yojetvā bhāvento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “soṇattherassa
tika-s0102t:1366_0: Samatanti saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anūnānadhikabhāvaṃ, tathā samādhivīriyānaṃ. Yathā
tika-s0102t:1366_1: hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññaṃ nātivattanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1366_2: visesato icchitabbaṃ, yato nesaṃ samadhuratāya appanā sampajjati, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1366_5: vuttasseva atthassa samatthanaṃ. Tassattho yo balavatiyā saddhāya samannāgato avisadañāṇo,
tika-s0102t:1366_6: so mudhappasanno hoti, na aveccappasanno. Tathā hi avatthusmiṃ pasīdati seyyathāpi
tika-s0102t:1366_7: titthiyasāvakā. Kerāṭikapakkhanti sāṭheyyapakkhaṃ bhajati. Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto
tika-s0102t:1366_8: “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī”tiādīni parikappeti
tika-s0102t:1366_9: hetupatirūpakehi vañcito, evaṃbhūto ca sukkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1366_10: nādiyati saññattiṃ na gacchati. Tenāha “bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1366_11: Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ visamabhāvo na atthāvaho, anatthāvahova, evaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1366_12: samādhivīriyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ visamabhāvo na atthāvaho, anatthāvahova, tathā na avikkhepāvaho,
tika-s0102t:1366_13: vikkhepāvahovāti. Kosajjaṃ abhibhavati, tena appanaṃ na pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo. Uddhaccaṃ
tika-s0102t:1366_14: abhibhavatīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tadubhayanti saddhāpaññādvayaṃ, samādhivīriyadvayañca.
tika-s0102t:1367_0: Samādhikammikassāti samathakammaṭṭhānikassa. Evanti evaṃ sante, saddhāya thokaṃ balavabhāve
tika-s0102t:1367_1: satīti attho. Saddahantoti “pathavī pathavīti manasikaraṇamattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī”ti
tika-s0102t:1367_2: acintetvā “addhā sammāsambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhissatī”ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento.
tika-s0102t:1367_3: Okappentoti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto.
tika-s0102t:1367_4: Ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati samādhippadhānattā jhānassa. Ubhinnanti samādhipaññānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1367_5: Samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha
tika-s0102t:1367_6: “samatāyapī”ti, samabhāvenāpīti attho. Appanāti lokiyappanā. Tathā hi “hotiyevā”ti
tika-s0102t:1367_7: sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Lokuttarappanā pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. Yathāha “samathavipassanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1368_0: Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ, samādhivīriyānañca samatāva icchitā, kathaṃ satīti
tika-s0102t:1368_1: āha “sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī”ti. Sabbatthāti līnuddhaccapakkhikesu pañcasu
tika-s0102t:1368_3: pīti ca gahetabbā siyā. Tathā hi “kosajjapakkhikena samādhinā” icceva vuttaṃ, na
tika-s0102t:1368_4: “passaddhisamādhiupekkhāhī”ti. Sāti sati. Sabbesu rājakammesu niyutto sabbakammiko.
tika-s0102t:1368_5: Tenāti tena sabbattha icchitabbaṭṭhena kāraṇena. Āha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Sabbattha niyuttā
tika-s0102t:1368_6: sabbatthikā sabbattha līne, uddhate ca citte icchitabbattā, sabbe vā līne, uddhate
tika-s0102t:1368_7: ca citte bhāvetabbā bojjhaṅgā atthikā etāyāti sabbatthikā. Cittanti kusalaṃ cittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1368_8: Tassa hi sati paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya.
tika-s0102t:1369_1: Bahussutasevanā hi sutamayañāṇāvahā. Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā
tika-s0102t:1369_2: ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha “samapaññāsa lakkhaṇapariggāhikāya udayabbayapaññāya
tika-s0102t:1369_5: Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ, tassā vā paññāya tattha
tika-s0102t:1369_6: pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā, tassā paccavekkhaṇāti āha “gambhīrapaññāya
tika-s0102t:1369_7: pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā”ti. Yathā sativepullappatto nāma arahā eva, evaṃ paññāvepullappattotipi
tika-s0102t:1369_8: so evāti āha “arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotī”ti. Vīriyādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:1370_1: nibbattasattassa yebhuyyena sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti, devadūtasuttādīsu tassa ādito
tika-s0102t:1370_3: ādi-saddena tadaññamanussehi, tiracchānehi ca vibādhiyamānakālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. “Ekaṃ
tika-s0102t:1370_4: buddhantara”nti idaṃ aparāparaṃ petesu eva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ, ekaccānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1370_5: vā petānaṃ ekaccatiracchānānaṃ viya tathā dīghāyukatāpi siyāti tathā vuttaṃ. Tathā
tika-s0102t:1370_6: hi “kālo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ labhitvā ṭhito metteyyassapi
tika-s0102t:1370_7: bhagavato sammukhībhāvaṃ labhissatī”ti vadanti, yaṃ tassa kappāyukatā vuttā.
tika-s0102t:1371_0: Ānisaṃsadassāvinoti “vīriyāyatto eva sabbo lokuttaro, lokiyo ca visesādhigamo”ti
tika-s0102t:1371_1: evaṃ vīriye ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa. Gamanavīthinti sapubbabhāgaṃ nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1371_2: saha vipassanāya ariyamaggapaṭipāṭi, sattavisuddhiparamparā vā. Sā hi bhikkhuno vaṭṭaniyyānāya
tika-s0102t:1371_3: gantabbā paṭipadāti katvā gamanavīthi nāma. Kāyadaḷhībahuloti yathā tathā kāyassa
tika-s0102t:1371_4: daḷhīkammappasuto. Piṇḍanti raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ. Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano
tika-s0102t:1371_5: sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍassa bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā piṇḍāpacāyanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1372_0: Nīharantoti pattathavikato nīharanto. Taṃ saddaṃ sutvāti taṃ upāsikāya vacanaṃ attano
tika-s0102t:1372_1: vasanapaṇṇasāladvāre ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvā. Manussasampatti,
tika-s0102t:1372_2: dibbasampatti, nibbānasampattīti imā tisso sampattiyo. Dātuṃ sakkhissasīti “tayi
tika-s0102t:1372_3: katena dānamayena, veyyāvaccamayena ca puññakammena khettavisesabhāvūpagamanena aparāparaṃ
tika-s0102t:1372_4: devamanussasampattiyo, ante nibbānasampattiñca dātuṃ sakkhissasī”ti thero attānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1372_5: pucchati. Sitaṃ karonto vāti “akiccheneva mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta”nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne
tika-s0102t:1373_0: Vippaṭipannanti jātidhammakuladhammādilaṅghanena asammāpaṭipannaṃ. Evaṃ yathā asammāpaṭipanno
tika-s0102t:1373_1: putto tāya eva asammāpaṭipattiyā kulasantānato bāhiro hutvā pitu santikā dāyajjassa
tika-s0102t:1373_2: na bhāgī, evaṃ. Kusītopi tena kusītabhāvena asammāpaṭipanno satthu santikā laddhabbaariyadhanadāyajjassa
tika-s0102t:1373_3: na bhāgī. Āraddhavīriyova labhati sammāpaṭipajjanato. Uppajjati vīriyasambojjhaṅgoti
tika-s0102t:1374: Mahāti sīlādīhi guṇehi mahanto vipulo anaññasādhāraṇo. Taṃ panassa guṇamahattaṃ dasasahassilokadhātukampanena loke pākaṭanti dassento “satthuno hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1375: Yasmā satthusāsane pabbajitassa pabbajjūpagamena sakyaputtassabhāvo sampajāyati, tasmā buddhaputtabhāvaṃ dassento “asambhinnāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1376_0: Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā
tika-s0102t:1376_1: seyyasukhādianuyuñjanakānaṃ tiracchānakathikānaṃ puggalānaṃ dūrato vajjanā kusītapuggalaparivajjanā.
tika-s0102t:1376_3: kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanā āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanā. Tenāha “kucchiṃ pūretvā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1376_5: dvayaṃ na gahitaṃ, thinamiddhavinodanatā, sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇatāti idaṃ dvayaṃ
tika-s0102t:1376_6: gahitaṃ. Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā hoti lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa
tika-s0102t:1376_7: vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato. Thinamiddhavinodanaṃ tadadhimuttatāya eva gahitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:1377_1: pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā”ti vuttā, tassā pana bahuso pavattiyā puthuttaṃ upādāya
tika-s0102t:1377_2: bahuvacananiddeso. Yathā sā uppajjati, evaṃ paṭipatti tassā uppādakamanasikāro.
tika-s0102t:1379_0: Buddhānussatiyā upacārasamādhiniṭṭhattā vuttaṃ “yāva upacārā”ti. Sakalasarīraṃ pharamānoti
tika-s0102t:1379_1: pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno. Dhammaguṇe anussarantassāpi
tika-s0102t:1379_2: yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti yojanā, evaṃ sesaanussatīsu.
tika-s0102t:1379_4: Saṅkhārānaṃ sappadesavūpasamepi nippadesavūpasame viya tathā paññāya pavattito bhāvanāmanasikāro
tika-s0102t:1379_7: Tattha “vikkhambhitā kilesā”ti pāṭho. Te hi na samudācarantīti. Iti-saddo kāraṇattho,
tika-s0102t:1379_8: yasmā na samudācaranti, tasmā taṃ nesaṃ asamudācāraṃ paccavekkhantassāti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1379_9: Na hi kilese paccavekkhantassa bojjhaṅguppatti yuttā. Pasādanīyesu ṭhānesu pasādasinehābhāvena
tika-s0102t:1379_10: thūsasamahadayatā lūkhatā, sā tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti āha “asakkaccakiriyāya
tika-s0102t:1380: Kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā passaddhi eva yathāvuttabodhiaṅgabhūto passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, tassa passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa evaṃ uppādo hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1381_1: sappāyautuiriyāpathaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tañhi tividhampi sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa
tika-s0102t:1381_2: kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṃ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:1381_3: Ahetukaṃ sattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhadukkhanti ayameko anto, issarādivisamahetukanti
tika-s0102t:1381_4: pana ayaṃ dutiyo. Ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā
tika-s0102t:1381_5: paṭipatti. Majjhatto payogo yassa so majjhattapayogo, tassa bhāvo majjhattapayogatā.
tika-s0102t:1381_6: Ayañhi pahāya sāraddhakāyataṃ passaddhakāyatāya kāraṇaṃ hontī passaddhidvayaṃ āvahati,
tika-s0102t:1382_0: Yathāsamāhitākārasallakkhaṇavasena gayhamāno purimuppanno samatho eva samathanimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1382_1: Nānārammaṇe paribbhamanena vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo. Tathā hi so
tika-s0102t:1382_2: anavaṭṭhānaraso, bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca vutto, ekaggatābhāvato byaggapaṭipakkhoti
tika-s0102t:1382_3: abyaggo, samādhi. So eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ. Tenāha “avikkhepaṭṭhena
tika-s0102t:1383: Vatthuvisadakiriyā, indriyasamattapaṭipādanā ca paññāvahā vuttā, samādhānāvahāpi tā honti samādhānāvahabhāveneva paññāvahabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “vatthuvisada…pe… veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1384_1: nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā” icceva vuttaṃ. Kasiṇanimittassāti ca nidassanamattaṃ
tika-s0102t:1384_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asubhanimittassāpi hi yassa kassaci jhānuppattinimittassa uggahaṇakosallaṃ
tika-s0102t:1384_4: pamodavekallañca saṅgaṇhāti. Tassa paggaṇhananti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena
tika-s0102t:1385_0: “Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0102t:1385_1: bhāvanāya, kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya.
tika-s0102t:1385_2: Taṃ kissa hetu? Līnaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ taṃ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:1385_3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjālitukāmo assa, so tattha sukkhāni
tika-s0102t:1385_4: ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni gomayāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0102t:1385_5: mukhavātañca dadeyya, na ca paṃsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ
tika-s0102t:1386_0: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanāsamuṭṭhāpanāti
tika-s0102t:1386_1: veditabbā, sā anantaraṃ vibhāvitā eva. Āraddhavīriyatādīhīti ādi-saddena paññāpayogabalavataṃ,
tika-s0102t:1386_2: pamodubbilāvanañca saṅgaṇhāti. Tassa niggaṇhananti tassa uddhatassa cittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena
tika-s0102t:1387_0: “Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0102t:1387_1: bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya.
tika-s0102t:1387_2: Taṃ kissa hetu? Uddhataṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ taṃ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:1387_3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha
tika-s0102t:1387_4: allāni ceva tiṇāni…pe… paṃsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ
tika-s0102t:1388_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanāsamuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā,
tika-s0102t:1388_1: tattha passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanā vuttā eva. Samādhisambojjhaṅgassa anantaraṃ
tika-s0102t:1388_2: vakkhati. Paññāpayogamandatāyāti paññābyāpārassa appabhāvena. Yathā hi dānaṃ alobhapadhānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1388_3: sīlaṃ adosapadhānaṃ, evaṃ bhāvanā amohapadhānā. Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
tika-s0102t:1388_4: tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti, anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa
tika-s0102t:1388_5: yogino cittassa abhiruciṃ na janeti, tena taṃ nirassādaṃ hoti, tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva
tika-s0102t:1388_6: avīthipaṭipattiyā upasamasukhaṃ na vindati, tenāpi cittaṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:1388_7: “paññāpayoga…pe… nirassādaṃ hotī”ti. Tassa saṃveguppādanaṃ, pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti
tika-s0102t:1388_8: taṃ dassento “aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūnī”tiādimāha. Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ
tika-s0102t:1388_9: sugatiyaṃ, duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva pañcavidhabandhanādikhuppipāsādi aññamaññaṃ
tika-s0102t:1388_10: vibādhanādihetukaṃ apāyadukkhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ
tika-s0102t:1388_11: gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni. Ye pana sattā
tika-s0102t:1388_12: āhārūpajīvino, tattha ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvikādukkhaṃ
tika-s0102t:1388_13: aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanāti ayaṃ
tika-s0102t:1388_14: bhāvanācittassa sampahaṃsitabbasamaye vuttanayena saṃvegajananavasena ceva pasāduppādanavasena
tika-s0102t:1388_15: ca sammadeva pahaṃsanā, saṃvegajananapubbakapasāduppādanena tosanāti attho.
tika-s0102t:1389_0: Sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgammāti līnuddhaccavirahena, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammā avisamaṃ
tika-s0102t:1389_2: anadhimattatāya alīnaṃ, uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ anadhimattatāya anuddhataṃ, paññāpayogasampattiyā,
tika-s0102t:1389_3: upasamasukhādhigamena ca anirassādaṃ, tato eva ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1389_4: Tattha alīnatāya paggahe, anuddhatatāya niggahe, anirassādatāya sampahaṃsane na byāpāraṃ
tika-s0102t:1389_5: āpajjati. Alīnānuddhatatā hi ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ, anirassādatāya samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1389_6: samappavattiyā vā alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ. Samathavīthipaṭipattiyā anirassādanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1389_7: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatāti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye bhāvanācittassa
tika-s0102t:1389_9: vuccati. Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato, vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvūpagamanato ca upacārajjhānampi
tika-s0102t:1389_10: samādhāna kiccanipphattiyā puggalassa samāhitabhāvasādhanaṃ evāti tattha samadhurabhāvenāha
tika-s0102t:1390_0: Upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena
tika-s0102t:1390_2: kāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ sati sijjhanato, asati ca asijjhanato. So ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena
tika-s0102t:1390_3: duvidhoti āha “sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā”ti. Tadubhaye ca virujjhanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1390_4: passaddhisambojjhaṅgabhāvanāya eva dūrīkatanti anurujjhanasseva pahānavidhiṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0102t:1390_6: Upekkhāya hi visesato rāgo paṭipakkho. Tathā cāha “upekkhā rāgabahulassa visuddhimaggo”ti.
tika-s0102t:1390_8: kāraṇehi. Dvīhevāti avadhāraṇaṃ saṅkhyāsamānatādassanatthaṃ. Saṅkhyā evettha samānā,
tika-s0102t:1390_9: na saṅkhyeyyaṃ sabbathā samānanti. Assāmikabhāvo anattaniyatā. Sati hi attani tassa
tika-s0102t:1390_10: kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṃ, aññaṃ vā kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā, so pana koci natthevāti
tika-s0102t:1390_11: adhippāyo. Anaddhaniyanti na addhānakkhamaṃ na ciraṭṭhāyi, ittaraṃ aniccanti attho.
tika-s0102t:1391: Mamāyatīti mamattaṃ karoti “mamā”ti taṇhāya pariggayha tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0102t:1393: Ayaṃ satipaṭṭhānadesanā pubbabhāgamaggavasena desitāti pubbabhāgiyabojjhaṅge sandhāyāha “bojjhaṅgapariggāhikā sati dukkhasacca”nti. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0102t:1397_0: 386. Yathāsabhāvatoti aviparītasabhāvato. Bādhanakkhaṇato yo yo vā sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo,
tika-s0102t:1397_1: tato, ruppanādi kakkhaḷādisabhāvatoti attho. Janikaṃ samuṭṭhāpikanti pavattalakkhaṇassa
tika-s0102t:1397_2: dukkhassa janikaṃ nimittalakkhaṇassa samuṭṭhāpikaṃ. Purimataṇhanti yathāpariggahitassa
tika-s0102t:1397_3: dukkhassa nibbattito puretaraṃ siddhaṃ taṇhaṃ. Siddhe hi kāraṇe tassa phaluppatti.
tika-s0102t:1397_4: Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti pajānātīti yojanā. Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:1397_5: Ubhinnaṃ appavattinti dukkhaṃ, samudayo cāti dvinnaṃ appavattinimittaṃ, tadubhayaṃ
tika-s0102t:1397_6: na pavatti etāyāti appavatti, asaṅkhatā dhātu. Dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ parijānāti pariññābhisamayavasena
tika-s0102t:1397_7: paricchindatīti dukkhaparijānano, ariyamaggo, taṃ dukkhaparijānanaṃ. Sesapadadvayepi
tika-s0102t:1399_0: 388. Evaṃ vuttāti evaṃ uddesavasena vuttā. Sabbasattānaṃ pariyādānavacanaṃ byāpanicchāvasena
tika-s0102t:1399_1: āmeḍitaniddesabhāvato. Sattanikāyeti sattānaṃ nikāye, sattaghaṭe sattasamūheti attho.
tika-s0102t:1399_3: sattasamūho sattanikāyo. Nippariyāyato khandhānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti jātīti katvā
tika-s0102t:1399_4: “jananaṃ jātī”ti vatvā svāyaṃ uppādavikāro aparinipphanno yesu khandhesu icchitabbo,
tika-s0102t:1399_5: te teneva saddhiṃ dassetuṃ “savikārāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Savikārānanti uppādasaṅkhātena
tika-s0102t:1399_6: vikārena savikārānaṃ. Jātiādīni hi tīṇi lakkhaṇāni dhammānaṃ vikāravisesāti. “Upasaggamaṇḍitavevacana”nti
tika-s0102t:1399_7: iminā kevalaṃ upasaggena padavaḍḍhanaṃ katanti dasseti. Anupaviṭṭhākārenāti aṇḍakosaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1400_0: Atha vā jananaṃ jātīti aparipuṇṇāyatanaṃ jātimāha. Sañjātīti sampuṇṇāyatanaṃ. Sampuṇṇā
tika-s0102t:1400_1: hi jāti sañjāti. Okkamanaṭṭhena okkantīti aṇḍajajalābujavasena jāti. Te hi aṇḍakosaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1400_2: vatthikosañca okkamantā pavisantā viya paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti. Abhinibbattanaṭṭhena
tika-s0102t:1400_3: abhinibbattīti saṃsedajaopapātikavasena. Te hi pākaṭā eva hutvā nibbattanti. Abhibyattā
tika-s0102t:1400_4: nibbatti abhinibbatti. “Jananaṃ jātī”tiādi āyatanavasena, yonivasena ca dvīhi dvīhi
tika-s0102t:1400_5: padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyitvā jātiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. “Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ…pe…
tika-s0102t:1400_6: abhinibbattī”ti sattavasena vuttattā sammutikathā. Pātubhāvoti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho,
tika-s0102t:1400_7: pakārattho vā, tena “āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho”ti imassa padassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Ayampi
tika-s0102t:1400_8: hi paramatthakathāti. Ekavokārabhavādīsūti ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu. Tasmiṃ khandhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1400_9: pātubhāve sati. Āyatanānaṃ paṭilābhoti ekacatuvokārabhavesu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ āyatanānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1400_10: vasena, sesesu rūpadhātuyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ pañcannaṃ, kāmadhātuyaṃ
tika-s0102t:1400_11: vikalāvikalindriyānaṃ vasena sattannaṃ, navannaṃ, dasannaṃ, punadasannaṃ, ekādasannañca
tika-s0102t:1400_12: āyatanānaṃ vasena saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Pātubhavantāneva, na kutoci āgatāni. Paṭiladdhāni
tika-s0102t:1400_13: nāma honti sattasantānassa tassa saṃvijjamānattā. Āyatanānaṃ paṭilābhoti vā āyatanānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1401_1: vā. Jīraṇameva jīraṇatā, jīrantassa vā ākāro tā-saddena vuttoti āha “ākārabhāvaniddeso”ti.
tika-s0102t:1401_2: Khaṇḍitadantā khaṇḍitā nāma uttarapadalopena. Yassa vikārassa vasena satto “khaṇḍito”ti
tika-s0102t:1401_3: vuccati, taṃ khaṇḍiccaṃ. Tathā palitāni assa santīti “palito”ti vuccati, taṃ pāliccaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1401_4: Valittacatāya vā vali taco assāti valittaco.
tika-s0102t:1403_0: 390. Cavanameva cavanatā, cavantassa vā ākāro tā-saddena vutto. Khandhā bhijjantīti
tika-s0102t:1403_1: ekabhavapariyāpannassa khandhasantānassa pariyosānabhūtā khandhā bhijjanti, teneva
tika-s0102t:1403_2: bhedena nirodhanaṃ adassanaṃ gacchanti, tasmā bhedo antaradhānaṃ maraṇaṃ. Maccumaraṇanti
tika-s0102t:1403_4: khaṇikamaraṇa”nti. “Maccu maraṇa”nti samāsaṃ akatvā yo “maccū”ti vuccati bhedo, yañca
tika-s0102t:1403_5: maraṇaṃ pāṇacāgo, idaṃ vuccati maraṇanti visuṃ sambandho na na yujjati. Kālakiriyāti
tika-s0102t:1403_6: maraṇakālo, anatikkamanīyattā visesena “kālo”ti vuttoti tassa kiriyā, atthato cutikhandhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1403_7: bhedappattiyeva, kālassa vā antakassa kiriyāti yā loke vuccati, sā cuti, maraṇanti
tika-s0102t:1403_8: attho. Ayaṃ sabbāpi sammutikathāva “yaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattāna”ntiādinā sattavasena
tika-s0102t:1403_9: vuttattā. Ayaṃ paramatthakathā paramatthato labbhamānānaṃ ruppanādisabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1404_0: Attāti bhavati ettha cittanti attabhāvo, khandhasamūho, tassa nikkhepo nikkhipanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1404_1: pātanaṃ vināsoti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpana “maraṇaṃ pattassā”tiādinā nikkhepahetutāya
tika-s0102t:1404_2: patanaṃ “nikkhepo”ti phalūpacārena vuttanti dasseti. “Khandhānaṃ bhedo”ti pabandhavasena
tika-s0102t:1404_4: upacchedo”ti panettha na koci vohāraleso pīti āha “jīvitindriyassa upacchedo pana
tika-s0102t:1404_5: sabbākārato paramatthato maraṇa”nti. Evaṃ santepi yassa khandhabhedassa pavattattā
tika-s0102t:1404_6: “tisso mato, phusso mato”ti vohāro hoti, so bhedo khandhappabandhassa anupacchinnatāya
tika-s0102t:1404_8: Tenāha “jīvitindriyupacchedameva hī”tiādi. Sabbaso pabandhasamucchedo hi samucchedamaraṇanti.
tika-s0102t:1405_1: āha “dukkhakāraṇenā”ti. Socananti lakkhitabbatāya socanalakkhaṇo. Socitassa socanakassa
tika-s0102t:1405_2: puggalassa, cittassa vā bhāvo socitabhāvo. Abbhantareti attabhāvassa anto. Attano
tika-s0102t:1405_3: lūkhasabhāvatāya sosento. Thāmagamanena samantato sosanavasena parisosento.
tika-s0102t:1406_0: 392. “Ādissa ādissa devanti paridevanti etenāti ādevo”ti ādevana-saddaṃ katvā assumocanādivikāraṃ
tika-s0102t:1406_1: āpajjantānaṃ tabbikārāpattiyā so saddo kāraṇabhāvena vutto. Taṃ taṃ vaṇṇanti taṃ
tika-s0102t:1406_2: taṃ guṇaṃ. Tassevāti ādevaparidevasseva. Bhāvaniddesāti “ādevitattaṃ paridevitatta”nti bhāvaniddesā.
tika-s0102t:1407_0: 393. Nissayabhūto kāyo etassa atthīti kāyikaṃ. Tenāha “kāyapasādavatthuka”nti. Dukkaraṃ
tika-s0102t:1407_1: khamanaṃ etassāti dukkhamanaṃ, so eva attho sabhāvoti dukkhamanaṭṭho, tena. Sātavidhuratāya asātaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1408: 394. Cetasi bhavanti cetasikaṃ, taṃ pana yasmā cittena samaṃ pakārehi yuttaṃ, tasmā āha “cittasampayutta”nti.
tika-s0102t:1409_1: asakkuṇeyyatākaraṇavasena atibalavaṃ, virūpaṃ vā sīdanaṃ visīdanaṃ. Cittakilamathoti
tika-s0102t:1409_2: visīdanākārena cittassa parikhedo. Upāyāso, sayaṃ na dukkho dosattā, saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannadhammantarattā
tika-s0102t:1409_3: vā. Ye pana domanassameva “upāyāso”ti vadeyyuṃ, te “upāyāso tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena
tika-s0102t:1409_4: ekāya dhātuyā sampayutto, ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto”ti.
tika-s0102t:1409_5: Imāya pāḷiyā paṭikkhipitabbā. Upa-saddo bhusatthoti āha “balavataraṃ āyāso upāyāso”ti.
tika-s0102t:1409_6: Dhammamattatādīpano bhāvaniddeso dhammato aññassa kattuabhāvajotano, asati ca kattari
tika-s0102t:1409_7: tena kattabbassa, pariggahetabbassa ca abhāvo evāti āha “attattaniyābhāvadīpakābhāvaniddesā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1410_1: jāyanapakatikānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Maggabhāvanāya maggabhāvanicchāhetukatā icchitabbāti
tika-s0102t:1410_2: tādisaṃ icchaṃ nivattento “vinā maggabhāvana”nti āha. Aparo nayo na kho panetanti
tika-s0102t:1410_3: yametaṃ “aho vata mayaṃ na jātidhammā assāma, na ca vata no jāti āgaccheyyā”ti evaṃ
tika-s0102t:1410_4: pahīnasamudayesu ariyesu vijjamānaṃ ajātidhammattaṃ, parinibbutesu ca vijjamānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1410_5: jātiyā anāgamanaṃ icchitaṃ, taṃ icchantassāpi maggabhāvanāya vinā appattabbato, anicchantassāpi
tika-s0102t:1410_6: bhāvanāya pattabbato na icchāya pattabbaṃ nāma hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:1410_7: Vakkhamānatthasampiṇḍanattho pi-saddoti āha “upari sesāni upādāya pi-kāro”ti. Yanti
tika-s0102t:1410_8: hetuatthe karaṇe paccattavacananti āha “yenapi dhammenā”ti. Hetuattho hi ayaṃ dhamma-saddo,
tika-s0102t:1410_9: alabbhaneyyabhāvo ettha hetu veditabbo. Tanti vā icchitassa vatthuno alabbhanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1410_10: evamettha “yampīti yenapī”ti vibhattivipallāsena attho vutto. Yadā pana yaṃ-saddo
tika-s0102t:1410_11: “iccha”nti etaṃ apekkhati, tadā alābhavisiṭṭhā icchā vuttā hoti. Yadā pana “na labhatī”ti
tika-s0102t:1410_12: etaṃ apekkhati, tadā icchāvisiṭṭho alābho vutto hoti, so pana atthato añño dhammo
tika-s0102t:1410_13: natthi, tathāpi alabbhaneyyavatthugatā icchāva vuttā hoti. Sabbatthāti “jarādhammāna”ntiādinā
tika-s0102t:1412_0: 400. Punabbhavakaraṇaṃ punobbhavo uttarapadalopaṃ katvā mano-saddassa viya purimapadassa
tika-s0102t:1412_1: o-kārantatā daṭṭhabbā. Atha vā sīlanaṭṭhena ika-saddena gamitatthattā kiriyāvācakassa
tika-s0102t:1412_2: saddassa adassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ yathā “asūpabhakkhanasīlo asūpiko”ti. Sammohavinodaniyaṃ
tika-s0102t:1412_3: pana “punabbhavaṃ deti, punabbhavāya saṃvattati, punappunaṃ bhave nibbattetīti ponobbhavikā”ti
tika-s0102t:1412_4: attho vutto so “taddhitā” iti bahuvacananiddesato, vicittattā vā taddhitavuttiyā,
tika-s0102t:1412_5: abhidhānalakkhaṇattā vā taddhitānaṃ tesupi atthesu ponobbhavikasaddasiddhi sambhaveyyāti
tika-s0102t:1412_6: katvā vutto. Tattha kammunā sahajātā punabbhavaṃ deti, asahajātā kammasahāyabhūtā
tika-s0102t:1412_7: punabbhavāya saṃvattati, duvidhāpi punappunaṃ bhave nibbattetīti daṭṭhabbā. Nandanaṭṭhena,
tika-s0102t:1412_8: rañjanaṭṭhena ca nandīrāgo, yo ca nandīrāgo, yā ca taṇhāyanaṭṭhena taṇhā, ubhayametaṃ
tika-s0102t:1412_9: ekatthaṃ, byañjanameva nānanti taṇhā “nandīrāgena saddhiṃ atthato ekattameva gatā”ti
tika-s0102t:1412_10: vuttā. Tabbhāvattho hettha saha-saddo “sanidassanā dhammā”tiādīsu viya. Tasmā nandīrāgasahagatāti
tika-s0102t:1412_11: nandīrāgabhāvaṃ gatā sabbāsupi avatthāsu nandīrāgabhāvassa apaccakkhāya vattanatoti
tika-s0102t:1412_12: attho. Rāgasambandhena uppannassāti vuttaṃ. Rūpārūpabhavarāgassa visuṃ vuccamānattā
tika-s0102t:1413_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ piyarūpe paṭhamuppattivasena “uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ, punappunaṃ pavattivasena
tika-s0102t:1413_2: manussasobhagge, devatte ca. Attano cakkhunti savatthukaṃ cakkhuṃ vadati, sapasādaṃ
tika-s0102t:1413_4: Rajatapanāḷikaṃ viya chiddaṃ abbhantare odātattā. Pāmaṅgasuttaṃ viya ālambakaṇṇabaddhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1413_5: Tuṅgā uccā dīghā nāsikā tuṅganāsā, evaṃ laddhavohāraṃ attano ghānaṃ. “Laddhavohārā”ti
tika-s0102t:1413_6: vā pāṭho, tasmiṃ sati tuṅgā nāsā yesaṃ te tuṅganāsā, evaṃ laddhavohārā sattā attano
