tika-s0102t:1413_7: ghānanti yojanā kātabbā. Jivhaṃ…pe… maññanti vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato, kiccato ca. Kāyaṃ…pe…
tika-s0102t:1413_9: Attanā paṭiladdhāni ajjhattañca sarīragandhādīni, bahiddhā ca vilepanagandhādīni.
tika-s0102t:1413_10: Uppajjamānā uppajjatīti yadā uppajjamānā hoti, tadā ettha uppajjatīti sāmaññena gahitā
tika-s0102t:1413_11: uppādakiriyā lakkhaṇabhāvena vuttā, visayavisiṭṭhā ca lakkhitabbabhāvena. Na hi sāmaññavisesehi
tika-s0102t:1413_12: nānattavohāro na hotīti. Uppajjamānāti vā anicchito uppādo hetubhāvena vutto, uppajjatīti
tika-s0102t:1413_13: nicchito phalabhāvena yadi uppajjamānā hoti, ettha uppajjatīti.
tika-s0102t:1415_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha āgammāti nimittaṃ katvā. Nibbānahetuko hi taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho.
tika-s0102t:1415_2: Khayagamanavasena virajjati. Appavattigamanavasena nirujjhati. Anapekkhatāya cajanavasena,
tika-s0102t:1415_3: hānivasena vā cajīyati. Puna yathā nappavattati, tathā dūra khipanavasena paṭinissajjīyati.
tika-s0102t:1415_4: Bandhanabhūtāya mocanavasena muccati. Asaṃkilesavasena na allīyati. Kasmā panetaṃ
tika-s0102t:1415_5: nibbānaṃ ekameva samānaṃ nānānāmehi vuccatīti? Paṭipakkhanānatāyāti dassento “ekameva
tika-s0102t:1415_8: Asesaṃ virajjati taṇhā etthāti asesavirāgoti. Esa nayo sesesupi. Ayaṃ pana viseso
tika-s0102t:1415_9: – natthi etassa uppādo, na vā etasmiṃ adhigate puggalassa uppādoti anuppādo, asaṅkhatadhammo.
tika-s0102t:1415_10: “Appavatta”ntiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Āyūhanaṃ samudayo, tappaṭipakkhavasena anāyūhanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1416_0: Taṇhā appahīne sati yattha uppajjati, pahāne pana sati tattha tatthevassā abhāvo
tika-s0102t:1416_1: sudassitoti āha “tattheva abhāvaṃ dassetu”nti. Apaññattinti apaññāpanaṃ, “titta alābu
tika-s0102t:1416_2: atthī”ti vohārābhāvaṃ vā. Tittaalābuvalliyā appavattiṃ icchanto puriso viya ariyamaggo,
tika-s0102t:1416_3: tassa tassā appavattininnacittassa mūlacchedanaṃ viya maggassa nibbānārammaṇassa
tika-s0102t:1416_4: taṇhāya pahānaṃ, tadappavatti viya taṇhāya appavattibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1417_0: Dutiyaupamāyaṃ dakkhiṇadvāraṃ viya nibbānaṃ, coraghātakā viya maggo. Dakkhiṇadvāre
tika-s0102t:1417_1: ghātitāpi corā pacchā “aṭaviyaṃ corā ghātitā”ti vuccanti, evaṃ nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhāpi
tika-s0102t:1417_2: taṇhā “cakkhādīsu niruddhā”ti vuccati tattha kiccakaraṇābhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Purimā
tika-s0102t:1417_3: vā upamā maggena niruddhāya “piyarūpasātarūpesu niruddhā”ti vattabbatādassanatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1417_4: vuttā, pacchimā nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhāya “piyarūpasātarūpesu niruddhā”ti vattabbatādassanatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1419_1: aññassa vā maggabhāvapaṭikkhepo aññamaggapaṭikkhepo, tadatthaṃ. “Aya”nti pana attano,
tika-s0102t:1419_2: tesu ca bhikkhūsu ekaccānaṃ paccakkhabhāvato āsannapaccakkhavacanaṃ. Ārakattāti niruttinayena
tika-s0102t:1419_3: ariyasaddasiddhimāha. Ariyabhāvakarattāti ariyakaraṇo ariyoti uttarapadalopena, puggalassa
tika-s0102t:1419_4: ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaṃ karotīti vā ariyo, ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā vā ariyaṃ
tika-s0102t:1419_5: phalaṃ labhāpeti janetīti ariyo. Purimena cettha attano kiccavasena, pacchimena phalavasena
tika-s0102t:1419_6: ariyanāmalābho vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. Catusaccapaṭivedhāvahaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1419_7: catusaccaṃ vā uddissa pavattaṃ bhāvanākammaṃ yogino sukhavisesānaṃ ṭhānabhūtanti
tika-s0102t:1419_8: catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Purimāni dve saccāni vaṭṭaṃ pavattihetubhāvato. Pacchimāni
tika-s0102t:1419_9: vivaṭṭaṃ nivattitadadhigamupāyabhāvato. Vaṭṭe kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso sarūpato pariggahasabbhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1419_10: Vivaṭṭe natthi avisayattā, visayatte ca payojanābhāvato. Purimāni dve saccāni uggaṇhitvāti
tika-s0102t:1419_11: sambandho. Kammaṭṭhānapāḷiyā hi tadatthasallakkhaṇena vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho. Tenāha
tika-s0102t:1419_12: “vācāya punappunaṃ parivattento”ti. Iṭṭhaṃ kantanti nirodhamaggesu ninnabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0102t:1419_13: na abhinandanaṃ, tanninnabhāvoyeva ca tattha kammakaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1420_0: Ekapaṭivedhenevāti ekañāṇeneva paṭivijjhanena. Paṭivedho paṭighātābhāvena visaye
tika-s0102t:1420_1: nissaṅgacārasaṅkhātaṃ nibbijjhanaṃ. Abhisamayo avirajjhitvā visayassa adhigamasaṅkhāto
tika-s0102t:1420_2: avabodho. “Idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito bhiyyo”ti paricchinditvā jānanameva
tika-s0102t:1420_3: vuttanayena paṭivedhoti pariññāpaṭivedho, tena. Idañca yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte
tika-s0102t:1420_4: pacchā dukkhassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā pavattiṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1420_5: na pana maggañāṇassa “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā pavattanato. Pahīnassa puna appahātabbatāya
tika-s0102t:1420_6: pakaṭṭhaṃ hānaṃ cajanaṃ samucchindanaṃ, pahānameva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti pahānapaṭivedho,
tika-s0102t:1420_7: tena. Ayampi yasmiṃ kilese appahīyamāne maggabhāvanāya na bhavitabbaṃ, asati ca maggabhāvanāya
tika-s0102t:1420_8: yo uppajjeyya, tassa kilesassa paṭighātaṃ karontassa anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentassa
tika-s0102t:1420_9: ñāṇassa tathāpavattiyaṃ paṭighātābhāvena nissaṅgacāraṃ upādāya evaṃ vutto. Sacchikiriyā
tika-s0102t:1420_11: ta”nti yathāsabhāvato gahaṇaṃ, sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho,
tika-s0102t:1420_12: tena. Ayaṃ panassa āvaraṇassa asamucchindanato ñāṇaṃ nirodhaṃ ālambituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0102t:1420_13: tassa samucchindanato taṃ sarūpato vibhāventameva pavattatīti evaṃ vutto. Bhāvanā
tika-s0102t:1420_14: uppādanā, vaḍḍhanā ca. Tattha paṭhamamagge uppādanaṭṭhena, dutiyādīsu vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena,
tika-s0102t:1420_15: ubhayatthāpi vā ubhayathāpi veditabbaṃ. Paṭhamamaggepi hi yathārahaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyaṃ
tika-s0102t:1420_16: pavattaṃ parijānanādiṃ vaḍḍhento pavattoti vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0102t:1420_18: bhāvanā sakkā viññātuṃ, sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti bhāvanāpaṭivedho, tena. Ayampi
tika-s0102t:1420_19: hi yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā maggadhammānaṃ sarūpaparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā
tika-s0102t:1421_0: Tiṭṭhantu tāva yathādhigatā maggadhammā, yathāpavattesu phaladhammesupi ayaṃ yathādhigatasaccadhammesu
tika-s0102t:1421_1: viya vigatasammohova hoti. Tenevāha “diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo”ti
tika-s0102t:1421_2: yato sacassa dhammatāsañcoditā yathādhigatasaccadhammālambaniyo maggavīthito parato
tika-s0102t:1421_5: Ekābhisamayena abhisametīti etthāha vitaṇḍavādī “ariyamaggañāṇaṃ catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayavasena
tika-s0102t:1421_6: kiccakara”nti, so abhidhamme odhisokathāya saññāpetabbo. Idāni tameva ekābhisamayaṃ
tika-s0102t:1421_8: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu paṭivedho pubbabhāgiyo na hotīti? Saccametaṃ nippariyāyato, idha
tika-s0102t:1421_9: pana uggahādivasena pavatto avabodho pariyāyato tathā vutto. Paṭivedhanimittattā
tika-s0102t:1421_10: vā uggahādivasena pavattaṃ dukkhādīsu pubbabhāge ñāṇaṃ “paṭivedho”ti vuttaṃ, na paṭivijjhanasabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1421_11: Kiccatoti pubbabhāgehi dukkhādiñāṇehi kātabbakiccassa idha nipphattito, imasseva
tika-s0102t:1421_12: vā ñāṇassa dukkhādippakāsanakiccato, pariññāditoti attho. Ārammaṇapaṭivedhoti sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhamāha.
tika-s0102t:1421_13: Sāti paccavekkhaṇā. Idhāti imasmiṃ ṭhāne. Uggahādīsu vuccamānesu na vuttā anavasarattā.
tika-s0102t:1421_14: Adhigame hi sati tassā siyā avasaro.
tika-s0102t:1422_0: Taṃyeva hi anavasaraṃ dassetuṃ “imassa cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pubbe pariggahatoti kammaṭṭhānapariggahato
tika-s0102t:1422_1: pubbe. Uggahādivasena saccānaṃ pariggaṇhanañhi pariggaho. Tathā tāni pariggaṇhanato
tika-s0102t:1422_2: manasikāradaḷhatāya pubbabhāgiyā dukkhapariññādayo honti yevāti āha “pariggahato
tika-s0102t:1422_3: paṭṭhāya hotī”ti. Aparabhāgeti maggakkhaṇe. Duddasattāti attano pavattikkhaṇavasena
tika-s0102t:1422_4: pākaṭānipi pakatiñāṇena sabhāvarasato daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Gambhīreneva ca bhāvanāñāṇena,
tika-s0102t:1422_5: tathāpi matthakappattena ariyamaggañāṇeneva yāthāvato passitabbattā gambhīrāni. Tenāha
tika-s0102t:1422_7: accantasukhappattāya anuppattibhavatāya, anuppannapubbatāya ca pavattivasena apākaṭattā
tika-s0102t:1422_8: ca paramagambhīrattā, tathā paramagambhīrañāṇeneva passitabbatāya pakatiñāṇena daṭṭhuṃ
tika-s0102t:1422_9: na sakkuṇeyyānīti duddasāni. Tenāha “itaresaṃ panā”tiādi. Payogoti kiriyā, vāyāmo
tika-s0102t:1422_10: vā. Tassa mahantatarassa icchitabbataṃ, dukkarataratañca upamāhi dasseti “bhavaggaggahaṇattha”ntiādinā.
tika-s0102t:1422_11: Paṭivedhakkhaṇeti ariyassa maggassa catusaccasampaṭivedhakkhaṇe. Ekameva taṃ ñāṇanti
tika-s0102t:1422_12: dukkhādīsu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena ekameva taṃ maggañāṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0102t:1423_0: Imesu tīsu ṭhānesūti imesu viramitabbatāvasena jotitesu tīsu kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakkavatthūsu.
tika-s0102t:1423_1: Visuṃ visuṃ uppannassa tividhaakusalasaṅkappassa. Padapacchedatoti ettha gatamaggo
tika-s0102t:1423_2: “pada”nti vuccati, yena ca upāyena kāraṇena kāmavitakko uppajjati, so tassa gatamaggoti
tika-s0102t:1423_3: tassa pacchedo ghāto padapacchedo, tato padapacchedato. Anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1423_4: anuppattisādhanaṃ, tassa vasena. Maggakiccasādhanena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamāno ekova tividhakiccasādhano
tika-s0102t:1423_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā nayena “imesu catūsu ṭhānesū”tiādīsupi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1424_0: Musāvādāveramaṇiādayoti ettha yasmā sikkhāpadavibhaṅge viraticetanā, sabbe sampayuttadhammā
tika-s0102t:1424_1: ca sikkhāpadānīti āgatānīti tattha padhānānaṃ viraticetanānaṃ vasena “viratiyopi
tika-s0102t:1424_2: honti cetanāyopī”ti sammohavinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā keci “ādi-saddena na kevalaṃ
tika-s0102t:1424_3: pisuṇavācā veramaṇiādīnaṃyeva saṅgaho, atha kho tādisānaṃ cetanānampi saṅgaho”ti
tika-s0102t:1424_4: vadanti, taṃ pubbabhāgavasena vuccamānattā yujjeyya, musāvādādīhi viramaṇakāle vā
tika-s0102t:1424_5: viratiyo, subhāsitādivācābhāsanādikāle ca cetanāyo yojetabbā, maggakkhaṇe pana viratiyova
tika-s0102t:1424_6: icchitabbā cetanānaṃ amaggaṅgattā. Ekassa ñāṇassa dukkhādiñāṇatā viya, ekāya viratiyā
tika-s0102t:1424_7: musāvādādiviratibhāvo viya ca ekāya cetanāya sammāvācādikiccattayasādhanasabhāvābhāvā
tika-s0102t:1425_0: Bhikkhussa ājīvahetukaṃ kāyavacīduccaritaṃ nāma ayoniso āhārapariyesanahetukameva
tika-s0102t:1425_2: ājīvapakopo, na manodvāreti dassanatthaṃ. Tenāha “imesuyeva sattasu ṭhānesū”ti.
tika-s0102t:1426_0: Anuppannānanti asamudācāravasena vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena vā anuppannānaṃ. Aññathā
tika-s0102t:1426_1: hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā nāma na santi. Tenāha “ekasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:1426_2: bhave”tiādi. Yasmiṃ bhave ayaṃ imaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhati, tasmiṃ ekasmiṃ bhave. Janetīti
tika-s0102t:1426_3: uppādeti. Tādisaṃ chandaṃ kurumāno evaṃ chandaṃ janeti nāma. Vāyāmaṃ karotīti payogaṃ
tika-s0102t:1426_4: parakkamaṃ karoti. Vīriyaṃ pavattetīti kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ pakārato vatteti. Vīriyena
tika-s0102t:1426_5: cittaṃ paggahitaṃ karotīti teneva sahajātavīriyena cittaṃ ukkhipento kosajjapātato
tika-s0102t:1426_6: nisedhanena paggahitaṃ karoti. Padahanaṃ pavattetīti padhānaṃ vīriyaṃ karoti. Paṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0102t:1427_0: Uppannapubbānanti sadisavohārena vuttaṃ. Bhavati hi taṃsadisesu tabbohāro yathā “sā
tika-s0102t:1427_1: eva tittiri, tāni eva osadhānī”ti. Tenāha “idāni tādise”ti. Uppannānanti “anuppannā”ti
tika-s0102t:1427_2: avattabbataṃ āpannānaṃ. Pahānāyāti pajahanatthāya. Anuppannānaṃ kusalānanti ettha
tika-s0102t:1427_3: kusalāti uttarimanussadhammā adhippetā, tesañca uppādo nāma adhigamo paṭilābho, tappaṭikkhepena
tika-s0102t:1427_5: ārabhatī”ti vutte na khaṇaṭhiti adhippetā tadatthaṃ vīriyārabbhena payojanābhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1427_6: atha kho pabandhaṭhiti adhippetāti āha “punappunaṃ uppattipabandhavasena ṭhitattha”nti.
tika-s0102t:1427_8: asammosoti āha “asammosāyāti avināsanattha”nti. Bhiyyobhāvo punappunaṃ bhavanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1427_9: so pana uparūpari uppattīti āha “uparibhāvāyā”ti. Vepullaṃ abhiṇhappavattiyā paguṇabalavabhāvāpattīti
tika-s0102t:1427_10: vuttaṃ “vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāyā”ti, mahantabhāvāyāti attho. Bhāvanāya paripūraṇatthanti
tika-s0102t:1428: Catūsu ṭhānesūti anuppannākusalānuppādanādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu. Kiccasādhanavasenāti catubbidhassapi kiccassa ekajjhaṃ nipphādanavasena.
tika-s0102t:1429_0: Jhānāni pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi nānāti yadipi samādhiupakārakehi abhiniropanānumajjanasampiyāyanabrūhanasantasukhasabhāvehi
tika-s0102t:1429_1: vitakkādīhi sampayogabhedato bhāvanātisayappavattānaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena sammāsamādhi
tika-s0102t:1429_2: vibhatto, tathāpi vāyāmo viya anuppannākusalānuppādanādicatuvāyāmakiccaṃ, sati viya
tika-s0102t:1429_3: ca asubhāsukhāniccānattesu kāyādīsu subhādisaññāppahānacatusatikiccaṃ, eko samādhi
tika-s0102t:1429_4: catujhānasamādhikiccaṃ na sādhetīti pubbabhāgepi paṭhamajjhānasamādhi eva maggakkhaṇepi,
tika-s0102t:1429_5: tathā pubbabhāgepi catutthajjhānasamādhi eva maggakkhaṇe pīti attho. Nānāmaggavasenāti
tika-s0102t:1429_6: paṭhamamaggādinānāmaggavasena jhānāni nānā. Dutiyādayopi maggā dutiyādīnaṃ jhānānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1429_7: Ayaṃ panassāti ettha maggabhāvena catubbidhampi ekattena gahetvā “assā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1429_8: assa maggassāti attho. Ayanti pana ayaṃ jhānavasena sabbasadisasabbāsadisekaccasadisatā viseso.
tika-s0102t:1430_0: Pādakajjhānaniyamena hotīti idha pādakajjhānaniyamaṃ dhuraṃ katvā vuttaṃ, yathā cettha,
tika-s0102t:1430_1: evaṃ sammohavinodaniyampi. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana vipassanāniyamo vutto sabbavādāvirodhato,
tika-s0102t:1430_3: Vipassanāniyamo pana sādhāraṇattā idhāpi na paṭikkhittoti daṭṭhabbo. Aññe ca ācariyavādā
tika-s0102t:1430_4: parato vakkhamānā vibhajitabbāti yathāvuttameva tāva pādakajjhānaniyamaṃ vibhajanto
tika-s0102t:1430_5: āha “pādakajjhānaniyamena tāvā”ti. Paṭhamajjhāniko hoti, yasmā āsannapadese vuṭṭhitasamāpatti
tika-s0102t:1430_6: maggassa attano sadisabhāvaṃ karoti bhūmivaṇṇo viya godhāvaṇṇassa. Paripuṇṇāneva
tika-s0102t:1430_7: hontīti aṭṭha satta ca hontīti attho. Satta honti sammāsaṅkappassa abhāvato. Cha
tika-s0102t:1430_8: honti pītisambojjhaṅgassa abhāvato. Maggaṅgabojjhaṅgānaṃ sattachabhāvaṃ atidisati
tika-s0102t:1430_9: “esa nayo”ti. Arūpe catukkapañcakajjhānaṃ…pe… vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:1430_10: Nanu tattha “arūpe tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ, na “catukkapañcakajjhāna”nti?
tika-s0102t:1430_11: Saccametaṃ, yesu pana saṃsayo atthi, tesaṃ uppattidassanena, tena atthato “catukkapañcakajjhānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1430_12: uppajjatī”ti vuttameva hotīti evamāhāti veditabbaṃ. Samudāyañca apekkhitvā “tañca
tika-s0102t:1430_13: lokuttaraṃ, na lokiya”nti āha “avayavekattaṃ liṅgasamudāyassa visesakaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1430_14: Catutthajjhānameva hi tattha lokiyaṃ uppajjati, na catukkaṃ, pañcakaṃ vāti. Ettha
tika-s0102t:1430_15: kathanti pādakajjhānassa abhāvā kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti attho. Taṃjhānikāvassa tattha
tika-s0102t:1430_16: tayo maggā uppajjanti, tajjhānikaṃpaṭhamaphalādiṃ pādakaṃ katvā uparimaggabhāvanāyāti
tika-s0102t:1430_17: adhippāyo. Tikacatukkajjhānikaṃ pana maggaṃ bhāvetvā tattha uppannassa arūpacatutthajjhānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1430_18: tajjhānikaṃ phalañca pādakaṃ katvā uparimaggabhāvanāya aññajhānikāpi uppajjantīti,
tika-s0102t:1430_19: jhānaṅgādiniyāmikā pubbābhisaṅkhārasamāpattipādakaṃ, na sammasitabbāti phalassāpi pādakatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0102t:1431_0: Keci panāti moravāpīmahādattattheraṃ sandhāyāha. Puna kecīti tipiṭakacūḷābhayattheraṃ.
tika-s0102t:1431_1: Tatiyavāre kecīti “pādakajjhānameva niyametī”ti evaṃ vādinaṃ tipiṭakacūḷanāgattherañceva
tika-s0102t:1431_2: anantaraṃ vutte dve ca there ṭhapetvā itare there sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0102t:1432_1: sasantatipariyāpanno viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “attano vā cattāri saccānī”ti. Parassa
tika-s0102t:1432_2: vāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tenāha bhagavā “imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi
tika-s0102t:1432_3: samanake lokañca paññāpemi, lokasamudayañca paññāpemi, lokanirodhañca paññāpemi,
tika-s0102t:1432_4: lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadañca paññāpemī”ti kathaṃ pana ādikammiko nirodhamaggasaccāni
tika-s0102t:1432_5: pariggaṇhātīti? Anussavādisiddhamākāraṃ pariggaṇhāti. Evañca katvā lokuttarabojjhaṅge
tika-s0102t:1432_6: uddissāpi pariggaho na virujjhati. Yathāsambhavatoti sambhavānurūpaṃ, ṭhapetvā nirodhasaccaṃ
tika-s0102t:1435_1: itarāsaṃ uddhumātakādīnaṃ sabhāvenevāti navannaṃ sivathikānaṃ appanākammaṭṭhānatā
tika-s0102t:1435_2: vuttā. Dveyevāti ānāpānaṃ, dvattiṃsākāroti imāni dveyeva. Abhinivesoti vipassanābhiniveso,
tika-s0102t:1435_3: so pana sammasaniyadhammapariggaho. Iriyāpathā, ālokitādayo ca rūpadhammānaṃ avatthāvisesamattatāya
tika-s0102t:1435_4: na sammasanupagā viññattiādayo viya. Nīvaraṇabojjhaṅgā ādito na pariggahetabbāti
tika-s0102t:1435_5: vuttaṃ “iriyāpatha…pe… na jāyatī”ti. Kesādiapadesena tadupādānadhammā viya iriyāpathādiapadesena
tika-s0102t:1435_6: tadavatthā rūpadhammā pariggayhanti, nīvaraṇādimukhena ca taṃsampayuttā, taṃnissayadhammāti
tika-s0102t:1435_7: adhippāyena mahāsivatthero ca iriyāpathādīsupi “abhiniveso jāyatī”ti avoca. “Atthi
tika-s0102t:1435_8: nu kho me”tiādi pana sabhāvato iriyāpathādīnaṃ ādikammikassa anicchitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1436_0: Kāmaṃ “idha bhikkhave bhikkhū”tiādinā uddesaniddesesu tattha tattha bhikkhuggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:1436_1: kataṃ taṃpaṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatthaṃ, desanā pana sabbasādhāraṇāti dassetuṃ
tika-s0102t:1436_2: “yo hi koci bhikkhave” icceva vuttaṃ, na bhikkhu yevāti dassento “yo hi koci bhikkhu
tika-s0102t:1436_3: vā”tiādimāha. Dassanamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānantī sikhāppattā aggamaggapaññā
tika-s0102t:1436_4: aññā nāma, tassa phalabhāvato aggaphalaṃ pīti āha “aññāti arahatta”nti.
tika-s0102t:1437: Appatarepi kāle sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassentoti yojanā. Niyyātentoti nigamento.
tika-s0102t:1440: 406. Bhagavatā evaṃ gahitanāmattāti yojanā. Yasmā rājaputtā loke “kumāro”ti voharīyanti. Ayañca rañño kittimaputto, tasmā āha “rañño…pe… sañjāniṃsū”ti.
tika-s0102t:1441_0: Assāti therassa. Puññāni karonto kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ceva manussesu ca uppajjitvā
tika-s0102t:1441_1: visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā. Tatiyadivaseti pabbataṃ āruḷhadivasato tatiye divase.
tika-s0102t:1442: Tesaṃ sāvakabodhiyā niyatatāya, puññasambhārassa ca sātisayattā vinipātaṃ agantvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ…pe… anubhavantānaṃ. Devatāyāti pubbe sahadhammacāriniyā suddhāvāsadevatāya.
tika-s0102t:1443_0: “Kuladārikāya kucchimhi uppanno”ti vatvā taṃ evassa uppannabhāvaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0102t:1443_1: dassetuṃ “sā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sāti kuladārikā. Ca-saddo byatirekattho, tena
tika-s0102t:1443_2: vuccamānaṃ visesaṃ joteti. Kulagharanti patikulagehaṃ. Gabbhanimittanti gabbhassa
tika-s0102t:1443_3: saṇṭhitabhāvanimittaṃ. Satipi visākhāya ca sāvatthivāsikulapariyāpannatte tassā tattha
tika-s0102t:1443_4: padhānabhāvadassanatthaṃ “visākhañcā”ti vuttaṃ yathā “brāhmaṇā āgatā vāsiṭṭhopi āgato”ti.
tika-s0102t:1443_5: Devatāti idhapi sā eva suddhāvāsadevatā. Pañheti “bhikkhu bhikkhu ayaṃ vammiko”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:1444_0: Setabyāti itthiliṅgavasena tassa nagarassa nāmaṃ. Uttarenāti ena-saddayogena “setabya”nti
tika-s0102t:1444_1: upayogavacanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Atthavacanena pana uttarasaddaṃ apekkhitvā setabyatoti
tika-s0102t:1444_2: nissakkappayogo kato. Anabhisittakarājāti khattiyajātiko abhisekaṃ appatto.
tika-s0102t:1446_0: 407. Diṭṭhiyeva diṭṭhigatanti gata-saddena padavaḍḍhanamāha, diṭṭhiyā vā gatamattaṃ
tika-s0102t:1446_1: diṭṭhigataṃ, ayāthāvaggāhitāya gantabbābhāvato diṭṭhiyā gahaṇamattaṃ, kevalo micchābhinivesoti
tika-s0102t:1446_2: attho, taṃ pana diṭṭhigataṃ tassa ayonisomanasikārādivasena uppajjitvā paṭipakkhasammukhībhāvābhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1446_3: anurūpāhāralābhato ca samudācārappattaṃ jātanti pāḷiyaṃ “uppannaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1446_4: Taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ apadisitvāti tato idhāgacchanakassa, ito tattha gacchanakassa ca
tika-s0102t:1446_5: apadisanato “tattha tattheva sattānaṃ ucchijjanato”ti evamādi taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭirūpakaṃ apadisitvā.
tika-s0102t:1447: 408. Āpannānadhippetatthavisaye ayaṃ purā-saddapayogoti āha “purā…pe… saññāpetīti yāva na saññāpetī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1449_0: 411. Yathā candimasūriyā uḷāravipulobhāsatāya aññena obhāsena anabhibhavanīyā, evamayampi
tika-s0102t:1449_2: ṭhāne ete pavattenti, kittakañca ṭhānaṃ nesaṃ ābhā pharatī”ti evamādimpi codanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1449_3: saṅgaṇhāti. Paliveṭhessatīti ābandhissati, anuyuñjissatīti attho. Nibbeṭhetuṃ taṃ
tika-s0102t:1449_4: vissajjetuṃ. Tasmāti yasmā yathāvuttaṃ codanaṃ nibbeṭhetuṃ na sakkoti, tasmā. Attano
tika-s0102t:1449_5: anicchitaṃ saṅghātanaṃ pakkhaṃ paṭijānanto “parasmiṃ loke, na imasmi”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1450_0: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ natthikadiṭṭhi “devo”ti paṭijānātīti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavā
tika-s0102t:1450_1: panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Devāpi devattabhāveneva ucchijjanti, manussāpi manussattabhāveneva
tika-s0102t:1450_2: ucchijjantī”ti evaṃ vā assa diṭṭhi, evañca katvā “devā te, na manussā”ti vacanañca
tika-s0102t:1450_3: na virujjhati. Evaṃ candeti candavimāne, na ca cande vā kathiyante.
tika-s0102t:1451_0: 412. Ābādho etesaṃ atthīti ābādhikā. Dukkhaṃ sañjātaṃ etesanti dukkhitā. Saddhāya
tika-s0102t:1451_1: ayitabbā saddhāyikā, saddhāya pavattiṭṭhānabhūtā. Tenāha “ahaṃ tumhe”tiādi. Paccayo
tika-s0102t:1453_0: 413. Uddisitvāti upecca dassetvā. Kammakāraṇikasattesūti nerayikānaṃ saṅghātanakasattesu.
tika-s0102t:1453_1: Kammamevāti tehi tehi nerayikehi katakammameva. Kammakāraṇaṃ karotīti āyūhanānurūpaṃ
tika-s0102t:1453_2: taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ karoti, tathā dukkhaṃ uppādetīti attho. Nirayapālāti ettha iti-saddo
tika-s0102t:1453_3: ādiattho, tena tattha sabbaṃ nirayakaṇḍapāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Evaṃ suttato nirayapālānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1453_4: atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni yuttitopi dassetuṃ “manussaloke”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nerayike
tika-s0102t:1453_5: niraye pālenti tato niggantuṃ appadānavasena rakkhantīti nirayapālā. Yaṃ panettha
tika-s0102t:1455: 415. Nimmajjathāti niravasesato majjatha sodhetha. Taṃ pana tassa tassa gūthassa tathā sodhanaṃ apanayanaṃ hotīti āha “apanethā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1456_0: Asucīti asuddho, so pana yasmā manavaḍḍhanako manoharo na hoti, tasmā āha “amanāpo”ti.
tika-s0102t:1456_1: Asucisaṅkhātaṃ asucibhāgataṃ attano sabhāvataṃ gato pattoti asucisaṅkhātoti āha “asucikoṭṭhāsabhūto”ti.
tika-s0102t:1456_2: Duggandhoti duṭṭhagandho aniṭṭhagandho, so pana na yo koci, atha kho pūtigandhoti
tika-s0102t:1456_4: paṭikūlarūpo. Ubbādhatīti uparūpari bādhati. Manussānaṃ gandho…pe… bādhati ativiya
tika-s0102t:1456_5: asucisabhāvattā, asucimhiyeva jātasaṃvaddhanabhāvato, devānañca ghānapasādassa tikkhavisadabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1458: 419. Sundaradhammeti sobhanaguṇe. Sugatisukhanti sugati ceva tappariyāpannaṃ sukhañca.
tika-s0102t:1460_0: 420. Puññakammato eti uppajjatīti ayo, sukhaṃ. Tappaṭipakkhato anayo, dukkhaṃ. Apakkanti
tika-s0102t:1460_1: na siddhaṃ na niṭṭhānappattaṃ. Na paripācenti na niṭṭhānaṃ pāpenti. Na upacchindanti
tika-s0102t:1460_2: attavinipātassa sāvajjabhāvato. Āgamentīti udikkhanti. Nibbisanti yassa pana taṃ
tika-s0102t:1460_3: kammaphalaṃ nibbisanto niyuñjanto, nibbisanti vā nibbesaṃ vetanaṃ paṭikaṅkhanto bhatapuriso yathā.
tika-s0102t:1463_0: 422. “Nikkhamantaṃ vā pavisantaṃ vā jīva”nti idaṃ tassa ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. So
tika-s0102t:1463_1: hi “sattānaṃ supinadassanakāle attabhāvato jīvo bahi nikkhamitvā taṃtaṃārāmarāmaṇeyyakadassanādivasena
tika-s0102t:1463_2: ito cito ca paribbhamitvā punadeva attabhāvaṃ anupavisatī”ti evaṃ pavattamicchāgāhavipallattacitto.
tika-s0102t:1463_3: Athassa thero khuddakāya āṇiyā vipulaṃ āṇiṃ nīharanto viya jīvasamaññāmukhena ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ
tika-s0102t:1463_4: nīharitukāmo “api nu tā tuyhaṃ jīvaṃ passanti pavisantaṃ vā nikkhamantaṃ vā”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:1463_5: Yattha pana tathārūpā jīvasamaññā, taṃ dassento “cittācāraṃ jīvanti gahetvā āhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1464_0: 423. Veṭhetvāti vekhadānasaṅkhepena veṭhetvā. Cavanakāleti cavanassa cutiyā pattakāle,
tika-s0102t:1464_2: hi tadā labbhati, matta-saddo vā visesanivattiattho, tena kammajāditisantatirūpavisesaṃ
tika-s0102t:1464_3: nivatteti. Appavattā hontīti appavattikā honti, na upalabbhatīti attho. Viññāṇe pana
tika-s0102t:1464_4: jīvasaññī, tasmā “viññāṇakkhandho gacchatī”ti āha, tattha anupalabbhanatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:1467_0: 425. Āmatoti ettha ā-saddo āmisa-saddo viya upaḍḍhapariyāyoti āha “addhamato”ti,
tika-s0102t:1467_1: āmatoti vā īsaṃ darathena usmanā yuttamaraṇo marantoti attho. Mīyamāno hi avigatusmo
tika-s0102t:1467_2: hoti, na mato viya vigatusmo. Tenāha “marituṃ āraddho hotī”ti. Tathā rūpassa odhunanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1467_3: nāmassa orato parivattanamevāti āha “orato karothā”ti. Orato kātukāmassa pana saṃparivattanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1467_4: sandhunanaṃ, taṃ pana parato karaṇanti āha “parato karothā”ti. Paramukhaṃ katassa
tika-s0102t:1467_5: ito cito parivattanaṃ niddhunananti āha “aparāparaṃ karothā”ti. Indriyāni aparibhinnānīti
tika-s0102t:1469: 426. Saṅkhaṃ dhamati, dhamāpetīti vā saṅkhadhamo. Upalāpetvāti uparūpari saddayogavasena sallāpetvā, saddayuttaṃ katvāti attho. Taṃ pana atthato dhamanamevāti āha “dhamitvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1471_0: 428. Āhito aggi etassa atthīti aggiko, svāssa aggikabhāvo yasmā aggihutamālāvedisampādanehi
tika-s0102t:1471_2: tassa payirupāsanāya icchito, tasmā vuttaṃ “aggiparicārako”ti. Āyuṃ pāpuṇāpeyyanti
tika-s0102t:1471_3: yathā cirajīvī hoti, evaṃ āyuṃ pacchimavayaṃ pāpeyyaṃ. Vaḍḍhiṃ gameyyanti sarīrāvayave,
tika-s0102t:1471_4: guṇāvayave ca phātiṃ pāpeyyaṃ. Araṇī yugaḷanti uttarāraṇī, adharāraṇīti araṇīdvayaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1472_0: 429. Evanti “bālo pāyāsirājañño”tiādippakārena. Tayāti theraṃ sandhāya vadati. Vuttayuttakāraṇamakkhalakkhaṇenāti
tika-s0102t:1472_2: Palāsenāti palāsetīti palāso, parassa guṇe uttaritare ḍaṃsitvā viya chaḍḍento attano
tika-s0102t:1472_3: guṇehi same karotīti attho. Samakaraṇaraso hi palāso, tena palāsena.
tika-s0102t:1474_1: Sannaddhadhanukalāpanti ettha kalāpanti tūṇīramāha, tañca sannayhato dhanunā vinā
tika-s0102t:1474_2: na sannayhatīti āha “sannaddhadhanukalāpa”nti. Āsittodakāni vaṭumānīti gamanamaggā
tika-s0102t:1474_3: ceva taṃtaṃudakamaggā ca sammadeva devena phuṭṭhattā tahaṃ tahaṃ paggharitaudaka
tika-s0102t:1474_4: sandamānaudakā. Tenāha “paripuṇṇasalilā maggā ca kandarā cā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1475: Yathābhatenāti sakaṭesu yathāṭhapitena, yathā “amma ito karohī”ti vutte ṭhapesīti attho karaṇakiriyāya kiriyāsāmaññavācībhāvato. Tasmā yathāropitena, yathāgahitenāti attho vutto.
tika-s0102t:1477_0: 434. Parājayaguḷanti yena guḷena, yāya salākāya ṭhitāya ca parājayo hoti, taṃ adassanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1477_1: gamento gilati. Pajjohananti pakārehi juhanakammaṃ. Taṃ pana balidānavasena karīyatīti āha “balikamma”nti.
tika-s0102t:1479_0: 436. Gāmapattanti gāmo eva hutvā āpajjitabbaṃ, suññabhāvena anāvasitabbaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0102t:1479_3: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “ayamevattho”ti. Susannaddhoti sukhena gahetvā gamanayogyatāvasena
tika-s0102t:1479_4: suṭṭhu sajjito. Taṃ pana susajjanaṃ suṭṭhu bandhanavasenevāti āha “subaddho”ti.
tika-s0102t:1480: Ayādīnampi lohabhāve satipi loha-saddo sāsane tambalohe niruḷhoti āha “lohanti tambaloha”nti.
tika-s0102t:1482_0: 437. Abhiraddhoti ārādhitacitto, sāsanassa ārādhitacittatā pasīdanavasenāti āha “abhippasanno”ti.
tika-s0102t:1482_1: Pañhupaṭṭhānānīti pañhesu upaṭṭhānāni mayā pucchitatthesu tumhākaṃ vissajjanavasena ñāṇupaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0102t:1484_0: 438. Saṅghātanti saṃ-saddo padavaḍḍhanamattanti āha “ghāta”nti. Vipākaphalenāti sadisaphalena.
tika-s0102t:1484_1: Mahapphalo na hoti gavādipāṇaghātena upakkiliṭṭhabhāvato. Guṇānisaṃsenāti uddayaphalena.
tika-s0102t:1484_2: Ānubhāvajutiyāti paṭipakkhavigamanajanitena sabhāvasaṅkhātena tejena. Na mahājutiko
tika-s0102t:1484_3: hoti aparisuddhabhāvato. Vipākavipphāratāyāti vipākaphalassa vipulatāya, pāripūriyāti
tika-s0102t:1484_4: attho. Duṭṭhukhetteti usabhādidosehi dūsitakhette, taṃ pana vappābhāvato asāraṃ hotīti
tika-s0102t:1484_5: āha “nissārakhette”ti. Dubbhūmeti kucchitabhūmibhāge, svāssa kucchitabhāvo asāratāya
tika-s0102t:1484_6: vā siyā ninnatādidosavasena vā. Tattha paṭhamo pakkho paṭhamapadena dassitoti itaraṃ
tika-s0102t:1484_7: dassento “visamabhūmibhāge”ti āha. Daṇḍābhighātādinā chinnabhinnāni. Pūtīnīti gomayalepadānādisukhena
tika-s0102t:1484_8: asukkhāpitattā pūtibhāvaṃ gatāni. Tāni pana yasmā sāravantāni na honti, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0102t:1484_9: “nissārānī”ti. Vātātapahatānīti vātena ca ātapena ca vinaṭṭhabījasāmatthiyāni. Tenāha
tika-s0102t:1484_11: taṃ taṇḍulasāro, tassa ādānaṃ gahaṇaṃ tathāuppajjanameva. Etāni pana bījāni na tādisāni
tika-s0102t:1484_12: khaṇḍādidosavantatāya. Dhārāya khette anuppavesanaṃ nāma vassanameva, taṃ paṭikkhepavasena
tika-s0102t:1484_13: dassento āha “na sammā vasseyyā”ti. Aṅkuramūlapattādīhīti cettha aṅkurakandādīhi
tika-s0102t:1484_14: uddhaṃ vuddhiṃ, mūlajaṭādīhi heṭṭhā viruḷhiṃ, pattapupphādīhi samantato ca vepullanti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1485_1: Gavādighātenapi hi tattha paṭiggāhakānaṃ ghāso saṅkīyati. “Aparūpaghātitāyā”ti idaṃ
tika-s0102t:1485_2: sīlavantatāya kāraṇavacanaṃ. Guṇātirekanti guṇātirittaṃ, sīlādilokuttaraguṇehi visiṭṭhanti
tika-s0102t:1487_0: 439. Atha kho tehi sakuṇḍakehi taṇḍulehi siddhaṃbhattaṃ uttaṇḍulameva hotīti āha
tika-s0102t:1487_1: “uttaṇḍulabhatta”nti. Bilaṅgaṃ vuccati āranālaṃ bilaṅgato nibbattanato, tadeva kañjiyato
tika-s0102t:1487_2: jātanti kañjiyaṃ, taṃ dutiyaṃ etassāti bilaṅgadutiyaṃ, taṃ “kañjikadutiya”nti ca
tika-s0102t:1487_3: vuttaṃ. Dhorakānīti dhoviyāni. Yasmā thūlatarānipi “thūlānī”ti vattabbataṃ arahanti,
tika-s0102t:1487_4: tasmā “thūlāni cā”ti vuttaṃ. Guḷadasānīti suttānaṃ thūlatāya, kañjikassa bahalatāya
tika-s0102t:1487_5: ca piṇḍitadasāni. Tenāha “puñjapuñja…pe… dasānī”ti. Anuddisatīti anu anu katheti.
tika-s0102t:1488_0: 440. Asakkaccanti na sakkaccaṃ anādarakāraṃ, taṃ pana kammaphalasaddhāya abhāvena
tika-s0102t:1488_1: hotīti āha “saddhāvirahita”nti. Acittīkatanti cittīkārapaccupaṭṭhāpanavasena na cittīkataṃ.
tika-s0102t:1488_2: Tenāha “cittīkāravirahita”ntiādi. Cittīkārarahitaṃ vā acittīkataṃ, yathā kataṃ paresaṃ
tika-s0102t:1488_3: vimhayāvahaṃ hoti, tathā akataṃ. Cittassa uḷārapaṇītabhāvo pana asakkaccadāneneva
tika-s0102t:1488_4: bādhito. Apaviddhanti chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ viya apaviddhaṃ katvā, etena tasmiṃ dāne
tika-s0102t:1488_5: gāravākaraṇaṃ vadati. Serīsakaṃ nāmāti “serīsaka”nti evaṃ nāmakaṃ. Tucchanti parijanaparicchedavirahato rittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1490_1: manuññadassano dibbo sirīsarukkho. Aṭṭhāsīti phalassa kammasarikkhataṃ dassento vimānadvāre
tika-s0102t:1490_2: nibbattitvā aṭṭhāsi. Pubbāciṇṇavasenāti purimajātiyaṃ tattha nivāsaparicayanavasena.
tika-s0102t:1490_3: Na kevalaṃ pubbāciṇṇavaseneva, atha kho utusukhumavasena pīti dassento “tattha kirassa
tika-s0102t:1491_0: Soti uttaro māṇavo. Yadi asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā pāyāsi tattha nibbatto, pāyāsissa
tika-s0102t:1491_1: paricārikā sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā kathaṃ tattha nibbattāti āha “pāyāsissa panā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1491_2: Nikantivasenāti pāyāsimhi sāpekkhāvasena, pubbepi vā tattha nivutthapubbatāya. Disācārikavimānanti
tika-s0102t:1491_3: ākāsaṭṭhaṃ hutvā disāsu vicaraṇakavimānaṃ, na rukkhapabbatasikharādisambandhaṃ. Vaṭṭaniaṭaviyanti vimānavīthiyanti.
